txt: "_I know no way of judging of the Future but by the Past_."
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: --_Patrick Henry_.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: REPORT
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of a select committee of the Senate of Ohio, in 1857, on a bill proposed
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: to protect the passenger pigeon.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "The passenger pigeon needs no protection. Wonderfully prolific, having
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the vast forests of the North as its breeding grounds, traveling
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: hundreds of miles in search of food, it is here to-day and elsewhere
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: to-morrow, and no ordinary destruction can lessen them, or be missed
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: from the myriads that are yearly produced."
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "The snipe (_Scolopax wilsonii_) needs no protection.... The snipe, too,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: like the pigeon, will take care of itself, and its yearly numbers can
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: not be materially lessened by the gun."
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: [Illustration: THE LAST LIVING PASSENGER PIGEON
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "_I drink to him, he is not here,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Yet I would guard his glory;
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: A knight without reproach or fear
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Should live in song and story_."
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: --_Walsh_.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: FOREWORD
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The preservation of animal and plant life, and of the general beauty
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of Nature, is one of the foremost duties of the men and women of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: to-day. It is an imperative duty, because it must be performed at
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: once, for otherwise it will be too late. Every possible means of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: preservation,--sentimental, educational and legislative,--must be
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: employed.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The present warning issues with no uncertain sound, because this great
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: battle for preservation and conservation cannot be won by gentle tones,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: nor by appeals to the aesthetic instincts of those who have no sense of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: beauty, or enjoyment of Nature. It is necessary to sound a loud alarm,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: to present the facts in very strong language, backed up by irrefutable
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: statistics and by photographs which tell no lies, to establish the law
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and enforce it if needs be with a bludgeon.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: This book is such an alarm call. Its forceful pages remind me of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: sounding of the great bells in the watch-towers of the cities of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Middle Ages which called the citizens to arms to protect their homes,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: their liberties and their happiness. It is undeniable that the welfare
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and happiness of our own and of all future generations of Americans are
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: at stake in this battle for the preservation of Nature against the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: selfishness, the ignorance, or the cruelty of her destroyers.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: We no longer destroy great works of art. They are treasured, and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: regarded as of priceless value; but we have yet to attain the state of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: civilization where the destruction of a glorious work of Nature, whether
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: it be a cliff, a forest, or a species of mammal or bird, is regarded
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: with equal abhorrence. The whole earth is a poorer place to live in when
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: a colony of exquisite egrets or birds of paradise is destroyed in order
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: that the plumes may decorate the hat of some lady of fashion, and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: ultimately find their way into the rubbish heap. The people of all the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: New England States are poorer when the ignorant whites, foreigners, or
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: negroes of our southern states destroy the robins and other song birds
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of the North for a mess of pottage.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Travels through Europe, as well as over a large part of the North
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: American continent, have convinced me that nowhere is Nature being
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: destroyed so rapidly as in the United States. Except within our
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: conservation areas, an earthly paradise is being turned into an earthly
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: hades; and it is not savages nor primitive men who are doing this, but
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: men and women who boast of their civilization. Air and water are
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: polluted, rivers and streams serve as sewers and dumping grounds,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: forests are swept away and fishes are driven from the streams. Many
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: birds are becoming extinct, and certain mammals are on the verge of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: extermination. Vulgar advertisements hide the landscape, and in all
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: that disfigures the wonderful heritage of the beauty of Nature to-day,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: we Americans are in the lead.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Fortunately the tide of destruction is ebbing, and the tide of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: conservation is coming in. Americans are practical. Like all other
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: northern peoples, they love money and will sacrifice much for it, but
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: they are also full of idealism, as well as of moral and spiritual
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: energy. The influence of the splendid body of Americans and Canadians
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: who have turned their best forces of mind and language into literature
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and into political power for the conservation movement, is becoming
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: stronger every day. Yet we are far from the point where the momentum of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: conservation is strong enough to arrest and roll back the tide of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: destruction; and this is especially true with regard to our fast
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: vanishing animal life.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The facts and figures set forth in this volume will astonish all those
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: lovers of Nature and friends of the animal world who are living in a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: false or imaginary sense of security. The logic of these facts is
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: inexorable. As regards our birds and mammals, the failures of supposed
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: protection in America--under a system of free shooting--are so glaring
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: that we are confident this exposure will lead to sweeping reforms. The
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: author of this work is no amateur in the field of wild-life protection.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: His ideas concerning methods of reform are drawn from long and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: successful experience. The states which are still behind in this
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: movement may well give serious heed to his summons, and pass the new
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: laws that are so urgently demanded to save the vanishing remnant.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The New York Zoological Society, which is cooperating with many other
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: organizations in this great movement, sends forth this work in the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: belief that there is no one who is more ardently devoted to the great
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: cause or rendering more effective service in it than William T.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Hornaday. We believe that this is a great book, destined to exert a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: world-wide influence, to be translated into other languages, and to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: arouse the defenders and lovers of our vanishing animal life before it
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: is too late.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: HENRY FAIRFIELD OSBORN,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 10 December, 1912. _President of the New York Zoological Society_
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: PREFACE
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The writing of this book has taught me many things. Beyond question, we
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: are exterminating our finest species of mammals, birds and fishes
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: _according to law!_
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: I am appalled by the mass of evidence proving that throughout the entire
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: United States and Canada, in every state and province, the existing
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: legal system for the preservation of wild life is fatally defective.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: There is not a single state in our country from which the killable game
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: is not being rapidly and persistently shot to death, legally or
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: illegally, very much more rapidly than it is breeding, with
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: extermination for the most of it close in sight. This statement is not
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: open to argument; for millions of men know that it is literally true. We
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: are living in a fool's paradise.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The rage for wild-life slaughter is far more prevalent to-day throughout
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the world than it was in 1872, when the buffalo butchers paved the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: prairies of Texas and Colorado with festering carcasses. From one end of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: our continent to the other, there is a restless, resistless desire to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "kill, _kill!_"
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: I have been shocked by the accumulation of evidence showing that all
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: over our country and Canada fully nine-tenths of our protective laws
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: have practically been dictated by the killers of the game, and that in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: all save a very few instances the hunters have been exceedingly careful
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: to provide "open seasons" for slaughter, as long as any game remains to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: kill!
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: _And yet, the game of North America does not belong wholly and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: exclusively to the men who kill! The other ninety-seven per cent of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: People have vested rights in it, far exceeding those of the three per
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: cent. Posterity has claims upon it that no honest man can ignore._
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: I am now going to ask both the true sportsman and the people who do not
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: kill wild things to awake, and do their plain duty in protecting and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: preserving the game and other wild life which belongs partly to us, but
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: chiefly to those who come after us. Can they be aroused, before it is
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: too late?
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The time to discuss tiresome academic theories regarding "bag limits"
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and different "open seasons" as being sufficient to preserve the game,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: has gone by! We have reached the point where the alternatives are _long
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: closed seasons or a gameless continent;_ and we must choose one or the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: other, speedily. A continent without wild life is like a forest with no
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: leaves on the trees.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The great increase in the slaughter of song birds for food, by the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: negroes and poor whites of the South, has become an unbearable scourge
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: to our migratory birds,--the very birds on which farmers north and south
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: depend for protection from the insect hordes,--the very birds that are
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: most near and dear to the people of the North. _Song-bird slaughter is
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: growing and spreading_, with the decrease of the game birds! It is a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: matter that requires instant attention and stern repression. At the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: present moment it seems that the only remedy lies in federal protection
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: for all migratory birds,--because so many states will not do their duty.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: We are weary of witnessing the greed, selfishness and cruelty of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "civilized" man toward the wild creatures of the earth. We are sick of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: tales of slaughter and pictures of carnage. It is time for a sweeping
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Reformation; and that is precisely what we now demand.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: I have been a sportsman myself; but times have changed, and we must
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: change also. When game was plentiful, I believed that it was right for
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: men and boys to kill a limited amount of it for sport and for the table.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: But the old basis has been swept away by an Army of Destruction that now
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: is almost beyond all control. We must awake, and arouse to the new
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: situation, face it like men, and adjust our minds to the new conditions.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The three million gunners of to-day must no longer expect or demand the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: same generous hunting privileges that were right for hunters fifty years
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: ago, when game was fifty times as plentiful as it is now and there was
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: only one killer for every fifty now in the field.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The fatalistic idea that bag-limit laws can save the game is to-day _the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: curse of all our game birds, mammals and fishes!_ It is a fraud, a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: delusion and a snare. That miserable fetish has been worshipped much too
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: long. Our game is being exterminated, everywhere, by blind insistence
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: upon "open seasons," and solemn reliance upon "legal bag-limits." If a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: majority of the people of America feel that so long as there is any game
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: alive there must be an annual two months or four months open season for
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: its slaughter, then assuredly we soon will have a gameless continent.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The only thing that will save the game is by stopping the killing of it!
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In establishing and promulgating this principle, the cause of wild-life
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: protection greatly needs three things: money, labor, and publicity. With
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the first, we can secure the second and third. But can we get it,--and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: _get it in time to save?_
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: This volume is in every sense a contribution to a Cause; and as such it
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: ever will remain. I wish the public to receive it on that basis. So much
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: important material has drifted straight to it from other hands that this
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: unexpected aid seems to the author like a good omen.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The manuscript has received the benefit of a close and critical reading
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and correcting by my comrade on the firing-line and esteemed friend, Mr.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Madison Grant, through which the text was greatly improved. But for the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: splendid encouragement and assistance that I have received from him and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: from Professor Henry Fairneld Osborn the work involved would have borne
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: down rather heavily.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The four chapters embracing the "New Laws Needed; A Roll-Call of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: States," were critically inspected, corrected and brought down to date
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: by Dr. T.S. Palmer, our highest authority on the game laws of the Nation
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and the States. For this valuable service the author is deeply grateful.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Of course the author is alone responsible for all the opinions and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: conclusions herein recorded, and for all errors that appear outside of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: quotations.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: I trust that the Reader will kindly excuse and forget all the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: typographic and clerical errors that may have escaped me in the rush
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: that had to be made against Time.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: W.T.H.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: UNIVERSITY HEIGHTS, NEW YORK,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: December 1, 1912.

txt: OUR VANISHING WILD LIFE
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: PART I. EXTERMINATION
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: CHAPTER I
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: THE FORMER ABUNDANCE OF WILD LIFE
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: _"By my labors my vineyard flourished. But Ahab came. Alas! for Naboth."_
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In order that the American people may correctly understand and judge the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: question of the extinction or preservation of our wild life, it is
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: necessary to recall the near past. It is not necessary, however, to go
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: far into the details of history; for a few quick glances at a few high
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: points will be quite sufficient for the purpose in view.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Any man who reads the books which best tell the story of the development
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of the American colonies of 1712 into the American nation of 1912, and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: takes due note of the wild-life features of the tale, will say without
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: hesitation that when the American people received this land from the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: bountiful hand of Nature, it was endowed with a magnificent and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: all-pervading supply of valuable wild creatures. The pioneers and the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: early settlers were too busy even to take due note of that fact, or to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: comment upon it, save in very fragmentary ways.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Nevertheless, the wild-life abundance of early American days survived
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: down to so late a period that it touched the lives of millions of people
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: now living. Any man 55 years of age who when a boy had a taste for
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "hunting,"--for at that time there were no "sportsmen" in America,--will
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: remember the flocks and herds of wild creatures that he saw and which
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: made upon his mind many indelible impressions.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "Abundance" is the word with which to describe the original animal life
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: that stocked our country, and all North America, only a short
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: half-century ago. Throughout every state, on every shore-line, in all
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the millions of fresh water lakes, ponds and rivers, on every mountain
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: range, in every forest, _and even on every desert_, the wild flocks and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: herds held sway. It was impossible to go beyond the settled haunts of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: civilized man and escape them.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: It was a full century after the complete settlement of New England and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the Virginia colonies that the wonderful big-game fauna of the great
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: plains and Rocky Mountains was really discovered; but the bison
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: millions, the antelope millions, the mule deer, the mountain sheep and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: mountain goat were there, all the time. In the early days, the millions
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of pinnated grouse and quail of the central states attracted no serious
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: attention from the American people-at-large; but they lived and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: flourished just the same, far down in the seventies, when the greedy
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: market gunners systematically slaughtered them, and barreled them up for
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "the market," while the foolish farmers calmly permitted them to do it.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: We obtain the best of our history of the former abundance of North
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: American wild life first from the pages of Audubon and Wilson; next,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: from the records left by such pioneers as Lewis and Clark, and last from
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the testimony of living men. To all this we can, many of us, add
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: observations of our own.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: To me the most striking fact that stands forth in the story of American
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: wild life one hundred years ago is the wide extent and thoroughness of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: its distribution. Wide as our country is, and marvelous as it is in the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: diversity of its climates, its soils, its topography, its flora, its
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: riches and its poverty, Nature gave to each square mile and to each acre
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: a generous quota of wild creatures, according to its ability to maintain
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: living things. No pioneer ever pushed so far, or into regions so
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: difficult or so remote, that he did not find awaiting him a host of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: birds and beasts. Sometimes the pioneer was not a good hunter; usually
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: he was a stupid fisherman; but the "game" was there, nevertheless. The
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: time was when every farm had its quota.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The part that the wild life of America played in the settlement and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: development of this continent was so far-reaching in extent, and so
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: enormous in potential value, that it fairly staggers the imagination.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: From the landing of the Pilgrims down to the present hour the wild game
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: has been the mainstay and the resource against starvation of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: pathfinder, the settler, the prospector, and at times even the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: railroad-builder. In view of what the bison millions did for the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Dakotas, Montana, Wyoming, Kansas and Texas, it is only right and square
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: that those states should now do something for the perpetual preservation
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of the bison species and all other big game that needs help.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: For years and years, the antelope millions of the Montana and Wyoming
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: grass-lands fed the scout and Indian-fighter, freighter, cowboy and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: surveyor, ranchman _and sheep-herder_; but thus far I have yet to hear
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of one Western state that has ever spent one penny directly for the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: preservation of the antelope! And to-day we are in a hand-to-hand fight
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: in Congress, and in Montana, with the Wool-Growers Association, which
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: maintains in Washington a keen lobbyist to keep aloft the tariff on
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: wool, and prevent Congress from taking 15 square miles of grass lands on
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Snow Creek, Montana, for a National Antelope Preserve. All that the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: wool-growers want is the entire earth, all to themselves. Mr. McClure,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the Secretary of the Association says:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "The proper place in which to preserve the big game of the West is in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: city parks, where it can be protected."
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: To the colonist of the East and pioneer of the West, the white-tailed
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: deer was an ever present help in time of trouble. Without this
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: omnipresent animal, and the supply of good meat that each white flag
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: represented, the commissariat difficulties of the settlers who won the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: country as far westward as Indiana would have been many times greater
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: than they were. The backwoods Pilgrim's progress was like this:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Trail, deer; cabin, deer; clearing; bear, corn, deer; hogs, deer;
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: cattle, wheat, independence.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: And yet, how many men are there to-day, out of our ninety millions of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Americans and pseudo-Americans, who remember with any feeling of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: gratitude the part played in American history by the white-tailed deer?
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Very few! How many Americans are there in our land who now preserve that
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: deer for sentimental reasons, and because his forbears were
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: nation-builders? As a matter of fact, are there any?
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: On every eastern pioneer's monument, the white-tailed deer should
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: figure; and on those of the Great West, the bison and the antelope
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: should be cast in enduring bronze, "_lest we forget!_"
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The game birds of America played a different part from that of the deer,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: antelope and bison. In the early days, shotguns were few, and shot was
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: scarce and dear. The wild turkey and goose were the smallest birds on
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: which a rifleman could afford to expend a bullet and a whole charge of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: powder. It was for this reason that the deer, bear, bison, and elk
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: disappeared from the eastern United States while the game birds yet
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: remained abundant. With the disappearance of the big game came the fat
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: steer, hog and hominy, the wheat-field, fruit orchard and poultry
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: galore.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The game birds of America, as a class and a mass, have not been swept
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: away to ward off starvation or to rescue the perishing. Even back in the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: sixties and seventies, very, very few men of the North thought of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: killing prairie chickens, ducks and quail, snipe and woodcock, in order
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: to keep the hunger wolf from the door. The process was too slow and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: uncertain; and besides, the really-poor man rarely had the gun and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: ammunition. Instead of attempting to live on birds, he hustled for the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: staple food products that the soil of his own farm could produce.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: First, last and nearly all the time, the game birds of the United States
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: as a whole, have been sacrificed on the altar of Rank Luxury, to tempt
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: appetites that were tired of fried chicken and other farm delicacies.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: To-day, even the average poor man hunts birds for the joy of the outing,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and the pampered epicures of the hotels and restaurants buy game birds,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and eat small portions of them, solely to tempt jaded appetites. If
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: there is such a thing as "class" legislation, it is that which permits a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: few sordid market-shooters to slaughter the birds of the whole people in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: order to sell them to a few epicures.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The game of a state belongs to the whole people of the state. The
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Supreme Court of the United States has so decided. (Geer vs.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Connecticut). If it is abundant, it is a valuable asset. The great value
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of the game birds of America lies not in their meat pounds as they lie
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: upon the table, but in the temptation they annually put before millions
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of field-weary farmers and desk-weary clerks and merchants to get into
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: their beloved hunting togs, stalk out into the lap of Nature, and say
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "Begone, dull Care!"
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: And the man who has had a fine day in the painted woods, on the bright
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: waters of a duck-haunted bay, or in the golden stubble of September, can
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: fill his day and his soul with six good birds just as well as with
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: sixty. The idea that in order to enjoy a fine day in the open a man must
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: kill a wheel-barrow load of birds, is a mistaken idea; and if
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: obstinately adhered to, it becomes vicious! The Outing in the Open is
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the thing,--not the blood-stained feathers, nasty viscera and Death in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the game-bag. One quail on a fence is worth more to the world than ten
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: in a bag.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The farmers of America have, by their own supineness and lack of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: foresight, permitted the slaughter of a stock of game birds which, had
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: it been properly and wisely conserved, would have furnished a good
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: annual shoot to every farming man and boy of sporting instincts through
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the past, right down to the present, and far beyond. They have allowed
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: millions of dollars worth of _their_ birds to be coolly snatched away
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: from them by the greedy market-shooters.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: There is one state in America, and so far as I know _only one_, in which
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: there is at this moment an old-time abundance of game-bird life. That is
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the state of Louisiana. The reason is not so very far to seek. For the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: birds that do not migrate,--quail, wild turkeys and doves,--the cover is
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: yet abundant. For the migratory game birds of the Mississippi Valley,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Louisiana is a grand central depot, with terminal facilities that are
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: unsurpassed. Her reedy shores, her vast marshes, her long coast line and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: abundance of food furnish what should be not only a haven but a heaven
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: for ducks and geese. After running the gauntlet of guns all the way from
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Manitoba and Ontario to the Sunk Lands of Arkansas, the shores of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Gulf must seem like heaven itself.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The great forests of Louisiana shelter deer, turkeys, and fur-bearing
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: animals galore; and rabbits and squirrels abound.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Naturally, this abundance of game has given rise to an extensive
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: industry in shooting for the market. The "big interests" outside the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: state send their agents into the best game districts, often bringing in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: their own force of shooters. They comb out the game in enormous
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: quantities, without leaving to the people of Louisiana any decent and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: fair quid-pro-quo for having despoiled them of their game and shipped a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: vast annual product outside, to create wealth elsewhere.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: At present, however, we are but incidentally interested in the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: short-sightedness of the people of the Pelican State. As a state of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: oldtime abundance in killable game, the killing records that were kept
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: in the year 1909-10 possess for us very great interest. They throw a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: startling searchlight on the subject of this chapter,--the former
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: abundance of wild life.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: From the records that with great pains and labor were gathered by the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: State Game Commission, and which were furnished me for use here by
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: President Frank M. Miller, we set forth this remarkable exhibit of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: old-fashioned abundance in game, A.D. 1909.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: OFFICIAL RECORD OF GAME KILLED IN LOUISIANA DURING THE SEASON (12
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: MONTHS) OF 1909-10
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Doves                                   310,660
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Of the thousands of slaughtered robins, it would seem that no records
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: exist. It is to be understood that the annual slaughter of wild life in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Louisiana never before reached such a pitch as now. Without drastic
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: measures, what will be the inevitable result? Does any man suppose that
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: even the wild millions of Louisiana can long withstand such slaughter as
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: that shown by the official figures given above? It is wildly impossible.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: But the darkest hour is just before the dawn. At the session of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Louisiana legislature that was held in the spring of 1912, great
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: improvements were made in the game laws of that state. The most
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: important feature was the suppression of wholesale market hunting, by
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: persons who are not residents of the state. A very limited amount of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: game may be sold and served as food in public places, but the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: restrictions placed upon this traffic are so effective that they will
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: vastly reduce the annual slaughter. In other respects, also, the cause
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of wild life protection gained much; for which great credit is due to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Mr. Edward A. McIlhenny.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: It is the way of Americans to feel that because game is abundant in a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: given place at a given time, it always will be abundant, and may
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: therefore be slaughtered without limit. That was the case last winter in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: California during the awful slaughter of band-tailed pigeons, as will be
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: noted elsewhere.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: It is time for all men to be told in the plainest terms that there never
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: has existed, anywhere in historic times, a volume of wild life so great
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: that civilized man could not quickly exterminate it by his methods of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: destruction. Lift the veil and look at the stories of the bison, the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: passenger pigeon, the wild ducks and shore birds of the Atlantic coast,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and the fur-seal.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: [Illustration: SHALL WE LEAVE ANY ONE OF THEM OPEN?]
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: As reasoning beings, it is our duty to heed the lessons of history, and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: not rush blindly on until we perpetrate a continent destitute of wild
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: life.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: CHAPTER II
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: EXTINCT SPECIES OF NORTH AMERICAN BIRDS
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: For educated, civilized Man to exterminate a valuable wild species of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: living things is a crime. It is a crime against his own children, and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: posterity.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: No man has a right, either moral or legal, to destroy or squander an
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: inheritance of his children that he holds for them in trust. And man,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the wasteful and greedy spendthrift that he is, has not created even the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: humblest of the species of birds, mammals and fishes that adorn and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: enrich this earth. "The earth is THE LORD'S, and the fulness thereof!"
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: With all his wisdom, man has not evolved and placed here so much as a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: ground-squirrel, a sparrow or a clam. It is true that he has juggled
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: with the wild horse and sheep, the goats and the swine, and produced
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: some hardy breeds that can withstand his abuse without going down before
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: it; but as for species, he has not yet created and placed here even so
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: much as a protozoan.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The wild things of this earth are _not_ ours, to do with as we please.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: They have been given to us _in trust_, and we must account for them to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the generations which will come after us and audit our accounts.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: But man, the shameless destroyer of Nature's gifts, blithely and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: persistently exterminates one species after another. Fully ten per cent
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of the human race consists of people who will lie, steal, throw rubbish
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: in parks, and destroy forests and wild life whenever and wherever they
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: can do so without being stopped by a policemen and a club. These are
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: hard words, but they are absolutely true. From ten per cent (or more) of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the human race, the high moral instinct which is honest without
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: compulsion _is absent_. The things that seemingly decent citizens,--men
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: posing as gentlemen,--will do to wild game when they secure great
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: chances to slaughter, are appalling. I could fill a book of this size
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: with cases in point.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: To-day the women of England, Europe and elsewhere are directly promoting
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the extermination of scores of beautiful species of wild birds by the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: devilish persistence with which they buy and wear feather ornaments made
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of their plumage. They are just as mean and cruel as the truck-driver
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: who drives a horse with a sore shoulder and beats him on the street. But
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: they do it! And appeals to them to do otherwise they laugh to scorn,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: saying, "I will wear what is fashionable, when I please and where I
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: please!" As a famous bird protector of England has just written me, "The
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: women of the smart set are beyond the reach of appeal or protest."
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: To-day, the thing that stares me in the face every waking hour, like a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: grisly spectre with bloody fang and claw, is _the extermination of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: species_. To me, that is a horrible thing. It is wholesale murder, no
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: less. It is capital crime, and a black disgrace to the races of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: civilized mankind. I say "civilized mankind," because savages don't do
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: it!
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: There are three kinds of extermination:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: _The practical extermination of a species_ means the destruction of its
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: members to an extent so thorough and widespread that the species
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: disappears from view, and living specimens of it can not be found by
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: seeking for them. In North America this is to-day the status of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: whooping crane, upland plover, and several other species. If any
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: individuals are living, they will be met with only by accident.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: _The absolute extermination_ of a species means that not one individual
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of it remains alive. Judgment to this effect is based upon the lapse of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: time since the last living specimen was observed or killed. When five
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: years have passed without a living "record" of a wild specimen, it is
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: time to place a species in the class of the totally extinct.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: _Extermination in a wild state_ means that the only living
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: representatives are in captivity or otherwise under protection. This is
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the case of the heath hen and David's deer, of China. The American bison
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: is saved from being wholly extinct as a wild animal by the remnant of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: about 300 head in northern Athabasca, and 49 head in the Yellow-stone
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Park.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: It is a serious thing to exterminate a species of any of the vertebrate
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: animals. There are probably millions of people who do not realize that
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: civilized (!) man is the most persistently and wickedly wasteful of all
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the predatory animals. The lions, the tigers, the bears, the eagles and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: hawks, serpents, and the fish-eating fishes, all live by destroying
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: life; but they kill only what they think they can consume. If something
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: is by chance left over, it goes to satisfy the hunger of the humbler
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: creatures of prey. _In a state of nature, where wild creatures prey upon
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: wild creatures, such a thing as wanton, wholesale and utterly wasteful
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: slaughter is almost unknown!_
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: When the wild mink, weasel and skunk suddenly finds himself in the midst
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of scores of man's confined and helpless domestic fowls, or his caged
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: gulls in a zoological park, an unusual criminal passion to murder for
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the joy of killing sometimes seizes the wild animal, and great slaughter
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: is the result.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: From the earliest historic times, it has been the way of savage man,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: red, black, brown and yellow, to kill as the wild animals do,--only what
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: he can use, or _thinks_ he can use. The Cree Indian impounded small
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: herds of bison, and sometimes killed from 100 to 200 at one time; but it
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: was to make sure of having enough meat and hides, and because he
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: expected to use the product. I think that even the worst enemies of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: plains Indians hardly will accuse them of killing large numbers of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: bison, elk or deer merely for the pleasure of seeing them fall, or
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: taking only their teeth.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: [Illustration: SIX RECENTLY EXTERMINATED NORTH AMERICAN BIRDS
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Great Auk             Labrador Duck
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Eskimo Curlew         Pallas Cormorant
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Passenger Pigeon      Carolina Parrakeet]
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: It has remained for the wolf, the sheep-killing dog and civilized man to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: make records of wanton slaughter which puts them in a class together,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and quite apart from other predatory animals. When a man can kill bison
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: for their tongues alone, bull elk for their "tusks" alone, and shoot a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: whole colony of hippopotami,--actually damming a river with their
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: bloated and putrid carcasses, all untouched by the knife,--the men who
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: do such things must be classed with the cruel wolf and the criminal dog.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: It is now desirable that we should pause in our career of destruction
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: long enough to look back upon what we have recently accomplished in the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: total extinction of species, and also note what we have blocked out for
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the immediate future. Here let us erect a monument to the dead species
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of our own times.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: It is to be doubted whether, up to this hour, any man has made a list of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the species of North American birds that have become extinct during the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: past sixty years. The specialists have no time to spare from their
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: compound differential microscopes, and the bird-killers are too busy
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: with shooting, netting and clubbing to waste any time on such trifles as
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: exterminated species. What does a market-shooter care about birds that
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: can not be killed a second time? As for the farmers, they are so busy
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: raising hogs and prices that their best friends, the birds, get scant
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: attention from them,--until a hen-hawk takes a chicken!
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Down South, the negroes and poor whites may slaughter robins for food by
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the ten thousand; but does the northern farmer bother his head about a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: trifle of that kind? No, indeed. Will he contribute any real money to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: help put a stop to it? Ask him yourself.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Let us pause long enough to reckon up some of our expenditures in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: species, and in millions of individuals. Let us set down here, in cold
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: blood, a list of the species of our own North American birds that have
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: been totally exterminated in our own times. After that we will have
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: something to say about other species that soon will be exterminated; and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the second task is much greater than the first.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: ROLL CALL OF THE DEAD SPECIES OF AMERICAN BIRDS
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: THE GREAT AUK,--_Plautus-impennis_, (Linn.), was a sea-going diving bird
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: about the size of a domestic goose, related to the guillemots, murres
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and puffins. For a bird endowed only with flipper-like wings, and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: therefore absolutely unable to fly, this species had an astonishing
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: geographic range. It embraced the shores of northern Europe to North
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Cape, southern Greenland, southern Labrador, and the Atlantic coast of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: North America as far south as Massachusetts. Some say, "as far south as
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Massachusetts, the Carolinas and Florida," but that is a large order,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and I leave the A.O.U. to prove that if it can. In the life history of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: this bird, a great tragedy was enacted in 1800 by sailors, on Funk
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Island, north of Newfoundland, where men were landed by a ship, and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: spent several months slaughtering great auks and trying out their fat
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: for oil. In this process, the bodies of thousands of auks were burned as
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: fuel, in working up the remains of tens of thousands of others.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: On Funk Island, a favorite breeding-place, the great auk was
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: exterminated in 1840, and in Iceland in 1844. Many natives ate this bird
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: with relish, and being easily captured, either on land or sea, the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: commercialism of its day soon obliterated the species. The last living
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: specimen was seen in 1852, and the last dead one was picked up in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Trinity Bay, Ireland, in 1853. There are about 80 mounted and unmounted
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: skins in existence, four skeletons, and quite a number of eggs. An egg
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: is worth about $1200 and a good mounted skin at least double that sum.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: THE LABRADOR DUCK,--_Camptorhynchus labradoricus_, (Gmel.).--This
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: handsome sea-duck, of a species related to the eider ducks of arctic
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: waters, became totally extinct about 1875, before the scientific world
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: even knew that its existence was threatened. With this species, the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: exact and final cause of its extinction is to this day unknown. It is
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: not at all probable, however, that its unfortunate blotting out from our
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: bird fauna was due to natural causes, and when the truth becomes known,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: it is very probable that the hand of man will be revealed.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The Labrador duck bred in Labrador, and once frequented our Atlantic
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: coast as far south as Chesapeake Bay; but it is said that it never was
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: very numerous, at least during the twenty-five years preceding its
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: disappearance. About thirty-five skins and mounted museum specimens are
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: all that remain to prove its former existence, and I think there is not
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: even one skeleton.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: THE PALLAS CORMORANT,--_Carbo perspicillatus_, (Pallas).--In 1741, when
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the Russian explorer, Commander Bering, discovered the Bering or
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Commander Islands, in the far-north Pacific, and landed upon them, he
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: also discovered this striking bird species. Its plumage both above and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: below was a dark metallic green, with blue iridescence on the neck and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: purple on the shoulders. A pale ring of naked skin around each eye
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: suggested the Latin specific name of this bird. The Pallas cormorant
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: became totally extinct, through causes not positively known, about 1852.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: THE PASSENGER PIGEON,--_Ectopistes migratoria_, (Linn.).--We place this
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: bird in the totally-extinct class, not only because it is extinct in a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: wild state, but only one solitary individual, a twenty-year-old female
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: in the Cincinnati Zoological Gardens, now remains alive. One living
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: specimen and a few skins, skeletons and stuffed specimens are all that
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: remain to show for the uncountable millions of pigeons that swarmed over
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the United States, only yesterday as it were!
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: There is no doubt about where those millions have gone. They went down
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and out by systematic, wholesale slaughter for the market and the pot,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: before the shotguns, _clubs_ and _nets_ of the earliest American
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: pot-hunters. Wherever they nested they were slaughtered.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: It is a long and shameful story, but the grisly skeleton of its Michigan
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: chapter can be set forth in a few words. In 1869, from the town of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Hartford, Mich., _three car loads_ of dead pigeons were shipped to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: market each day for _forty days_, making a total of 11,880,000 birds. It
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: is recorded that another Michigan town marketed 15,840,000 in two years.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: (See Mr. W.B. Mershon's book, "The Passenger Pigeon.")
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Alexander Wilson, the pioneer American ornithologist, was the man who
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: seriously endeavored to estimate by computations the total number of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: passenger pigeons in one flock that was seen by him. Here is what he has
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: said in his "American Ornithology":
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "To form a rough estimate of the daily consumption of one of these
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: immense flocks, let us first attempt to calculate the numbers of that
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: above mentioned, as seen in passing between Frankfort and the Indiana
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: territory. If we suppose this column to have been one mile in breadth
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: (and I believe it to have been much more) and that it moved at the rate
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of one mile in a minute, four hours, the time it continued passing,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: would make its whole length two hundred and forty miles. Again,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: supposing that each square yard of this moving body comprehended three
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: pigeons; the square yards in the whole space multiplied by three would
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: give 2,230,272,000 pigeons! An almost inconceivable multitude, and yet
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: probably far below the actual amount."
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "Happening to go ashore one charming afternoon, to purchase some milk at
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: a house that stood near the river, and while talking with the people
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: within doors, I was suddenly struck with astonishment at a loud rushing
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: roar, succeeded by instant darkness, which, on the first moment, I took
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: for a tornado about to overwhelm the house and every thing around in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: destruction. The people observing my surprise, coolly said, 'It is only
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the pigeons!' On running out I beheld a flock, thirty or forty yards in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: width, sweeping along very low, between the house and the mountain or
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: height that formed the second bank of the river. These continued passing
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: for more than a quarter of an hour, and at length varied their bearing
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: so as to pass over the mountains, behind which they disappeared before
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the rear came up.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "In the Atlantic States, though they never appear in such unparalleled
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: multitudes, they are sometimes very numerous; and great havoc is then
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: made amongst them with the gun, the clap-net, and various other
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: implements of destruction. As soon as it is ascertained in a town that
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the pigeons are flying numerously in the neighborhood, the gunners rise
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: _en masse_; the clap-nets are spread out on suitable situations,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: commonly on an open height in an old buckwheat field, four or five live
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: pigeons, _with their eyelids sewed up_,[A] are fastened on a movable
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: stick, a small hut of branches is fitted up for the fowler at the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: distance of forty or fifty yards. By the pulling of a string, the stick
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: on which the pigeons rest is alternately elevated and depressed, which
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: produces a fluttering of their wings, similar to that of birds
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: alighting. This being perceived by the passing flocks, they descend with
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: great rapidity, and finding corn, buckwheat, etc, strewed about, begin
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: to feed, and are instantly, by the pulling of a cord, covered by the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: net. In this manner ten, twenty, and even thirty dozen have been caught
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: at one sweep. Meantime the air is darkened with large bodies of them
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: moving in various directions; the woods also swarm with them in search
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of acorns, and the thundering of musquetry is perpetual on all sides
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: from morning to night. Wagon loads of them are poured into market, where
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: they sell from fifty to twenty-five and even twelve cents per dozen; and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: pigeons become the order of the day at dinner, breakfast and supper,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: until the very name becomes sickening."
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: [Footnote A: To-day, we think that the fowlers of the roccolos of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: northern Italy are very cruel in their methods of catching song-birds
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: wholesale for the market (chapter xi); but our own countrymen of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Wilson's day were just as cruel in the method described above.]
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The range of the passenger pigeon covered nearly the whole United
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: States from the Atlantic coast westward to the Rocky Mountains. A few
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: bold pigeons crossed the Rocky Mountains into Oregon, northern
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: California and Washington, but only as "stragglers," few and far
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: between. The wide range of this bird was worthy of a species that
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: existed in millions, and it was persecuted literally all along the line.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The greatest slaughter was in Michigan, Ohio and Pennsylvania. In 1848
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Massachusetts gravely passed a law protecting the _netters_ of wild
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: pigeons from foreign interference! There was a fine of $10 for damaging
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: nets, or frightening pigeons away from them. This was on the theory that
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the pigeons were so abundant they could not by any possibility ever
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: become scarce, and that pigeon-slaughter was a legitimate industry.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In 1867, the State of New York found that the wild pigeon needed
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: protection, and enacted a law to that effect. The year 1868 was the last
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: year in which great numbers of passenger pigeons nested in that State.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Eaton, in "The Birds of New York," said that "millions of birds occupied
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the timber along Bell's Run, near Ceres, Alleghany County, on the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Pennsylvania line."
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In 1870, Massachusetts gave pigeons protection except during an "open
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: season," and in 1878 Pennsylvania elected to protect pigeons on their
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: nesting grounds.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The passenger pigeon millions were destroyed so quickly, and so
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: thoroughly _en masse_, that the American people utterly failed to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: comprehend it, and for thirty years obstinately refused to believe that
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the species had been suddenly wiped off the map of North America. There
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: was years of talk about the great flocks having "taken refuge in South
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: America," or in Mexico, and being still in existence. There were
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: surmises about their having all "gone out to sea," and perished on the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: briny deep.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: A thousand times, at least, wild pigeons have been "reported" as having
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: been "seen." These rumors have covered nearly every northern state, the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: whole of the southwest, and California. For years and years we have been
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: patiently writing letters to explain over and over that the band-tailed
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: pigeon of the Pacific coast, and the red-billed pigeon of Arizona and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the southwest are neither of them the passenger pigeon, and never can
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: be.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: There was a long period wherein we believed many of the pigeon reports
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: that came from the states where the birds once were most numerous; but
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: that period has absolutely passed. During the past five years large cash
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: rewards, aggregating about $5000, have been offered for the discovery
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of one nesting pair of genuine passenger pigeons. Many persons have
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: claimed this reward (of Professor C.F. Hodge, of Clark University,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Worcester, Mass.), and many claims have been investigated. The results
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: have disclosed many _mourning doves_, but not one pigeon. Now we
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: understand that the quest is closed, and hope has been abandoned.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The passenger pigeon is a dead species. The last wild specimen (so we
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: believe) that ever will reach the hands of man, was taken near Detroit,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Michigan, on Sept. 14, 1908, and mounted by C. Campion. That is the one
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: definite, positive record of the past ten years.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The fate of this species should be a lasting lesson to the world at
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: large. Any wild bird or mammal species can be exterminated by commercial
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: interests in twenty years time, or less.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: THE ESKIMO CURLEW,_--Numenius borealis_, (Forst.). This valuable game
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: bird once ranged all along the Atlantic coast of North America, and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: wherever found it was prized for the table. It preferred the fields and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: meadows to the shore lines, and was the companion of the plovers of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: uplands, especially the golden plover. "About 1872," says Mr. Forbush,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "there was a great flight of these birds on Cape Cod and Nantucket. They
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: were everywhere; and enormous numbers were killed. They could be bought
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of boys at six cents apiece. Two men killed $300 worth of these birds at
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: that time."
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Apparently, that was the beginning of the end of the "dough bird," which
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: was another name for this curlew. In 1908 Mr. G.H. Mackay stated that
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: this bird and the golden plover had decreased 90 per cent in fifty
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: years, and in the last ten years of that period 90 per cent of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: remainder had gone. "Now (1908)," says Mr. Forbush, "ornithologists
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: believe that the Eskimo curlew is practically extinct, as only a few
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: specimens have been recorded since the beginning of the twentieth
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: century." The very last record is of two specimens collected at Waco,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: York County, Nebraska, in March, 1911, and recorded by Mr. August Eiche.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Of course, it is possible that other individuals may still survive; but
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: so far as our knowledge extends, the species is absolutely dead.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In the West Indies and the Guadeloupe Islands, five species of macaws
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and parrakeets have passed out without any serious note of their
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: disappearance on the part of the people of the United States. It is at
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: least time to write brief obituary notices of them.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: We are indebted to the Hon. Walter Rothschild, of Tring, England, for
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: essential facts regarding these species as set forth in his sumptuous
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: work "Extinct Birds".
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: THE CUBAN TRICOLORED MACAW,--_Ara tricolor_, (Gm.). In 1875, when the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: author visited Cuba and the Isle of Pines, he was informed by Professor
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Poey that he was "about ten years too late" to find this fine species
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: alive. It was exterminated for food purposes, about 1864, and only four
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: specimens are known to be in existence.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life
