name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Guadeloupe Macaw
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Yellow Winged Green Parrot
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Purple Guadaloupe Parakeet
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Carolina Parakeet
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: EXTERMINATED BY CIVILIZED MAN 1840-1910]
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: GOSSE'S MACAW,--_Ara gossei_, (Roth.).--This species once inhabited the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Island of Jamaica. It was exterminated about 1800, and so far as known
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: not one specimen of it is in existence.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: GUADELOUPE MACAW,--_Ara guadeloupensis_, (Clark).--All that is known of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the life history of this large bird is that once it inhabited the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Guadeloupe Islands. The date and history of its disappearance are both
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: unknown, and there is not one specimen of it in existence.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: YELLOW-WINGED GREEN PARROT,--_Amazona olivacea_, (Gm.).--Of the history
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of this Guadeloupe species, also, nothing is known, and there appear to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: be no specimens of it in existence.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: PURPLE GUADELOUPE PARRAKEET,--_Anodorhynchus purpurescens_,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: (Rothschild).--This is another dead species, that once lived in the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Guadeloupe Islands, and passed away silently and unnoticed at the time,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: leaving no records of its existence, and no specimens.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: THE CAROLINA PARRAKEET,--_Conuropsis carolinensis_, (Linn.), brings us
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: down to the present moment. To this charming little green-and-yellow
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: bird, we are in the very act of bidding everlasting farewell. Ten
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: specimens remain alive in captivity, six of which are in the Cincinnati
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Zoological Garden, three are in the Washington Zoological Park and one
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: is in the New York Zoological Park.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Regarding wild specimens, it is possible that some yet remain, in some
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: obscure and _neglected_ corner of Florida; but it is extremely doubtful
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: whether the world ever will find any of them alive. Mrs. Minnie Moore
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Willson, of Kissimee, Fla. reports the species as totally extinct in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Florida. Unless we would strain at a gnat, we may just as well enter
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: this species in the dead class; for there is no reason to hope that any
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: more wild specimens ever will be found.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The former range of this species embraced the whole southeastern and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: central United States. From the Gulf it extended to Albany, N.Y.,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: northern Ohio and Indiana, northern Iowa, Nebraska, central Colorado and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: eastern Texas, from which it will be seen that once it was widely
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: distributed. It was shot because it was destructive to fruit and for its
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: plumage, and many were trapped alive, to be kept in captivity. I know
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: that one colony, near the mouth of the Sebastian River, east coast of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Florida, was exterminated in 1898 by a local hunter, and I regret to say
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: that it was done in the hope of selling the living birds to a New York
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: bird-dealer. By holding bags over the holes in which the birds were
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: nesting, the entire colony, of about 16 birds, was caught.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Everywhere else than in Florida, the Carolina parrakeet has long been
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: extinct. In 1904 a flock of 13 birds was seen near Lake Okechobee; but
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: in Florida many calamities can overtake a flock of birds in eight years.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The birds in captivity are not breeding, and so far as perpetuation by
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: them is concerned, they are only one remove from mounted museum
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: specimens. This parrakeet is the only member of its order that ranged
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: into the United States during our own times, and with its disappearance
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the Order Psittaciformes totally disappears from our country.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: CHAPTER III
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: THE NEXT CANDIDATES FOR OBLIVION
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In the world of human beings, murder is the most serious of all crimes.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: To take from a man that which no one ever can restore to him, his life,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: is murder; and its penalty is the most severe of all penalties.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: There are circumstances under which the killing of a wild animal may be
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: so wanton, so revolting and so utterly reprehensible that the act may
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: justly be classed as murder. The man who kills a walrus from the deck of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: a steamer that he knows will not stop; the man who wantonly killed the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: whole colony of hippopotami that Mr. Dugmore photographed in life; the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: man who last winter shot bull elk in Wyoming for their two ugly and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: shapeless teeth, and the man who wantonly shot down a half-tame deer
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "for fun" near Carmel, Putnam County, New York, in the summer of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 1912,--all were guilty of _murdering_ wild animals.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The murder of a wild animal species consists in taking from it that
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: which man with all his cunning and all his preserves and breeding can
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: not give back to it,--its God-given place in the ranks of Living Things.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Where is man's boasted intelligence, or his sense of proportion, that
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: every man does not see the monstrous moral obliquity involved in the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: destruction of a species!
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: If the beautiful Taj Mehal at Agra should be destroyed by vandals, the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: intelligent portion of humanity would be profoundly shocked, even though
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the hand of man could at will restore the shrine of sorrowing love.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: To-day the great Indian rhinoceros, certainly one of the most wonderful
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: four-footed animals still surviving, is actually being exterminated; and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: even the people of India and England are viewing it with an indifference
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: that is appalling. Of course there are among Englishmen a great many
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: sportsmen and several zoologists who really care; but they do not
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: constitute one-tenth of one per-cent of the men who ought to care!
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In the museums, we stand in awe and wonder before the fossil skeleton of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the Megatherium, and the savants struggle to unveil its past, while the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: equally great and marvelous _Rhinoceros indicus_ is being rushed into
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: oblivion. We marvel at the fossil shell of the gigantic turtle called
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: _Collosochelys atlas_, while the last living representatives of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: gigantic land tortoises are being exterminated in the Galapagos Islands
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and the Sychelles, for their paltry oil and meat; and only one man (Hon.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Walter Rothschild) is doing aught to save any of them in their haunts,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: where they can breed. The dodo of Mauritius was exterminated by swine,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: whose bipedal descendants have exterminated many other species since
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: that time.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: A failure to appreciate either the beauty or the value of our living
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: birds, quadrupeds and fishes is the hall-mark of arrested mental
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: development and ignorance. The victim is _not always to blame_; but in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: this practical world the cornerstone of legal jurisprudence is the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: inexorable principle that "ignorance of the law excuses no man."
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: These pages are addressed to my countrymen, and the world at large, not
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: as a reproach upon the dead Past which is gone beyond recall, but in the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: faint hope of somewhere and somehow arousing forces that will reform the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Present and save the Future. The extermination of wild species that now
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: is proceeding throughout the world, is a dreadful thing. It is not only
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: injurious to the economy of the world, but it is a shame and a disgrace
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: to the civilized portion of the human race.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: It is of little avail that I should here enter into a detailed
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: description of each species that now is being railroaded into oblivion.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The bookshelves of intelligent men and women are filled with beautiful
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and adequate books on birds and quadrupeds, wherein the status of each
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: species may be determined, almost without effort. There is time and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: space only in which to notice the most prominent of the doomed species,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and perhaps discuss a few examples by way of illustration. Here is a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: PARTIAL LIST OF NORTH AMERICAN BIRDS THREATENED WITH EARLY EXTERMINATION
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: THE WHOOPING CRANE.--This splendid bird will almost certainly be the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: next North American species to be totally exterminated. It is the only
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: new world rival of the numerous large and showy cranes of the old world;
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: for the sandhill crane is not in the same class as the white, black and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: blue giants of Asia. We will part from our stately _Grus americanus_
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: with profound sorrow, for on this continent we ne'er shall see his like
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: again.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The well-nigh total disappearance of this species has been brought close
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: home to us by the fact that there are less than half a dozen individuals
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: alive in captivity, while in a wild state the bird is so rare as to be
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: quite unobtainable. For example, for nearly five years an English
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: gentlemen has been offering $1,000 for a pair, and the most
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: enterprising bird collector in America has been quite unable to fill the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: order. So far as our information extends, the last living specimen
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: captured was taken six or seven years ago. The last wild birds seen and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: reported were observed by Ernest Thompson Seton, who saw five below Fort
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: McMurray, Saskatchewan, October 16th, 1907, and by John F. Ferry, who
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: saw one at Big Quill Lake, Saskatchewan, in June, 1909.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The range of this species once covered the eastern two-thirds of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: continent of North America. It extended from the Atlantic coast to the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Rocky Mountains, and from Great Bear Lake to Florida and Texas. Eastward
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of the Mississippi it has for twenty years been totally extinct, and the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: last specimens taken alive were found in Kansas and Nebraska.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: [Illustration: WHOOPING CRANES IN THE ZOOLOGICAL PARK
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Very Soon this Species will Become Totally Extinct.]
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: THE TRUMPETER SWAN.--Six years ago this species was regarded as so
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: nearly extinct that a doubting ornithological club of Boston refused to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: believe on hearsay evidence that the New York Zoological Park contained
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: a pair of living birds, and a committee was appointed, to investigate in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: person, and report. Even at that time, skins were worth all the way from
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: $100 to $150 each; and when swan skins sell at either of those figures
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: it is because there are people who believe that the species either is on
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the verge of extinction, or has passed it. The pair referred to above
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: was acquired in 1900. Since that time, Dr. Leonard C. Sanford procured
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: in 1910 two living birds from a bird dealer who obtained them on the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: coast of Virginia. We have done our utmost to induce our pair to breed,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: but without any further results than nest-building.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The loss of the trumpeter swan (_Olor americanus_) will not be so great,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: nor felt so keenly, as the blotting out of the whooping crane. It so
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: closely resembles the whistling swan that only an ornithologist can
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: recognize the difference, a yellow spot on the side of the upper
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: mandible, near its base. The whistling swan yet remains in fair numbers,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: but it is to be feared that soon it will go as the trumpeter has gone.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: THE AMERICAN FLAMINGO, SCARLET IBIS AND ROSEATE SPOONBILL are three of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the most beautiful and curious water-haunting birds of the tropics. Once
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: all three species inhabited portions of the southern United States; but
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: now all three are gone from our star-spangled bird fauna. The brilliant
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: scarlet plumage of the flamingo and ibis, and the exquisite pink
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: rose-color and white of the spoonbill naturally attracted the evil eyes
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of the "milliner's taxidermists" and other bird-butchers. From Florida
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: these birds quickly vanished. The six great breeding colonies of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Flamingoes on Andros Island, Bahamas, have been reduced to two, and from
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Prof. E.A. Goeldi, of the State Museum Goeldi, Para, Brazil, have come
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: bitter complaints of the slaughter of scarlet ibises in South America by
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: plume-hunters in European pay.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: I know not how other naturalists regard the future of the three species
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: named above, but my opinion is that unless the European feather trade is
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: quickly stopped as to wild plumage, they are absolutely certain to be
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: shot into total oblivion, within a very few years. The plumage of these
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: birds has so much commercial value, for fishermen's flies as well as for
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: women's hats, that the birds will be killed as long as their feathers
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: can be sold and any birds remain alive.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Zoologically, the flamingo is the most odd and interesting bird on the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: American continent except the emperor penguin. Its beak baffles
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: description, its long legs and webbed feet are a joke, its nesting
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: habits are amazing, and its food habits the despair of most
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: zoological-garden keepers. Millions of flamingos inhabit the shores of a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: number of small lakes in the interior of equatorial East Africa, but
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: that species is not brilliant scarlet all over the neck and head, as is
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the case with our species.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: If the American flamingo, scarlet ibis and roseate spoonbill, one or all
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of them, are to be saved from total extinction, efforts must be made in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: each of the countries in which they breed and live. Their preservation
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: is distinctly a burden upon the countries of South America that lie
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: eastward of the Andes, and on Yucatan, Cuba and the Bahamas. The time
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: has come when the Government of the Bahama Islands should sternly forbid
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the killing of any more flamingos, on any pretext whatever; and if the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: capture of living specimens for exhibition purposes militates against
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the welfare of the colonies, _they should forbid that also_.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: THE UPLAND PLOVER, OR "BARTRAMIAN SANDPIPER."--Apparently this is the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: next shore-bird species that will follow the Eskimo curlew into
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: oblivion. Four years ago,--a long period for a species that is on the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: edge of extermination,--Mr. E.H. Forbush[B] wrote of it as follows:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "The Bartramian Sandpiper, commonly known as the Upland Plover, a bird
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: which formerly bred on grassy hills all over the State and migrated
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: southward along our coasts in great flocks, is in imminent danger of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: extirpation. A few still breed in Worcester and Berkshire Counties, or
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Nantucket, so there is still a nucleus which, if protected, may save the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: species. Five reports from localities where this bird formerly bred give
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: it as nearing extinction, and four as extinct. This is one of the most
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: useful of all birds in grass land, feeding largely on grasshoppers and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: cutworms. It is one of the finest of all birds for the table. An effort
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: should be made at once to save this useful species."
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: [Footnote B: "Special Report on the Decrease of Certain Birds, and its
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Causes."--Mass. State Board of Agriculture, 1908.]
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: THE BLACK-CAPPED PETREL, (_Aestrelata hasitata_).--This species is
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: already recorded in the A.O.U. "Check list" as extinct; but it appears
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: that this may not as yet be absolutely true. On January 1, 1912, a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: strange thing happened. A much battered and exhausted black-capped
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: petrel was picked up alive in Central Park, New York, taken to the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: menagerie, and kept there during the few days that it survived. When it
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: died it was sent to the American Museum; and this may easily prove to be
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the last living record for that species. In reality, this species might
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: as well be listed with those totally extinct. Formerly it ranged from
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the Antilles to Ohio and Ontario, and the causes of its blotting out are
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: not yet definitely known.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: This ocean-going bird once had a wide range overseas in the temperate
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: areas of the North Atlantic. It is recorded from Ulster County, New
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: York, New Hampshire, Kentucky, Ohio, Virginia and Florida. It was about
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of the size of the common tern.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: THE CALIFORNIA CONDOR, (_Gymnogyps californianus_).--I feel that the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: existence of this species hangs on a very slender thread. This is due to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: its alarmingly small range, the insignificant number of individuals now
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: living, the openness of the species to attack, and the danger of its
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: extinction by poison. Originally this remarkable bird,--the largest
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: North American bird of prey,--ranged as far northward as the Columbia
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: River, and southward for an unknown distance. Now its range is reduced
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: to seven counties in southern California, although it is said to extend
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: from Monterey Bay to Lower California, and eastward to Arizona.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Regarding the present status and the future of this bird, I have been
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: greatly disturbed in mind. When a unique and zoologically important
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: species becomes reduced in its geographic range to a small section of a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: single state, it seems to me quite time for alarm. For some time I have
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: counted this bird as one of those threatened with early extermination,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and as I think with good reason. In view of the swift calamities that
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: now seem able to fall on species like thunderbolts out of clear skies,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and wipe them off the earth even before we know that such a fate is
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: impending, no species of seven-county distribution is safe. Any species
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: that is limited to a few counties of a single state is liable to be
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: wiped out in five years, by poison, or traps, or lack of food.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: [Illustration: CALIFORNIA CONDOR
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Now Living in the New York Zoological Park.]
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: On order to obtain the best and also the most conservative information
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: regarding this species, I appealed to the Curator of the Museum of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Vertebrate Zoology, of the University of California. Although written in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the mountain wilds, I promptly received the valuable contribution that
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: appears below. As a clear, precise and conservative survey of an
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: important species, it is really a model document.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: THE STATUS OF THE CALIFORNIA CONDOR IN 1912 _By Joseph Grinnell_
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "To my knowledge, the California Condor has been definitely observed
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: within the past five years in the following California counties: Los
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Angeles, Ventura, Santa Barbara, San Luis Obispo, Monterey, Kern, and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Tulare. In parts of Ventura, Santa Barbara, San Luis Obispo and Kern
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: counties the species is still fairly common, for a large bird, probably
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: equal in numbers to the golden eagle in those regions that are suited to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: it. By suitable country I mean cattle-raising, mountainous territory,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of which there are still vast areas, and which are not likely to be put
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: to any other use for a very long time, if ever, on account of the lack
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of water.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "While in Kern County last April, I was informed by a reliable man who
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: lives near the Tejon Rancho that he had counted twenty-five condors in a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: single day, since January 1 of the present year. These were on the Tejon
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Rancho, which is an enormous cattle range covering parts of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Tehachapi and San Emigdio Mountains.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "Our present state law provides complete protection for the condor and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: its eggs; and the State Fish and Game Commission, in granting permits
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: for collectors, always adds the phrase--'except the California condor
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and its eggs.' I know of two special permits having been issued, but
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: neither of these were used; that is, no 'specimens' have been taken
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: since 1908, as far as I am aware.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "In my travels about the state, I have found that practically everyone
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: knows that the condor is protected. Still, there is always the hunting
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: element who do not hesitate to shoot anything alive and out of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: ordinary, and a certain percentage of the condors are doubtless picked
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: off each year by such criminals. It is possible, also, that the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: mercenary egg-collector continues to take his annual rents, though if
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: this is done it is kept very quiet. It is my impression that the present
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: fatalities from all sources are fully balanced by the natural rate of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: increase.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "There is one factor that has militated against the condor more than any
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: other one thing; namely, the restriction in its food source. Its forage
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: range formerly included most of the great valleys adjacent to its
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: mountain retreats. But now the valleys are almost entirely devoted to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: agriculture, and of course far more thickly settled than formerly.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "The mountainous areas where the condor is making its last stand seem to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: me likely to remain adapted to the bird's existence for many
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: years,--fifty years, if not longer. Of course, this is conditional upon
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the maintenance and enforcement of the present laws. There is also the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: enlightenment of public sentiment in regard to the preservation of wild
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: life, which I believe can be depended upon. This is a matter of general
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: education, which is, fortunately, and with no doubt whatever,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: progressing at a quite perceptible rate.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "Yes; I should say that the condor has a fair chance to survive, in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: limited numbers.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "Another bird which in my opinion is far nearer extinction than the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: condor, so far as California is concerned, is the white-tailed kite.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: This is a perfectly harmless bird, but one which harries over the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: marshes, where it has been an easy target for the idle duck-hunter.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Then, too, its range was limited to the valley bottoms, where human
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: settlement is increasingly close. I know of only _two_ live pairs within
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the state last year!
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "Finally, let me remark that the rate of increase of the California
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: condor is not one whit less than that of the band-tailed pigeon! Yet,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: there is no protection at all for the latter in this state, even in the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: nesting season; and thousands were shot last spring, in the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: unprecedented concentration of the species in the southern coast
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: counties. (See Chambers in _The Condor_ for May, 1912, p. 108.)"
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The California Condor is one of the only two species of condor now
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: living, and it is the only one found in North America. As a matter of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: national pride, and a duty to posterity, the people of the United States
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: can far better afford to lose a million dollars from their national
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: treasury than to allow that bird to become extinct. Its preservation for
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: all coming time is distinctly a white man's burden upon the state of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: California. The laws now in force for the condor's protection are not
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: half adequate! I think there is no law by which the accidental poisoning
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of those birds, by baits put out for coyotes and foxes, can be stopped.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: A law to prevent the use of poisoned meat baits anywhere in southern
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: California, should be enacted at the next session of California's
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: legislature. The fine for molesting a condor should be raised to $500,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: with a long prison-term as an alternative. A competent, interested game
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: warden should be appointed _solely for the protection of the condors_.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: It is time to count those birds, keep them under observation, and have
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: an annual report upon their condition.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: THE HEATH HEN.--But for the protection that has been provided for it by
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the ornithologists of Massachusetts, and particularly Dr. George W.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Field, William Brewster and John E. Thayer, the heath hen or eastern
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: pinnated grouse would years ago have become totally extinct. New York,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: New Jersey and Massachusetts began to protect that species entirely too
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: late. It was given five-year close seasons, without avail. Then it was
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: given ten-year close seasons, but it was _too late_!
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: To-day, the species exists only in one locality, the island of Martha's
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Vineyard, and concerning its present status, Mr. Forbush has recently
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: furnished us the following clear statement:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "The heath hens increased for two years after the Massachusetts Fish
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and Game Commission established a reservation for them, but in 1911
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: they had not increased. There are probably about two hundred birds
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: extant.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "I found a great many marsh hawks on the Island and the Commission
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: did not kill them, believing them to be beneficial. In watching
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: them, I concluded that they were catching the young heath hens. A
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: large number of these hawks have been shot and their stomachs sent
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: to Washington for examination, as I was too busy at the time to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: examine them. So far as I know, no report of the examination has
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: been made, but Dr. Field himself examined a few of the stomachs and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: found the remains of the heath hen in some.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "The warden now says that during the past two years, the heath hen
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: has not increased, but I can give you no definite evidence of this.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: I am quite sure they are being killed by natives of the island and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: that at least one collector supplies birds for museums. We are
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: trying to get evidence of this.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "I believe if the heath hen is to be increased in numbers and brought
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: back to this country, we shall have to have more than one warden on
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the reservation and, eventually, we shall have to establish the bird
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: on the mainland also."
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: [Illustration: PINNATED GROUSE, OR "PRAIRIE CHICKEN"
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: From the "American Natural History"]
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: THE PINNATED GROUSE, SAGE GROUSE AND PRAIRIE SHARP-TAIL.--In view of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: fate of the grouse of the United States, as it has been wrought out thus
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: far in all the more thickly settled areas, and particularly in view of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the history of the heath hen, we have no choice but to regard all three
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of the species named above as absolutely certain to become totally
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: extinct, within a short period of years, unless the conditions
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: surrounding them are immediately and radically changed for the better.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Personally, I do not believe that the gunners and game-hogs of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Minnesota, Montana, Nebraska, Idaho, Washington, Oregon and California
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: will permit any one of those species to be saved.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: If the present open seasons prevail in the states that I have mentioned
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: above, no power on earth can save those three species of grouse from the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: fate of the heath hen. To-day their representatives exist only in small
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: shreds and patches, and from fully nineteen-twentieths of their original
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: ranges they are forever gone.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The sage grouse will be the first species to go. It is the largest, the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: most conspicuous, the one most easily found, and the biggest mark for
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the gunner. Those who have seen this bird in its native sage-brush well
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: understand how fatally it is exposed to slaughter.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Many appeals have been made in behalf of the pinnated grouse; but the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: open seasons continue. The gunners of the states in which a few remnants
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: still exist are determined to have them, all; and the state legislatures
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: seem disposed to allow the killers to have their way. It may be
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: however, that like New York with the heath hen, they will arouse and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: virtuously lock the stable door--after the horse has been stolen!
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: [Illustration: SAGE GROUSE
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The First of the Upland Game Birds that will Become Extinct]
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: THE SNOWY EGRET AND AMERICAN EGRET, (_Egretta candidissima and Herodias
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: egretta_).--These unfortunate birds, cursed for all time by the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: commercially valuable "aigrette" plumes that they bear, have had a very
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: narrow escape from total extinction in the United States, despite all
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the efforts made to save them. The "plume-hunters" of the millinery
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: trade have been, _and still are_, determined to have the last feather
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and the last drop of egret blood. In an effort to stop the slaughter in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: at least one locality in Florida, Warden Guy Bradley was killed by a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: plume-hunter, who of course escaped all punishment through the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: heaven-born "sympathy" of a local jury.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Of the bloody egret slaughter in Florida, not one-tenth of the whole
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: story ever has been told. Millions of adult birds,--all there
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: were,--were killed _in the breeding season_, when the plumes were ripe
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: for the market; and millions of young birds starved in their nests. It
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: was a common thing for a rookery of several hundred birds to be attacked
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: by the plume-hunters, and in two or three days utterly destroyed. The
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: same bloody work is going on to-day in Venezuela and Brazil; and the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: stories and "affidavits" stating that the millions of egret plumes being
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: shipped annually from those countries are "shed feathers," "picked up
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: off the ground," are absolute lies. The men who have sworn to those lies
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: are perjurers, and should be punished for their crimes. (See Chapter
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: XIII).
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: By 1908, the plume-hunters had so far won the fight for the egrets that
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Florida had been swept almost as bare of these birds as the Colorado
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: desert.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Until Mr. E.A. McIlhenny's egret preserve, at Avery Island, Louisiana,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: became a pronounced success, we had believed that our two egrets soon
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: would become totally extinct in the United States. But Mr. McIlhenny has
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: certainly saved those birds to our fauna. In 1892 he started an egret
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and heron preserve, close beside his house on Avery Island. By 1900 it
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: was an established success. To-day 20,000 pairs of egrets and herons are
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: living and breeding in that bird refuge, and the two egret species are
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: safe in at least one spot in our own country.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: [Illustration: SNOWY EGRETS IN THE McILHENNY EGRET PRESERVE
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: It is at This Period That the Parent Birds are Killed for Their Plumes,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and the Young Starve in the Nest
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Photo by E.A. McIlhenny]
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Three years ago, I think there were not many bird-lovers in the United
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: States, who believed it possible to prevent the total extinction of both
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: egrets from our fauna. All the known rookeries accessible to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: plume-hunters had been totally destroyed. Two years ago, the secret
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: discovery of several small, hidden colonies prompted William Dutcher,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: President of the National Association of Audubon Societies, and Mr. T.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Gilbert Pearson, Secretary, to attempt the protection of those colonies.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: With a fund contributed for the purpose, wardens were hired and duly
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: commissioned. As previously stated, one of those wardens was shot dead
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: in cold blood by a plume hunter. The task of guarding swamp rookeries
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: from the attacks of money-hungry desperadoes to whom the accursed plumes
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: were worth their weight in gold, is a very chancy proceeding. There is
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: now one warden in Florida who says that "before they get my rookery they
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: will first have to get me."
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Thus far the protective work of the Audubon Association has been
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: successful. Now there are twenty colonies, which contain all told, about
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 5,000 egrets and about 120,000 herons and ibises which are guarded by
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the Audubon wardens. One of the most important is on Bird Island, a mile
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: out in Orange Lake, central Florida, and it is ably defended by Oscar E.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Baynard. To-day, the plume hunters who do not dare to raid the guarded
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: rookeries are trying to study out the lines of flight of the birds, to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and from their feeding-grounds, and shoot them in transit. Their motto
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: is--"Anything to beat the law, and get the plumes." It is there that the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: state of Florida should take part in the war.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The success of this campaign is attested by the fact that last year a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: number of egrets were seen in eastern Massachusetts--for the first time
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: in many years. And so to-day the question is, can the wardens continue
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: to hold the plume-hunters at bay?
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: THE WOOD-DUCK (_Aix sponsa_), by many bird-lovers regarded as the most
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: beautiful of all American birds, is threatened with extinction, in all
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the states that it still inhabits with the exception of eight. Long ago
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: (1901) the U.S. Biological Survey sounded a general alarm for this
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: species by the issue of a special bulletin regarding its disappearance,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and advising its protection by long close seasons. To their everlasting
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: honor, eight states responded, by the enactment of long close-season
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: laws. This, is the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: ROLL OF HONOR
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: CONNECTICUT
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: MAINE
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: MASSACHUSETTS
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: NEW HAMPSHIRE
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: NEW JERSEY
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: NEW YORK
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: VERMONT
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: WEST VIRGINIA
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: [Illustration: WOOD DUCK
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Regularly Killed as "Food" in 15 States]
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: And how is it with the other states that number the wood-duck in their
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: avian faunas? I am ashamed to tell; but it is necessary that the truth
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: should be known.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Surely we will find that if the other states have not the grace to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: protect this bird on account of its exquisite beauty they will not
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: penalize it by extra long open seasons.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: _A number of them have taken pains to provide extra long_ OPEN _seasons
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: on this species, usually of five or six months!!_ And this for a bird so
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: exquisitely beautiful that shooting it for the table is like dining on
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: birds of paradise. Here is a partial list of them:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: WOOD-DUCK-EATING STATES (1912)
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Georgia kills and eats the Wood-duck from Sept. 1, to Feb. 1.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Indiana, Iowa and Kansas      do so    "  Sept. 1, to Apr. 15.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Kentucky, (extra long!)     does so    "  Aug. 15, to Apr. 1.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Louisiana (extra long!)       "   "    "  Sept. 1, to Mar. 1.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Maryland                      "   "    "  Nov. 1, to Apr. 1.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Michigan                      "   "    "  Oct. 15, to Jan. 1.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Nebraska (extra long!)        "   "    "  Sept. 1, to Apr. 1.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Ohio                          "   "    "  Sept. 1, to Jan. 1.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Pennsylvania, (extra long!)   "   "    "  Sept. 1, to Apr. 11.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Rhode Island,    "     "      "   "    "  Aug. 15, to Apr. 1.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: South Carolina   "     "      "   "    "  Sept. 1, to Mar. 1.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: South Dakota     "     "      "   "    "  Sept. 10, to Apr. 10.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Tennessee        "     "      "   "    "  Aug. 1, to Apr. 15.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Virginia                      "   "    "  Aug. 1, to Jan. 1.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Wisconsin                     "   "    "  Sept. 1, to Jan. 1.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The above are the states that really possess the wood-duck and that
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: should give it, one and all, a series of five-year close seasons. Now,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: is not the record something to blush for?
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Is there in those fifteen states _nothing_ too beautiful or too good to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: go into the pot?
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: THE WOODCOCK _(Philohela minor)_, is a bird regarding which my
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: bird-hunting friends and I do not agree. I say that as a species it is
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: steadily disappearing, and presently will become extinct, unless it is
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: accorded better protection. They reply: "Well, I can show you where
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: there are woodcock yet!"
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: A few months ago a Nova Scotian writer in _Forest and Stream_ came out
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: with the bold prediction that three more years of the usual annual
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: slaughter of woodcock will bring the species to the verge of extinction
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: in that Province.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: It is such occurrences as this that bring the end of a species:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "Last fall [1911, at Norwalk, Conn.] we had a good flight of woodcock,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and it is a shame the way they were slaughtered. I know of a number of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: cases where twenty were killed by one gun in the day, and heard of one
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: case of fifty. This is all wrong, and means the end of the woodcock, if
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: continued. There is no doubt we need a bag limit on woodcock, as much as
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: on quail or partridge." ("Woodcock" in _Forest and Stream_, Mar. 2,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: As far back as 1901, Dr. A.K. Fisher of the Biological Survey predicted
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: that the woodcock and wood-duck would both become extinct unless better
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: protected. As yet, the better protection demanded has not materialized
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: to any great extent.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Says Mr. Forbush, State Ornithologist of Massachusetts, in his admirable
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "Special Report," p. 45:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "The woodcock is decreasing all over its range in the East, and needs
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the strongest protection. Of thirty-eight Massachusetts reports,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: thirty-six state that "woodcock are decreasing," "rare" or "extinct,"
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: while one states that they are holding their own, and one that they are
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: increasing slightly since the law was passed prohibiting their sale."
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Let not any honest American or Canadian sportsman lullaby himself into
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the belief that the woodcock is safe from extermination. As sure as the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: world, it is _going_! The fact that a little pocket here or there
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: contains a few birds does not in the slightest degree disprove the main
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: fact. If the sportsmen of this country desire to save the seed stock of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: woodcock, they must give it _everywhere_ five or ten-year close seasons,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and _do it immediately_!
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: OUR SHORE BIRDS IN GENERAL.--This group of game birds will be the first
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: to be exterminated in North America as a _group_. Of all our birds,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: these are the most illy fitted to survive. They are very conspicuous,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: very unwary, easy to find if alive, and easy to shoot. Never in my life
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: have any shore birds except woodcock and snipe appealed to me as real
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: game. They are too easy to kill, too trivial when killed, and some of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: them are too rank and fishy on the plate. As game for men I place them
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: on a level with barnyard ducks or orchard turkeys. I would as soon be
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: caught stealing a sheep as to be seen trying to shoot fishy yellow legs
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: or little joke sandpipers for the purpose of feeding upon them. And yet,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: thousands of full-grown men, some of them six feet high, grow indignant
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and turn red in the face at the mention of a law to give all the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: shore-birds of New York a five-year close season.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: But for all that, gentlemen of the gun, there are exactly two
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: alternatives between which you shall choose:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: (1) Either give the woodcock of the eastern United States just _ten
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: times_ the protection that it now has, or (2) bid the species a long
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: farewell. If you elect to slaughter old _Philohela minor_ on the altar
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of Selfishness, then it will be in order for the millions of people who
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: do not kill birds to say whether that proposal shall be consummated or
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: not.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Read if you please Mr. W.A. McAtee's convincing pamphlet (Biological
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Survey, No. 79), on "Our Vanishing Shore Birds," reproduced in full in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Chapter XXIII. He says: "Throughout the eastern United States, shore
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: birds are fast vanishing. Many of them have been so reduced that
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: _extermination seems imminent_. So averse to shore birds are present
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: conditions [of slaughter] that the wonder is that any escape. All the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: shore birds of the United States are in great need of better
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: protection.... Shore birds have been hunted until only a remnant of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: their once vast numbers are left. Their limited powers of reproduction,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: coupled with the natural vicissitudes of the breeding period, make their
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: increase slow, and peculiarly expose them to danger of extermination. So
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: great is their economic value that their retention in the game list and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: their destruction by sportsmen is a serious loss to agriculture."
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: And yet, here in New York state there are many men who think they
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "know," who indignantly scoff at the idea that our shore birds need a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: five-year close season to help save them from annihilation. The writer's
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: appeal for this at a recent convention of the New York State Fish, Game
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and Forest League fell upon deaf ears, and was not even seriously
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: discussed.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The shore-birds must be saved; and just at present it seems that the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: only persons who will do it are those who are _not_ sportsmen, and who
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: never kill game! If the sportsmen persist in refusing to act, to them we
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: must appeal.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Besides the woodcock and snipe, the species that are most seriously
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: threatened with extinction at an early date are the following:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: SPECIES IN GREAT DANGER
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Willet                           _Catoptrophorus semipalmatus_
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Dowitcher                        _Macrorhamphus griseus_
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Knot: Red-Breasted Sandpiper     _Tryngites subruficollis_
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Upland Plover                    _Bartramia longicauda_
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Golden Plover                    _Charadrius dominicus_
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Pectoral Sandpiper               _Pisobia maculata_
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Of these fine species, Mr. Forbush, whose excellent knowledge of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: shore birds of the Atlantic coast is well worth the most serious
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: consideration, says that the upland plover, or Bartramian sandpiper, "is
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: in imminent danger of extinction. Five reports from localities where
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: this bird formerly bred give it as nearing extinction, and four as
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: extinct. This is one of the most useful of all birds in grass land,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: feeding largely on grasshoppers and cutworms.... There is no difference
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of opinion in regard to the diminution of the shore birds; the reports
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: from all quarters are the same. It is noteworthy that practically all
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: observers agree that, considering all species, these birds have fallen
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: off about 75 per cent within twenty-five to forty years, and that
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: several species are nearly extirpated."
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: [Illustration: THE GRAY SQUIRREL, A FAMILIAR FRIEND WHEN PROTECTED]
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In 1897 when the Zoological Society published my report on the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "Extermination of Our Birds and Mammals," we put down the decrease in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the volume of bird life in Massachusetts during the previous fifteen
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: years at twenty-seven per cent. The later and more elaborate
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: investigations of Mr. Forbush have satisfactorily vindicated the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: accuracy of that estimate.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: There are other North American birds that easily might be added to the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: list of those now on the road to oblivion; but surely the foregoing
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: citations are sufficient to reveal the present desperate conditions of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: our bird life in general. Now the question is: What are the great
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: American people going to do about it?
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: THE GRAY SQUIRREL.--The gray squirrel is in danger of extermination.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Although it is our most beautiful and companionable small wild animal,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and really unfit for food, Americans have strangely elected to class it
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: as "game," and shoot it to death, _to eat_! And this in stall-fed
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: America, in the twentieth century! Americans are the only white people
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: in the world who eat squirrels. It would be just as reasonable, and no
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: more barbarous, to kill domestic cats and eat them. Their flesh would
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: taste quite as good as squirrel flesh and some of them would afford
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: quite as good "sport."
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Every intelligent person knows that in the United States the deadly
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: shot-gun is rapidly exterminating every bird and every small mammal that
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: is classed as "game," and which legally may be killed, even during two
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: months of the twelve. The market gunners slaughter ducks, grouse, shore
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: birds and rabbits as if we were all starving.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The beautiful gray squirrel has clung to life in a few of our forests
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and wood-lots, long after most other wild mammals have disappeared; but
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: throughout at least ninety-five per cent, of its original area, it is
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: now extinct. During the past thirty years I have roamed the woods of my
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: state in several widely separated localities,--the Adirondacks,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Catskills, Berkshires, western New York and elsewhere, and in all that
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: time I have seen only _three_ wild gray squirrels outside of city parks.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Except over a very small total area, the gray squirrel is already gone
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: from the wild fauna of New York State!
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Do the well-fed people of America wish to have this beautiful animal
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: entirely exterminated? Do they wish the woods to become wholly lifeless?
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Or, do they desire to bring back some of the wild creatures, and keep
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: them for their children to enjoy?
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: There is no wild mammal that responds to protection more quickly than
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the gray squirrel. In two years' time, wild specimens that are set free
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: in city parks learn that they are safe from harm and become almost
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: fearless. They take food from the hands of visitors, and climb into
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: their arms. One of the most pleasing sights of the Zoological Park is
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the enjoyment of visitors, young and old, in "petting" our wild gray
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: squirrels.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: We ask the Boy Scouts of America to bring back this animal to each state
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: where it belongs, by securing for it from legislatures and governors the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: perpetual closed seasons that it imperatively needs. It is not much to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: ask. This can be done by writing to members of the legislatures and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: requesting a suitable law. Such a request will be both right and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: reasonable; and three states have already granted it.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The gray squirrel is naturally the children's closest wild-animal
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: friend. Surely every farmer boy would like to have colonies of gray
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: squirrels around him, to keep him company, and furnish him with
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: entertainment. A wood-lot without squirrels and chipmunks is indeed a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: lifeless place. For $20 anyone can restock any bit of woods with the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: most companionable and most beautiful tree-dweller that nature has given
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: us.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The question now is, which will you choose--a gray squirrel colony to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: every farm, or lifeless desolation?
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: We ask every American to lend a hand to save Silver-Tail.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: CHAPTER IV
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: EXTINCT AND NEARLY EXTINCT SPECIES OF MAMMALS
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: When we pause and consider the years, the generations and the ages that
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Nature spends in the production of a high vertebrate species, the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: preservation of such species from extermination should seriously concern
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: us. As a matter of fact, in modern man's wild chase after wealth and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: pleasure, it is only one person out of every ten thousand who pauses to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: regard such causes, unless cornered by some protectionist fanatic, held
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: fast and coerced to listen.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: We are not discussing the animals of the Pleistocene, or the Eocene, or
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: any period of the far-distant Past. We are dealing with species that
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: have been ruthlessly, needlessly and wickedly destroyed by man during
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: our own times; species that, had they been given a fair chance, would be
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: alive and well to-day.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In reckless waste of blood and treasure, the nineteenth century has much
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: for which to answer. Wars and pillage, fires, earthquakes and volcanoes
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: are unhappily unavoidable. Like the poor of holy writ, we have them with
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: us always. But the destruction of animal life is in a totally different
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: category from the accidental calamities of life. It is deliberate,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: cold-blooded, persistent, and in its final stage, _criminal_! Worst of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: all, there is no limit to the devilish persistence of the confirmed
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: destroyer, this side of the total extinction of species. No polar night
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: is too cold, no desert inferno is too hot for the man who pursues wild
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: life for commercial purposes. The rhytina has been exterminated in the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: far north, the elephant seals on Kerguelen are being exterminated in the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: far south, and midway, in the desert mountains of Lower California a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: fine species of mountain sheep is rapidly being shot into oblivion.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: LARGE MAMMALS COMPLETELY EXTERMINATED
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: THE ARIZONA ELK, (_Cervus merriami_).--Right at our very door, under our
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: very noses and as it were only yesterday, a well-defined species of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: American elk has been totally exterminated. Until recently the mountains
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of Arizona and New Mexico were inhabited by a light-colored elk of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: smaller size than the Wyoming species, whose antlers possessed on each
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: side only one brow tine instead of two. The exact history of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: blotting out of that species has not yet been written, but it seems that
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: its final extinction occurred about 1901. Its extermination was only a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: routine incident of the devilish general slaughter of American big game
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: that by 1900 had wiped out nearly everything killable over a large
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: portion of the Rocky Mountain region and the Great Plains.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The Arizona elk was exterminated before the separate standing of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: species had been discovered by naturalists, and before even _one_ skin
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: had been preserved in a museum! In 1902 Mr. E.W. Nelson described the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: species from two male skulls, all the material of which he knew. Since
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: that time, a third male skull, bearing an excellent pair of antlers, has
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: been discovered by Mr. Ferdinand Kaegebehn, a member of the New York
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Zoological Society, and presented to our National Collection of Heads
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and Horns. It came from the Santa Catalina Mountains, Arizona, in 1884.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The species was first exterminated in the central and northern mountains
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of Arizona, probably twenty years ago, and made its last stand in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: northwestern New Mexico. Precisely when it became extinct there, its
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: last abiding place, we do not know, but in time the facts may appear.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: THE QUAGGA, (_Equus quagga_).--Before the days of Livingstone,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Gordon-Cumming and Anderson, the grassy plains and half-forested hills
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of South Africa were inhabited by great herds of a wild equine species
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: that in its markings was a sort of connecting link between the striped
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: zebras and the stripeless wild asses. The quagga resembled a wild ass
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: with a few zebra stripes around its neck, and no stripes elsewhere.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: There is no good reason why a mammal that is not in any one of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: families regularly eaten by man should be classed as a game animal.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: White men, outside of the western border of the continent of Europe, do
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: not eat horses; and by this token there is no reason why a zebra should
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: be shot as a "game" animal, any more than a baboon. A big male baboon is
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: dangerous; a male zebra is not.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Nevertheless, white men have elected to shoot zebras as game; and under
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: this curse the unfortunate quagga fell to rise no more. The species was
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: shot to a speedy death by sportsmen, and by the British and Dutch
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: farmers of South Africa. It became extinct about 1875, and to-day there
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: are only 18 specimens in all the museums of the world.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: THE BLAUBOK, (_Hippotragus leucophaeus_).--The first of the African
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: antelopes to become extinct in modern times was a species of large size,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: closely related to the roan antelope of to-day, and named by the early
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Dutch settlers of Cape Colony the blaubok, which means "blue-buck." It
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: was snuffed out of existence in the year 1800, so quickly and so
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: thoroughly that, like the Arizona elk, it very nearly escaped the annals
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of natural history. According to the careful investigations of Mr.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Graham Renshaw, there are only eight specimens in existence in all the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: museums of Europe. In general terms it may be stated that this species
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: has been extinct for about a century.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: DAVID'S DEER, (_Elaphurus davidianus_).--We enter this species with
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: those that are totally extinct, because this is true of it so far as its
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: wild state is concerned. It is a deer nearly as large as the red deer of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Europe, with 3-tined antlers about equal in total length to those of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: red deer. Its most striking differential character is its _long tail_, a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: feature that among the deer of the world is quite unique.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Originally this species inhabited "northern Mongolia" (China), but in a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: wild state it became extinct before its zoological standing became known
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: to the scientific world. The species was called to the attention of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: zoologists by a Roman Catholic missionary, called Father David, and when
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: finally described it was named in his honor.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: At the outbreak of the Boxer Rebellion, in 1900, there were about 200
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: specimens living in the imperial park of China, a short distance south
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of Pekin; but during the rebellion, all of them were killed and eaten,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: thus totally exterminating the species from Asia.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Fortunately, previous to that calamity (in 1894), the Duke of Bedford
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: had by considerable effort and expenditure procured and established in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: his matchless park surrounding Woburn Abbey, England, a herd of eighteen
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: specimens of this rarest of all deer. That nucleus has thriven and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: increased, until in 1910 it contained thirty-four head. Owing to the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: fact that all the living female specimens of this remarkable species are
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: concentrated in one spot, and perfectly liable to be wiped out in one
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: year by riot, war or disease, there is some cause for anxiety. The
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: writer has gone so far as to suggest the desirability of starting a new
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: herd of David's deer, at some point far distant from England, as an
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: insurance measure against the possibility of calamity at Woburn.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Excepting two or three specimens in European zoological gardens that
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: have been favored by the Duke of Bedford, there are no living specimens
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: outside of Woburn Park.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: [Illustration: SKELETON OF A RHYTINA, OR ARCTIC SEA-COW
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In the United States National Museum]
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: THE RHYTINA, (_Rhytina gigas_).--The most northerly Sirenian that (so
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: far as we know) ever inhabited the earth, lived on the Commander Islands
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: in the northern end of Behring Sea, and was exterminated by man, for its
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: oil and its flesh, about 1768. It was first made known to the world by
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Steller, in 1741, and must have become extinct near the beginning of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: nineteenth century.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The rhytina belonged to the same mammalian Order as the manatee of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Florida and South America, and the dugong of Australia. The largest
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: manatee that Florida has produced, so far as we know, was thirteen feet
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: long. The rhytina attained a length of between thirty and thirty-five
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: feet, and a weight of 6,000 pounds or over. The flesh of this animal,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: like that of the manatee and dugong, must have been edible, and surely
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: was prized by the hungry sailors and natives of its time. It is not
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: strange that such a species was quickly exterminated by man, in the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: arctic regions. The wonder is that it ever existed at a latitude so
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: outrageous for a Sirenian, an animal which by all precedents should
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: prefer life in temperate or warm waters.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: [Illustration: BURCHELL'S ZEBRA, IN THE U.S. NATIONAL MUSEUM
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Now Believed to be Totally Extinct]
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: BURCHELL'S ZEBRA (_Equus burchelli typicus_).--The foundation type of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: what now is the Burchell group of zebras, consisting of four or five
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: sub-species of the original species of _burchelli_, is an animal
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: abundantly striped as to its body, neck and head, but with legs that are
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: almost white and free from stripes. The sub-species have legs that are
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: striped about half as much as the mountain zebra and the Grevy species.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: While there are Chapman zebras and Grant zebras in plenty, and of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Crawshay's not a few, all these are forms that have developed northward
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of the range of the parent species, the original _Equus burchelli_. For
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: half a century in South Africa the latter had been harried and driven
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and shot, and now it is gone, forever. Now, the museum people of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life
