txt: world are hungrily enumerating their mounted specimens, and live ones
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: cannot be procured with money, because there are none! Already it is
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: common talk that "the true Burchell zebra is extinct;" and unfortunately
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: there is no good reason to doubt it. Even if there are a few now living
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: in some remote nook of the Transvaal, or Zululand, or Portuguese East
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Africa, the chances are as 100 to 1 that they will not be suffered to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: bring back the species; and so, to Burchell's zebra, the world is to-day
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: saying "Farewell!"
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: [Illustration: THYLACINE OR TASMANIAN WOLF
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Now Being Exterminated by the Sheep Owners of Tasmania]
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: SPECIES OF LARGE MAMMALS ALMOST EXTINCT
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: THE THYLACINE or TASMANIAN WOLF, (_Thylacinus cynocephalus_).--Four
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: years ago, when Mr. W.H.D. Le Souef, Director of the Melbourne
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Zoological Garden (Australia), stood before the cage of the living
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: thylacine in the New York Zoological Park, he first expressed surprise
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: at the sight of the animal, then said:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "I advise you to take excellent care of that specimen; for when it is
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: gone, you never will get another. The species soon will be extinct."
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: This opinion has been supported, quite independently, by a lady who is
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the highest authority on the present status of that species, Mrs. Mary
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: G. Roberts, of Hobart, Tasmania. For nearly ten years Mrs. Roberts has
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: been procuring all the living specimens of the thylacine that money
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: could buy, and attempting to breed them at her private zoo. She states
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: that the mountain home of this animal is now occupied by flocks of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: sheep, and because of the fact that the "Tasmanian wolves" raid the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: flocks and kill lambs, the sheep-owners and herders are systematically
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: poisoning the thylacines as fast as possible. Inasmuch as the species is
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: limited to Tasmania, Mrs. Roberts and others fear that the sheepmen
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: will totally exterminate the remnant at an early date. This animal is
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the largest and also the most interesting carnivorous marsupial of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Australia, and its untimely end will be a cause for sincere regret.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: [Illustration: WEST INDIAN SEAL
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In the New York Aquarium]
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: THE WEST INDIAN SEAL, (_Monachus tropicalis_).--For at least fifty
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: years, all the zoologists who ever had heard of this species believed
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: that the oil-hunters had completely exterminated it. In 1885, when the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: National Museum came into possession of one poorly-mounted skin, from
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Professor Poey, of Havana, it was regarded as a great _prize_.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Most unexpectedly, in 1886 American zoologists were startled by the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: discovery of a small herd on the Triangle Islands, in the Caribbean Sea,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: near Yucatan, by Mr. Henry L. Ward, now director of the Milwaukee Public
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Museum, and Professor Ferrari, of the National Museum of Mexico. They
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: found about twenty specimens, and collected only a sufficient number to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: establish the true character of the species.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Since that time, four living specimens have been captured, and sent to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the New York Aquarium, where they lived for satisfactory periods. The
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: indoor life and atmosphere did not seem to injure the natural vitality
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of the animals. In fact, I think they were far more lively in the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Aquarium than were the sluggish creatures that Mr. Ward saw on the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Triangle reefs, and described in his report of the expedition.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: It is quite possible that there are yet alive a few specimens of this
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: odd species; but the Damocletian sword of destruction hangs over them
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: suspended by a fine hair, and it is to be expected that in the future
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: some roving sea adventurer will pounce upon the Remnant, and wipe it
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: out of existence for whatever reason may to him seem good.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: [Illustration: CALIFORNIA ELEPHANT SEAL
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Photographed on Guadalupe Island by C.H. Townsend.]
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: THE CALIFORNIA ELEPHANT SEAL, (_Mirounga angustirostris_).--This
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: remarkable long-snouted species of seal was reluctantly stricken from
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the fauna of the United States several years ago, and for at least
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: fifteen years it has been regarded as totally extinct. Last year,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: however (1911), the _Albatross_ scientific expedition, under the control
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of Director C.H. Townsend of the New York Aquarium, visited Guadalupe
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Island, 175 miles off the Pacific coast of Lower California and there
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: found about 150 living elephant seals. They took six living specimens,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: all of which died after a few months in captivity. Ever since that time,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: first one person and then another comes to the front with a cheerful
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: proposition to go to those islands and "clean up" all the remainder of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: those wonderful seals. One hunting party could land on Guadalupe, and in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: one week totally destroy the last remnant of this almost extinct
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: species. To-day the only question is, Who will be mean enough to do it?
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Fortunately, those seals have no commercial value whatsoever. The little
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: oil they would yield would not pay the wages of cook's mate. The proven
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: impossibility of keeping specimens alive in captivity, even for one
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: year, and the absence of cash value in the skins, even for museum
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: purposes, has left nothing of value in the animals to justify an
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: expedition to kill or to capture them. No zoological garden or park
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: desires any of them, at any price. Adult males attain a length of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: sixteen feet, and females eleven feet. Formerly this species was
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: abundant in San Christobal Bay, Lower California.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: At present, Mexico is in no frame of mind to provide real protection to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: a small colony of seals of no commercial value, 175 miles from her
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: mainland, on an uninhabited island. It is wildly improbable that those
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: seals will be permitted to live. It is a safe prediction that our next
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: news of the elephant seals of Guadalupe will tell of the total
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: extinction of those last 140 survivors of the species.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: THE CALIFORNIA GRIZZLY BEAR, (_Ursus horribilis californicus_).--No one
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: protects grizzly bears, except in the Yellowstone Park and other game
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: preserves. For obvious reasons, it is impossible to say whether any
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: individuals of this huge species now remain alive, or how long it will
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: be until the last one falls before a .405 Winchester engine of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: extermination. We know that a living specimen can not be procured with
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: money, and we believe that "Old Monarch" now in Golden Gate Park, San
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Francisco, is the last specimen of his species that ever will be
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: exhibited alive.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: I can think of no reason, save general Californian apathy, why the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: extinction of this huge and remarkable animal was not prevented by law.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The sunset grizzly (on a railroad track) is the advertising emblem of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the Golden State, and surely the state should take sufficient interest
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: in the species to prevent its total extermination.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: But it will not. California is hell-bent on exterminating a long list of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: her wild-life species, and it is very doubtful whether the masses can be
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: reached and aroused in time to stop it. Name some of the species?
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Certainly; with all the pleasure in life: The band-tailed pigeon, the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: white-tailed kite, the sharp-tailed grouse, the sage grouse, the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: mountain sheep, prong-horned antelope, California mule deer, and ducks
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and geese too numerous to mention.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: CHAPTER V
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: THE EXTERMINATION OF SPECIES, STATE BY STATE
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Early in 1912 I addressed to about 250 persons throughout the United
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: States, three questions, as follows:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 1. What species of birds have become totally extinct in your state?
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 2. What species of birds and mammals are threatened with early
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: extinction?
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 3. What species of mammals have been exterminated throughout your state?
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: These queries were addressed to persons whose tastes and observations
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: rendered them especially qualified to furnish the information desired.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The interest shown in the inquiry was highly gratifying. The best of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: information given is summarized below; but this tabulation also includes
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: much information acquired from other sources. The general summary of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: subject will, I am sure, convince all thoughtful persons that the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: present condition of the best wild life of the nation is indeed very
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: grave. This list is not submitted as representing prolonged research or
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: absolute perfection, but it is sufficient to point forty-eight morals.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: BIRDS AND MAMMALS THAT HAVE BEEN TOTALLY EXTERMINATED IN VARIOUS STATES
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: BIRDS AND MAMMALS THREATENED WITH EXTINCTION
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The second question submitted in my inquiry produced results even more
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: startling than the first. None of the persons reporting can be regarded
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: as alarmists, but some of the lists of species approaching extinction
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: are appallingly long. To their observations I add other notes and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: observations of interest at this time.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: ALABAMA:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Wood-duck, snowy egret, woodcock. "The worst enemy of wild life is the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: pot-hunter and game hog. These wholesale slaughterers of game resort to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: any device and practice, it matters not how murderous, to accomplish the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: pernicious ends of their nefarious campaign of relentless extermination
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of fur and feather. They cannot be controlled by local laws, for these
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: after having been tried for several generations have proven consummate
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: failures, for the reason that local authorities will not enforce the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: provisions of game and bird protective statutes. Experience has
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: demonstrated the fact that no one desires to inform voluntarily on his
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: neighbors, and since breaking the game law is not construed to involve
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: moral turpitude, even to an infinitesimal degree, by many of our
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: citizens, the plunderers of nature's storehouse thus go free, it matters
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: not how great the damage done to the people as a whole."--(John H.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Wallace, Jr., Game Commissioner of Alabama.)
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: ALASKA:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Thanks to geographic and climatic conditions, the Alaskan game laws and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: $15,000 with which to enforce them, the status of the wild life of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Alaska is fairly satisfactory. I think that at present no species is in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: danger of extinction in the near future. When it was pointed out to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Congress in 1902, by Madison Grant, T.S. Palmer and others that the wild
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: life of Alaska was seriously threatened, Congress immediately enacted
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the law that was recommended, and now appropriates yearly a fair sum for
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: its enforcement. I regard the Alaskan situation as being, for so vast
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and difficult a region, reasonably well in hand, even though open to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: improvement.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: There is one fatal defect in our Alaskan game law, in the perpetual and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: sweeping license to kill, that is bestowed upon "natives" and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "prospectors." Under cover of this law, the Indians can slaughter game
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: to any extent they choose; and they are great killers. For example: In
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 1911 at Sand Point, Kenai Peninsula, Frank E. Kleinchmidt saw 82 caribou
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: tongues in the boat of a native, that had been brought in for sale at 50
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: cents, while the carcasses were left where they fell, to poison the air
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of Alaska. Thanks to the game law, and five wardens, the number of big
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: game animals killed last year in Alaska by sportsmen was reasonably
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: small,--just as it should have been.--(W.T.H.)
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: ARIZONA:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: During an overland trip made by Dr. MacDougal and others in 1907 from
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Tucson to Sonoyta, on the international boundary, 150 miles and back
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: again, we saw not one antelope or deer.--(W.T.H.)
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: CALIFORNIA:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Swan, white heron, bronze ibis. California valley quail are getting very
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: scarce, and unless adequate protection is afforded them shortly, they
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: will be found hereafter only in remote districts. Ducks also are
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: decreasing rapidly.--(H.W. Keller, Los Angeles.)
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Sage grouse and Columbian sharp-tailed grouse are so nearly extinct that
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: it may practically be said that they _are_ extinct. Among species likely
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: to be exterminated in the near future are the wood-duck and band-tailed
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: pigeon.--(W.P. Taylor, Berkeley.)
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: COLORADO:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Sage grouse and sharp-tailed grouse; nearly all the shore birds.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: CONNECTICUT:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: All the shore birds; quail, purple martin.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: DELAWARE:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Wood duck, upland plover, least tern, Wilson tern, roseate tern, black
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: skimmer, oystercatcher, and numerous other littoral species. Pileated
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: woodpeckers, bald eagles and all the ducks are much more rare than
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: formerly. Swan are about gone, geese scarce. The list of ducks, geese
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and shore-birds, as well as of terns and gulls that are nearing
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: extinction is appalling.--(C.J. Pennock, Wilmington.)
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Wood-duck, woodcock, turtle dove and bob-white.--(A.R. Spaid,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Wilmington.)
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: FLORIDA:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Limpkin, ivory-billed woodpecker, wild turkey (?).
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: GEORGIA:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Ruffed grouse, wild turkey.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: IDAHO:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Harlequin duck, mountain plover, dusky grouse, Columbian sharp-tailed
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: grouse, sage grouse. Elk, goats and grizzly bears are becoming very
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: scarce. Of the smaller animals I have not seen a fisher for years, and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: marten are hardly to be found. The same is true of other species.--(Dr.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Charles S. Moody, Sand Point.)
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: ILLINOIS:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Pinnated grouse, except where rigidly protected. In Vermillion County,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: by long and persistent protection Harvey J. Sconce has bred back upon
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: his farm about 400 of these birds.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: INDIANA:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Pileated woodpecker, woodcock, ruffed grouse, pigeon hawk, duck
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: hawk.--(Amos W. Butler, Indianapolis.)
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In northern and northwestern Indiana, a perpetual close season and rigid
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: protection have enabled the almost-extinct pinnated grouse to breed up
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: to a total number now estimated by Game Commissioner Miles and his
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: wardens at 10,000 birds. This is a gratifying illustration of what can
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: be done in bringing back an almost-vanished species. The good example of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Indiana should be followed by every state that still possesses a remnant
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of prairie-chickens, or other grouse.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: IOWA:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Pinnated grouse, wood-duck. Notwithstanding an invasion of Jasper
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: County, Iowa, in the winter of 1911-12 by hundreds of pinnated grouse,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: such as had not been known in 20 years, this gives no ground to hope
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: that the future of the species is worth a moment's purchase. The winter
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: migration came from the Dakotas, and was believed to be due to the extra
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: severe winter, and the scarcity of food. Commenting on this
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: unprecedented occurrence, J.L. Sloanaker in the "Wilson Bulletin" No.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 78, says:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "In the opinion of many, the formerly abundant prairie chicken is doomed
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: to early extinction. Many will testify to their abundance in those years
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: [in South Dakota, 1902] when the great land movement was taking place.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The influx of hungry settlers, together with an occasional bad season,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: decimated their ranks. They were eaten by the farmers, both in and out
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of season. Driven from pillar to post, with no friends and insufficient
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: food,--what else then can be expected?"
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Mr. F.C. Pellett, of Atlantic, Iowa, says: "Unless ways can be devised
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of rearing these birds in the domestic state, the prairie hen in my
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: opinion is doomed to early extinction."
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The older inhabitants here say that there is not one song-bird in summer
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: where there used to be ten.--(G.H. Nicol, in _Outdoor Life_ March,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: KANSAS:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: To all of those named in my previous list that are not actually extinct,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: I might add the prairie hen, the lesser prairie hen, as well as the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: prairie sharp-tailed grouse and the wood-duck. Such water birds as the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: avocets, godwits, greater yellow-legs, long-billed curlew and Eskimo
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: curlew are becoming very rare. All the water birds that are killed as
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: game birds have been greatly reduced in numbers during the past 25
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: years. I have not seen a wood-duck in 5 years. _The prairie chicken_ has
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: entirely disappeared from this locality. A few are still seen in the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: sand hills of western Kansas, and they are still comparatively abundant
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: along the extreme southwestern line, and in northern Oklahoma and the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Texas panhandle.--(C.H. Smyth, Wichita.)
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Yellow-legged plover, golden plover; Hudsonian and Eskimo curlew,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: prairie chicken.--(James Howard, Wichita.)
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: LOUISIANA:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Ivory-billed woodpecker, butterball, bufflehead. The wood-duck is
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: greatly diminishing every year, and if not completely protected, ten
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: years hence no wood-duck will be found in Louisiana.--(Frank M. Miller,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and G.E. Beyer, New Orleans.)
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Ivory-billed woodpecker, sandhill crane, whooping crane, pinnated
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: grouse, American and snowy egret where unprotected.--(E.A. McIlhenny,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Avery Island.)
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: MAINE:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Wood-duck, upland plover, purple martin, house wren, pileated
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: woodpecker, bald eagle, yellow-legs, great blue heron, Canada goose,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: redhead and canvasback duck.--(John F. Sprague, Dover.)
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Puffin, Leach's petrel, eider duck, laughing gull, great blue heron,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: fish-hawk and bald eagle.--(Arthur H. Norton, Portland.)
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: MARYLAND:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Curlew, pileated woodpecker, summer duck, snowy heron. No record of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: sandhill crane for the last 35 years. Greater yellow-leg is much scarcer
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: than formerly, also Bartramian sandpiper. The only two birds which show
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: an _increase_ in the past few years are the robin and lesser scaup.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: General protection of the robin has caused its increase; stopping of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: spring shooting in the North has probably caused the increase of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: latter. As a general proposition I think I can say that all birds are
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: becoming scarcer in this state, as we have laws that do not protect,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: little enforcement of same, no revenue for bird protection and too
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: little public interest. We are working to change all this, but it comes
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: slowly. _The public fails to respond until the birds are 'most gone_,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and we have a pretty good lot of game still left. The members of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Order Gallinae are only holding their own where privately protected. The
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: members of the Plover Family and what are known locally as shore birds
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: are still plentiful on the shores of Chincoteague and Assateague, and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: although they do not breed there as formerly, so far as I know there are
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: no species exterminated.--(Talbott Denmead, Baltimore.)
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: MASSACHUSETTS:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Wood-duck, hooded merganser, blue-winged teal, upland plover; curlew
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: (perhaps already gone); red-tailed hawk (I have not seen one in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Middlesex County for several years); great horned owl (almost gone in my
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: county, Middlesex); house wren. The eave swallows and purple martins are
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: fast deserting eastern Massachusetts and the barn swallows steadily
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: diminishing in numbers. The bald eagle should perhaps be included here.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: I seldom see or hear of it now.--(William Brewster, Cambridge.)
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Upland plover, woodcock, wood-duck (recent complete protection is
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: helping these somewhat), heath hen, piping plover, golden plover, a good
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: many song and insectivorous birds are apparently decreasing rather
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: rapidly; for instance, the eave swallow.--(William P. Wharton, Groton.)
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: MICHIGAN:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Wood-duck, limicolae, woodcock, sandhill crane. The great whooping crane
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: is not a wild bird, but I think it is now practically extinct. Many of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: our warblers and song birds are now exceedingly rare. Ruffed grouse
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: greatly decreased during the past 10 years.--(W.B. Mershon, Saginaw.)
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: MINNESOTA:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The sandhill crane has been killed by sportsmen. I have not seen one in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: three years. Where there were, a few years ago, thousands of blue
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: herons, egrets, wood ducks, redbirds, and Baltimore orioles, all those
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: birds are now almost extinct in this state. They are being killed by
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Austrians and Italians, who slaughter everything that flies or moves.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Robins, too, will be a rarity if more severe penalties are not imposed.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: I have seized 22 robins, 1 pigeon hawk, 1 crested log-cock, 4
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: woodpeckers and 1 grosbeak in one camp, at the Lertonia mine, all being
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: prepared for eating. I have also caught them preparing and eating sea
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: gulls, terns, blue heron, egret and even the bittern. I have secured 128
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: convictions since the first of last September.--(George E. Wood, Game
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Warden, Hibbing, Minnesota.)
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: From Robert Page Lincoln, Minneapolis.--Partridge are waning fast, quail
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: gradually becoming extinct, prairie chickens almost extinct.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Duck-shooting is rare. The gray squirrel is fast becoming extinct in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Minnesota. Mink are going fast, and fur-bearing animals generally are
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: becoming extinct. The game is passing so very rapidly that it will soon
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: be a thing of the forgotten past. The quail are suffering most. The
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: falling off is amazing, and inconceivable to one who has not looked it
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: up. Duck-shooting is rare, the clubs are idle for want of birds. What
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: ducks come down fly high, being harassed coming down from the north. I
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: consider the southern Minnesota country practically cleaned out.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: MISSOURI:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The birds threatened with extermination are the American woodcock,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: wood-duck, snowy egret, pinnated grouse, wild turkey, ruffed grouse,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: golden eagle, bald eagle, pileated woodpecker.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: MONTANA:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Blue grouse.--(Henry Avare, Helena.)
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Sage grouse, prairie and Columbian sharp-tailed grouse, trumpeter swan,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Canada goose, in fact, most of the water-fowl. The sickle-billed curlew,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of which there were many a few years ago, is becoming scarce. There are
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: no more golden or black-bellied plover in these parts.--(Harry P.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Stanford, Kalispell.)
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Curlew, Franklin grouse (fool hen) and sage grouse.--W.R. Felton, Miles
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: City.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Sage grouse.--(L.A. Huffman, Miles City.)
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Ptarmigan, wood-duck, sharp-tailed grouse, sage grouse, fool hen and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: plover. All game birds are becoming scarce as the country becomes
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: settled and they are confined to uninhabited regions.--(Prof. M.J.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Elrod, Missoula.)
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: NEBRASKA:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Grouse, prairie chicken and quail.--(H.N. Miller, Lincoln.)
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Whistling swan.--(Dr. S.G. Towne, Omaha.)
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: NEW HAMPSHIRE:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Wood-duck and upland plover.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: NEW YORK:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Quail, woodcock, upland plover, golden plover, black-bellied plover,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: willet, dowitcher, red-breasted sandpiper, long-billed curlew,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: wood-duck, purple martin, redheaded woodpecker, mourning dove; gray
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: squirrel, otter.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: NEW JERSEY:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Ruffed grouse, teal, canvasback, red-head duck, widgeon, and all species
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of shore birds, the most noticeable being black-bellied plover,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: dowitcher, golden plover, killdeer, sickle-bill curlew, upland plover
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and English snipe; also the mourning dove.--(James M. Stratton and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Ernest Napier, Trenton.)
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Upland plover, apparently killdeer, egret, wood-duck, woodcock, and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: probably others.--(B.S. Bowdish, Demarest.)
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: NORTH CAROLINA:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Forster's tern, oystercatcher, egret and snowy egret.--(T. Gilbert
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Pearson, Sec. Nat. Asso. Audubon Societies.)
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Ruffed grouse rapidly disappearing; bobwhite becoming scarce.--(E.L.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Ewbank, Hendersonville.)
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Perhaps American and snowy egret. If long-billed curlew is not extinct,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: it seems due to become so. No definite, reliable record of it later than
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 1885.--(H.H. Brimley, Raleigh.)
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: NORTH DAKOTA:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Wood-duck, prairie hen, upland plover, sharp-tailed grouse, canvas-back,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: pinnated and ruffed grouse, double-crested cormorant, blue heron,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: long-billed curlew, whooping crane and white pelican.--(W.B. Bell,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Agricultural College.)
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Upland plover, marbled godwit, Baird's sparrow, chestnut-collared
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: longspur.--(Alfred Eastgate, Tolna.)
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: OHIO:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: White heron, pileated woodpecker (if not already extinct). White heron
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: reported a number of times last year; occurrences in Sandusky, Huron,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Ashtabula and several other counties during 1911. These birds would
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: doubtless rapidly recruit under a proper federal law.--(Paul North,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Cleveland.)
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Turtle dove, quail, red-bird, wren, hummingbird, wild canary [goldfinch]
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and blue bird.--(Walter C. Staley, Dayton.)
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: OKLAHOMA:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Pinnated grouse.--(J.C. Clark); otter, kit fox, black-footed
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: ferret.--(G.W. Stevens.)
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: OREGON:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: American egret, snowy egret.--(W.L. Finley, Portland.)
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: PENNSYLVANIA:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Virginia partridge and woodcock.--(Arthur Chapman.)
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Wood-duck, least bittern, phalarope, woodcock, duck hawk and barn
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: swallow.--(Dr. Chas. B. Penrose.)
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Wild turkey; also various transient and straggling water birds.--(Witmer
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Stone.)
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: RHODE ISLAND:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Wood-duck, knot, greater yellow-legs, upland plover, golden plover,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: piping plover, great horned owl.--(Harry S. Hathaway, South Auburn.)
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: SOUTH CAROLINA:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Wood duck, abundant 6 years ago, now almost gone. Wild turkey (abundant
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: up to 1898); woodcock, upland plover, Hudsonian curlew, Carolina rail,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Virginia rail, clapper rail and coot. Black bear verging on extinction,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: opossum dwindling rapidly.--(James H. Rice Jr., Summerville.)
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: SOUTH DAKOTA:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Prairie chicken and quail are most likely to become extinct in the near
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: future.--(W.F. Bancroft, Watertown.)
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: TEXAS:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Wild turkey and prairie chickens.--(J.D. Cox, Austin.)
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Plover, all species; curlew, cardinal, road-runner, woodcock, wood-duck,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: canvas-back, cranes, all the herons; wild turkey; quail, all varieties;
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: prairie chicken and Texas guan.--(Capt. M.B. Davis, Waco.)
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Curlew, very rare; plover, very rare; antelope. (Answer applies to the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Panhandle of Texas.--Chas. Goodnight.)
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Everything [is threatened with extinction] save the dove, which is a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: migrating bird. Antelope nearly all gone.--(Col. O.C. Guessaz, San
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Antonio.)
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: UTAH:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Our wild birds are well protected, and there are none that are
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: threatened with extinction. They are increasing.--(Fred. W. Chambers,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: State Game Warden, Salt Lake City.)
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: VERMONT:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: If all states afforded as good protection as does Vermont, none; but
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: migrating birds like woodcock are now threatened.--(John W. Tilcomb,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: State Game Warden, Lyndonville.)
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: VIRGINIA:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Pheasants (ruffed grouse), wild turkey and other game birds are nearly
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: extinct. A few bears remain, and deer in small numbers in remote
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: sections. In fact, all animals show great reduction in numbers, owing to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: cutting down forests, and constant gunning.--(L.T. Christian, Richmond.)
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: WEST VIRGINIA:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Wood-duck, wild turkey, northern raven, dickcissel.--(Rev. Earle A.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Brooks, Weston.)
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Wild turkeys are very scarce, also ducks. Doves, once numerous, now
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: almost _nil_. Eagles, except a few in remote fastnesses. Many native
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: song-birds are retreating before the English sparrow.--(William Perry
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Brown, Glenville.)
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Wood-duck and wild turkey.--(J.A. Viquesney, Belington.)
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: WISCONSIN:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Double-crested cormorant, upland plover, white pelican, long-billed
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: curlew, lesser snow goose, Hudsonian curlew, sandhill crane, golden
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: plover, woodcock, dowitcher and long-billed duck; spruce grouse, knot,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: prairie sharp-tailed grouse, marbled godwit and bald eagle. All these,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: formerly abundant, must now be called rare in Wisconsin.--(Prof. George
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: E. Wagner, Madison.)
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Common tern, knot, American white pelican, Hudsonian godwit, trumpeter
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: swan, long-billed curlew, snowy heron, Hudsonian curlew, American
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: avocet, prairie sharp-tailed grouse, dowitcher, passenger pigeon.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Long-billed dowitcher and northern hairy woodpecker.--(Henry L. Ward,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Milwaukee Public Museum.)
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Wood-duck, ruddy duck, black mallard, grebe or hell-diver, tern and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: woodcock.--(Fred. Gerhardt, Madison.)
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: WYOMING:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Sage grouse and sharp-tailed grouse are becoming extinct, both in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Wyoming and North Dakota. Sheridan and Johnson Counties (Wyoming) have
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: sage grouse protected until 1915. The miners (mostly foreigners) are out
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: after rabbits at all seasons. To them everything that flies, walks or
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: swims, large enough to be seen, is a "rabbit." They are even worse than
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the average sheep-herder, as he will seldom kill a bird brooding her
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: young, but to one of those men, a wren or creeper looks like a turkey.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Antelope, mountain sheep and grizzly bears are _going_, fast! The moose
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: season opens in 1915, for a 30 days open season, then close season until
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 1920.--(Howard Eaton, Wolf.)
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Sage grouse, blue grouse, curlew, sandhill crane, porcupine practically
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: extinct; wolverine and pine marten nearly all gone.--(S.N. Leek,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Jackson's Hole.)
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: CANADA
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: ALBERTA:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Swainson's buzzard and sandhill crane are now practically extinct. Elk
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and antelope will soon be as extinct as the buffalo.--(Arthur G.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Wooley-Dod, Calgary.)
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: BRITISH COLUMBIA:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Wild fowl are in the greatest danger in the southern part of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Province, especially the wood-duck. Otherwise birds are increasing
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: rather than otherwise, especially the small non-game birds. The sea
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: otter is almost extinct.--(A. Bryan Williams, Provincial Game Warden,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Vancouver.)
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: MANITOBA:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Whooping crane, wood-duck and golden plover. Other species begin to show
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: a marked increase, due to our stringent protective measures. For
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: example, the pinnated grouse and sharp-tailed grouse are more plentiful
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: than in 15 years. Prong-horned antelope and wolf are threatened with
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: extinction.--(J.P. Turner, Winnipeg.)
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The game birds indigenous to this Province are fairly plentiful. Though
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the prairie chicken was very scarce some few years ago, these birds have
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: become very plentiful again, owing to the strict enforcement of our
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: present "Game Act." The elk are in danger of becoming extinct if they
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: are not stringently guarded. Beaver and otter were almost extinct some
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: few years ago, but are now on the increase, owing to a strict
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: enforcement of the "Game Act."--(Charles Barber, Winnipeg.)
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: NEW BRUNSWICK:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Partridge, plover and woodcock. Moose and deer are getting more
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: plentiful every year.--(W.W. Gerard, St. John.)
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: NOVA SCOTIA:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The Canada grouse may possibly become extinct in Nova Scotia, unless the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: protection it now enjoys can save it. The American golden plover, which
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: formerly came in immense flocks, is now very rare. Snowflakes are very
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: much less common than formerly, but I think this is because our winters
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: are now usually much less severe. The caribou is almost extinct on the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: mainland of Nova Scotia, but is still found in North Cape Breton Island.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The wolf has become excessively rare, but as it is found in New
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Brunswick, it may occur here at any time again. The beaver had been
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: threatened with extinction; but since being protected, it has
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: multiplied, and is now on a fairly safe footing again.--(Curator of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Museum, Halifax.)
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: ONTARIO:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Quail are getting scarce.--(E. Tinsley, Toronto.)
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Wood-duck, bob white, woodcock, golden plover, Hudsonian curlew, knot
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and dowitcher [are threatened with extinction.]--(C.W. Nash, Toronto.)
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: PRINCE EDWARD ISLAND:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The species threatened with extinction are the golden plover, American
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: woodcock, pied-billed grebe, red-throated loon, sooty shearwater,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: gadwall, ruddy duck, black-crowned night heron, Hudsonian godwit,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: kildeer, northern pileated woodpecker, chimney swift, yellow-bellied
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: flycatcher, red-winged blackbird, pine finch, magnolia warbler,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: ruby-crowned kinglet.--(E.T. Carbonell, Charlottetown.)
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In closing the notes of this survey, I repeat my assurance that they are
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: not offered on a basis of infallibility. It would require years of work
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: to obtain answers from forty-eight states to the three questions that I
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: have asked that could be offered as absolutely exact. All these reports
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: are submitted on the well-recognized court-testimony basis,--"to the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: best of our knowledge and belief." Gathered as they have been from
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: persons whose knowledge is good, these opinions are therefore valuable;
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and they furnish excellent indices of wild-life conditions as they exist
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: in 1912 in the various states and provinces of North America north of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Mexico.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: CHAPTER VI
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: THE REGULAR ARMY OF DESTRUCTION
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In order to cure any disease, the surgeon must make of it a correct
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: diagnosis. It is useless to try to prescribe remedies without a thorough
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: understanding of the trouble.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: That the best and most interesting wild life of America is disappearing
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: at a rapid rate, we all know only too well. That proposition is entirely
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: beyond the domain of argument. The fact that a species or a group of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: species has made a little gain here and there, or is stationary, does
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: not sensibly diminish the force of the descending blow. The wild-life
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: situation is full of surprises. For example, in 1902 I was astounded by
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the extent to which bird life had decreased over the 130 miles between
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Miles City, Montana, and the Missouri River since 1886; for there was no
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: reason to expect anything of the kind. Even the jack rabbits and coyotes
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: had almost totally disappeared.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The duties of the present hour, that fairly thrust themselves into our
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: faces and will not be put aside, are these:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: _First_,--To save valuable species from extermination!
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: _Second_,--To preserve a satisfactory representation of our once rich
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: fauna, to hand down to Posterity.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: _Third_,--To protect the farmer and fruit grower from the enormous
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: losses that the destruction of our insectivorous and rodent-eating birds
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: is now inflicting upon both the producer and consumer.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: _Fourth_,--To protect our forests, by protecting the birds that keep
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: down the myriads of insects that are destructive to trees and shrubs.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: _Fifth_,--To preserve to the future sportsmen of America enough game and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: fish that they may have at least a taste of the legitimate pursuit of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: game in the open that has made life so interesting to the sportsmen of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: to-day.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: For any civilized nation to exterminate valuable and interesting species
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of wild mammals, birds or fishes is more than a disgrace. It is a crime!
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: We have no right, legal, moral or commercial, to exterminate any
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: valuable or interesting species; because none of them belong to us, to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: exterminate or not, as we please.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: For the people of any civilized nation to permit the slaughter of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: wild birds that protect its crops, its fruits and its forests from the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: insect hordes, is worse than folly. It is sheer orneryness and idiocy.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: People who are either so lazy or asinine as to permit the slaughter of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: their best friends deserve to have their crops destroyed and their
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: forests ravaged. They deserve to pay twenty cents a pound for their
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: cotton when the boll weevil has cut down the normal supply.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: It is very desirable that we should now take an inventory of the forces
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: that have been, and to-day are, active in the destruction of our wild
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: birds, mammals, and game fishes. During the past ten years a sufficient
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: quantity of facts and figures has become available to enable us to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: secure a reasonably full and accurate view of the whole situation. As we
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: pause on our hill-top, and survey the field of carnage, we find that we
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: are reviewing the _Army of Destruction_!
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: It is indeed a motley array. We see true sportsmen beside ordinary
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: gunners, game-hogs and meat hunters; handsome setter dogs are mixed up
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: with coyotes, cats, foxes and skunks; and well-gowned women and ladies'
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: maids are jostled by half-naked "poor-white" and black-negro "plume
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: hunters."
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Verily, the destruction of wild life makes strange companions.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Let us briefly review the several army corps that together make up the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: army of the destroyers. Space in this volume forbids an extended notice
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of each. Unfortunately it is impossible to segregate some of these
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: classes, and number each one, for they merge together too closely for
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: that; but we can at least describe the several classes that form the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: great mass of destroyers.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: THE GENTLEMEN SPORTSMEN.--These men are the very bone and sinew of wild
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: life preservation. These are the men who have red blood in their veins,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: who annually hear the red gods calling, who love the earth, the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: mountains, the woods, the waters and the sky. These are the men to whom
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "the bag" is a matter of small importance, and to whom "the bag-limit"
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: has only academic interest; because in nine cases out of ten they do not
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: care to kill all that the law allows. The tenth and exceptional time is
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: when the bag limit is "one." A gentleman sportsman is a man who protects
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: game, stops shooting when he has "enough"--without reference to the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: legal bag-limit, and whenever a species is threatened with extinction,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: he conscientiously refrains from shooting it.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The true sportsmen of the world are the men who once were keen in the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: stubble or on the trail, but who have been halted by the general
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: slaughter and the awful decrease of game. Many of them, long before a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: hair has turned gray, have hung up their guns forever, and turned to the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: camera. These are the men who are willing to hand out checks, or to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: leave their mirth and their employment and go to the firing line at
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: their state capitols, to lock horns with the bull-headed killers of wild
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: life who recognize no check or limit save the law.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: These are the men who have done the most to put upon our statute books
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the laws that thus far have saved some of our American game from total
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: annihilation, and who (so we firmly believe) will be chiefly
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: instrumental in tightening the lines of protection around the remnant.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: These are the men who are making and stocking game preserves, public and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: private, great and small.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: [Illustration:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: THE REGULAR ARMY OF DESTRUCTION, WAITING FOR THE FIRST OF OCTOBER
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Each Year 2,642,274 Well-Armed Men Take the Field Against the Remnant
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of Wild Birds and Mammals In the United States.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Drawn by Dan Beard]
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: If you wish to know some of these men, I will tell you where to find a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: goodly number of them; and when you find them, you will also find that
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: they are men you would enjoy camping with! Look in the membership lists
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of the Boone and Crockett Club, Camp-Fire Club of America, the Lewis and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Clark Club of Pittsburgh, the New York State League, the Shikar Club of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: London, the Society for the Preservation of the Wild Fauna of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: British Empire, the Massachusetts Fish and Game Protective Association,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the Springfield (Mass.) Sportsmen's Association, the Camp-Fire Clubs of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Detroit and Chicago, and the North American Fish and Game Protective
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Association.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: There are other bodies of sportsmen that I would like to name, were
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: space available, but to set down here a complete list is quite
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: impossible.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The best and the most of the game-protective laws now in force in the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: United States and Canada were brought into existence through the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: initiative and efforts of the real sportsmen of those two nations. But
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: for their activity, exerted on the right side, the settled portion of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: North America would to-day be an utterly gameless land! Even though the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: sportsmen have taken their toll of the wilds, they have made the laws
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: that have saved a remnant of the game until 1912.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: For all that, however, every man who still shoots game is a soldier in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the Army of Destruction! There is no blinking that fact. Such men do not
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: stand on the summit with the men who now protect the game _and do not
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: shoot at all!_ The millions of men who do not shoot, and who also _do
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: nothing to protect or preserve wild life_, do not count! In this warfare
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: they are merely ciphers in front of the real figures.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: THE GUNNERS, WHO KILL TO THE LIMIT.--Out of the enormous mass of men who
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: annually take up arms against the remnant of wild life, _and are called
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "sportsmen_," I believe that only one out of every 500 _conscientiously_
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: stops shooting when game becomes scarce, and extinction is impending.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: All of the others feel that it is right and proper to kill all the game
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: that they can kill _up to the legal bag limit_. It is the reasoning of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Shylock:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "Justice demands it, and _the law_ doth give it!"
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Especially is this true of the men who pay their _one dollar_ per year
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: for a resident hunting license, and feel that in doing so they have done
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: a great Big Thing!
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: This is a very deadly frame of mind. Ethically it is _entirely wrong_;
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and at least two million men and boys who shoot American game must be
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: shown that it is wrong! This is the spirit of Extermination, clothed in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the robes of Law and Justice.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Whenever and wherever game birds are so scarce that a good shot who
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: hunts hard during a day in the fields finds only three or four birds, he
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: should _stop shooting at once, and devote his mind and energies to the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: problem of bringing back the game!_ It is strange that conditions do not
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: make this duty clear to every conscientious citizen.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The Shylock spirit which prompts a man to kill all that "the law allows"
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: is a terrible scourge to the wild life of America, and to the world at
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: large. It is the spirit of extermination according to law. Even the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: killing of game for the market is not so great a scourge as this; for
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: this spirit searches out the game in every nook and cranny of the world,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and spares not. In effect it says: "If the law is defective, it is right
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: for me to take every advantage of it! I do not need to have any
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: conscience in the matter outside _the letter of the law_."
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The extent to which this amazing spirit prevails is positively awful.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: You will find it among pseudo game-protectors to a paralyzing extent! It
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: is the great gunner's paradox, and it pervades this country from corner
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: to corner. No: there is no use in trying to "educate" the mass of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: hunters of America out of it, as a means of saving the game; for
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: positively it can not be done! Do not waste time in trying it. If you
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: rely upon it, you will be doing a great wrong to wild life, and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: promoting extermination. The only remedy is _sweeping laws, for long
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: close seasons, for a great many species_. Forget the paltry
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: dollar-a-year license money. The license fees never represent more than
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: a tenth part of the value of the game that is killed under licenses.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The savage desire to kill "all that the law allows" often is manifested
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: in men in whom we naturally expect to find a very different spirit. By
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: way of illumination, I offer three cases out of the many that I could
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: state.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Case No. 1. _The Duck Breeder_.--A gentleman of my acquaintance has
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: spent several years and much money in breeding wild ducks. From my
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: relations with him, I had acquired the belief that he was a great lover
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of ducks, and at least wished all species well. One whizzing cold day in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: winter he called upon me, and stated that he had been duck-hunting;
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: which surprised me. He added, "I have just spent two days on Great South
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Bay, and I made a great killing. _In the two days I got ninety-four
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: ducks!"_
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: I said, "How _could_ you do it,--caring for wild ducks as you do?"
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "Well, I had hunted ducks twice before on Great South Bay and didn't
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: have very good luck; but this time the cold weather drove the ducks in,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and I got square with them!"
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Case No. 2. _The Ornithologist_.--A short time ago the news was
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: published in _Forest and Stream_, that a well-known ornithologist had
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: distinguished himself in one of the mid-western states by the skill he
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: had displayed in bagging thirty-four ducks in one day, greatly to the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: envy of the natives; and if this shoe fits any American naturalist, he
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: is welcome to put it on and wear it.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Case No. 3. _The Sportsman_.--A friend of mine in the South is the owner
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of a game preserve in which wild ducks are at times very numerous. Once
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: upon a time he was visited by a northern sportsmen who takes a deep and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: abiding interest in the preservation of game. The sportsman was invited
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: to go out duck-shooting; ducks being then in season there. He said:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "Yes, I will go; and I want you to put me in a place where I can kill a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: _hundred ducks in a day_! I never have done that yet, and I would like
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: to do it, once!"
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "All right," said my friend, "I can put you in such a place; and if you
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: can shoot well enough, you can kill a hundred ducks in a day."
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The effort was made in all earnestness. There was much shooting, but few
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: were the ducks that fell before it. In concluding this story my friend
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: remarked in a tone of disgust:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "All the game-preserving sportsmen that come to me are just like that!
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: _They want to kill all they can kill_!"
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: There is a blood-test by which to separate the conscientious sportsmen
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: from the mere gunners. Here it is:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: A _sportsman_ stops shooting when game becomes scarce; and he does not
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: object to long-close-season laws; but
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: A _gunner_ believes in killing "all that the law allows;" and _he
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: objects to long close seasons_!
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: I warrant that whenever and wherever this test is applied it will
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: separate the sheep from the goats. It applies in all America, all Asia
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and Africa, and in Greenland, with equal force.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: [Illustration: G.O. SHIELDS
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: A Notable Defender of Wild Life]
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: THE GAME-HOG.--This term was coined by G.O. Shields, in 1897, when he
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: was editor and owner of _Recreation Magazine_, and it has come into
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: general use. It has been recognized by a judge on the bench as being an
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: appropriate term to apply to all men who selfishly slaughter wild game
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: beyond the limits of decency. Although it is a harsh term, and was
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: mercilessly used by Mr. Shields in his fierce war on the men who
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: slaughtered game for "sport," it has jarred at least a hundred thousand
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: men into their first realization of the fact that to-day there is a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: difference between decency and indecency in the pursuit of game. The use
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of the term has done _very great good_; but, strange to say, it has made
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: for Mr. Shields a great many enemies _outside_ the ranks of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: game-hogs themselves! From this one might fairly suppose that there is
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: such a thing as a sympathetic game-hog!
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: One thing at least is certain. During a period of about six years, while
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: his war with the game-hogs was on, from Maine to California, Mr.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Shields's name became a genuine terror to excessive killers of game; and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: it is reasonably certain that his war saved a great number of game birds
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: from the slaughter that otherwise would have overtaken them!
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The number of armed men and boys who annually take the field in the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: United States in the pursuit of birds and quadrupeds, is enormous.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: People who do not shoot have no conception of it; and neither do they
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: comprehend the mechanical perfection and fearful deadliness of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: weapons used. This feature of the situation can hardly be realized until
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: some aspect of it is actually seen.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: I have been at some pains to collect the latest figures showing the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: number of hunting licenses issued in 1911, but the total is incomplete.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In some states the figures are not obtainable, and in some states there
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: are no hunters' license laws. The figures of hunting licenses issued in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 1911 that I have obtained from official sources are set forth below.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Now, the twenty-one states issuing no licenses, or not reporting,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: produced in 1911 fully as many gunners per capita as did the other
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: twenty-seven states. Computed fairly on existing averages they must have
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: turned out a total of 1,155,966 gunners, making for all the United
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: States =2,642,194= armed men and boys warring upon the remnant of game
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: in 1911. We are not counting the large number of lawless hunters who
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: never take out licenses. Now, is Mr. Beard's picture a truthful
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: presentation, or not?
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: _New York_ with only deer, ruffed grouse, shore-birds, ducks and a very
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: few woodcock to shoot annually puts into the field 150,222 armed men. In
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 1909 they killed about _9,000 deer!_
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: _New Jersey_, spending $30,000 in 1912 in efforts to restock her covers
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: with game, and with a population of 2,537,167, sent out in 1911 a total
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: army of 61,920 well-armed gunners. How can any of her game survive?
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: _New Hampshire_, with only 430,572 population, has 33,542 licensed
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: hunters,--equal to _thirty-three regiments of full strength!_
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: _Vermont_, with 355,956 people, sends out annually an army of 31,762 men
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: who hunt according to law; and in 1910 they killed 3,649 deer.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: _Utah_, with only 373,351 population, had 27,800 men in the field after
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: her very small remnant of game! How can any wild thing of Utah escape?
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: _Montana_, population 376,053, had in 1911 an army of 59,291 well-armed
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: men, warring chiefly upon the big game, and swiftly exterminating it.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: How long can any of the big game stand before the army of _two and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: one-half million well-armed men_, eager and keen to kill, and out to get
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: an equivalent for their annual expenditure in guns, ammunition and other
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: expenses?
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In addition to the hunters themselves, they are assisted by thousands of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: expert guides, thousands of horses, thousands of dogs, hundreds of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: automobiles and hundreds of thousands of tents. Each big-game hunter has
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: an experienced guide who knows the haunts and habits of the game, the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: best feeding grounds, the best trails, and everything else that will aid
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the hunter in taking the game at a disadvantage and destroying it. The
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: big-game rifles are of the highest power, the longest range, the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: greatest accuracy and the best repeating mechanism that modern inventive
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: genius can produce. It is said that in Wyoming the Maxim silencer is now
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: being used. England has produced a weapon of a new type, called "the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: scatter rifle," which is intended for use on ducks. The best binoculars
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: are used in searching out the game, and horses carry the hunters and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: guides as near as possible to the game. For bears, baits are freely
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: used, and in the pursuit of pumas, dogs are employed to the limit of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: available supply.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The deadliness of the automobile in hunting already is so apparent that
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: North Dakota has wisely and justly forbidden their use by law, (1911).
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The swift machine enables city gunmen to penetrate game regions they
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: could not reach with horses, and hunt through from four to six
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: localities per day, instead of one only, as formerly. The use of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: automobiles in hunting should be everywhere prohibited.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Every appliance and assistance that money can buy, the modern sportsman
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: secures to help him against the game. The game is beset during its
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: breeding season by various wild enemies,--foxes, cats, wolves, pumas,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: lynxes, eagles, and many other predatory species. The only help that it
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: receives is in the form of an annual close season--_which thus far has
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: saved in America only a few local moose, white-tailed deer and a few
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: game birds, from steady and sure extermination_.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: _The bag limits on which vast reliance is placed to preserve the wild
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: game, are a fraud, a delusion and a snare_! The few local exceptions
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: only prove the generality of the rule. In every state, without one
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: single exception, the bag limits are far too high, and the laws are of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: deadly liberality. In many states, the bag limit laws on birds are an
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: absolute dead letter. Fancy the 125 wardens of New York enforcing the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: bag-limit laws on 150,000 gunners! It is this horrible condition that is
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: enabling the licensed army of destruction to get in its deadly work on
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the game, all over the world. In America, the over-liberality of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: laws are to blame for two-thirds of the carnival of slaughter, and the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: successful evasions of the law are responsible for the other third.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: [Illustration: TWO GUNNERS OF KANSAS CITY
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Who Believe in Killing all That the Law Allows. They are not so Much to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Blame as the System That Permits Such Slaughter. (Note the Pump Guns)]
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: [Illustration: WHY THE SANDHILL CRANE IS BECOMING EXTINCT
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Nineteen of Them Killed as "Game" by Three Gunners. Note the Machine Gun.]
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The only remedy for the present extermination of game according to law
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: that so rapidly and so furiously is proceeding all over the United
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: States, Canada, Alaska, and Africa, is ten-year close seasons on all the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: species threatened with extinction, and immensely reduced open seasons
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and bag limits on all the others.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Will the people who still have wild game take heed now, and clamp down
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the brakes, hard and fast before it is too late, or will they have their
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life
