txt: game exterminated?
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Shall we have five-year close seasons, or close seasons of 500 years? We
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: must take our choice.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Shall we hand down to our children a gameless continent, with all the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: shame that such a calamity will entail?
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: We have _got_ to answer these questions like men, or they will soon be
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: answered for us by the extermination of the wild life. For twenty-five
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: years we have been smarting under the disgrace of the extermination of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: our bison millions. Let us not repeat the dose through the destruction
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of other species.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: CHAPTER VII
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: THE GUERRILLAS OF DESTRUCTION
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: We have now to deal with THE GUERRILLAS OF DESTRUCTION.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In warfare, a _guerrilla, or bushwhacker_, is an armed man who
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: recognizes none of the rules of civilized warfare, and very often has no
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: commander. In France he is called a "franc-tireur," or free-shooter. The
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: guerrilla goes out to live on the country, to skulk, to war on the weak,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and never attack save from ambush, or when the odds clearly are on his
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: side. His military status is barely one remove from that of the spy.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The meat-shooters who harry the game and other wild life in order to use
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: it as a staple food supply; the Italians, negroes and others who shoot
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: song-birds as food; the plume-hunters and the hide-and-tusk hunters all
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: over the world are the guerrillas of the Army of Destruction. Let us
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: consider some of these grand divisions in detail.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Here is an inexorable law of Nature, to which there are no exceptions:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: _No wild species of bird, mammal, reptile or fish can withstand
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: exploitation for commercial purposes_.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The men who pursue wild creatures for the money or other value there is
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: in them, never give up. They work at slaughter when other men are
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: enjoying life, or are asleep. If they are persistent, no species on
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: which they fix the Evil Eye escapes extermination at their hands.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Does anyone question this statement? If so let him turn backward and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: look at the lists of dead and dying species.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: THE DIVISION OF MEAT-SHOOTERS contains all men who sordidly shoot for
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the frying-pan,--to save bacon and beef at the expense of the public, or
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: for the markets. There are a few wilderness regions so remote and so
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: difficult of access that the transportation of meat into them is a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: matter of much difficulty and expense. There are a very few men in North
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: America who are justified in "living off the country," _for short
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: periods_. The genuine prospectors always have been counted in this
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: class; but all miners who are fully located, all lumbermen and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: railway-builders certainly are not in the prospector's class. They are
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: abundantly able to maintain continuous lines of communication for the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: transit of beef and mutton.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Of all the meat-shooters, the market-gunners who prey on wild fowl and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: ground game birds for the big-city markets are the most deadly to wild
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: life. Enough geese, ducks, brant, quail, ruffed grouse, prairie
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: chickens, heath hens and wild pigeons have been butchered by gunners and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: netters for "the market" to have stocked the whole world. No section
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: containing a good supply of game has escaped. In the United States the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: great slaughtering-grounds have been Cape Cod; Great South Bay, New
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: York; Currituck Sound, North Carolina; Marsh Island, Louisiana; the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: southwest corner of Louisiana; the Sunk Lands of Arkansas; the lake
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: regions of Minnesota; the prairies of the whole middle West; Great Salt
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Lake; the Klamath Lake region (Oregon) and southern California.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: [Illustration: A MARKET GUNNER AT WORK ON MARSH ISLAND
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Killing Mallards for the New Orleans Market. The Purchase of This Island by
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Mrs. Russell Sage has now Converted it Into a Bird Sanctuary]
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The output of this systematic bird slaughter has supplied the greedy
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: game markets of Boston, New York, Philadelphia, Washington, Baltimore,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Chicago, New Orleans, St. Louis, Salt Lake City, San Francisco,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Portland, and Seattle. The history of this industry, its methods, its
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: carnage, its profits and its losses would make a volume, but we can not
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: enter upon it here. Beyond reasonable doubt, this awful traffic in dead
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: game is responsible for at least three-fourths of the slaughter that has
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: reduced our game birds to a mere remnant of their former abundance.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: There is no influence so deadly to wild life as that of the market
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: gunner who works six days a week, from sunrise until sunset, hunting
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: down and killing every game bird that he can reach with a choke-bore
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: gun.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: During the past five years, several of the once-great killing grounds
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: have been so thoroughly "shot out" that they have ceased to hold their
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: former rank. This is the case with the Minnesota Lakes, the Sunk Lands
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of Arkansas, the Klamath Lakes of Oregon, and I think it is also true of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: southern California. The Klamath Lakes have been taken over by the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Government as a bird refuge. Currituck Sound, at the northeastern corner
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of North Carolina, has been so bottled up by the Bayne law of New York
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: State that Currituck's greatest market has been cut off. Last year only
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: one-half the usual number of ducks and geese were killed; and already
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: many "professional" duck and brant shooters have abandoned the business
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: because the commission merchants no longer will buy dead birds.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: [Illustration: RUFFED GROUSE
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: A Common Victim of Illegal Slaughter]
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Very many enormous bags of game have been made in a day by market
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: gunners: but rarely have they published any of their records. The
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: greatest kill of which I ever have heard occurred under the auspices of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the Glenn County Club, in southern California, on February 5, 1906. Two
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: men, armed with automatic shot-guns, fired five shots apiece, and got
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: ten geese out of one flock. In one hour they killed _two hundred and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: eighteen geese_, and their bag for the day was _four hundred and fifty
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: geese!_ The shooter who wrote the story for publication (on February 12,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: at Willows, Glenn County, California) said: "It being warm weather, the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: birds had to be shipped at once in order to keep them from spoiling." A
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: photograph was made of the "one hour's slaughter" of two hundred and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: eighteen geese, and it was published in a western magazine with
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "C.H.B.'s" story, nearly all of which will be found in Chapter XV.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The reasons why market shooting is so deadly destructive to wild life
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: are not obscure.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The true sportsman hunts during a very few days only each year. The
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: market gunners shoot early and late, six days a week, month after month.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: When game is abundant, the price is low, and a great quantity must be
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: killed in order to make it pay well. When game is scarce, the market
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: prices are high, and the shooter makes the utmost exertions to find the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: last of the game in order to secure the "big money."
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: When game is protected by law, thousands of people with money desire it
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: for their tables, just the same, and are willing to pay fabulous prices
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: for what they want, when they want it. Many a dealer is quite willing to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: run the risk of fines, because fines don't really hurt; they are only
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: annoying. The dealer wishes to make the big profit, and _retain his
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: customers_; "and besides," he reasons, "if I don't supply him some one
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: else will; so what is the difference?"
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: When game is scarce, prices high and the consumer's money ready, there
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: are a hundred tricks to which shooters and dealers willingly resort to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: ship and receive unlawful game without detection. It takes the very
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: best kind of game wardens,--genuine detectives, in fact,--to ferret out
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: these cunning illegal practices, and catch lawbreakers "with the goods
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: on them," so that they can be punished. Mind you, convictions can not be
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: secured at _both_ ends of the line save by the most extraordinary good
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: fortune, and usually the shooter and shipper escape, even when the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: dealer is apprehended and fined.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: [Illustration: A PERFECTLY LAWFUL BAG OF 58 RUFFED GROUSE FOR TWO MEN
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: From "Rod and Gun in Canada"]
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Here are some of the methods that have been practiced in the past in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: getting illegal game into the New York market:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Ruffed grouse and quail have both been shipped in butter firkins, marked
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "butter"; and latterly, butter has actually been packed solidly on top
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of the birds.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Ruffed grouse and quail very often have been shipped in egg crates,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: marked "eggs." They have been shipped in trunks and suit cases,--a very
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: common method for illegal game birds, all over the United States. In
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Oklahoma when a man refuses to open his trunk for a game warden, the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: warden joyously gets out his brace and bitt, and bores an inch hole into
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the lower story of the trunk. If dead birds are there, the tell-tale
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: auger quickly reveals them.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Three years ago, I was told that certain milk-wagons on Long Island made
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: daily collections of dead ducks intended for the New York market, and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the drivers kindly shipped them by express from the end of the route.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Once upon a time, a New York man gave notice that on a certain date he
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: would be in a certain town in St. Lawrence County, New York, with a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: palace horse-car, "to buy horses." Car and man appeared there as
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: advertised. Very ostentatiously, he bought one horse, and had it taken
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: aboard the car before the gaze of the admiring populace. At night, when
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the A.P. had gone to bed, many men appeared, and into the horseless end
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of that car, they loaded thousands of ruffed grouse. The game warden who
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: described the incident to me said: "That man pulled out for New York
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: with one horse and _half a car load of ruffed grouse_!"
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Whenever a good market exists for the sale of game, as sure as the world
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: that market will be supplied. Twenty-six states forbid by law the sale
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of _their own_ "protected" game, but twenty of them do _not_ expressly
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: prohibit the sale of game stolen from neighboring states! That is _a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: very, very weak point in the laws of all those states_. A child can see
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: how it works. Take Pittsburgh as a case in point.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In the winter and spring of 1912 the State Game Commission of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Pennsylvania found that quail and ruffed grouse were being sold in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Pittsburgh, in large quantities. The state laws were well enforced, and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: it was believed that the birds were not being killed in Pennsylvania.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Some other state was being _robbed_!
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The Game Commission went to work, and in a very short time certain
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: game-dealers of Pittsburgh were arrested. At first they tried to bluff
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: their way out of their difficulty, and even went as far as to bring
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: charges against the game-warden whom the Commission had instructed to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: buy some of their illegal game, and pay for it. But the net of the law
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: tightened upon them so quickly and so tightly that they threw up their
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: hands and begged for mercy.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: It was found that those Pittsburgh game-dealers were selling quail and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: grouse that had been stolen in thousands, from the state of Kentucky!
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Between the state game laws, working in lovely harmony with the Lacey
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: federal law that prohibits the shipment of game illegally killed or
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: sold, the whole bad business was laid bare, and signed confessions were
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: promptly obtained from the shippers in Kentucky.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: At that very time, a good bill for the better protection of her game was
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: before the Kentucky legislature; and a certain member was vigorously
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: opposing it, as he had successfully done in previous years. He was told
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: that the state was being robbed, but refused to believe it. Then a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: signed confession was laid before him, bearing the name of the man who
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: was instigating his opposition,--his friend,--who confessed that he had
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: illegally bought and shipped to Pittsburgh over 5,000 birds. The
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: objector literally threw up his hands, and said, "I have been _wrong!_
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Let the bill go through!" And it went.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: [Illustration: SNOW BUNTING
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: A Great "Game Bird"! Of These, 8,058 Were Found in 1902
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: in one New York Cold-Storage Warehouse]
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Before the passage of the Bayne law, New York City was a "fence" for the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: sale of grouse illegally killed in Massachusetts, Connecticut,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Pennsylvania, New Jersey and I know not how many other states. The Bayne
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: law stopped all that business, abruptly and forever; and if the ruffed
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: grouse, quail and ducks of the Eastern States are offered for sale in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Chicago, Cincinnati, Baltimore and Washington, the people of New York
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and Massachusetts can at least be assured that they are not to blame.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Those two states now maintain no "fences" for the sale of game that has
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: been stolen from other states. They have both set their houses in order,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and set two examples for forty other states to follow.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The remedy for all this miserable game-stealing, law-breaking business
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: is simple and easily obtained. Let each state of the United States and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: each province and Canada _enact a Bayne law, absolutely prohibiting the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: sale of all wild native game_, and the thing is done! But nothing short
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of that will be really effective. It will not do at all to let state
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: laws rest with merely forbidding the sale of game "protected by the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: State;" for that law is full of loop-holes. It does much good service,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: yes; but what earthly _objection_ can there be in any state to the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: enactment of a law that is sweepingly effective, and which can not be
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: evaded, save through the criminal connivance of officers of the law?
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: By way of illustration, to show what the sale of wild game means to the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: remnant of our game, and the wicked slaughter of non-game birds to which
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: it leads, consider these figures:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: DEAD BIRDS FOUND IN ONE COLD STORAGE HOUSE IN NEW YORK IN 1902.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Snow Buntings   8,058
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Grouse          7,560
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Sandpipers      7,607
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Quail           4,385
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Plover          5,218
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Ducks           1,756
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Snipe           7,003
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Bobolinks         288
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Yellow-legs       788
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Woodcock           96
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The fines for this lot, if imposed, would have amounted to $1,168,315.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Shortly after that seizure American quail became so scarce that in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: effect they totally disappeared from the banquet tables of New York. I
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: can not recall having been served with one since 1903, but the little
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Egyptian quail can be legally imported and sold when officially tagged.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Few persons away from the firing line realize the far-reaching effects
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of the sale of wild game. Here are a few flashes from the searchlight:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: At Hangkow, China, Mr. C. William Beebe found that during his visit in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: =1911=, over =46,000= pheasants of various species were shipped from
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: that port on one cold-storage steamer to the London market. And this
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: when English pheasants were selling in the Covent Garden market at from
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: two to three shillings each, for _fresh_ birds!
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In =1910=, =1,200= ptarmigan from Norway, bound for the Chicago market,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: passed through the port of New York,--not by any means the first or the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: last shipment of the kind. The epicures of Chicago are being permitted
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: to comb the game out of Norway.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In =1910=, =70,000= _dozen_ Egyptian quail were shipped to Europe from
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Alexandria, Egypt. Just why that species has not already been
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: exterminated, is a zoological mystery; but extermination surely will
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: come some day, and I think it will be in the near future.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The coast of China has been raked and scraped for wild ducks to ship to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: New York,--prior to the passage of the Bayne law! I have forgotten the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: figures that once were given me, but they were an astonishing number of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: thousands for the year.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The Division of Negroes and Poor Whites who kill song and other birds
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: indiscriminately will be found in a separate chapter.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: THE DIVISION OF "RESIDENT" GAME-BUTCHERS.--This refers to the men who
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: live in the haunts of big game, where wardens are the most of the time
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: totally absent, and where bucks, does and fawns of hoofed big game may
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: be killed in season and out of season, with impunity. It includes
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: guides, ranchmen, sheep-herders, cowboys, miners, lumbermen and floaters
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: generally. In times past, certain taxidermists of Montana promoted the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: slaughter of wild bison in the Yellowstone Park, and it was a pair of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: rascally taxidermists who killed, or caused to be killed in Lost Park,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: in 1897, the very last bison of Colorado.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: It seems to be natural for the minds of men who live in America in the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: haunts of big game to drift into the idea that the wild game around them
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: is all theirs. Very few of them recognize the fact that every other man,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: woman and child in a given state or province has vested rights in its
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: wild game. It is natural for a frontiersman to feel that because he is
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: in the wilds he has a God-given right to live off the country; but
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: to-day _that idea is totally wrong_! If some way can not be found to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: curb that all-pervading propensity among our frontiersmen, then we may
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: as well bid all our open-field big game a long farewell; for the deadly
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "residents" surely will exterminate it, outside the game preserves. The
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "residents" are, in my opinion, about ten times more destructive than
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the sportsmen. A sportsman in quest of large game is in the field only
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: from ten to thirty days; all his movements are known, and all his
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: trophies are seen and counted. His killing is limited by law, and upon
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: him the law is actually enforced. Often a resident hunts the whole
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: twelve months of the year,--for food, for amusement, and for trophies to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: sell. Rarely does a game warden reach his cabin; because the wardens are
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: few, the distances great and the frontier cabins are widely scattered.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Mr. Carl Pickhardt told me of a guide in Newfoundland who had a shed in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the woods hanging full of bodies of caribou, and who admitted to him
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: that while the law allowed him five caribou each year, he killed each
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: year about twenty-five.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Mr. J.M. Phillips knows of a mountain in British Columbia, once well
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: stocked with goats, on which the goats have been completely exterminated
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: by one man who lives within easy striking distance of them, and who
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: finds goat meat to his liking.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: I have been reliably informed that in 1911, at Haha Lake, near Grande
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Bay, Saguenay District, P.Q., one family of six persons killed
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: thirty-four woodland caribou and six moose. This meant the waste of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: about 14,000 pounds of good meat, and the death of several female
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: animals.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In 1886 I knew a man named Owens who lived on the head of Sunday Creek,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Montana, who told me that in 1884-5 he killed thirty-five mule deer for
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: himself and family. The family ate as much as possible, the dogs ate all
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: they could, and in the spring the remainder spoiled. Now there is not a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: deer, an antelope, or a sage grouse within fifty miles of that lifeless
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: waste.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Here is a Montana object lesson on the frame of mind of the "resident"
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: hunter, copied from _Outdoor Life_ Magazine (Denver) for February, 1912.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: It is from a letter to the Editor, written by C.B. Davis.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: November 27, 28, 29, and 30, 1911, will remain a red letter day with
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: a half thousand men for years to come. These half thousand men
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: gathered along the border of the Yellowstone National Park, near
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Gardiner, Montana, at a point known as Buffalo Flats, to exterminate
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: elk. The snow had driven the elk down to the foothills, and Buffalo
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Flats is on the border of the park and outside the park. The elk
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: entered this little valley for food. Like hungry wolves, shooters,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: not hunters, gathered along the border waiting to catch an elk off
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the "reservation" and kill it.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: On November 27th about 1500 elk crossed the line, and the slaughter
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: began. I have not the data of the number killed this day, but it was
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: hundreds.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: On the 28th, twenty-two stepped over and were promptly executed.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Like Custer's band, not one escaped. On the evening of the 28th, 600
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: were sighted just over the line, and the army of 125 brave men
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: entrenched themselves for the battle which was expected to open next
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: morning. Before daylight of the 29th the battle began. The elk were
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: over the line, feeding on Buffalo Flats. One hundred and twenty-five
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: men poured bullets into this band of 600 elk till the ground was red
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: with blood and strewn with carcasses, and in their madness they shot
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: each other. One man was shot through the ear,--a close call; another
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: received a bullet through his coat sleeve, and another was shot
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: through the bowels and can't live.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: My informer told me he participated in the slaughter, and while he
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: would not take fifty dollars for what he saw, and the experience he
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: went through, yet he would not go through it again for $1,000. When
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: my informer got back to Gardiner that day there were four sleigh
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: loads of elk, each load containing from twenty to thirty-five elk,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: besides thirty-two mules and horses carrying one to two each. This
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: was only a part of the slaughter. Hundreds more were carried to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: other points; and this was only one day's work.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Hundreds of wounded elk wandered back into the park to die, and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: others died outside the park. The station at Livingston, Montana,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: for a week looked like a packing house. Carcasses were piled up on
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the trucks and depot platform. The baggage cars were loaded with elk
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: going to points east and west of Livingston.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Maybe this is all right. Maybe the government can't stop the elk
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: from crossing the line. Maybe the elk were helped over; but it
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: strikes me there is something wrong somewhere.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: THE DIVISION OF HIRED LABORERS.--The scourge of lumber-camps in big-game
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: territory, the mining camps and the railroad-builders is a long story,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and if told in detail it would make several chapters. Their awful
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: destructiveness is well known. It is a common thing for "the boss" to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: hire a hunter to kill big game to supply the hungry outfit, and save
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: beef and pork.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The abuses arising from this source easily could be checked, and finally
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: suppressed. A ten-line law would do the business,--forbidding any person
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: employed in any camp of sheep men, cattle men, lumbermen, miners,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: railway laborers or excavators to own or use a rifle in hunting wild
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: game; and forbidding any employer of labor to feed those laborers, or
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: permit them to be fed, on the flesh of wild game mammals or birds.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "Camp" laborers are not "pioneers;" not by a long shot! They are
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: soldiers of Commerce, and makers of money.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: A MOUNTAIN SHEEP CASE IN COLORADO.--The state of Colorado sincerely
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: desires to protect and perpetuate its slender remnant of mountain sheep,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: but as usual the Lawless Miscreant is abroad to thwart the efforts of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the guardians of the game. Every state that strives to protect its big
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: game has such doings as this to contend with:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In the winter of 1911-12, a resident poacher brought into Grant,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Colorado, a lot of mountain sheep meat _for sale_; and he actually sold
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: it to residents of that town! The price was _six cents per pound_. A lot
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of it was purchased by the railway station-agent. I have no doubt that
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the same man who did that job, which was made possible only by the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: co-operation of the citizens of Grant, will try the same
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: poaching-and-selling game next winter, unless the State Game
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Commissioner is able to bring him to book.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: A WYOMING CASE IN POINT.--As a fair sample of what game wardens, and the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: general public, are sometimes compelled to endure through the improper
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: decisions of judges, I will cite this case:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In the Shoshone Mountains of northern Wyoming, about fifty miles or so
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: from the town of Cody, in the winter of 1911-12 a man was engaged in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: trapping coyotes. It was currently reported that he had been "driven out
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of Montana and Idaho." He had scores of traps. He baited his traps with
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the flesh of deer, elk calves and grouse, all illegally killed and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: illegally used for that purpose. A man of my acquaintance saw some of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: this game meat actually used as described.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The man was a notorious character, and cruel in the extreme. Finally a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: game warden caught him red-handed, arrested him, and took him to Cody
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: for trial. It happened that the judge on the bench had once trapped with
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: him, and therefore "he set the game-killer free, while the game-warden
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: was roasted."
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: That wolf-trapper once took into the mountains a horse, to kill and use
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: as bear-bait. The animal was blind in one eye, and because it would not
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: graze precisely where the wolfer desired it to remain, he deliberately
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: destroyed the sight of its good eye, and left it for days, without the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: ability to find water.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Think of the fate of any wild animal that unkind Fate places at the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: mercy of such a man!
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: CHAPTER VIII
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: UNSEEN FOES OF WILD LIFE
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Quite unintentionally on his part, Man, the arch destroyer and the most
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: predatory and merciless of all animal species except the wolves, has
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: rendered a great service to all the birds that live or nest upon the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: ground. His relentless pursuit and destruction of the savage-tempered,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: strong-jawed fur-bearing animals is in part the salvation of the ground
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: birds of to-day and yesterday. If the teeth and claws had been permitted
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: to multiply unchecked down to the present time, with man's warfare on
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the upland game proceeding as it has done, scores upon scores of species
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: long ere this would have been exterminated.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: But the slaughter of the millions of North American foxes, wolves,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: weasels, skunks, and mink has so overwhelmingly reduced the four-footed
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: enemies of the birds that the balance of wild Nature has been preserved.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: As a rule, the few predatory wild animals that remain are not
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: slaughtering the birds to a serious extent; and for this we may well be
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: thankful.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: THE DOMESTIC CAT.--In such thickly settled communities as our northern
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: states, from the Atlantic coast to the sandhills of Kansas and Nebraska,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the domestic cat is probably the greatest four-footed scourge of bird
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: life. Thousands of persons who never have seen a hunting cat in action
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: will doubt this statement, but the proof of its truthfulness is only too
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: painfully abundant.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Unhappily it is the way of the hunting cat to stalk unseen, and to kill
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the very birds that are most friendly with man, and most helpful to him
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: in his farming and fruit-growing business. The quail is about the only
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: game bird that the cat affects seriously, and to it the cat is very
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: destructive. It is the robin, catbird, thrush, bluebird, dove,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: woodpecker, chickadee, phoebe, tanager and other birds of the lawn, the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: garden and orchard that afford good hunting for sly and savage old
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Thomas.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: When I was a boy in my 'teens, I had a lasting series of object lessons
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: on the cat as a predatory animal. Our "Betty" was the most ambitious and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: successful domestic-cat hunter of wild mammals of which I ever have
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: heard. To her, rats and mice were mere child's-play, and after a time
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: their pursuit offered such tame sport that she sought fresh fields for
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: her prowess. Then she brought in young rabbits, chipmunks and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: thirteen-lined spermophiles, and once she came in, quite exhausted, half
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: dragging and half carrying a big, fat pocket gopher. With her it seemed
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: to be a point of honor that she should bring in her game and display it.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Little did we realize then that in course of time the wild birds would
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: become so scarce that their slaughter by house cats would demand
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: legislative action in the states.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In considering the hunting cat, let us call in a credible witness of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: effects of domestic cats on the bob white. The following is an
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: eye-witness report, by Ernest B. Beardsley, in _Outdoor Life_ for April,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 1912. The locality was Wellington, Sumner County, Kansas.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In the meantime, old Queen was having a high old time up ahead, some
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: hundred feet by then, running up the bank and back down in the draw.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: We had hardly caught up when up goes Mr. Savage's gun and he gives
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: both barrels. I had seen nothing up to date, but I didn't have long
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: to wait, for by the time I got up to him and the dog, they were both
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: in the high grass and had a great, big, common gray maltese
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: house-cat; and Queen had a half-eaten quail that Mr. Cat was busy
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: with when disturbed.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Well, we followed the draw across the field and got nine of a covey
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of sixteen that had been ahead of Mr. Cat; and about four o'clock
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: that evening we killed another white-and-gray cat. While driving
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: home that night, Mr. Savage told me that he had killed fifty or more
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: in three or four years. They will get in a draw full of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: tumble-grass, on a cold day when quail don't like to fly, and stay
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: right with them; and even after feeding on two or three, they will
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: lie and watch, and when the covey moves, they move. When eating time
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: comes around they are at it again, and to a covey of young birds
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: they are sure death to the whole covey.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Well, Will told me never to overlook a house-cat that I found as far
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: as a quarter of a mile from a farm or ranch, for if they have not
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: already turned wild, they are learning how easy it is to hunt and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: live on game, and are almost as bad. We found Mr. Black-and-White
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Hunter had eaten two quail just before we killed him that evening. I
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: would rather not write what Mr. Savage said when we found the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: remains of a partly-eaten bird.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: My advice is, don't let tame cats get away when found out hunting;
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: for the chances are they have not seen a home in months, and maybe
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: years,--and say! but they do get big and bad. When you meet one,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: give it to him good, and don't let your dog run up to him until he
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: is out for keeps. I learned afterwards that was how Will knew it was
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: a cat. Queen had learned to back off and call for help on cats some
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: years before.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In the New York Zoological Park, we have had troubles of our own with
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: marauding cats. They establish themselves in a day, and quickly learn
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: where to seek easy game and good cover. In the daytime they lie close in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the thick brush, exactly as tigers do in India, but if not molested for
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: a period of days, they become bold and attack game in open view. One
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: bird-killing cat was so shy of man that it was only after two weeks of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: hard hunting (mornings and evenings) that it was killed.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: We have seen cats catch and kill gray squirrels, chipmunks, robins and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: thrushes, and have found the feathers of slaughtered quail. Once we had
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: gray rabbits breeding in the park, and their number reached between
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: eighty and ninety. For a time they fearlessly hopped about in sight from
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: our windows, and they were of great interest to visitors and to all of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: us. Then the cats began upon them; and in one year there was not a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: rabbit to be seen, save at rare intervals. At the same time the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: chipmunks of the park were almost exterminated.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: That was the last straw, and we began a vigorous war upon those wild and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: predatory cats. The cats came off second best. We killed every cat that
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: was found hunting in the park, and we certainly got some that were big
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and bad. We eliminated that pest, and we are keeping it eliminated. And
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: with what result?
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In 1911 a covey of eleven quail came and settled in our grounds, and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: have remained there. Twenty times at least during the past eight months
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: (winter and spring) I have seen the flock on the granite ledge not more
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: than forty feet from the rear window of my office. Last spring when I
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: left the Administration Building at six o'clock, after the visitors had
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: gone, I found two half-grown rabbits calmly roosting on the door-mat.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The rabbits are slowly coming back, and the chipmunks are visibly
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: increasing in number. The gray squirrels now chase over the walks
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: without fear of any living thing, and our ducklings and young guineas
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and peacocks are safe once more.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: That cats destroy annually in the United States several _millions_ of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: very valuable birds, seems fairly beyond question. I believe that in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: settled regions they are worse than weasels, foxes, skunks and mink
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: _combined_; because there are about one hundred times as many of them,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and those that hunt are not afraid to hunt in the daytime. Of course I
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: am not saying that _all_ cats hunt wild game; but in the country I
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: believe that fully one-half of them do.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: I am personally acquainted with a cat in Indiana, on the farm of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: relatives, which is notorious for its hunting propensities, and its
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: remarkable ability in capturing game. Even the lady who is joint owner
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of the cat feels very badly about its destructiveness, and has said,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: over and over again, that it ought to be killed; but the cat is such a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: family pet that no one in the family has the heart to destroy it, and as
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: yet no stranger has come forward to play the part of executioner. The
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: lady in question assured me that to her certain knowledge that
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: particular cat would watch a nestful of young robins week after week
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: until they had grown up to such a size that they were almost ready to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: fly; then he would kill them and devour them. Old "Tommy" was too wise
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: to kill the robins when they were unduly small.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In a great book entitled _Useful Birds and Their Protection_, by E.H.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Forbush, State Ornithologist of Massachusetts, and published by the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Massachusetts State Board of Agriculture in 1905, there appears, on page
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 362, many interesting facts on this subject. For example:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Mr. William Brewster tells of an acquaintance in Maine, who said
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: that his cat killed about fifty birds a year. Mr. A.C. Dike wrote
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: [to Mr. Forbush] of a cat owned by a family, and well cared for.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: They watched it through one season, and found that it killed
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: fifty-eight birds, including the young in five nests.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Nearly a hundred correspondents, scattered through all the counties
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of the state, report the cat as one of the greatest enemies of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: birds. The reports that have come in of the torturing and killing of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: birds by cats are absolutely sickening. The number of birds killed
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: by them in this state is appalling.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Some cat lovers believe that each cat kills on the average not more
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: than ten birds a year; but I have learned of two instances where
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: more than that number were killed in a single day, and another where
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: seven were killed. If we assume, however, that the average cat on
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the farm kills but ten birds per year, and that there is one cat to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: each farm in Massachusetts, we have, in round numbers, seventy
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: thousand cats, killing seven hundred thousand birds annually.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: [Illustration: A HUNTING CAT AND ITS VICTIM
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: This Cat had fed so bountifully on the Rabbits and Squirrels of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Zoological Park, that it ate only the Brain of this Gray Rabbit]
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In Mr. Forbush's book there is an illustration of the cat which killed
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: fifty-eight birds in one year, and the animal was photographed with a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: dead robin in its mouth. The portrait is reproduced in this chapter.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Last year, a strong effort was made in Massachusetts to enact a law
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: requiring cats to be licensed. On account of the amount of work
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: necessary in passing the no-sale-of-game bill, that measure was not
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: pressed, and so it did not become a law; but another year it will
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: undoubtedly be passed, for it is a good bill, and extremely necessary at
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: this time. _Such a law is needed in every state_!
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: There is a mark by which you may instantly and infallibly know the worst
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of the wild cats--by their presence _away from home, hunting in the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: open_. Kill all such, wherever found. The harmless cats are domestic in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: their tastes, and stay close to the family fireside and the kitchen.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Being properly fed, they have no temptation to become hunters. There are
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: cats and cats, just as there are men and men: some tolerable, many
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: utterly intolerable. No sweeping sentiment for _all_ cats should be
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: allowed to stand in the way of the abatement of the hunting-cat
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: nuisances.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: _Of all men, the farmer cannot afford the luxury of their existence_! It
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: is too expensive. With him it is a matter of dollars, and cash out of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: pocket for every hunting cat that he tolerates in his neighborhood.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: There are two places in which to strike the hunting cats: in the open,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and in the state legislature.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: While this chapter was in the hands of the compositors, the hunting cat
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and gray rabbit shown in the accompanying illustration were brought in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: by a keeper.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: DOGS AS DESTROYERS OF BIRDS.--I have received many letters from
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: protectors of wild life informing me that the destruction of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: ground-nesting birds, and especially of upland game birds, by roaming
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: dogs, has in some localities become a great curse to bird life.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Complaints of this kind have come from New York, Massachusetts,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Connecticut, Pennsylvania and elsewhere. Usually the culprits are
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: _hunting dogs_--setters, pointers and hounds.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Now, surely it is not necessary to set forth here any argument on this
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: subject. It is not open to argument, or academic treatment of any kind.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The cold fact is:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In the breeding season of birds, and while the young birds are incapable
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of quick and strong flight, all dogs, of every description, should be
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: restrained from free hunting; and all dogs found hunting in the woods
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: during the season referred to should be arrested, and their owners
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: should be fined twenty dollars for each offense. Incidentally, one-half
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the fine should go to the citizen who arrests the dog. The method of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: restraining hunting dogs should devolve upon dog owners; and the law
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: need only prohibit or punish the act.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Beyond a doubt, in states that still possess quail and ruffed grouse,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: free hunting by hunting dogs leads to great destruction of nests and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: broods during the breeding season.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: TELEGRAPH AND TELEPHONE WIRES.--Mr. Daniel C. Beard has strongly called
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: my attention to the slaughter of birds by telegraph wires that has come
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: under his personal observation. His country home, at Redding,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Connecticut, is near the main line of the New York, New Haven and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Hartford Railway, along which a line of very large poles carries a great
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: number of wires. The wires are so numerous that they form a barrier
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: through which it is difficult for any bird to fly and come out alive and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: unhurt.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Mr. Beard says that among the birds killed or crippled by flying against
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: those wires near Redding he has seen the following species: olive-backed
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: thrush, white-throated sparrow and other sparrows, oriole, blue jay,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: rail, ruffed grouse, and woodcock. It is a common practice for employees
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of the railway, and others living along the line, to follow the line and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: pick up on one excursion enough birds for a pot-pie.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Beyond question, the telegraph and telephone wires of the United States
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: annually exact a heavy toll in bird life, and claim countless thousands
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of victims. They may well be set down as one of the unseen forces
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: destructive to birds.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Naturally, we ask, what can be done about it?
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: I am told that in Scotland such slaughter is prevented by the attachment
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of small tags or discs to the telephone wires, at intervals of a few
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: rods, sufficiently near that they attract the attention of flying birds,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and reveal the line of an obstruction. This system should be adopted in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: all regions where the conditions are such that birds kill themselves
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: against telegraph wires, and an excellent place to begin would be along
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the line of the N.Y., N.H. & H. Railway.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: WILD ANIMALS.--Beyond question, it is both desirable and necessary that
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: any excess of wild animals that prey upon our grouse, quail, pheasants,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: woodcock, snipe, mallard duck, shore birds and other species that nest
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: on the ground, should be killed. Since we must choose between the two,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the birds have it! Weasels and foxes and skunks are interesting, and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: they do much to promote the hilarity of life in rural districts, but
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: they do not destroy insects, and are of comparatively little value as
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: destroyers of the noxious rodents that prey upon farm crops. While a few
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: persons may dispute the second half of this proposition, the burden of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: proof that my view is wrong will rest upon them; and having spent
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: eighteen years "on the farm," I think I am right. If there is any
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: positive evidence tending to prove that the small carnivores that we
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: class as "vermin" are industrious and persistent destroyers of noxious
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: rodents--pocket gophers, moles, field-mice and rats--or that they do not
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: kill wild birds numerously, now is the time to produce it, because the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: tide of public sentiment is strongly setting against the weasels, mink,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: foxes and skunks. (Once upon a time, a shrewd young man in the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Zoological Park discovered a weasel hiding behind a stone while
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: devouring a sparrow that it had just caught and killed. He stalked it
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: successfully, seized it in his bare hand, and, even though bitten, made
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: good the capture.)
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The State of Pennsylvania is extensively wooded, with forests and with
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: brush which affords excellent home quarters and breeding grounds for
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: mammalian "vermin." The small predatory mammals are so seriously
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: destructive to ruffed grouse and other ground birds that the State Game
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Commission is greatly concerned. When the hunter's license law is
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: enacted, as it very surely will be at the next session of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: legislature (1913), a portion of the $70,000 that it will produce each
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: year will be used by the commission in paying bounties on the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: destruction of the surplus of vermin. Through the pursuit of vermin, any
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: farmer can easily win enough bounties to more than pay the cost of his
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: annual hunting license (one dollar), and the farmers' boys will find a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: new interest in life.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In some portions of the Rocky Mountain region, the assaults of the large
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: predatory mammals and birds on the young of the big-game species
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: occasionally demand special treatment. In the Yellowstone Park the pumas
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: multiplied to such an extent and killed so many young elk that their
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: number had to be systematically reduced. To that end "Buffalo" Jones was
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: sent out by the Government to find and destroy the intolerable surplus
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of pumas. In the course of his campaign he killed about forty, much to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the benefit of the elk herds. Around the entrance to the den of a big
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: old male puma, Mr. Jones found the skulls and other remains of nine elk
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: calves that "the old Tom" had killed and carried there.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Pumas and lynxes attack and kill mountain sheep; and the golden eagle is
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: very partial to mountain sheep lambs and mountain goat kids. It will not
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: answer to permit birds of that bold and predatory species to become too
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: numerous in mountains inhabited by goats and sheep; and the fewer the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: mountain lions the better, for they, like the lynx and eagle, have
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: nothing to live upon save the game.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The wolves and coyotes have learned to seek the ranges of cattle,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: horses and sheep, where they still do immense damage, chiefly in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: killing young stock. In spite of the great sums that have been paid out
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: by western states in bounties for the destruction of wolves, in many,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: many places the gray wolf still persists, and can not be exterminated.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: To the stockmen of the west the wolf question is a serious matter. The
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: stockmen of Montana say that a government expert once told them how to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: get rid of the gray wolves. His instructions were: "Locate the dens, and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: kill the young in the dens, soon after they are born!" "All very easy to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: _say_, but a trifle difficult to _do_!" said my informant; and the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: ranchman seem to think they are yet a long way from a solution of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: wolf question.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: During the past year the destruction of noxious predatory animals in the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: national forest reserves has seriously occupied the attention of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: United States Bureau of Forestry. By the foresters of that bureau the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: following animals were destroyed in fifteen western states:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 6,487 Coyotes
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 870 Wild-Cats
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 72 Lynxes
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 213 Bears
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 88 Mountain Lions
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 172 Gray Wolves
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 69 Wolf Pups
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In 1910 the total was 9,103.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: [Illustration: THE EASTERN RED SQUIRREL
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: A Great Destroyer of Birds]
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: THE RED SQUIRREL.--Once in a great while, conditions change in subtle
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: ways, wild creatures unexpectedly increase in number, and a community
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: awakens to the fact that some wild species has become a public nuisance.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In a small city park, even gray squirrels may breed and become so
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: fearfully numerous that, in their restless quest for food, they may
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: ravage the nests of the wild birds, kill and devour the young, and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: become a pest. In the Zoological Park, in 1903, we found that the red
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: squirrels had increased to such a horde that they were driving out all
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: our nesting wild birds, driving out the gray squirrels, and making
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: themselves intolerably obnoxious. We shot sixty of them, and brought the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: total down to a reasonable number. Wherever he is or whatever his
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: numerical strength, the red squirrel is a bad citizen, and, while we do
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: not by any means favor his extermination, he should resolutely be kept
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: within bounds by the rifle.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: When a crow nested in our woods, near the Beaver Pond, we were greatly
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: pleased; but with the feeding of the first brood, the crows began to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: carry off ducklings from the wild-fowl pond. After one crow had been
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: seen to seize and carry away _five_ young ducks in one forenoon, we
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: decided that the constitutional limit had been reached, for we did not
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: propose that all our young mallards should be swept into the awful
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: vortex of that crow nest. We took those young crows and reared them by
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: hand; but the old one had acquired a bad habit, and she persisted in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: carrying off young ducks until we had to end her existence with a gun.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: It was a painful operation, but there was no other way.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: [Illustration: COOPER'S HAWK
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: A Species to be Destroyed]
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: BIRD-DESTROYING BIRDS.--There are several species of birds that may at
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: once be put under sentence of death for their destructiveness of useful
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: birds, without any extenuating circumstances worth mentioning. Four of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: these are _Cooper's Hawk_, the _Sharp-Shinned Hawk, Pigeon Hawk_ and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: _Duck Hawk_. Fortunately these species are not so numerous that we need
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: lose any sleep over them. Indeed, I think that today it would be a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: mighty good collector who could find one specimen in seven days'
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: hunting. Like all other species, these, too, are being shot out of our
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: bird fauna.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Several species of bird-eating birds are trembling in the balance, and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: under grave suspicion. Some of them are the _Great Horned Owl, Screech
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Owl, Butcher Bird_ or _Great Northern Shrike_. The only circumstance
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: that saves these birds from instant condemnation is the delightful
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: amount of rats, mice, moles, gophers and noxious insects that they
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: annually consume. In view of the awful destructiveness of the accursed
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: bubonic-plague-carrying rat, we are impelled to think long before
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: placing in our killing list even the great horned owl, who really does
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: levy a heavy tax on our upland game birds. As to the butcher bird, we
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: feel that we ought to kill him, but in view of his record on wild mice
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and rats, we hesitate, and finally decline.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: [Illustration: SHARP-SHINNED HAWK
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: A Species to be Destroyed]
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: SNAKES.--Mr. Thomas M. Upp, a close and long observer of wild things
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: wishes it distinctly understood that while the common black-snakes and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: racers are practically harmless to birds, the _Pilot Black-Snake_,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: --long, thick and truculent,--is a great scourge to nesting birds. It
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: seems to be deserving of death. Mr. Upp speaks from personal knowledge,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and his condemnation of the species referred to is quite sweeping. At
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the same time Mr. Raymond L. Ditmars points out the fact that this
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: serpent feeds during 6 months of the year on mice, and in doing so
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: renders good service. In the South it is called the "Mouse Snake."
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: [Illustration: THE CAT THAT KILLED 58 BIRDS IN ONE YEAR
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: From Mr. Forbush's Book
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Photo by A.C. Dyke]
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: CHAPTER IX
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: THE DESTRUCTION OF WILD LIFE BY DISEASES
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Every cause that has the effect of reducing the total of wild-life
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: population is now a matter of importance to mankind. The violent and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: universal disturbance of the balance of Nature that already has taken
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: place throughout the temperate and frigid zone offers not only food for
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: thought, but it calls for vigorous action.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: There are vast sections in the populous centres of western civilization
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: where the destruction of species, even to the point of extermination, is
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: fairly inevitable. It is the way of Christian man to destroy all wild
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: life that comes within the sphere of influence of his iron heel. With
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the exception of the big game, this destruction is largely a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: temperamental result, peculiar to the highest civilization. In India
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: where the same fields have been plowed for wheat and dahl and raggi for
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: at least 2,000 years, the Indian antelope, or "black buck," the saras
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: crane and the adjutant stalk through the crops, and the nilgai and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: gazelle inhabit the eroded ravines in an agricultural land that averages
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 1,200 people to the square mile!
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: We have seen that even in farming country, where mud villages are as
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: thick as farm houses in Nebraska, wild animals and even hoofed game can
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: live and hold their own through hundreds of years of close association
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: with man. The explanation is that the Hindus regard wild animals as
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: creatures entitled to life, liberty and the pursuit of happiness, and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: they are not anxious to shoot every wild animal that shows its head. In
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the United States, nearly every game-inhabited community is animated by
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: a feeling that every wild animal must necessarily be killed as soon as
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: seen; and this sentiment often leads to disgraceful things. For
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: instance, in some parts of New England a deer straying into a town is at
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: once beset by the hue and cry, and it is chased and assaulted until it
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: is dead, by violent and disgraceful means. New York State, however,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: seems to have outgrown that spirit. During the past ten years, at least
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: a dozen deer in distress have been rescued from the Hudson River, or in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: inland towns, or in barnyards in the suburbs of Yonkers and New York,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and carefully cared for until "the zoo people" could be communicated
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: with. Last winter about 13 exhausted grebes and one loon were picked up,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: cared for and finally shipped with tender care to the Zoological Park.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: One distressed dovekie was picked up, but failed to survive.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The sentiment for the conservation of wild life has changed the mental
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: attitude of very many people. The old Chinese-Malay spirit which cries
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "Kill! Kill!" and at once runs amuck among suddenly discovered wild
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: animals, is slowly being replaced by a more humane and intelligent
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: sentiment. This is one of the hopeful and encouraging signs of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: times.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The destruction of wild animals by natural causes is an interesting
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: subject, even though painful. We need to know how much destruction is
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: wrought by influences wholly beyond the control of man, and a few cases
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: must be cited.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: RINDERPEST IN AFRICA.--Probably the greatest slaughter ever wrought upon
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: wild animals by diseases during historic times, was by rinderpest, a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: cattle plague which afflicted Africa in the last decade of the previous
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: century. Originally, the disease reached Africa by way of Egypt, and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: came as an importation from Europe. From Egypt it steadily traveled
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: southward, reaching Somaliland in 1889. In 1896 it reached the Zambesi
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: River and entered Rhodesia. From thence it went on southward almost to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the Cape. Not only did it sweep away ninety percent of the native cattle
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: but it also destroyed more than seventy-five per cent of the buffalos,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: antelopes and other hoofed game of Rhodesia. It was feared that many
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: species would be completely exterminated, but happily that fear was not
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: realized. The buffalo and antelope herds were fifteen years in breeding
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: up again to a reasonable number, but thanks to the respite from hunters
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: which they enjoyed for several years, finally they did recover.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Throughout British East Africa the supply of big game in 1905 was very
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: great, but since that time it has been very greatly diminished by
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: shooting.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: CARIBOU DISEASE.--From time to time reports have come from the Province
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of Quebec, and I think from Maine and New Brunswick also, of many
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: caribou having died of disease. The nature of that disease has remained
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: a mystery, because it seems that no pathologist ever has had an
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: opportunity to investigate it. Fortunately, however, the alleged disease
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life
