txt: never has been sufficiently wide-spread or continuous to make
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: appreciable inroads on the total number of caribou, and apparently the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: trouble has been local.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: SCAB IN MOUNTAIN SHEEP.--"Scab" is a contagious and persistent skin
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: disease that affects sheep, and is destructive when not controlled.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Fifteen years ago it prevailed in some portions of the west. In Colorado
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: it has several times been reported that many bighorn mountain sheep were
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: killed by "scab," which was contracted on wild mountain pastures that
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: had been gone over by domestic sheep carrying that disease. From the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: reports current at that time, we inferred that about 200 mountain sheep
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: had been affected. It was feared that the disease would spread through
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the wild flocks and become general, but this did not occur. It seems
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: that the remnant flocks had become so isolated from one another that the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: isolation of the affected flocks saved the others.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: LUMPY-JAW IN ANTELOPE AND SHEEP.--It is a lamentable fact that some, at
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: least, of the United States herds of prong-horned antelope are afflicted
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: with a very deadly chronic infective disease known as actinomycosis, or
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: lumpy-jaw. It has been brought into the Zoological Park five times, by
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: specimens shipped from Colorado, Texas, Wyoming and Montana. I think our
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: first cases came to us in 1902.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In its early stage this disease is so subtle and slow that it is months
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: in developing; and this feature renders it all the more deadly, through
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the spread of infection long before the ailment can be discovered.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: One of our antelope arrivals, apparently in perfect health when
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: received, was on general principles kept isolated in rigid quarantine
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: for two months. At the expiration of that period, no disease of any kind
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: having become manifest, the animal was placed on exhibition, with two
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: others that had been in the Park for more than a year, in perfect
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: health.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In one more week the late arrival developed a swelling on its jaw,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: drooled at the corner of the mouth, and became feverish,--sure symptoms
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of the dread disease. At once it was removed and isolated, but in about
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 10 days it died. The other two antelopes were promptly attacked, and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: eventually died.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The course of the disease is very intense, and thus far it has proven
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: incurable in our wild animals. We have lost about 10 antelopes from it,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and one deer, usually, in each case, within ten days or two weeks from
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the discovery of the first outward sign,--the well known swelling on the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: jaw. One case that was detected immediately upon arrival was very
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: persistently treated by Dr. Blair, and the animal actually survived for
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: four months, but finally it succumbed. From first to last not a single
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: case was cured.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In 1912, the future of the prong-horned antelope in real captivity seems
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: hopeless. We have decided not to bring any more specimens to our
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: institution, partly because all available candidates seem reasonably
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: certain to be affected with lumpy-jaw, and partly because we are
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: unwilling to run further risks of having other hoofed animals inoculated
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: by them. Today we are anxiously wondering whether the jaw disease of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: prong-horn is destined to exterminate the species. Such a catastrophe is
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: much to be feared. This is probably one of the reasons why the antelope
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: is steadily disappearing, despite protection.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In 1906 we discovered the existence of actinomycosis among the black
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: mountain sheep of northern British Columbia. Two specimens out of six
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: were badly affected, the bones of the jaws being greatly enlarged, and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: perforated by deep pits. The black sheep of the Stickine and Iskoot
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: regions are so seldom seen by white men, save when a sportsman kills his
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: allotment of three specimens, we really do not know anything about the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: extent to which actinomycosis prevails in those herds, or how deadly are
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: its effects. One thing seems quite certain, from the appearance of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: diseased skulls found by the writer in the taxidermic laboratory of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Frederick Sauter, in New York. The enormous swelling of the diseased jaw
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: bones clearly indicates a disease that in some cases affects its victim
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: throughout many months. Such a condition as we found in those sheep
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: could not have been reached in a few days after the disease became
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: apparent. Now, in our antelopes, the collapse and death of the victim
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: usually occurred in about 10 days from the time that the first swelling
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: was observed: which means a very virulent disease, and rapid progress at
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the climax. The jaw of one of our antelopes, which was figured in Dr.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Blair's paper in the Eleventh Annual Report of the New York Zoological
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Society (1906) shows only a very slight lesion, in comparison with those
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of the mountain sheep.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The conclusion is that among the sheep, this disease does not carry off
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: its victims in any short period like 10 days. The animal must survive
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: for some months after it becomes apparent. At least two parties of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: American sportsmen have shot rams afflicted with this disease, but I
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: have no reports of any sheep having been found dead from this cause.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: This disease is well known among domestic cattle, but so far as we are
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: aware it never before has been found among wild animals. The black sheep
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: herds wherein it was found in British Columbia are absolutely isolated
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: from domestic cattle and all their influences, and therefore it seems
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: quite certain that the disease developed among the sheep
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: spontaneously,--a remarkable episode, to say the least. Whether it will
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: exterminate the black mountain sheep species, and in time spread to the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: white sheep of the northwest, is of course a matter of conjecture; but
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: there is nothing in the world to prevent a calamity of that kind. The
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: white sheep of Yukon Territory range southward until in the Sheslay
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Mountains they touch the sphere of influence of the black sheep, where
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the disease could easily be transmitted. It would be a good thing if
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: there existed between the two species a sheepless zone about 200 miles
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: wide.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: I greatly fear that actinomycosis is destined to play an important part
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: in the final extinction that seems to be the impending fate of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: beautiful and valuable prong-horned antelope. In view of our hard
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: experiences, extending through ten years (1902-1912), I think this fear
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: is justified. All persons who live in country still inhabited by
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: antelope are urged to watch for this disease. If any antelopes are found
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: dead, see if the lower jaw is badly swollen and discharging pus. If it
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: is, bury the body quickly, burn the ground over, and advise the writer
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: regarding the case.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: THE RABBIT PLAGUE.--One of the strangest freaks of Nature of which we
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: know as effecting the wholesale destruction of wild animals by disease
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: is the rabbit plague. In the northern wilderness, and particularly
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: central Canada, where rabbits exist in great numbers and supply the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: wants of a large carnivorous population, this plague is well known, and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: among trappers and woodsmen is a common topic of conversation. The best
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: treatment of the subject is to be found in Ernest T. Seton's "Life
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Histories of Northern Animals", Vol. I, p. 640 et seq. From this I
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: quote:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "Invariably the year of greatest numbers [of rabbits] is followed by a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: year of plague, which sweeps them away, leaving few or no rabbits in the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: land. The denser the rabbit population, the more drastically is it
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: ravaged by the plague. They are wiped out in a single spring by
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: epidemic diseases usually characterized by swellings of the throat,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: sores under the armpits and groins, and by diarrhea."
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "The year 1885 was for the country around Carberry 'a rabbit year,' the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: greatest ever known in that country. The number of rabbits was
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: incredible. W.R. Hine killed 75 in two hours, and estimated that he
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: could have killed 500 in a day. The farmers were stricken with fear that
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the rabbit pest of Australia was to be repeated in Manitoba. But the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: years 1886-7 changed all that. The rabbits died until their bodies
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: dotted the country in thousands. The plague seemed to kill all the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: members of the vast host of 1885."
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The strangest item of Mr. Seton's story is yet to be told. In 1890 Mr.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Seton stocked his park at Cos Cob, Conn., with hares and rabbits from
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: several widely separated localities. In 1903, the plague came and swept
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: them all away. Mr. Seton sent specimens to the Zoological Park for
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: examination by the Park veterinary surgeon, Dr. W. Reid Blair. They were
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: found to be infested by great numbers of a dangerous bloodsucking
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: parasite known as _Strongylus strigosus_, which produces death by anemia
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and emaciation. There were hundreds of those parasites in each animal. I
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: assisted in the examination, and was shown by Dr. Blair, under the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: microscope, that _Strongylus_ puts forth eggs literally by hundreds of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: thousands!
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The life history of that parasite is not well known, but it may easily
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: develop that the cycle of its maximum destructiveness is seven years,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and therefore it may be accountable for the seven-year plague among the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: hares and rabbits of the northern United States and Canada.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Possibly _Strongylus strigosus_ is all that stands between Canada and a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: pest of rabbits like that of Australia. Just why this parasite is
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: inoperative in Australia, or why it has not been introduced there to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: lessen the rabbit evil, we do not know. Mr. Seton declares that the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: rabbits of his park were "subject to all the ills of the flesh, except
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: possibly writer's paralysis and housemaid's knee."
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: PARASITIC INFECTION OF WILD DUCKS.--The diseases of wild game,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: especially waterfowl, grouse and quail, have caused heavy losses in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: America as well as in European countries, and scientists have been
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: carefully investigating the cause and the general nature of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: maladies, as well as probable methods of prevention and cure. Mr. Geo.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Atkinson, a well-known practical naturalist of Portage la Prairie,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Manitoba, writes as follows to a local paper on this subject, which I
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: find quoted in the _National Sportsman_:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The question which has developed these important proportions during
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the past year is that of the extent of the parasitic infection of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: our wild ducks and other game, and the possibilities of the extended
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: transmission of these parasites to domestic stock, or even humanity,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: by eating.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The parasites in question are contained in small elliptical cases
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: found underlying the surface muscles of the breast, and in advanced
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: cases extending deeper into the flesh and the muscular tissues of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the legs and wings. They are not noticeable in the ordinary process
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of plucking the bird for the table, and are not found internally, so
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: that the only method of discovering their presence is by slitting
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the skin of the breast and paring it back a few inches when the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: worm-like sacs will be seen buried in the flesh.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: These parasites have come to my notice periodically during the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: process of skinning birds for mounting during the past number of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: years, but it was only when they appeared in unusual numbers last
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: fall that I made inquiries of the biological bureaus of Washington
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and Ottawa for information of their life history and the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: possibilities of their transmission to other hosts.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Replies from these sources surprised me with the information that
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: very little was known of the life history of any of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Sarcosporidia, of which group this was a species. Nothing was known
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of the method of infection or the transference from host to host or
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: species to species, and both departments asked for specimens for
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: examination.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Authorities are a unit in opinion that the question is one of great
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: importance to game conservation, and although opinions of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: dangers from eating differ somewhat, a record is given of a hog fed
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: upon affected flesh developing parasites in the muscles in six
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: weeks' time, while a case of a man's death from dropsy was found to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: be the result of development of these parasites in the valves of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: heart.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The ability of these low forms of life to withstand extremes of heat
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: makes it necessary for more than ordinary cooking to be assured of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: killing them, and since their presence is unnoted in the ordinary
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: course of dressing the birds for the table, there is little doubt
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: that very considerable numbers of these parasites are consumed at
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: our tables every season, with results at present unknown to us.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The species I have found most particularly infected have been
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: mallards, shovellers, teal, gadwall and pintails, and the birds,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: outwardly in the best condition, have frequently been found loaded
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: with sacs of these parasites and only the turning back of the breast
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: skin can disclose their presence.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The greatest slaughter of wild ducks by disease occurred on Great Salt
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Lake, Utah. Until the "duck disease" (intestinal coccidiosis) broke out
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: there, in the summer of 1910, the annual market slaughter of ducks at
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the mouth of Bear River had been enormous. When at Salt Lake City in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 1888 I made an effort to arouse the sportsmen whom I met to the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: necessity of a reform, but my exhortations fell on deaf ears. Naturally,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the sweeping away of the remaining ducks by disease would suggest a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: heaven-sent judgment upon the slaughterers were it not for the fact that
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the last state of the unfortunate ducks is if anything worse than the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: first.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: On Oct. 17, 1911, the annual report of the chief of the Biological
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Survey contained the following information on this subject:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: _Epidemic Among Wild Ducks on Great Salt Lake_.--Following a long
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: dry season, which favored the rearing of a large number of wild
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: ducks, but materially reduced the area of the feeding ponds,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: resulting in great overcrowding, a severe epidemic broke out about
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: August 1, 1910, among the wild ducks about Great Salt Lake, Utah.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Dead ducks could be counted by thousands along the shores and the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: disease raged unabated until late fall. Shooting clubs found it
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: necessary to declare a closed season. Some of the dead ducks were
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: forwarded to the Biological Survey and were turned over for
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: examination to the Bureau of Animal Industry, by the experts of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: which the disease was diagnosed as intestinal coccidiosis.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Various plans of relieving the situation were tried. The irrigation
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: ditches were closed, thus providing the sloughs and ponds with fresh
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: water, and lime was sprinkled on the mud flats and duck trails.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Great improvement followed this treatment, and experiments proved
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: that ducks provided with abundant fresh water and clean food began
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: to recover immediately. These methods promised success, but later it
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: was proposed that the marshes be drained and exposed to the sun's
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: rays--a course which cannot be recommended. That coccidia are not
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: always killed by exposure to the sun is shown by their survival on
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the sites of old chicken yards. An added disadvantage of the plan is
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: that draining and drying the marshes would have a bad effect on the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: natural duck food, and upon the birds themselves.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: CHAPTER X
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: DESTRUCTION OF WILD LIFE BY THE ELEMENTS
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: It is a fixed condition of Nature that whenever and wherever a wild
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: species exists in a state of nature, free from the trammels and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: limitations that contact with man always imposes, the species is fitted
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: to survive all ordinary climatic influences. Freedom of action, and the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: exercise of several options in the line of individual maintenance under
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: stress, is essential to the welfare of every wild species.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: A prong-horned antelope herd that is free can drift before a blizzard,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: can keep from freezing by the exercise, and eventually come to shelter.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Let that same herd drift against a barbed-wire fence five miles long,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and its whole scheme of self-preservation is upset. The herd perishes
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: then and there.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Cut out the undergrowth of a given section, drain the swamps and mow
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: down all the weeds and tall grass, and the next particularly hard winter
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: starves and freezes the quail.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Naturally the cutting of forests, clearing of brush and drainage of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: marshes is more or less calamitous to all the species of birds that
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: inhabit such places and find there winter food and shelter. Red-winged
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: blackbirds and real estate booms can not inhabit the same swamps
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: contemporaneously. Before the relentless march of civilization, the wild
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Indian, the bison and many of the wild birds must inevitably disappear.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: We cannot change conditions that are as inexorable as death itself. The
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: wild life must either adjust itself to the conditions that civilized man
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: imposes upon it, or perish. I say "civilized man," for the reason that
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the primitive races of man are not deadly exterminators of species, as
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: we are. I know of not one species of wild life that has been
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: exterminated by savage man without the aid of his civilized peers.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: As civilization marches ever onward, over the prairies, into the bad
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: lands and the forests, over the mountains and even into the farthest
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: corner of Death Valley, the desert of deserts, the struggle of the wild
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: birds, mammals and fishes is daily and hourly intensified. Man must help
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: them to maintain themselves, or accept a lifeless continent. The best
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: help consists in letting the wild creatures throughly alone, so that
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: they can help themselves; but quail often need to be fed in critical
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: periods. The best food is wheat screenings placed under little tents of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: straw, bringing food and shelter together.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In the well settled portions of the United States, such species as
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: quail, ruffed grouse, wild turkey, pinnated grouse and sage grouse hang
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: to life by slender threads. A winter of exceptionally deep snows, much
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: sleet, and a late spring always causes grave anxiety among the state
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: game wardens. In Pennsylvania a very earnest movement is in progress to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: educate and persuade farmers to feed the quail in winter, and much good
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: is being done in that direction.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Mr. Erasmus Wilson, of the _Pittsburgh Gazette-Times_ is the apostle of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: that movement.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: _Quail should be fed every winter, in every northern state_. The methods
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: to be pursued will be mentioned elsewhere.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: By way of illustration, here is a sample game report, from Las Animas,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Colorado, Feb. 22, 1912:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "After the most severe winter weather experienced for twenty years we
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: are able to compute approximately our loss of feathered life. It is
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: seventy-five per cent of the quail throughout the irrigated district,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and about twenty per cent of meadow-larks. In the rough cedar-covered
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: sections south of the Arkansas River, the loss among the quail was much
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: lighter. The ground sparrows suffered severely, while the English
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: sparrow seems to have come through in good shape. Many cotton-tail
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: rabbits starved to death, while the deep, light snow of January made
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: them easy prey for hawks and coyotes." (F.T. Webber).
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: It would be possible to record many instances similar to the above, but
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: why multiply them? And now behold the cruel corollary:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: At least twenty-five times during the past two years I have heard and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: read arguments by sportsmen against my proposal for a 5-year close
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: season for quail, taking the ground that "The sportsmen are not wholly
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: to blame for the scarcity of quail. It is the cold winters that kill
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: them off!"
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: So then, _because the fierce winters murder the bob white, wholesale,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: they should not have a chance to recover themselves_! Could human beings
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: possibly assume a more absurd attitude?
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Yes, it is coldly and incontestably true, that even after such winter
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: slaughter as Mr. Webber has reported above, the very next season will
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: find the quail hunter joyously taking the field, his face beaming with
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: health and good living, to hunt down and shoot to death as many as
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: possible of the pitiful 25 per cent remnant that managed to survive the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: pitiless winter. How many quail hunters, think you, ever stayed their
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: hands because of "a hard winter on the quail?" I warrant not one out of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: every hundred! How many states in this Union ever put on a close season
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: because of a hard winter? I'll warrant that not one ever did; and I
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: think there is only one state whose game commissioners have the power to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: act in that way without recourse to the legislature. This situation is
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: intolerable.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Thanks to the splendid codified game laws enacted in New York state in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 1912, our Conservation Commission can declare a close season in any
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: locality, for any length of time, when the state of the game demands an
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: emergency measure. This act is as follows; and it is a model law, which
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: every other state should speedily enact:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: THE NEW YORK CLOSE-SEASON LAW.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: _152. Petition for additional protection; notice of hearings; power
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: to grant additional protection; notice of prohibition or regulation;
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: penalties_.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: _1. Petition for additional protection_. Any citizen of the state
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: may file with the commission a petition in writing requesting it to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: give any species of fish, other than migratory food fish of the sea,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: or game protected by law, additional or other protection than that
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: afforded by the provisions of this article. Such petition shall
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: state the grounds upon which such protection is considered
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: necessary, and shall be signed by the petitioner with his address.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: _2. Notice of hearings_. The commission shall hold a public hearing
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: in the locality or county to be affected upon the allegations of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: such petition within twenty days from the filing thereof. At least
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: ten days prior to such hearing notice thereof, stating the time and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: place at which such hearing shall be held, shall be advertised in a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: newspaper published in the county to be affected by such additional
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: or other protection. Such notice shall state the name and the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: address of the petitioner, together with a brief statement of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: grounds upon which such application is made, and a copy thereof
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: shall be mailed to the petitioner at the address given in such
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: petition at least ten days before such hearing.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: _3. Power to grant additional protection_. If upon such hearing the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: commission shall determine that such species of fish or game, by
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: reason of disease, danger of extermination, or from any other cause
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: or reason, requires such additional or other protection, in any
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: locality or throughout the state, the commission shall have power to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: prohibit or regulate, during the open season therefor, the taking of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: such species of fish or game. Such prohibition or regulation may be
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: made general throughout the state or confined to a particular part
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: or district thereof.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: _4. Notice of prohibition or regulation_. Any order made by the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: commission under the provisions of this section shall be signed by
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: it, and entered in its minute book. At least thirty days before such
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: prohibition or regulation shall take effect, copies of the same
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: shall be filed in the office of the clerk issuing hunting and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: trapping licenses for the district to which the prohibition or
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: regulation applies. It shall be the duty of said clerks to issue a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: copy of said prohibition or regulation to each person to whom a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: hunting or trapping license is issued by them; to mail a copy of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: such prohibition or regulation to each holder of a hunting and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: trapping license theretofore issued by them and at that time in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: effect, and to post a copy thereof in a conspicuous place in their
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: office. At least thirty days before such prohibition or regulation
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: shall take effect the commission shall cause a notice thereof to be
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: advertised in a newspaper published in the county wherein such
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: prohibition or regulation shall take effect.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: _5. Penalties_. Any person violating the provisions of such
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: prohibition, rule or regulation shall be guilty of a misdemeanor and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: shall, upon conviction, be subject to a fine of not to exceed one
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: hundred dollars, or shall be imprisoned for not more than thirty
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: days, or both, for each offense, in addition to the penalties
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: hereinafter provided for taking fish, birds or quadrupeds in the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: close season.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: I want all sensible, honest sportsmen to stop citing the killing of game
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: birds by severe winters _as a reason_ why long close seasons are not
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: necessary, and why automatic guns "don't matter." And I want sportsmen
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: to consider their duty, and not go out hunting any game species that has
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: been slaughtered by a hard winter, until it has had at least five years
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: in which to recover. Any other course is cruel, selfish, and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: shortsighted; and a word to the humane should be sufficient.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The worst exhibitions ever made of the wolfish instinct to slay that
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: springs eternal in some human (!) breasts are those brought about
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: through the distress or errors of wild animals. By way of illustration,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: consider the slaughter of half-starved elk that took place in the edge
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of Idaho in the winter of 1909 and 1910, when about seven hundred elk
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: that were driven out of the Yellowstone Park at its northwestern corner
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: by the deep snow, fled into Idaho in the hope of finding food. The
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: inhabitants met the starving herds with repeating rifles, and as the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: unfortunate animals struggled westward through the snow and storm, they
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: were slaughtered without mercy. Bulls and cows, old and young, all of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the seven hundred, went down; and Stoney Indians could not have acted
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: any worse than did those "settlers."
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: On another occasion, it is recorded that the prong-horned antelope herd
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of the Mammoth Hot Springs wandered across the line into Gardiner, and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: quickly met a savage attack of gunners with rifles. A number of those
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: rare and valuable animals were killed, and others fled back into the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Park with broken legs dangling in the air.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In the interest of public decency, and for the protection of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: reputation of American citizenship, one of two things should be done.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The northern boundary of the Park should be extended northward beyond
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Gardiner, or else the deathtrap should be moved elsewhere. The case of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the town of Gardiner is referred to the legislature of Montana for
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: treatment.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Beyond question, the highest sentiments of humanity are those that are
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: stirred by the misfortunes of killable game. During the past thirty
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: years, I have noticed some interesting manifestations of the increased
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: sympathy for wild creatures that steadily is growing in a large section
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of the public mind. Thirty years ago, the appearance of a deer or moose
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: in the streets of any eastern village nearly always was in itself a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: signal for a grand chase of the unfortunate creature, and its speedy
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: slaughter. Today, in the eastern states, the general feeling is quite
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: different. The appearance of a deer in the Hudson River itself, or a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: moose in a Maine village is a signal, not for a wild chase and cruel
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: slaughter, but for a general effort to save the animal from being hurt,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: or killed. I know this through ocular proof, at least half a dozen lost
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and bewildered deer having been carefully driven into yards, or barns,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and humanely kept and cared for until they could be shipped to us.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Several have been caught while swimming in the Hudson, bewildered and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: panic-stricken. The latest capture occurred in New York City itself.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: A puma that escaped (about 1902) from the Zoological Park, instead of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: being shot was captured by sensible people in the hamlet of Bronxdale,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: alive and unhurt, and safely returned to us.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In some portions of the east, though not all, the day of the hue and cry
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: over "a wild animal in town" seems to be about over. On Long Island some
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: humane persons found an injured turkey vulture, and took it in and cared
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: for it,--only to be persecuted by ill-advised game wardens, because they
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: had a forbidden wild bird "in their possession!" There are times when it
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: is the highest (moral) duty of a game warden to follow the advice of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Private Mulvaney to the "orficer boy," and "Shut yer oye to the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: rigulations, sorr!"
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Such occurrences as these are becoming more and more common. _The desire
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of "the great silent majority" is to SAVE the wild creatures_; and it
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: is in response to that sentiment that thousands of people are today in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the field against the Army of Destruction.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: It is the duty of every sportsman to assist in promoting the passage of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: a law like our New York law which empowers the State Game Commission to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: throw extra protection around any species that has been slaughtered too
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: much by snow or by firearms, by closing the open season as long as may
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: be necessary. Can there be in all America even one thinking, reasoning
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: being who can not see the justice and also the imperative necessity of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: this measure? It seems impossible.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Give the game the benefit of every doubt! If it becomes too thick, your
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: gun can quickly thin it out; but if it is once exterminated, it will be
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: impossible to bring it back. Be wise; and take thought for the morrow.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Remember the heath hen.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: SLAUGHTER OF BLUEBIRDS.--In the late winter and early spring of 1896 the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: wave of bluebirds was caught on its northward migration by a period of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: unseasonably cold and fearfully tempestuous weather, involving much
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: icy-cold rain and sleet. Now, there is no other climatic condition that
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: is so hard for a wild bird or mammal to withstand as rain at the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: freezing point, and a mantle of ice or frozen snow over all supplies of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: food.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The bluebirds perished by thousands. The loss occurred practically all
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: along their east-and-west line of migration, from Arkansas to the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Atlantic Coast. In places the species seemed almost exterminated; and it
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: was several years ere it recovered to a point even faintly approximating
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: its original population. I am quite certain that the species never has
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: recovered more than 50 per cent of the number that existed previous to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the calamity.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: DUCK CHOLERA IN THE BRONX RIVER.--In 1911, some unknown but new and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: particularly deadly element, probably introduced in sewage, contaminated
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the waters of Bronx River where it flows through New York City, with
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: results very fatal in the Zoological Park. The large flock of mallard
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: ducks, Canada geese, and snow geese on Lake Agassiz was completely wiped
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: out. In all about 125 waterfowl died in rapid succession, from causes
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: commonly classed under the popular name of "duck cholera." The disease
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: was carried to other bodies of water in the Park that were fed from
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: other sources, but made no headway elsewhere than on lakes fed by the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: polluted Bronx River.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Fortunately the work of the Bronx River Parkway Commission soon will
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: terminate the present very unsanitary condition of that stream.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: WILD DUCKS IN DISTRESS.--In the winter of 1911-12, many flocks of wild
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: ducks decided to winter in the North. Many persons believe that this was
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: largely due to the prevention of late winter and spring shooting; which
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: seems reasonable. Unfortunately the winter referred to proved
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: exceptionally severe and formed vast sheets of thick ice over the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: feeding-grounds where the ducks had expected to obtain their food. On
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Cayuga, Seneca and other lakes in central New York, and on the island of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Martha's Vineyard, the flocks of ducks suffered very severely, and many
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: perished of hunger and cold. _But for the laws prohibiting late winter
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: shooting undoubtedly all of them would have been shot and eaten,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: regardless of their distress_.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Game wardens and humane citizens made numerous efforts to feed the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: starving flocks, and many ducks were saved in that way. An illustrated
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: article on the distressed ducks of Keuka Lake, by C. William Beebe and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Verdi Burtch, appeared in the _Zoological Society Bulletin_ for May,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 1912. Fortunately there is every reason to believe that such occurrences
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: will be rare.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: WILD SWANS SWEPT OVER NIAGARA FALLS.--During the past ten years, several
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: winter tragedies to birds have occurred on a large scale at Niagara
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Falls. Whole flocks of whistling swans of from 20 up to 70 individuals
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: alighting in the Niagara River above the rapids have permitted
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: themselves to float down into the rapids, and be swept over the Falls,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: en masse. On each occasion, the great majority of the birds were
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: drowned, or killed on the rocks. Of the very few that survived, few if
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: any were able to rise and fly out of the gorge below the Falls to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: safety. It is my impression that about 200 swans recently have perished
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: in this strange way.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: CHAPTER XI
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: SLAUGHTER OF SONG-BIRDS BY ITALIANS
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In these days of wild-life slaughter, we hear much of death and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: destruction. Before our eyes there continually arise photographs of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: hanging masses of waterfowl, grouse, pheasants, deer and fish, usually
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: supported in true heraldic fashion by the men who slew them and the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: implements of slaughter. The world has become somewhat hardened to these
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: things, because the victims are classed as game; and in the destruction
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of game, one game-bag more or less "Will not count in the news of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: battle."
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The slaughter of song, insectivorous and all other birds by Italians and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: other aliens from southern Europe has become a scourge to the bird life
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of this country. The devilish work of the negroes and poor whites of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: South will be considered in the next chapter. In Italy, linnets and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: sparrows are "game"; and so is everything else that wears feathers!
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Italy is a continuous slaughtering-ground for the migratory birds of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Europe, and as such it is an international nuisance and a pest. The way
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: passerine birds are killed and eaten in that country is a disgrace to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the government of Italy, and a standing reproach to the throne. Even
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: kings and parliaments have no right in moral or international law to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: permit year after year the wholesale slaughter of birds of passage of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: species that no civilized man has a right to kill.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: There are some tales of slaughter from which every properly-balanced
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Christian mind is bound to recoil with horror. One such tale has
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: recently been given to us in the pages of the _Avicultural Magazine_, of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: London, for January, 1912, by Mr. Hubert D. Astley, F.Z.S., whose word
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: no man will dispute. In condensing it, let us call it
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: THE ITALIAN SLAUGHTER OF THE INNOCENTS
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: This story does not concern game birds of any kind. Quite the contrary.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: That it should be published in America, a land now rapidly filling up
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: with Italians, is a painful necessity in order that the people of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: America may be enabled accurately to measure the fatherland traditions
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and the fixed mental attitude of Italians generally toward our song
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: birds. I shall now hold a mirror up to Italian nature. If the image is
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: either hideous or grotesque, the fault will not be mine. I specially
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: commend the picture to the notice of American game wardens and judges on
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the bench.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The American reader must be reminded that the Italian peninsula reaches
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: out a long arm of land into the Mediterranean Sea for several hundred
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: miles toward the sunny Barbary coast of North Africa. This great
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: southward highway has been chosen by the birds of central Europe as
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: their favorite migration route. Especially is this true of the small
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: song-birds with weak wings and a minimum of power for long-sustained
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: flight. Naturally, they follow the peninsula down to the Italian Land's
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: End before they launch forth to dare the passage of the Mediterranean.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: [Illustration: AN ITALIAN ROCCOLO, ON LAKE COMO
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: A Death-Trap for Song-Birds. From the Avicultural Magazine]
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Italy is the narrow end of a great continental funnel, into the wide
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: northern end of which Germany, Austria, France and Switzerland annually
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: pour their volume of migratory bird life. And what is the result? For
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: answer let us take the testimony of two reliable witnesses, and file it
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: for use on the day when Tony Macchewin, gun in hand and pockets bulging
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: with cartridges, goes afield in our country and opens fire on our birds.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The linnet is one of the sweet singers of Europe. It is a small,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: delicately formed, weak-winged little bird, about the size of our
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: phoebe-bird. It weighs only a trifle more than a girl's love-letter.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Where it breeds and rears its young, in Germany for example, a true
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: sportsman would no more think of shooting a linnet than he would of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: killing and eating his daughter's dearest canary.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: To the migrating bird, the approach to northern Italy, either going or
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: returning, is not through a land of plenty. The sheltering forests have
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: mostly been swept away, and safe shelters for small birds are very rare.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In the open, there are owls and hawks; and the only refuge from either
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: is the thick-leafed grove, into which linnets and pipits can dive at the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: approach of danger and quickly hide.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: A linnet from the North after days of dangerous travel finally reached
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Lake Como, southward bound. The country was much too open for safety,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and its first impulse was to look about for safe shelter. The low bushes
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: that sparsely covered the steep hillsides were too thin for refuge in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: times of sudden danger.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Ah! Upon a hilltop is a little grove of trees, green and inviting. In
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the grove a bird is calling, calling, insistently. The trees are very
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: small; but they seem to stand thickly together, and their foliage should
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: afford a haven from both hawk and gunner. To it joyously flits the tired
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: linnet. As it perches aloft upon a convenient whip-like wand, it notices
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: for the first time a queer, square brick tower of small dimensions,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: rising in the center of a court-yard surrounded by trees. The tower is
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: like an old and dingy turret that has been shorn from a castle, and set
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: on the hilltop without apparent reason. It is two stories in height,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: with one window, dingy and uninviting. A door opens into its base.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Several birds that seem very near, but are invisible, frequently call
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and chirp, as if seeking answering calls and companionship. Surely the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: grove must be a safe place for birds, or they would not be here.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Hark! A whirring, whistling sound fills the air, like the air tone of a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: flying hawk's wings. A hawk! A hawk!
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Down plunges the scared linnet, blindly, frantically, into the space
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: sheltered by the grove!
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Horrors! What is this?
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Threads! Invisible, interlacing threads; tangled and full of pockets,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: treacherously spanning the open space. It is a fowler's net! The linnet
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: is entangled. It flutters frantically but helplessly, and hangs there,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: caught. Its alarm cry is frantically answered by the two strange,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: invisible bird voices that come from the top of the tower!
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The grove and the tower are A ROCCOLO! A huge, permanent, merciless,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: deadly _trap_, for the wholesale capture of songbirds! The tower is the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: hiding place of the fowler, and the calling birds are decoy birds whose
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: eyes have been totally blinded by red-hot wires in order that they will
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: call more frantically than birds with eyes would do. The whistling wings
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: that seemed a hawk were a sham, made by a racquet thrown through the air
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: by the fowler, through a slot in his tower. He keeps by him many such
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: racquets.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The door of the tower opens, and out comes the fowler. He is lowbrowed,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: swarthy, ill kept, and wears rings in his ears. A soiled hand seizes the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: struggling linnet, and drags it violently from the threads that
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: entangled it. A sharp-pointed twig is thrust straight through the head
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of the helpless victim _at the eyes_, and after one wild, fluttering
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: agony--it is dead.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The fowler sighs contentedly, re-enters his dirty and foul-smelling
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: tower, tosses the feathered atom upon the pile of dead birds that lies
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: upon the dirty floor in a dirty corner,--and is ready for the next one.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Ask him, as did Mr. Astley, and he will tell you frankly that there are
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: about 150 dead birds in the pile,--starlings, sparrows, linnets,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: greenfinches, chaffinches, goldfinches, hawfinches, redstarts,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: blackcaps, robins, song thrushes, blackbirds, blue and coal tits,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: fieldfares and redwings. He will tell you also, that there are _seven
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: other roccolos within sight and twelve within easy walking distance_. He
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: will tell you, as he did Mr. Astley, that during that week he had taken
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: about 500 birds, and that that number was a fair average for each of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 12 other roccolos.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: This means the destruction of about 5,000 songbirds per week _in that
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: neighborhood alone!_ Another keeper of a roccolo told Mr. Astley that
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: during the previous autumn he took about 10,000 birds at his small and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: comparatively insignificant roccolo.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: And above that awful roccolo of slaughtered innocents rose _a wooden
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: cross_, in memory of Christ, the Merciful, the Compassionate!
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Around the interior of the entwined sapling tops that formed the fatal
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: bower of death there hung a semicircle of tiny cages containing live
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: decoys,--chaffinches, hawfinches, titmice and several other species.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "The older and staider ones call repeatedly," says Mr. Astley, "and the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: chaffinches break into song. It is the only song to be heard in Italy at
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the time of the autum migration."
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: And the King of Italy, the Queen of Italy, the Parliament of Italy and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: His Holiness the Pope permit these things, year in and year out. It is
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: now said, however, that through the efforts of a recently organized
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: bird-lovers' society in Italy, the blinding of decoy birds for roccolos
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: is to be stopped.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In Germany, Austria, and Switzerland, the protection of these birds
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: during their breeding season must be very effective, for otherwise the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: supply for the Italian slaughter of the Innocents would long ago have
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: fallen to nothing.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The Germans love birds, and all wild life. I wonder how they like the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Italian roccolo. I wonder how France regards it; and whether the nations
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of Europe north of Italy will endure this situation forever.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: To the American and English reader, comment on the practices recorded
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: above is quite unnecessary, except the observation that they betoken a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: callousness of feeling and a depth of cruelty and destructiveness to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: which, so far as known, no savages ever yet have sunk. As an exhibit of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the groveling pusillanimity of the human soul, the roccolo of northern
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Italy reveals minus qualities which can not be expressed either in words
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: or in figures.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: And what is the final exhibit of the gallant knight of the roccolo, the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: feudal lord of the modern castle and its retainers?
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The answer is given by Dr. Louis B. Bishop, in an article on "Birds in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the Markets of Southern Europe."
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In Venice, which was visited in October and November, during the fall
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: migration, he found on sale in the markets, as food, thousands of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: songbirds.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "Birds were there in profusion, from ducks to kites, in the early
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: morning, hung in great bunches above the stalls, but by 9 A.M. most of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: them had been sold. Ducks and shorebirds occurred in some numbers, but
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the vast majority were small sparrows, larks and thrushes. These were
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: there during my visit by the thousands, if not ten thousands. To the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: market they were brought in large sacks, strung in fours on twigs which
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: had been passed through the eyes and then tied. Most of these small
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: birds had been trapped, and on skinning them I often could find no
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: injury except at their eyes.[C] One of these sacks which I examined on
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: November 3, contained hundreds of birds, largely siskins, skylarks and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: bramblings. As a rule the small birds that were not sold in the early
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: morning were skinned or picked, and their tiny bodies packed in regular
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: order, breasts up, in shadow tin boxes, and exposed for sale."
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: [Footnote C: It is probable that these birds were killed by piercing the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: head through the eyes.]
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "During these visits to the Venetian markets, I identified 60 species,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and procured specimens of most. As nearly as I can remember, small birds
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: cost from two to five cents apiece. For example I paid $2.15 on Nov. 8,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: for
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 1 Woodcock,                    1 Skylark,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 1 Jay,                         1 Greenfinch,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 2 Starlings,                   1 Bullfinch,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 2 Spotted Crakes,              1 Redpoll.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 1 Song Thrush,                 3 Linnets,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 1 Gold-Crest,                  2 Goldfinches,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 1 Long-Tailed Titmouse,        6 Siskins,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 1 Great Titmouse,              3 Reed Buntings,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 1 Pipit,                       3 Bramblings,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 1 Redstart,              --and 5 Chaffinches.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "On November 10, I paid $3.25 for
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 2 Coots,                       1 European Curlew,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 1 Water Rail,                  2 Kingfishers,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 1 Spotted Crake,               2 Greenfinches,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 1 Sparrow Hawk,                2 Wrens,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 2 Woodcock,                    2 Great Titmouse,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 1 Common Redshank,             2 Blue Titmouse,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 1 Dusky Redshank,              1 Redbreast, and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 2 Dunlins."
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Of course there were various species of upland game birds, shore-birds
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and waterfowl,--everything, in fact, that could be found and killed. In
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: addition to the passerine birds listed above. Dr. Bishop noted the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: following, all in Venice alone:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Skylark ("in great numbers"),
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Crested Lark,                   Crossbill,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Calandra,                       House Sparrow,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Tree Sparrow,                   Stonechat,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Hawfinch,                       Coal,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Yellow-Hammer,                  Goldcrest,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Blackbird,                      Rock Pipit,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Fieldfare,                      White Wagtail,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Song Thrush,                    Redwing.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "In Florence," says Dr. Bishop, "I visited the central market on
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: November 26, 28, 29, 30, December 1, 2, 3, 5, 6, 7, 8 and 9, and found
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: birds even more plentiful than in Venice." Besides a variety of game
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: birds, he found quantities of the species mentioned above, seen in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Venice, and also the following:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Green Sandpiper,                Brown Creeper,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Dotterel,                       Nuthatch,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Magpie,                         Black-Cap Warbler,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Corn Bunting,                   Black-Headed Warbler,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Migratory Quail,                Fantail Warbler,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Green Woodpecker,               Missel Thrush,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Spotted Woodpecker,             Ring Ouzel,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Wood Lark,                      Rock Sparrow, and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Gray Wagtail.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "Here, too [at Florence] we saw often, bunches and baskets of small
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: birds, chiefly redbreasts, hawked through the streets.... Every Sunday
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: that we went into the country we met numbers of Italians out shooting,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and their bags seemed to consist wholly of small birds.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "At Genoa, San Remo, Monte Carlo and Nice, between December 13 and 29, I
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: did not visit the central markets, if such exist, but saw frequently
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: bunches of small birds hanging outside stores.... A gentleman who spent
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the fall on an automobile trip through the west of FRANCE _from Brittany
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: to the Pyrenees, tells me he noticed these bunches of small birds on
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: sale in every town he visited_.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "That killing song-birds for food," continues Dr. Bishop, "is not
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: confined to the poor Italians I learned on October 27, when one of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: most prominent and wealthy Italian _ornithologists_--a delightful
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: man--told me he had shot 180 skylarks and pipits the day before, and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: that his family liked them far better than other game. Our prejudice
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: against selling game does not exist in Europe, and this same
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: ornithologist told me he often shot 200 ducks in a day at his
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: shooting-box, sending to the market what he could not use himself. On
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: November 1, 1910, he shot 82 ducks, and on November 8, 103, chiefly
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: widgeon and teal."
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: An "ornithologist" indeed! A "sportsman" also, is he not? He belongs
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: with his brother "ornithologists" of the roccolos, who net their "game"
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: with the aid of _blind_ birds! Brave men, gallant "sportsmen," are these
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: men of Italy,--and western France also if the tale is true!
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: If the people of Europe can stand the wholesale, systematic slaughter of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: their song and insectivorous birds, _we can_! If they are too
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: mean-spirited to rise up, make a row about it, and stop it, then let
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: them pay the price; but, by the Eternal, Antonio shall not come to this
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: country with the song-bird tastes of the roccolo and indulge them here!
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The above facts have been cited, not at all for the benefit of Europe,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: but for our own good. The American People are now confronted by the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Italian and Austrian and Hungarian laborer and saloon-keeper and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: mechanic, and all Americans should have an exact measure of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: sentiments of southern Europe toward our wild life generally, especially
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the birds that we do not shoot at all, _and therefore are easy to kill_.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: When a warden or a citizen arrests an alien for killing any of our
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: non-game birds, show the judge these records of how they do things in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Italy, and ask for the extreme penalty.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: I have taken pains to publish the above facts from eye-witnesses in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: order that every game commissioner, game warden and state legislator who
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: reads these pages may know exactly what he is "up against" in the alien
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: population of our country from southern Europe. For unnumbered
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: generations, the people of Italy have been taught to believe that it is
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: _perfectly right_ to shoot and devour every song-bird that flies. The
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Venetian is no respecter of species; and when an Italian "ornithologist"
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: (!) can go out and murder 180 linnets and pipits in one day for the pot,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: it is time for Americans to think hard.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: We sincerely hope that it will not require blows and kicks and fines to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: remove from Antonio's head the idea that America is not Italy, and that
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the slaughter of song birds "don't go" in this country. I strongly
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: recommend to every state the enactment of a law that will do these
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: things:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 1.--Prohibit the owning, carrying or use of firearms by aliens, and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 2.--Prohibit the use of firearms in hunting by any naturalized alien
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: from southern Europe until after a 10-years' residence in America.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: From reports that have come to me at first hand regarding Italians in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the East, Hungarians in Pennsylvania and Austrians in Minnesota, it
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: seems absolutely certain that all members of the lower classes of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: southern Europe are a dangerous menace to our wild life.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: On account of the now-accursed land-of-liberty idea, every foreigner
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: who sails past the statue on Bedloe's Island and lands on our
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: liberty-ridden shore, is firmly convinced that _now, at last_, he can do
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: as he pleases! And as one of his first ways in which to show his
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: newly-acquired personal liberty and independence in the Land of Easy
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Marks, he buys a gun and goes out to shoot "free game!"
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: If we, as a people, are so indolent and so somnolent that Antonio gets
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: away with all our wild birds, then do we deserve to be robbed.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Italians are pouring into America in a steady stream. They are strong,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: prolific, persistent and of tireless energy. New York City now contains
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 340,000 of them. They work while the native Americans sleep. Wherever
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: they settle, their tendency is to root out the native American and take
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: his place and his income. Toward wild life the Italian laborer is a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: human mongoose. Give him power to act, and he will quickly exterminate
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: every wild thing that wears feathers or hair. To our songbirds he is
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: literally a "pestilence that walketh at noonday".
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: As we have shown, the Italian is a born pot-hunter, and he has grown up
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: in the fixed belief that killing song-birds for food is right! To him
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: all is game that goes into the bag. The moment he sets foot in the open,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: he provides himself with a shot-gun, and he looks about for things to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: kill. It is "a free country;" therefore, he may kill anything he can
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: find, cook it and eat it. If anybody attempts to check him,--sapristi!
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: beware his gun! He cheerfully invades your fields, and even your lawn;
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and he shoots robins, bluebirds, thrushes, catbirds, grosbeaks,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: tanagers, orioles, woodpeckers, quail, snipe, ducks, crows, and herons.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Down in Virginia, near Charlottesville, an Italian who was working on a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: new railroad once killed a turkey buzzard; and he selfishly cooked it
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and ate it, all alone. A pot-hunting compatriot of his heard of it, and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: reproached him for having-dined on game in camera. In the quarrel that
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: ensued, one of the "sportsmen" stabbed the other to death.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: When the New York Zoological Society began work on its Park in 1899, the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: northern half of the Borough of the Bronx was a regular daily
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life
