txt: hunting-ground for the slaughter of song-birds, and all other birds that
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: could be found. Every Sunday it was "bangetty!" "bang!" from Pelham Bay
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: to Van Cortlandt. The police force paid not the slightest attention to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: these open, flagrant, shameless violations of the city ordinances and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the state bird laws. In those days I never but once heard of a policeman
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: _on his own initiative_ arresting a birdshooter, even on Sunday; but
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: whenever meddlesome special wardens from the Zoological Park have
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: pointedly called upon the local police force for help, it has always
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: been given with cheerful alacrity. In the fall of 1912 an appeal to the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Police Commissioner resulted in a general order to stop all hunting and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: shooting in the Borough of the Bronx, and a reform is now on.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The war on the bird-killers in New York City began in 1900. It seemed
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: that if the Zoological Society did not take up the matter, the slaughter
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: would continue indefinitely. The white man's burden was taken up; and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the story of the war is rather illuminating. Mr. G.O. Shields,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: President of the League of American Sportsmen, quickly became interested
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: in the matter, and entered actively into the campaign. For months
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: unnumbered, he spent every Sunday patroling the woods and thickets of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: northern New York and Westchester county, usually accompanied by John J.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Rose and Rudolph Bell of the Zoological Park force, for whom
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: appointments as deputy game wardens had been secured from the State.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The adventures of that redoubtable trio of man-hunters would make an
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: interesting chapter. They were shot at by poachers, but more frequently
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: they shot at the other fellows. Just why it was that no one was killed,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: no one seems to know. Many Italians and several Americans were arrested
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: while hunting, haled to court, prosecuted and fined. Finally, a reign of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: terror set in; and that was the beginning of the end. It became known
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: that those three men could not be stopped by threats, and that they
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: always got their man--unless he got into a human rabbit-warren of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Italian boarding-house species. That was the only escape that was
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: possible.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The largest haul of dead birds was 43 robins, orioles, thrushes and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: woodpeckers, captured along with the five Italians who committed the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: indiscretion of sitting down in the woods to divide their dead birds. We
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: saved all the birds in alcohol, and showed them in court. The judge
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: fined two of the Italians $50 each, and the other three were sent to the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: penitentiary for two months each.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Even yet, however, at long intervals an occasional son of sunny Italy
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: tries his luck at Sunday bird shooting; but if anyone yells at him to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "Halt!" he throws away his gun and stampedes through the brush like a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: frightened deer. The birds of upper New York are now fairly secure; but
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: it has taken ten years of fighting to bring it about.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Throughout New York State, Pennsylvania, New Jersey, Connecticut,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Massachusetts, and even Minnesota, wherever there are large settlements
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of Italians and Hungarians, the reports are the same. They swarm through
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the country every Sunday, and shoot every wild thing they see. Wherever
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: there are large construction works,--railroads, canals or
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: aqueducts,--look for bird slaughter, and you are sure to find it. The
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: exception to this rule, so far as I know, is along the line of the new
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Catskill aqueduct, coming to New York City. The contractors have elected
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: not to permit bird slaughter, and the rule has been made that any man
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: who goes out hunting will instantly be discharged. That is the best rule
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: that ever was made for the protection of birds and game against
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: gang-working aliens.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Let every state and province in America look out sharply for the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: bird-killing foreigner; for sooner or later, he will surely attack your
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: wild life. The Italians are spreading, spreading, spreading. If you are
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: without them to-day, to-morrow they will be around you. Meet them at the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: threshold with drastic laws, throughly enforced; for no half way
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: measures will answer.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Pennsylvania has had the worst experience of alien slaughterers of any
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: state, thus far. _Six_ of her game wardens have been _killed_, and eight
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: or ten have been wounded, by shooting! Finally her legislature arose in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: wrath, and passed a law prohibiting the ownership or possession of guns
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of any kind by aliens. The law gives the right of domiciliary search,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and it surely is enforced. Of course the foreign population "kicked"
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: against the law, but the People's steam roller went over them just the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: same. In New York, we require from an alien a license costing $20, and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: it has saved a million (perhaps) of our birds; but the Pennsylvania law
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: is the best. It may be taken as a model for every state and province in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: America. Its text is as follows:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Section I. Be it enacted, &c., That from and after the passage of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: this act, it shall be unlawful for any unnaturalized foreign-born
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: resident to hunt for or capture or kill, in this Commonwealth, any
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: wild bird or animal, either game or otherwise, of any description,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: excepting in defense of person or property; and to that end it shall
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: be unlawful for any unnaturalized foreign-born resident, within this
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Commonwealth, to either own or be possessed of a shotgun or rifle of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: any make. Each and every person violating any provision of this
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: section shall, upon conviction thereof, be sentenced to pay a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: penalty of twenty-five dollars for each offense, or undergo
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: imprisonment in the common jail of the county for the period of one
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: day for each dollar of penalty imposed. Provided, That in addition
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: to the before-named penalty, all guns of the before-mentioned kinds
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: found in possession or under control of an unnaturalized
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: foreign-born resident shall, upon conviction of such person, or upon
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: his signing a declaration of guilt as prescribed by this act, be
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: declared forfeited to the Commonwealth of Pennsylvania, and shall be
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: sold by the Board of Game Commissioners as hereinafter directed.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Section 2. For the purpose of this act, any unnaturalized
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: foreign-born person who shall reside or live within the boundaries
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of the Commonwealth of Pennsylvania for ten consecutive days shall
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: be considered a resident and shall be liable to the penalties
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: imposed for violation of the provisions of this act.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Section 3. That the possession of a shotgun or rifle at any place
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: outside of a building, within this Commonwealth, by an unnaturalized
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: foreign-born resident, shall be conclusive proof of a violation of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the provisions of section one of this act, and shall render any
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: person convicted thereof liable to the penalty as fixed by said
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: section.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Section 4. That the presence of a shotgun or rifle in a room or
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: house, or building or tent, or camp of any description, within this
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Commonwealth, occupied by or controlled by an unnaturalized
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: foreign-born resident shall be prima facie evidence that such gun is
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: owned or controlled by the person occupying or controlling the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: property in which such gun is found, and shall render such person
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: liable to the penalty imposed by section one of this act.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Other sections provide for the full enforcement of this law.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: It is now high time, and an imperative public necessity, that every
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: state should act in this matter, before its bird life is suddenly
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: attacked, and serious inroads made upon it. Do it NOW! The enemy is
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: headed your way. Don't wait for him to strike the first blow!
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: _Duty of the Italian Press and Clergy_.--Now what is the best remedy for
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the troubles that will arise for Italians in America because of wrong
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: principles established in Italy? It is not in the law, the police, the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: court and the punishment. It is in _educating the Italian into a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: knowledge of the duties of the good citizen_! The Italian press and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: clergy can do this; and _no one else can do it so easily, so quickly and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: so well_!
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Those two powerful forces should enter seriously upon this task. In
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: every other respect, the naturalized Italian tries to become a good
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: citizen, and adjust himself to the laws and the customs of his new
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: country. Why should he not do this in regard to bird life? It is not too
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: much to ask, nor is it too much to _exact_. Does the Italian workman, or
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: store-keeper who makes his living by honest toil _enjoy_ breaking our
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: bird laws, _enjoy_ irritating and injuring those with whom he has come
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: to live? Does he _enjoy_ being watched, and searched, and chased, and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: arrested,--all for a few small birds that he _does not need_ for food?
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: He earns good wages; he has plenty of good food; and he must be
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: _educated_ into protecting our birds instead of destroying them. The
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Italian newspapers and clergy have a serious duty to perform in this
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: matter, and we hope they will diligently discharge it.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: [Illustration: DEAD SONG-BIRDS
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: These jars contain the dead bodies of 43 valuable insectivorous birds
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: that were taken from two Italians in October, 1905, in the suburbs of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: New York City, by game wardens of the New York Zoological Society.]
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: CHAPTER XII
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: DESTRUCTION OF SONG BIRDS BY SOUTHERN NEGROES AND POOR WHITES
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Before going farther, there is one point that I wish to make quite
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: clear.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Whenever the people of a particular race make a specialty of some
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: particular type of wrong-doing, anyone who pointedly rebukes the faulty
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: members of that race is immediately accused of "race prejudice." On
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: account of the facts I am now setting forth about the doings of Italian
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and negro bird-killers, I expect to be accused along that line. If I am,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: I shall strenuously deny the charge. The facts speak for themselves.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Zoologically, however, I am strongly prejudiced against the people of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: any race, creed, club, state or nation who make a specialty of any
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: particularly offensive type of bird or wild animal slaughter; and I do
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: not care who knows it.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The time was, and I remember it very well, when even the poorest gunner
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: scorned to kill birds that were not considered "game." In days lang
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: syne, many a zoological collector has been jeered because the specimens
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: he had killed for preservation were not "game."
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: But times have changed. In the wearing of furs, we have bumped down
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: steps both high and steep. In 1880 American women wore sealskin, marten,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: otter, beaver and mink. To-day nothing that wears hair is too humble to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: be skinned and worn. To-day "they are wearing" skins of muskrats, foxes,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: rabbits, skunks, domestic cats, squirrels, and even rats. And see how
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the taste for game,--of some sections of our population,--also has gone
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: down.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In the North, the Italians are fighting for the privilege of eating
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: everything that wears feathers; but we allow no birds to be shot for
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: food save game birds and cranes. In the South, the negroes and poor
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: whites are killing song-birds, woodpeckers and doves for food; and in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: several states some of it is done under the authority of the laws. Look
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: at these awful lists:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: IN THESE STATES, ROBINS ARE LEGALLY SHOT AND EATEN:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Louisiana    North Carolina   Tennessee  Texas
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Mississippi  South Carolina   Maryland   Florida
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: IN THESE STATES, BLACKBIRDS ARE LEGALLY SHOT AND EATEN:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Louisiana    Pennsylvania        Tennessee
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: District of Columbia    South Carolina
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: CRANES ARE SHOT AND EATEN IN THESE STATES:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Colorado    North Dakota    Nevada    Oklahoma    Nebraska
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In Mississippi, the _cedar bird_ is legally shot and eaten! In North
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Carolina, the meadow lark is shot and eaten.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: IN THE FOLLOWING STATES, DOVES ARE CONSIDERED "GAME," AND ARE SHOT IN AN
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "OPEN SEASON:"
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Alabama            Georgia    Minnesota        Ohio
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Arkansas           Idaho      Mississippi      Oregon
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: California         Illinois   Missouri         Pennsylvania
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Connecticut        Kentucky   Nebraska         South Carolina
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Delaware           Louisiana  New Mexico       Tennessee
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Dist. of Columbia  Maryland   North Carolina   Texas
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Utah                       Virginia
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The killing of doves represents a great and widespread decline in the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: ethics of sportsmanship. In the twenty-six States named, a great many
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: men who _call_ themselves sportsmen indulge in the cheap and ignoble
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: pastime of potting weak and confiding doves. It is on a par with the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "sport" of hunting English sparrows in a city street. Of course this is,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: to a certain extent, a matter of taste; but there is at least one club
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of sportsmen into which no dove-killer can enter, provided his standard
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of ethics is known in advance.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: With the killing of robins, larks, blackbirds and cedar birds for food,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the case is quite different. No white man calling himself a sportsman
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: ever indulges in such low pastimes as the killing of such birds for
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: food. That burden of disgrace rests upon the negroes and poor whites of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the South; but at the same time, it is a shame that respectable white
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: men sitting in state legislatures should deliberately enact laws
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: _permitting_ such disgraceful practices, or permit such disgraceful and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: ungentlemanly laws to remain in force!
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Here is a case by way of illustration, copied very recently from the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Atlanta _Journal_:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Editor _Journal_:--I located a robin roost up the Trinity River, six
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: miles from Dallas, and prevailed on six Dallas sportsmen to go with
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: me on a torch-light bird hunt. This style of hunting was, of course,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: new to the Texans, but they finally consented to go, and I had the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: pleasure of showing them how it was done.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Equipped with torch lights and shot guns, we proceeded. After
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: reaching the hunting grounds the sport began in reality, and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: continued for two hours and ten minutes, with a total slaughter of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 10,157 birds, an average of 1,451 birds killed by each man.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: But the Texans give me credit for killing at least 2,000 of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: entire number. I was called 'the king of bird hunters' by the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: sportsmen of Dallas, Texas, and have been invited to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: command-in-chief the next party of hunters which go from Dallas to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the Indian Territory in search of large game.--F.L. CROW, Dallas,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Texas, former Atlantan.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Dallas, Texas, papers and Oklahoma papers, please copy!
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: As a further illustration of the spirit manifested in the South toward
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: robins, I quote the following story from Dr. P.P. Claxton, of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: University of Tennessee, as related in Audubon Educational Leaflet No.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 46, by Mr. T. Gilbert Pearson:--
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "The roost to which I refer," says Professor Claxton, "was situated in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: what is locally known as a 'cedar glade,' near Porestville, Bedford Co.,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Tennessee. This is a great cedar country, and robins used to come in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: immense numbers during the winter months, to feed on the berries.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: [Illustration: THE ROBIN OF THE NORTH
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Our best-beloved Song Bird, now being legally shot as "game" in the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: South. In the North there is now only one robin for every ten formerly
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: there.]
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "The spot which the roost occupied was not unlike numerous others that
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: might have been selected. The trees grew to a height of from five to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: thirty feet, and for a mile square were literally loaded at night with
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: robins. Hunting them while they roosted was a favorite sport. A man
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: would climb a cedar tree with a torch, while his companions with poles
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and clubs would disturb the sleeping birds on the adjacent trees.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Blinded by the light, the suddenly awakened birds flew to the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: torch-bearer; who, _as he seized each bird would quickly pull off its
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: head_, and drop it into a sack suspended from his shoulders.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: [Illustration: THE MOCKING-BIRD OF THE SOUTH
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: This sweet singer of the South is NOT being shot in the North
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: for food! No northern lawmaker ever will permit such barbarity.]
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "The capture of three of four hundred birds was an ordinary night's
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: work. Men and boys would come in wagons from all the adjoining counties
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and camp near the roost for the purpose of killing robins. Many times,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 100 or more hunters with torches and clubs would be at work in a single
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: night. _For three years_ this tremendous slaughter continued in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: winter,--and then the survivors deserted the roost."
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: [Illustration: NORTHERN ROBINS READY FOR SOUTHERN SLAUGHTER
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 195 Birds at Avery Island, La. in January 1912, Photographed Daring the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Annual Slaughter, by E.A. McIlhenny]
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: No: these people were not Apache Indians, led by a Geronimo who knew no
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: mercy, no compassion. We imagine that they were mostly poor white trash,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of Tennessee. One small hamlet sent to market annually enough dead
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: robins to return $500 at _five cents per dozen_; which means _120,000
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: birds_!
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Last winter Mr. Edward A. McIlhenny of Avery Island, La. (south of New
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Iberia) informed me that every winter, during the two weeks that the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: holly berries are ripe thousands of robins come to his vicinity to feed
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: upon them. "Then every negro man and boy who can raise a gun is after
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: them. About 10,000 robins are slaughtered each day while they remain.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Their dead bodies are sold in New Iberia at 10 cents each." The
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: accompanying illustrations taken by Mr. McIlhenny shows 195 robins on
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: one tree, and explains how such great slaughter is possible.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: An officer of the Louisiana Audubon Society states that a conservative
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: estimate of the number of robins annually killed in Louisiana for food
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: purposes when they are usually plentiful, is a _quarter of a million_!
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The food of the robin is as follows:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Insects, 40 per cent; wild fruit, 43 per cent; cultivated fruit, 8 per
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: cent, miscellaneous vegetable food, 5 per cent.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: SPECIAL WORK OF THE SOUTHERN NEGROES.--In 1912 a female colored servant
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: who recently had arrived from country life in Virginia chanced to remark
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: to me at our country home in the middle of August: "I wish I could find
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: some birds' nests!"
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "What for?" I asked, rather puzzled.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "Why, to get the aigs and _eat 'em!_" she responded with a bright smile
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and flashing teeth.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "Do you eat the eggs of _wild_ birds?"
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "Yes indeed! It's _fine_ to get a pattridge nest! From them we nearly
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: always git a whole dozen of aigs at once,--back where I live, in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Virginia."
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "Do the colored people of Virginia make a _practice_ of hunting for the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: eggs of wild birds, and eating them?"
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "Yes, indeed we do. In the spring and summer, when the birds are around,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: we used to get out every Sunday, and hunt all day. Some days we'd come
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: back with a whole bucket full of aigs; and then we'd set up half the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: night, cookin' and eatin' 'em. They was _awful_ good!"
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Her face fairly beamed at the memory of it.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: A few days later, this story of the doings of Virginia negroes was fully
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: corroborated by a colored man who came from another section of that
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: state. Three months later, after special inquiries made at my request, a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: gentleman of Richmond obtained further corroboration, from negroes. He
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: was himself much surprised by the state of fact that was revealed to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: him.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In the North, the economic value of our song birds and other destroyers
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of insects and weed seeds is understood by a majority of the people, and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: as far as possible those birds are protected from all human enemies. But
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: in the South, a new division of the Army of Destruction has risen into
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: deadly prominence.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In _Recreation_ Magazine for May, 1909, Mr. Charles Askins published a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: most startling and illuminating article, entitled "The South's Problem
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: in Game Protection." It brought together in concrete form and with
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: eye-witness reliability the impressions that for months previous had
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: been gaining ground in the North. In order to give the testimony of a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: man who has seen what he describes, I shall now give numerous quotations
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: from Mr. Askins' article, which certainly bears the stamp of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: truthfulness, without any "race prejudice" whatever. It is a calm,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: judicial, unemotional analysis of a very bad situation: and I
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: particularly commend it alike to the farmers of the North and all the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: true sportsmen of the South.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In his opening paragraphs Mr. Askins describes game and hunting
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: conditions in the South as they were down to twenty years ago, when the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: negroes were too poor to own guns, and shooting was not for them.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: SPECIAL WORK OF THE SOUTHERN NEGROES.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: It is all different now, says Mr. Askins, and the old days will only
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: come back with the water that has gone down the stream. The master
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: is with his fathers or he is whiling away his last days on the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: courthouse steps of the town. Perhaps a chimney or two remain of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: what was once the "big house" on the hill; possibly it is still
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: standing, but as forlorn and lifeless as a dead tree. The muscadine
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: grapes still grow in the swale and the persimmons in the pasture
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: field, but neither 'possum nor 'coon is left to eat them. The last
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: deer vanished years ago, the rabbits died in their baby coats and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the quail were killed in June. Old "Uncle Ike" has gone across the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "Great River" with his master, and his grandson glances at you
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: askance, nods sullenly, whistles to his half breed bird dog,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: shoulders his three dollar gun and leaves you. He is typical of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: change and has caused it, this grandson of dear old Uncle Ike.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In the same way the white man is telling the black to abide upon the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: plantation raising cotton and corn, and further than this nothing
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: will be required of him. He can cheat a white man or a black, steal
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: in a petty way anything that comes handy, live in marriage or out of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: it to please himself, kill another negro if he likes, and lastly
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: shoot every wild thing that can be eaten, if only he raises the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: cotton and the corn. But the white sportsmen of the South have never
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: willingly granted the shooting privilege in its entirety, and hence
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: this story. They have told him to trap the rabbits, pot the robins,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: slaughter the doves, kill the song birds, but to spare the white
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: sportsman's game, the aristocratic little bobwhite quail.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In the beginning not so much damage to southern game interests could
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: be accomplished by our colored man and brother, however decided his
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: inclinations. He had no money, no ammunition and no gun. His weapons
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: were an ax, a club, a trap, and a hound dog; possibly he might own
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: an old war musket bored out for shot. Such an outfit was not adapted
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: to quail shooting and especially to wing shooting, with which
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: knowledge Dixie's sportsmen were content. Let the negro ramble about
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: with his hound dog and his war musket; he couldn't possibly kill the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: quail. And so Uncle Ike's grandson loafed and pottered about in the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: fields with his ax and his hound dogs, not doing so much harm to the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: quail but acquiring knowledge of the habits of the birds and skill
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: as a still-hunting pot-hunter that would serve him well later on.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The negro belongs to a primitive race of people and all such races
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: have keener eyes than white men whose fathers have pored over lines
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of black and white. He learned to see the rabbit in its form, the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: squirrels in the leafy trees, and the quails huddled in the grass.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The least shade of gray in the shadow of the creek bank he
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: distinguished at once as a rabbit, a glinting flash from a tree top
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: he knew instantly as being caused by the slight movement of a hidden
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: squirrel, and the quiver of a single stem of sedge grass told him of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: a bevy of birds hiding in the depths. The pot-hunting negro has all
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the skill of the Indian, has more industry in his loafing, and kills
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: without pity and without restraint. This grandson of Uncle Ike was
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: growing sulky, too, with the knowledge that the white man was
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: bribing him with half a loaf to raise cotton and corn when he might
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: as well exact it all. And this he shortly did, as we shall see.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The time came when cotton went up to sixteen cents a pound and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: single breech-loading guns went down to five dollars apiece. The
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: negro had money now, and the merchants--these men who had said let
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the nigger alone so long as he raises cotton and corn--sold him the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: guns, a gun for every black idler, man and boy, in all the South.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Then shortly a wail went up from the sportsmen, "The niggers are
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: killing our quail." They not only were killing them, but most of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: birds were already dead. On the grounds of the Southern Field Club
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: where sixty bevies were raised by the dogs in one day, within two
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: years but three bevies could be found in a day by the hardest kind
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of hunting; and this story was repeated all over the South. Now the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: negro began to raise bird dogs in place of hounds, and he carried
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: his new gun to church if services happened to be held on a week day.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Finally the negro had grown up and had compassed his ambition: he
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: could shoot partridges flying just the same as a white man, was a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: white man except for a trifling difference in color; and he could
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: kill more birds, too, three times as many. It was merely a change
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: from the old order to the new in which a dark-skinned "sportsman"
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: had taken the place in plantation life of the dear old "Colonel" of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: loved memory. The negro had exacted his price for raising cotton and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: corn.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: [Illustration: THE SOUTHERN-NEGRO METHOD OF COMBING OUT THE WILD LIFE
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "Our colored sportsman is gregarious at all times, but especially so in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the matter of recreation. He may slouch about alone, and pot a bevy or
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: two of quail when in actual need of something to eat, or when he has a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: sale for the birds, but when it comes to shooting for fun he wants to be
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: with the 'gang'."--Charles Askins.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Reproduced from Recreation Magazine. By permission of the Outdoor World.]
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Our colored sportsman is gregarious at all times, but especially so
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: in the matter of recreation. He may slouch about alone and pot a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: bevy or two of quail when in actual need of something to eat, or
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: when he has a sale for the birds, but when it comes to shooting for
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: fun he wants to be with the "gang." I have seen the darkies at
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Christmas time collect fifty in a drove with every man his dog, and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: spread out over the fields. Such a glorious time as he has then! A
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: single cottontail will draw a half-dozen shots and perhaps a couple
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of young bucks will pour loads into a bunny after he is dead out of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: pure deviltry and high spirits. I once witnessed the accidental
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: killing of a young negro on this kind of a foray. His companions
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: loaded him into a wagon, stuck a cigar in his mouth, and tried to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: pour whiskey down him every time they took a drink themselves as
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: they rode back to town. This army of black hunters and their dogs
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: cross field after field, combing the country with fine teeth that
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: leave neither wild animal nor bird life behind.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: There comes a time toward the spring of the year after the quail
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: season is over when the average rural darky is "between hay and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: grass." The merchants on whom he has depended for supplies make it a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: practice to refuse credit between January first and crop time. The
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: black has spent his cotton money, his sweet potato pile has
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: vanished, the sorghum barrel is empty, he has eaten the last of his
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: winter's pork, and all that remains is a bit of meal and the meat
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: his gun can secure. He is hunting in grim earnest now, using all the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: cunning and skill acquired by years of practice. He eats
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: woodpeckers, jaybirds, hawks and skunks, drawing the line only at
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: crows and buzzards. At this season of the year I have carried
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: chicken hawks up to the cabins for the sake of watching the delight
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of the piccaninnies who with glowing eyes would declare, "Them's
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: mos' as good as chicken." What happens to the robins, doves, larks,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: red birds, mocking birds and all songsters in this hungry season
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: needs hardly to be stated.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: It is also a time between hay and grass for the rabbits and the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: quail. The corn fields are bare and the weed seeds are exhausted. A
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: spring cold spell pinches, they lose their vitality, become thin and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: quite lack their ordinary wariness. Then the figure-four trap
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: springs up in the hedgerow and the sedge while the work of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: decimation goes more rapidly along. The rabbits can no longer escape
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the half-starved dogs, the thinning cover fails to hide the quail
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and the song birds betray themselves by singing of the coming
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: spring.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: With the growing scarcity of the game now comes the season of sedge
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and field burning. This is done ostensibly to prepare the land for
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: spring plowing, but really to destroy the last refuge of the quail
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and rabbits so that they can be bagged with certainty. All the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: negroes of a neighborhood collect for one of these burnings, all
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: their dogs, and of course all the boys from six years old up. They
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: surround the field and set it on fire in many places, leaving small
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: openings for the game to dash out among the motley assembly. I have
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: seen quail fly out of the burning grass with flaming particles still
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: attached to them. They alight on the burnt ground too bewildered to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: fly again and the boys and dogs pick them up. Crazed rabbits try the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: gauntlet amidst the barking curs, shouting negroes and popping guns,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: but death is sure and quick. The few quail that may escape have no
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: refuge from the hawks and nothing to eat, so every battue of this
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: kind marks the absolute end of the birds in one vicinity; and the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: next day the darkies repeat the performance elsewhere.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: At this season of the year, the first of May, the blacks are putting
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: in some of their one hundred working days while the single
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: breech-loader rusts in the chimney corner. Surely the few birds that
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: have escaped the foray of the "gang," lived through the hungry days,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and survived their burned homes can now call "Bob White" and mate in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: peace. But school is out and the summer sun is putting new life into
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the bare feet of the half-grown boys, and the halfbreed bird dogs
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: are busier than they were even in winter. The young rabbits are
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: killed before they get out of the nest, and the quail eggs must be
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: hidden rarely well that escape both the eyes of the boys and the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: noses of the dogs. After all it is not surprising that but three
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: bevies remained of the sixty. Doubtless they would not, except that
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: nature is very kind to her own in the sunny South.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Not every white man in the South is a sportsman or even a shooter;
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: many are purely business men who have said let the "nigger" do as he
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: likes so long as he raises cotton and buys our goods. But Dixie has
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: her full share of true men of the out-of-doors and they have sworn
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: in downright Southern fashion that this thing has got to end.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Nevertheless their problem is deep and puzzling. In Alabama they
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: made an effort and a beginning. They asked for a law requiring every
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: man to obtain written permission before entering the lands of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: another to hunt and shoot; they asked for a resident license law
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: taxing every gun not less than five dollars a year; for a shortened
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: season, a bag limit, and a complete system of State wardens.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Unfortunately, a lot of white farmers were in the same range as the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: blacks, and being hit, too, they raised a great outcry. The result
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: was that the Alabama sportsmen got everything they asked for except
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the foundation of the structure they were trying to build, the high
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: resident license or gun tax which alone could have shut out three
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: dollar guns and saved the remnant of the game. Under the new law the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: sale of game was forbidden, neither could it be shipped out of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: State alive or dead; the ever popular non-resident license was
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: provided for; the season was shortened and the bag limited; the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: office of State game warden was created with deputies to be paid
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: from fines; hunting upon the lands of another without written
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: permission became a misdemeanor; and then the whole thing was
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: nullified by reducing the resident license to nothing where a man
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: shot upon his own land, one dollar in his own county, and two
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: dollars outside of it. In its practical workings the new law amounts
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: to this: A few northern gunners have paid the non-resident license
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: fee, and enough resident licenses have been taken out by the city
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: sportsmen to make up the handsome salary of the State warden. The
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: negro still hunts upon his own land _or upon the land of the man who
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: wants corn and cotton raised_, with perfect indifference to the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: whole thing. Who was to enforce the law against him? Not the one
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: disgusted deputy with three big counties to patrol who depended for
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: his salary upon the fines collected from the negroes. It would take
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: one man to every three miles square to protect the game in the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: South.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The one effective way of dealing with the situation in Alabama was
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: to have legislated three dollar guns out of existence with a five
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: dollar tax, adding to this nearly a like amount on dogs. Hardly a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: sportsman in the South will disagree with this conclusion. But
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: sportsmen never had a majority vote either in the South or in the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: North, and the South's grave problem is yet unsolved.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: I do not favor depriving the black man of his natural human right to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: hunt and shoot. If he is the owner of land, or if he leases or rents
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: it, or if he does not, he should have exactly the same privilege of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: hunting that the white man has. That is not the question now,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: however, but how to restrict him to legal shooting, to make him
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: amenable to the law that governs the white man, to deprive him of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the absolute license he now enjoys to kill throughout the year
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: without mercy, without discrimination, without restraint. If only
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: for selfish reasons, we of the North should reach to southern
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: sportsmen a helping hand, for by and by the last of our migratory
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: song birds will go down into Dixie and never return.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Mr. Askins has fairly stated a profoundly disturbing case. The remedy
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: must contain at least three ingredients. The sportsmen of the South must
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: stop the unjustifiable slaughter of their non-migratory game birds. As a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: matter of comity between states, the gentlemen of the South must pass
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: laws to stop the killing of northern song-birds and all crop-protecting
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: birds, for food. Finally, all men, North and South, East and West, must
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: unite in the work that is necessary to secure the immediate enactment by
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Congress of a law for the federal protection of all migratory birds.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: CHAPTER XIII
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: EXTERMINATION OF BIRDS FOR WOMEN'S HATS[D]
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: [Footnote D: In the preparation of this chapter and its illustrations, I
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: have had much valuable assistance from Mr. C. William Beebe, who
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: recently has probed the London feather trade almost to the bottom.]
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: It is high time for the whole civilized world to know that many of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: most beautiful and remarkable birds of the world are now being
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: _exterminated_ to furnish millinery ornaments for women's wear. The mass
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of new information that we have recently secured on this traffic from
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the headquarters of the feather trade is appalling. Previously, I had
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: not dreamed that conditions are half as bad as they are.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: It is entirely fitting that on this subject New York should send a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: message to London. New York is almost a Spotless Town in plume-free
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: millinery, and London and Paris are the worst places in the world. We
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: have cleaned house. With but extremely slight exceptions, the blood of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the slaughtered innocents is no longer upon our skirts, and on the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: subject of plumage millinery we have a right to be just as Pharisaical
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: as we choose.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Here in New York (and also in New Jersey) no man may sell, own for sale
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: or offer for sale the plumage of any wild American bird other than a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: game bird. More than that, the plumage of no foreign bird belonging to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: any bird family represented in the fauna of North America can be sold
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: here! There are only a few kinds of improper "millinery" feathers that
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: it is possible to sell here under the law. Thanks to the long and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: arduous campaign of the National Association of Audubon Societies,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: founded and for ten years directed by gallant William Dutcher, you now
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: see on the streets of New York very, very little wild-bird plumage save
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: that from game birds.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: It is true that a few servant girls are now wearing the cast-off
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: aigrettes of their mistresses; but they are only as one in a thousand.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: At Atlantic City there is said to be a fine display of servant-girl and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: ladies-maid aigrettes. In New York and New Jersey, in Pennsylvania for
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: everything save the sale of heron and egret plumes (a privilege obtained
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: by a bunko game), in Massachusetts, and in many other of our States, the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: wild-birds'-plumage millinery business is dead. Two years ago, when the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: New York legislature refused to repeal the Dutcher law, the Millinery
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Association asserted, and brought a cloud of witnesses to Albany to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: prove, that the enforcement of the law would throw thousands of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: operatives out of employment.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: [Illustration: BEAUTIFUL AND CURIOUS BIRDS NOW BEING DESTROYED
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: FOR THE FEATHER TRADE--(I)
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Belted Kingfisher
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Victoria Crowned Pigeon
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Superb Calliste
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Greater Bird of Paradise
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Common Tern
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Cock of the Rock]
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The law is in effect; and the aigrette business is dead in this state.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Have any operatives starved, or been thrown out of employment? We have
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: heard of none. They are now at work making very pretty hat ornaments of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: silk and ribbons, and gauze and lace; and "_They_ are wearing them."
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: [Illustration: 1600 HUMMINGBIRD SKINS AT 2 CENTS EACH!
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Part of Lot Purchased by the Zoological Society at the Regular Quarterly
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: London Millinery Feather Sale, August, 1912.]
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: But even while these words are being written, there is one large fly in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the ointment. The store-window of E. &. S. Meyers, 688 Broadway, New
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: York, contains about _six hundred plumes and skins of birds of paradise
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: for sale for millinery purposes_. No wonder the great bird of paradise
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: is now almost extinct! Their sale here is possible because the Dutcher
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: law protects from the feather dealers only the birds that belong to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: avian families represented in the United States. With fiendish cunning
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and enterprise, the shameless feather dealers are ferreting out the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: birds whose skins and plumes may legally be imported into this country
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and sold; but we will meet that with a law that will protect all
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: foreign birds, so far as we are concerned. Now it is time for the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: universal enactment of a law which will prohibit the sale and use as
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: ornaments of the plumage, feathers or skins of _any_ wild bird that is
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: not a legitimate game bird.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: London is now the head of the giant octopus of the "feather trade" that
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: has reached out its deadly tentacles into the most remote wildernesses
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of the earth, and steadily is drawing in the "skins" and "plumes" and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "quills" of the most beautiful and most interesting _unprotected_ birds
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of the world. The extent of this cold-blooded industry, supported by
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: vain and hard-hearted women, will presently be shown in detail. Paris is
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the great manufacturing center of feather trimming and ornaments, and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the French people obstinately refuse to protect the birds from
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: extermination, because their slaughter affords employment to a certain
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: numbers of French factory operatives.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: All over the world where they have real estate possessions, the men of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: England know how to protect game from extermination. The English are
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: good at protecting game--when they decide to set about it.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Why should London be the Mecca of the feather-killers of the world?
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: It is easily explained:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: (1) London has the greatest feather market in the world; (2) the feather
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: industry "wants the money"; and (3) the London feather industry is
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: willing to spend money in fighting to retain its strangle-hold on the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: unprotected birds of the world.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Let us run through a small portion of the mass of fresh evidence before
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: us. It will be easier for the friends of birds to read these details
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: here than to procure them at first hand, as we have done.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The first thing that strikes one is the fact that the feather-hunters
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: are scattered _all over the world where bird life is plentiful_ and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: there are no laws to hinder their work. I commend to every friend of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: birds this list of the species whose plumage is to-day being bought and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: sold in large quantities every year in London. To the birds of the world
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: this list is of deadly import, for it spells extermination.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The reader will notice that it is the way of the millinery octopus to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: reach out to the uttermost ends of the earth, and take everything that
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: it can use. From the trackless jungles of New Guinea, round the world
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: both ways to the snow-capped peaks of the Andes, no unprotected bird is
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: safe. The humming-birds of Brazil, the egrets of the world at large, the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: rare birds of paradise, the toucan, the eagle, the condor and the emu,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: all are being _exterminated_ to swell the annual profits of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: millinery trade. The case is _far_ more serious than the world at large
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: knows, or even suspects. But for the profits, the birds would be safe;
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and no unprotected wild species can long escape the hounds of Commerce.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: But behold the list of rare, curious and beautiful birds that are today
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: in grave peril:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: [Illustration: BEAUTIFUL AND CURIOUS BIRDS NOW BEING DESTROYED
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In order to throw a spot-light on the most recent transactions in the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: London wild-birds'-plumage market, and to furnish a clear idea of what
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: is to-day going on in London, Paris, Berlin and Amsterdam, I will set
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: out in some detail the report of an agent whom I engaged to ascertain
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the London dealings in the plumage of wild birds that were killed
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: especially to furnish that plumage. As one item, let us take the sales
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: in London in February, May and October, 1911, because they bring the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: subject well down to date. My agent's explanatory note is as follows:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "These three sales represent six months. Very nearly double this
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: quantity is sold by these four firms in a year. We must also take into
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: consideration that all the feathers are not brought to the London
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: market, and that _very large shipments are also made direct to the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: raw-feather dealers and manufacturers of Paris and Berlin, and that
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Amsterdam also gets large quantities from the West Indies_. For your
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: purpose, I report upon three sales, at different periods of the year
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 1911, and as those sales do not vary much, you will be able to judge the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: consumption of birds in a year."
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The "aigrettes" of the feather trade come from egrets, and, being very
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: light, it requires the death of several birds to yield one ounce. In
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: many catalogues, the word "albatross" stands for the jabiru, a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: nearly-exterminated species of giant stork, inhabiting South America.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "Rhea" often stands for vulture plumage.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: If the feather dealers had deliberately attempted to form an educational
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: list of the most beautiful and the most interesting birds of the world,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: they could hardly have done better than they have done in the above
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: list. If it were in my power to show the reader a colored plate of each
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: species now being exterminated by the feather trade, he would be
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: startled by the exhibit. That the very choicest birds of the whole avian
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: world should be thus blotted out at the behest of vain and heartless
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: women is a shame, a disgrace and world-wide loss.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: If I am correctly informed, the London feather trade admits that it
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: requires six egrets to yield one "ounce" of aigrette plumes. This being
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the case, the 21,528 ounces sold as above stand for 129,168 egrets
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: killed for nine months' supply of egret plumes, for London alone.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The total number of bird corpses auctioned during these three sales is
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: as follows:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Aigrettes,   21,528 ounces = 129,168 Egrets.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Herons,       2,683 "      =  13,598 Herons.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 20,698 Birds of Paradise.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 41,090 Hummingbirds.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 9,472 Other Birds.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: It is to be remembered that the sales listed above cover the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: transactions of four firms only, and do not in any manner take into
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: account the direct importations from Paris, Berlin and Amsterdam of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: manufacturers and other dealers. The defenders of the feather trade are
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: at great pains to assure the world that in the monthly, bi-monthly and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: quarterly sales, feathers often appear in the market twice in the same
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: year; and this statement is made for them in order to be absolutely
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: fair. Recent examinations of the plume catalogues for an entire year,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: marked with the price _paid_ for each item, reveals very few which are
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: blank, indicating no sale! The subtractions of the duplicated items
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: would alter the result only very slightly.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The full extent of England's annual consumption of the plumage of wild
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: birds slaughtered especially for the trade never has been determined. I
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: doubt whether it is possible to ascertain it. The information that we
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: have is so fragmentary that in all probability it reflects only a small
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: portion of the whole truth, but for all that, it is sufficient to prove
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the case of the Defenders of the Birds _vs_. the London Chamber of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Commerce.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Under the head of "Hummingbirds Not Wanted," Mr. Downham is at great
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: pains to convey[F] the distinct impression that to-day hummingbirds are
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: scorned by the feather trade, and the demand for them is dead. _I
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: believed him_--until my agent turned in the following statement:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Hummingbirds sold by Lewis & Peat, London, February, 1911   24,800
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Hummingbirds sold by Lewis & Peat, London, May, 1911         6,250
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Hummingbirds sold by Hale & Sons, London, October, 1911     10,040
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Total 41,090
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: It is useless for anyone to assert that these birds were merely
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "offered," and not actually sold, as Mr. Downham so laboriously explains
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: is the regular course with hummingbird skins; for that will deceive no
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: intelligent person. The statement published above comes to me direct,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: from an absolutely competent and reliable source.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: [Footnote F: "The Feather Trade," by C.F. Downham, p. 63-4.]
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

name: Our Vanishing Wild Life
