txt: Many thoughts are suggested by these London lists of bird slaughter and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: loot.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: It will be noticed that the breast of the grebe has almost wholly
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: disappeared from the feather market and from women's hats. The reason is
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: that there are no longer enough birds of that group to hold a place in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the London market! Few indeed are the Americans who know that from 1900
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: to 1908 the lake region of southern Oregon was the scene of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: slaughter of uncountable thousands of those birds, which continued until
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the grebes were almost exterminated.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: When the wonderful lyre-bird of Australia had been almost exterminated
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: for its tail feathers, its open slaughter was stopped by law, and a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: heavy fine was imposed on exportation, amounting, I have been told, to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: $250 for each offense. My latest news of the lyre-bird was of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: surreptitious exportation of 200 skins to the London feather market.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In India, the smuggling outward of the skins of protected birds is
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: constantly going on. Occasionally an exporter is caught and fined; but
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: that does not stop the traffic.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Bird-lovers must now bid farewell forever to all the birds of paradise.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Nothing but the legal closing of the world's markets against their
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: plumes and skins can save any of them. They never were numerous; nor
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: does any species range over a wide area. They are strictly insular, and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the island homes of some of them are very small. Take the great bird of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: paradise (_Paradisea apoda_) as an illustration. On Oct. 2, 1912, at
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Indianapolis, Indiana, a city near the center of the United States, in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: three show-windows within 100 feet of the headquarters of the Fourth
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: National Conservation Congress, I counted 11 stuffed heads and 11
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: complete sets of plumes of this bird, displayed for sale. The prices
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: ranged from $30 to $47.50 each! And while I looked, a large lady
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: approached, pointed her finger at the remains of a greater bird of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: paradise, and with grim determination, said to her shopping companion:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "There! I want one o' them, an' I'm agoin' to _have_ it, too!"
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Says Mr. James Buckland in "Pros and Cons of the Plumage Bill":
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "Mr. Goodfellow has returned within the last few weeks from a second
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: expedition to new Guinea.... One can now walk, he states, miles and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: miles through the former haunts of these birds [of paradise] without
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: seeing or hearing even the commonest species. When I reflect on this
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: sacrilege, I am lost in wonder at the apathy of the British public."
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Mr. Carl Hagenbeck wrote me only three months ago that "the condors of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the Andes are all being exterminated for their feathers, and these birds
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: are now very difficult to obtain."
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The egret and heron plumes, known under the trade name of "osprey, etc.,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: feathers," form by far the most important item in each feather sale.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: There are _fifteen_ grades! They are sold by the ounce, and the prices
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: range all the way from twenty-eight cents per ounce for "mixed heron" to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: _two hundred and twenty-five shillings_ ($45.60) per ounce for the best
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Brazilian "short selected," on February 7, 1912! Is it any wonder that
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: in Philadelphia the prices of finished aigrettes, ready to be worn, runs
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: from $20 to $125!
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The plumes that run up into the big figures are the "short selected"
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: coming from the following localities, and quoted at the prices set down
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: here in shillings and pence. Count the shilling at twenty-four cents,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: United States money.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: PRICES OF "SHORT SELECTED" EGRET AND HERON PLUMES, IN LONDON ON FEBRUARY
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: (Lewis & Peat's List)
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: East Indies per ounce, 117/6 to 207/6 = $49.80 max.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The total offering of these "short selected" plumes in December 1911,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: was 689 ounces, and in February, 1912, it was 230 ounces.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Now with these enormous prices prevailing, is it any wonder that the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: egrets and herons are being relentlessly pursued to the uttermost ends
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of the earth? I think that any man who really knows the habits of egrets
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and herons, and the total impossibility of any quantity of their shed
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: feathers being picked up in a marketable state, must know in his heart
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: that if the London and continental feather markets keep open a few years
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: longer, _every species_ that furnishes "short selected" plumes will be
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: utterly exterminated from off the face of the earth.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Let the English people make no mistake about this, nor be fooled by any
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: fairy tales of the feather trade about Venezuelan "garceros," and vast
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: quantities of valuable plumes picked off the bushes and out of the mud.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Those carefully concocted egret-farm stories make lovely reading, but
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the reader who examines the evidence will soon decide the extent of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: their truthfulness. I think that they contain not even ten per cent of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: truth; and I shall not rest until the stories of Leon Laglaize and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Mayeul Grisol have been put to the test in the regions where they
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: originated.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: A _few_ plumes may be picked out of the jungle, yes; but as for any
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: _commercial quantity_, it is at present beyond belief. Besides, we have
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: direct, eye-witness testimony to the contrary.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: It must not be inferred that the friends of birds in England have been
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: idle or silent in the presence of the London feather trade. On the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: contrary, the Royal Society for the Protection of Wild Birds and Mr.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: James Buckland have so strongly attacked the feather industry that the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: London Chamber of Commerce has felt called upon to come to its rescue.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Mr. Buckland, on his own individual account, has done yeoman service to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the cause, and his devotion to the birds, and his tireless energy, are
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: both almost beyond the reach of praise in words. At the last moment
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: before going to press I learn that the birds'-plumage bill has achieved
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the triumph of a "first reading" in Parliament, which looks as if
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: success is at last in sight. The powerful pamphlet that he has written,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: published and circulated at his own expense, entitled "Pros and Cons of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the Plumage Bill," is a splendid effort. What a pity it is that more
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: individuals are not similarly inspired to make independent effort in the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: protection cause! But, strange to say, few indeed are the men who have
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: either the nerve or the ability to "go it alone."
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: On the introduction in Parliament of the bill to save the birds from the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: feather trade, it was opposed (through the efforts of the Chamber of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Commerce), on the ground that if any bill against the sale of plumes
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: should pass, and plumes could not be sold, the London business in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: wild-bird skins and feathers "would immediately be transferred to the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: continent!"
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In the face of that devastating and altogether horrible prospect, and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: because the London feather dealers "need the money," the bill was at
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: first defeated--to the great joy of the Chamber of Commerce and Mr.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Downham; but the cause of birds will win in the end, because it is
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Right.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The feather dealers have been shrewdly active in the defense of their
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: trade, and the methods they have employed for influencing public opinion
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: have quite outshone those put forth by their brethren in America. I have
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: before me a copy of a booklet bearing the name of Mr. C.F. Downham as
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the author, and the London Chamber of Commerce has loaned its good name
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: as publisher. Altogether it is a very shrewd piece of work, even though
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: its arguments in justification of bird slaughter for the feather market
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: are too absurd and weak for serious consideration.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The chief burden of the defender of bird slaughter for millinery
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: purposes is on account of the destruction of egrets and herons, but
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: particularly the former. To offset as far as possible the absolutely
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: true charge that egrets bear their best plumes in their breeding season,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: when the helpless young are in the nest and the parent birds must be
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: killed to obtain the plumes, the feather trade has obtained from three
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Frenchmen--Leon Laglaize, Mayeul Grisol, and F. Geay--a beautiful and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: plausible story to the effect that in Venezuela the enormous output of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: egret plumes has been obtained _by picking up, off the bushes and out of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the water and mud, the shed feathers of those birds!_ According to the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: story, Venezuela is full of _egret farms_, called "garceros,"--where the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: birds breed and moult under strict supervision, and kindly drop their
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: feathers in such places that it is possible _to find them_, and to _pick
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: them up_, in a high state of preservation! And we are asked to believe
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: that it is these very Venezuelan picked-up feathers that command in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: London the high price of _$44 per ounce_.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: [Illustration: THE FIGHT IN ENGLAND AGAINST THE USE OF WILD BIRD'S
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: PLUMAGE IN THE MILLINERY TRADE
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Sandwich-men Employed by the Royal Society for the Protection of Birds,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: that Patroled London Streets in July, 1911.]
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Mr. Laglaize is especially exploited by Mr. Downham, as a French
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: traveler of high standing, and well known in the zoological museums of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: France; but, sad to say, when Prof. Henry Fairfield Osborn cabled to the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Museum of Natural History in Paris, inquiring about Mr. Laglaize, the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: cable flashed back the one sad word; "_Inconnu!_" (Unknown!)
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: I think it entirely possible that enough shed feathers have been picked
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: up in the reeking swamps of Venezuela, on the upper tributaries of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Orinoco, to afford _an excuse_ for the beautiful story of Mr. Laglaize.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Any shrewd individual with money, and the influence that money secures,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: could put up just such a "plant" as I firmly believe _has_ been put up
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: by some one in Venezuela. I will guarantee that I could accomplish such
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: a job in Venezuela or Brazil, in four months' time, at an expense not
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: exceeding one thousand dollars.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: That the great supply of immaculately perfect egret plumes that annually
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: come out of Venezuela could by any possibility be picked up in the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: swamps where they were shed and dropped by the egrets, is entirely
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: preposterous and incredible. The whole proportion is denounced by
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: several men of standing and experience, none of whom are "_inconnu_."
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: As a sweeping refutation of the fantastic statements regarding
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "garceros," published by Mr. Downham as coming from Messrs. Laglaize,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Grisol and Geay, I offer the written testimony of an American gentleman
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: who at this moment owns and maintains within a few yards of his
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: residence a large preserve of snowy egrets and herons, the former
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: representing the species which furnishes egret plumes exactly similar to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: those shipped from Venezuela and Brazil. If the testimony of Mr.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: McIlhenny is not sufficient to stamp the statements of the three
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Frenchmen quoted by Mr. Downham as absolute and thoroughly misleading
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: falsehoods, then there is no such thing in this world as evidence. I
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: suggest a perusal of the statements of the three Frenchmen who are
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: quoted with such confidence by Mr. Downham and published by the Hon.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Chamber of Commerce at London, and then a careful reading of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: following letter:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Avery Island, La., June 17, 1912.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: DEAR MR. HORNADAY:--
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: I have before me your letter of June 8th, asking for information as
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: to whether or no egrets shed their plumes at their nesting places in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: sufficient quantities to enable them to be gathered commercially. I
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: most emphatically wish to state that it is impossible to gather at
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the nesting places of these birds any quantity of their plumes. I
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: have nesting within 50 yards of where I am now sitting dictating
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: this letter not less than 20,000 pairs of the various species of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: herons and egrets, and there are fully 2,500 pairs of snowy herons
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: nesting within my preserve.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: During the nesting season, which covers the months of April, May and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: June, I am through this heronry in a small canoe almost every day,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and often twice a day. I have had these herons under my close
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: inspection for the past 17 years, and I have not in any one season
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: picked up or seen more than half a dozen discarded plumes. Such
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: plumes as I have picked up, I have kept on my desk, and given to the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: people who were interested. I remember that last year I picked up
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: four plumes of the snowy heron that were in one bunch. I think these
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: must have been plucked out by the birds fighting.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: This year I have found only one plume so far. I enclose it herewith.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: You will notice that it is one of the shorter plumes, and is badly
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: worn at the end, as have been all the plumes which I have picked up
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: in my heronry.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: I am positive that it is not possible for natural shed plumes to be
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: gathered commercially. I have a number of times talked with plume
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: hunters from Venezuela and other South American countries, and I
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: have never heard of any egret feathers being gathered by their being
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: picked up after the birds have shed them.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: I have heard of a number of heronries in South America that are
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: protected by the land owners for the purpose of gathering a yearly
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: crop of egret plumes, but this crop is gathered always by shooting a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: certain percentage of the birds. This shooting is done by experts
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: with 22-calibre rifles, and does not materially disturb the nesting
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: colony. I have known of two men who have been engaged in killing the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: birds on large estates in South America, who were paid regular
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: salaries for their services as egret hunters.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Very truly yours,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: E.A. McIlhenny.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: I am more than willing to set the above against the fairy tale of Mr.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Laglaize.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Here is the testimony of A.H. Meyer, an ex-plume-hunter, who for nine
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: years worked in Venezuela. His sworn testimony was laid before the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Legislature of the State of New York, in 1911, when the New York
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Milliners' Association was frantically endeavoring to secure the repeal
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of the splendid Dutcher law. This witness was produced by the National
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Association of Audubon Societies.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "My attention has been called to the fact that certain commercial
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: interests in this city are circulating stories in the newspapers and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: elsewhere to the effect that the aigrettes used in the millinery trade
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: come chiefly from Venezuela, where they are gathered from the ground in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the large _garceros_, or breeding-colonies, of white herons.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "I wish to state that I have personally engaged in the work of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: collecting the plumes of these birds in Venezuela. This was my business
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: for the years 1896 to 1905, inclusive. I am thoroughly conversant with
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the methods employed in gathering egret and snowy heron plumes in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Venezuela, and I wish to give the following statement regarding the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: practices employed in procuring these feathers:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "The birds gather in large colonies to rear their young. They have the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: plumes only during the mating and nesting season. After the period when
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: they are employed in caring for their young, it is found that the plumes
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: are virtually of no commercial value, because of the worn and frayed
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: condition to which they have been reduced. It is the custom in Venezuela
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: to shoot the birds while the young are in the nests. A few feathers of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the large white heron (American egret), known as the _Garza blanca_, can
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: be picked up of a morning about their breeding places, but these are of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: small value and are known as "dead feathers." They are worth locally not
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: over three dollars an ounce; while the feathers taken from the bird,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: known as "live feathers," are worth fifteen dollars an ounce.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "My work led me into every part of Venezuela and Colombia where these
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: birds are to be found, and I have never yet found or heard of any
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: _garceros_ that were guarded for the purpose of simply gathering the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: feathers from the ground. No such condition exists in Venezuela. The
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: story is absolutely without foundation, in my opinion, and has simply
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: been put forward for commercial purposes.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "The natives of the country, who do virtually all of the hunting for
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: feathers, are not provident in their nature, and their practices are of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: a most cruel and brutal nature. I have seen them frequently pull the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: plumes from wounded birds, leaving the crippled birds to die of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: starvation, unable to respond to the cries of their young in the nests
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: above, which were calling for food. _I have known these people to tie
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and prop up wounded egrets on the marsh where they would attract the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: attention of other birds flying by. These decoys they keep in this
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: position until they die of their wounds, or from the attacks of insects.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: I have seen the terrible red ants of that country actually eating out
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the eyes of these wounded, helpless birds that were tied up by the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: plume-hunters._ I could write you many pages of the horrors practiced in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: gathering aigrette feathers in Venezuela by the natives for the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: millinery trade of Paris and New York.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "To illustrate the comparatively small number of dead feathers which
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: are collected, I will mention that in one year I and my associates
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: shipped to New York eighty pounds of the plumes of the large heron and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: twelve pounds of the little recurved plumes of the snowy heron. In this
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: whole lot there were not over five pounds of plumes that had been
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: gathered from the ground--and these were of little value. The
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: plume-birds have been nearly exterminated in the United States and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Mexico, and the same condition of affairs will soon exist in tropical
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: America. This extermination will come about because of the fact that the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: young are left to starve in the nest when the old birds are killed, any
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: other statement made by interested parties to the contrary
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: notwithstanding.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "I am so incensed at the ridiculously absurd and misleading stories that
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: are being published on this question that I want to give you this
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: letter, and, before delivering it to you, shall take oath to its
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: truthfulness."
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Here is the testimony of Mr. Caspar Whitney, of New York, formerly
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: editor of _Outing_ Magazine and _Outdoor America_:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "During extended travel throughout South America, from 1903 to 1907,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: inclusive, I journeyed, on three separate occasions, by canoe
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: (1904-1907), on the Lower Orinoco and Apure rivers and their
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: tributaries. This is the region, so far as Venezuela is concerned, in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: which is the greatest slaughter of white herons for their plumage, or
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: more specifically for the marital plumes, which are carried only in the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: mating and breeding season, and are known in the millinery trade as
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 'aigrettes.'
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "There is literally no room for question. The snowy herons are killed
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: exactly as I describe. It is the custom of all those who hunt for the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: millinery trade, and is recognized by the natives as the usual method."
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Here is the testimony of Mr. Julian A. Dimock, of Peekamose, N.Y., the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: famous outdoor photographer, and illustrator of "Florida Enchantments":
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "I know a goodly number of the plume-hunters of Florida. I have camped
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: with them, and talked to them. I have heard their tales, and even full
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: accounts of the 'shooting-up' of an egret rookery. Never has a man in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Florida suggested to me that plumes could be obtained without killing
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the birds. I have known the wardens, and have visited rookeries after
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: they had been 'shot-up,' and the evidence all pointed to the everlasting
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: use of the gun. _It is certainly not true that the plumes can be
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: obtained without killing the birds bearing them_.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "Nineteen years ago, I visited the Cuthbert Rookery with one of the men
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: who discovered the birds nesting in that lake. He and his partner had
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: sold the plumes gathered there for more than a thousand dollars. He
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: showed me how they hid in the bushes and shot the birds. He even gave me
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: a chance to watch him kill two or three birds.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "I know personally the man chiefly responsible for the slaughter of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: birds at Alligator Bay. _He laughed at the idea of getting plumes
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: without killing the birds!_ I well know the man who shot the birds up
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Rogers River, and even saw some of the empty shells left on the ground
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: by him.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: [Illustration: YOUNG EGRETS, UNABLE TO FLY, STARVING
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The Parent Birds had Been Killed by Plume Hunters]
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: [Illustration: SNOWY EGRET, DEAD ON HER NEST
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Wounded in the Feeding-Grounds, and Came Home to Die. Photographed in a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Florida Rookery Protected by the National Association of Audubon
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Societies]
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: I have camped with Seminoles, whites, blacks, outlaws, and those within
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the pale, connected with plume-hunting, and all tell the same story:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: _The birds are shot to get the plumes._ The evidence of my own eyes, and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the action of the birds themselves, convinces me that there is not a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: shadow of doubt concerning this point."
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: This sworn testimony from Mr. T.J. Ashe, of Key West, Florida, is very
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: direct and to the point:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "I have seen many moulted and dropped feathers from wild plumed birds. I
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: have never seen a moulted or dropped feather that was fit for anything.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: It is the exception when a plumed bird drops feathers of any value while
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: in flight. Whatever feathers are so dropped are those that are frayed,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: worn out, and forced out by the process of moulting. The moulting season
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: is not during the hatching season, but is after the hatching season. The
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: shedding, or moulting, takes place once a year; and during this moulting
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: season the feathers, after having the hard usage of the year from wind,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: rain and other causes, when dropped are of absolutely no commercial
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: value."
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Mr. Arthur T. Wayne, of Mount Pleasant, S.C., relates in sworn testimony
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: his experience in attempting to secure egret plumes without killing the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: birds:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "It is utterly impossible to get fifty egret plumes from any colony of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: breeding birds without shooting the birds. Last spring, I went twice a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: week to a breeding colony of American and snowy egrets, from early in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: April until June 8. Despite the fact that I covered miles of territory
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: in a boat, I picked up but two American egret plumes (which I now have);
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: but not a single snowy egret plume did I see, nor did my companion, who
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: accompanied me on every trip.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "I saw an American egret plume on the water, and left it, purposely, to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: see whether it would sink or not. Upon visiting the place a few days
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: afterwards, the plume was not in evidence, undoubtedly having sunk. The
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: plumes are chiefly shed in the air while the birds are going to or
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: coming from their breeding grounds. If that millinery plume law is
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: repealed, the fate of the American and snowy egrets is sealed, for the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: few birds that remain will be shot to the very last one."
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Any man who ever has been in an egret rookery (and I have) knows that
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the above testimony is _true_! The French story of the beautiful and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: smoothly-running egret farms in Venezuela is preposterous, save for a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: mere shadow of truth. I do not say that _no_ egret plumes could be
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: picked up, but I do assert that the total quantity obtainable in one
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: year in that way would be utterly trivial.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: No; the "ospreys" of the British feather market come from slaughtered
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: egrets and herons, _killed in the breeding season_. Let the British
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: public and the British Parliament make no mistake about that. If they
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: wish the trade to continue, let it be based on the impregnable ground
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: that the merchants want the money, and not on a fantastic dream that is
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: too silly to deceive even a child that knows birds.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The use or disuse of wild birds' plumage as millinery ornaments is
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: another of those wild-life subjects regarding which there is no room for
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: argument. To assert that the feather-dealers want the business for the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: money it brings them is not argument! We have seen many a steam roller
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: go over Truth, and Right, and Justice, by main strength and red-hot
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: power; but Truth and Right refuse to stay flat down. There is on this
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: earth not one wild-animal species--mammal, bird or reptile--that can
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: long withstand exploitation for commercial purposes. Even the whales of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the deep sea, the walrus of the arctic regions, the condors of the Andes
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and alligators of the Everglade morasses are no exception to the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: universal rule.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In Mr. Downham's book there is much fallacious reasoning, and many
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: conclusions that are not borne out by the facts. For example, he says
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: that no species of bird of paradise has been diminished in number by
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: slaughter for the feather trade; that Florida still contains a supply of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: egrets; that the decrease in bird life should be charged to the spread
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of cities, towns and farms, and not to the trade; that the trade was "in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: no way responsible" for the slaughter of three hundred thousand gulls
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and albatrosses on Laysan Island!
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: I have space to notice one other important erroneous conclusion that Mr.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Downham publishes in his book, on page 105. He says:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "The destruction of birds in foreign countries is something that no
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: trade can direct or control."
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: This is an amazing declaration; and absolutely contrary to experience.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Let me prove what I say by a fresh and incontestable illustration:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Prior to April, 1911, when Governor Dix signed the Bayne law against the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: sale of wild native game in the State of New York, Currituck County,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: N.C., was a vast slaughter-pen for wild fowl. No power or persuasion had
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: availed to induce the people of North Carolina to check, or regulate, or
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: in any manner mitigate that slaughter of geese, ducks and swans. It was
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: estimated that two hundred thousand wild fowl were annually slaughtered
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: there.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: We who advocated the Bayne law said: "Close the New York markets against
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Currituck birds, and you will stop a great deal of the slaughter."
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: We cleaned our Augean stable. The greatest game market in America was
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: absolutely closed.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Last winter (1911) the annual killing of wild fowl was fully fifty per
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: cent less than during previous years. In one small town, twenty
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: professional duck shooters went entirely out of business--because they
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: _couldn't sell their ducks_! The dealers refused to buy them. The result
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: was exactly what we predicted it would be; and this year, it is reported
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: over and over that ducks are more plentiful in New England than they
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: have been in twenty years previously! The result is wonderful, because
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: so quick.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Beyond all question, the feather merchants of London, Paris and Berlin
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: absolutely control the bird-killers of Venezuela, China, New Guinea.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Mexico and South America. Let the word go forth that "the trade" is no
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: longer permitted to buy and sell egret and heron plumes, skins of birds
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of paradise and condor feathers, and presto! the killing industry falls
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: dead the next moment.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: [Illustration: MISCELLANEOUS BIRD SKINS, 8 CENTS EACH
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Purchased by the New York Zoological Society from the Quarterly Sale in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: London, August, 1912]
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Yes, indeed, members of the British Parliament: it is easily within
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: _your power_ to wipe out at a single stroke fully one-half of the bird
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: slaughter for fancy feathers. It can be done just as we wiped out
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: one-half the annual duck slaughter in wickedly-wasteful North Carolina!
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The feather trade absolutely _does_ control the killing situation! Now,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: will the people of England clean house by controlling the feather trade?
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: If a hundred species of the most beautiful birds of the world must be
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: exterminated for the feather trade, let the odium rest elsewhere than on
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the people of England.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The bird-lovers of America may rest assured that the bird-lovers of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: England--a mighty host--are neither careless nor indifferent regarding
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the wild-birds' plumage business. On the contrary, several bills have
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: been brought before Parliament intended to regulate or prohibit the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: traffic, and a measure of vast importance to the birds of the world is
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: now before the House of Commons. It is backed by Mr. Percy Alden, M.P.,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: by the Royal Society for the Protection of Birds, by the Selbourne
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Society, and by Mr. James Buckland--a host in himself. For years past
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: that splendidly-equipped and well-managed Royal Society has waged
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: ceaseless warfare for the birds. Its activity has been tremendous, and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: its membership list contains many of the finest names in England. The
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: address of the Honorary Secretary, Frank E. Lemon, Esq., is 23 Queen
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Anne's Gate, London, S.W.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Naturally, these influences are opposed by the Textile Trade Section of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the London Chamber of Commerce, and their only argument consists of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: plea that if London doesn't get the money out of the feather trade, the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Continent will get it! A reasonable, logical, magnificent and convincing
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: excuse for wholesale bird slaughter, truly!
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Mr. Buckland has been informed from the Continent that the people of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: France, Germany, the Netherlands and Belgium are waiting and watching to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: see what England is going to do with the question, "To slaughter, or not
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: to slaughter?" For England has no monopoly of the birds' plumage trade,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: not by any means. Says Mr. Buckland ("Pros and Cons of the Plumage
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Bill," page 17):
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "As regards the vast majority of fancy feathers used in millinery, the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Continent receives its own supplies. The feathers of the hundreds of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: thousands of albatrosses which are killed in the North Pacific all go to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Paris. Of the untold thousands of 'magpies,' owls, and other species
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: which come from Peru, not one skin or feather crosses the Channel. The
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: white herons of the Upper Senegal and the Niger are being rapidly
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: exterminated at the instigation of the feather merchants, but not one of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the plumes reaches London. Paris receives direct a large supply of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: aigrettes from South America and elsewhere.... The millions of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: swallows and other migratory birds which are killed annually as they
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: pass through Italy, France and Spain on their way north, supply the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: millinery trade of Europe with an incredible quantity of wings and other
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: plumage, but none of it is distributed from London.... London, as a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: distributing center, has no monopoly of the trade in raw feathers."
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Mr. Buckland's green-covered pamphlet is a powerful document, and both
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: his facts and his conclusions seem to be unassailable. The author's
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: address is Royal Colonial Institute, Northumberland Ave., London, W.C.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The duty of the civilized nations of Europe is perfectly plain. The
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: savage and bloody business in feathers torn from wild birds should be
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: stopped, completely and forever. If the commons will not arise and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: reform the odious business out of existence, then the kings and queens
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and presidents should do their plain duty. In the suppression of a world
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: crime like this it is clearly a case of _noblesse oblige_!
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: CHAPTER XIV.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: THE BIRD TRAGEDY ON LAYSAN ISLAND
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: This chapter is a curtain-dropper to the preceding chapter. As a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: clearly-cut, concrete case, the reader will find it unique and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: unsurpassed. It should be of lively interest to every American because
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the tragedy occurred on American territory.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In the far-away North Pacific Ocean, about seven hundred miles from
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Honolulu west-b'-north, lies the small island of Laysan. It is level,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: sandy, poorly planted by nature, and barren of all things likely to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: enlist the attention of predatory man. To the harassed birds of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: mid-ocean, it seemed like a secure haven, and for ages past it has been
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: inhabited only by them. There several species of sea birds, large and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: small, have found homes and breeding places. Until 1909, the inhabitants
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: consisted of the Laysan albatross, black-footed albatross, sooty tern,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: gray-backed tern, noddy tern, Hawaiian tern, white tern, Bonin petrel,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: two shearwaters, the red-tailed tropic bird, two boobies and the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: man-of-war bird.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Laysan Island is two miles long by one and one-half miles broad, and at
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: times it has been literally covered with birds. Its bird life was first
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: brought prominently to notice in 1891, by Henry Palmer, the agent of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Hon. Walter Rothschild, and in 1902 and 1903 Walter K. Fisher and W.A.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Bryan made further observations.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Ever since 1891 the bird life on Laysan has been regarded as one of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: wonders of the bird world. One of the photographs taken prior to 1909
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: shows a vast plain, apparently a square mile in area, covered and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: crowded with Laysan albatrosses. They stand there on the level sand,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: serene, bulky and immaculate. Thousands of birds appear in one view--a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: very remarkable sight.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Naturally man, the ever-greedy, began to cast about for ways by which to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: convert some product of that feathered host into money. At first guano
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and eggs were collected. A tramway was laid down and small box-cars were
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: introduced, in which the collected material was piled and pushed down to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the packing place.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: For several years this went on, and the birds themselves were not
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: molested. At last, however, a tentacle of the feather-trade octopus
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: reached out to Laysan. In an evil moment in the spring of 1909, a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: predatory individual of Honolulu and elsewhere, named Max Schlemmer,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: decided that the wings of those albatross, gulls and terns should be
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: torn off and sent to Japan, whence they would undoubtedly be shipped to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Paris, the special market for the wings of sea-birds slaughtered in the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: North Pacific.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: [Illustration: LAYSAN ALBATROSSES, BEFORE THE GREAT SLAUGHTER
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: By the Courtesy of Hon. Walter Rothschild.]
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: [Illustration: LAYSAN ALBATROSS ROOKERY, AFTER THE GREAT SLAUGHTER
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The Same Ground as Shown in the Preceding Picture, Photographed in 1911
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: by Prof. Homer R. Dill]
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Schlemmer the Slaughterer bought a cheap vessel, hired twenty-three
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: phlegmatic and cold-blooded Japanese laborers, and organized a raid on
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Laysan. With the utmost secrecy he sailed from Honolulu, landed his
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: bird-killers upon the sea-bird wonderland, and turned them loose upon
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the birds.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: For several months they slaughtered diligently and without mercy.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Apparently it was the ambition of Schlemmer to kill every bird on the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: island.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: By the time the bird-butchers had accumulated between three and four
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: car-loads of wings, and the carnage was half finished, William A. Bryan,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Professor of Zoology in the College of Honolulu, heard of it and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: promptly wired the United States Government.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Without the loss of a moment the Secretary of the Navy despatched the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: revenue cutter _Thetis_ to the shambles of Laysan. When Captain Jacobs
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: arrived he found that in round numbers about _three hundred thousand_
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: birds had been destroyed, and all that remained of them were several
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: acres of bones and dead bodies, and about three carloads of wings,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: feathers and skins. It was evident that Schlemmer's intention was to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: kill all the birds on the island, and only the timely arrival of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: _Thetis_ frustrated that bloody plan.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The twenty-three Japanese poachers were arrested and taken to Honolulu
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: for trial, and the _Thetis_ also brought away all the stolen wings and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: plumage with the exception of one shedful of wings that had to be left
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: behind on account of lack of carrying space. That old shed, with one
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: end torn out, and supposed to contain nearly fifty thousand pairs of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: wings, was photographed by Prof. Dill in 1911, as shown herewith.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: [Illustration: ACRES OF GULL AND ALBATROSS BONES
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Photographed on Laysan Island by H.R. Dill, 1911]
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Three hundred thousand albatrosses, gulls, terns and other birds were
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: butchered to make a Schlemmer holiday! Had the arrival of the _Thetis_
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: been delayed, it is reasonably certain that every bird on Laysan would
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: have been killed to satisfy the wolfish rapacity of one money-grubbing
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: white man.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In 1911, the Iowa State University despatched to Laysan a scientific
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: expedition in charge of Prof. Homer R. Dill. The party landed on the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: island on April 24 and remained until June 5, and the report of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Professor Dill (U.S. Department of Agriculture) is consumedly
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: interesting to the friends of birds. Here is what he has said regarding
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the evidences of bird-slaughter:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "Our first impression of Laysan was that the poachers had stripped the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: place of bird life. An area of over 300 acres on each side of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: buildings was apparently abandoned. Only the shearwaters moaning in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: their burrows, the little wingless rail skulking from one grass tussock
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: to another, and the saucy finch remained. It is an excellent example of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: what Prof. Nutting calls the survival of the inconspicuous.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "Here on every side are bones bleaching in the sun, showing where the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: poachers had piled the bodies of the birds as they stripped them of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: wings and feathers. In the old open guano shed were seen the remains of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: hundreds and possibly thousands of wings which were placed there but
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: never cured for shipping, as the marauders were interrupted in their
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: work.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: [Illustration: SHED PILLED WITH WINGS OF SLAUGHTERED BIRDS ON LAYSAN
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: ISLAND]
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "An old cistern back of one of the buildings tells a story of cruelty
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: that surpasses anything else done by these heartless, sanguinary
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: pirates, not excepting the practice of cutting wings from living birds
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and leaving them to die of hemorrhage. In this dry cistern the living
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: birds were kept by hundreds to slowly starve to death. In this way the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: fatty tissue lying next to the skin was used up, and the skin was left
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: quite free from grease, so that it required little or no cleaning during
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: preparation.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "Many other revolting sights, such as the remains of young birds that
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: had been left to starve, and birds with broken legs and deformed beaks
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: were to be seen. Killing clubs, nets and other implements used by these
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: marauders were lying all about. Hundreds of boxes to be used in shipping
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the bird skins were packed in an old building. It was very evident they
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: intended to carry on their slaughter as long as the birds lasted.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "Not only did they kill and skin the larger species but they caught and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: caged the finch, honey eater, and miller bird. Cages and material for
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: making them were found."--(Report of an Expedition to Laysan Island in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 1911. By Homer R. Dill, page 12.)
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The report of Professor Bryan contains the following pertinent
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: paragraphs:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "This wholesale killing has had an appalling effect on the colony.... It
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: is conservative to say that fully one-half the number of birds of both
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: species of albatross that were so abundant everywhere in 1903 have been
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: killed. The colonies that remain are in a sadly decimated condition....
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Over a large part of the island, in some sections a hundred acres in a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: place, that ten years ago were thickly inhabited by albatrosses not a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: single bird remains, while heaps of the slain lie as mute testimony of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the awful slaughter of these beautiful, harmless, and without doubt
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: beneficial inhabitants of the high seas.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "While the main activity of the plume-hunters was directed against the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: albatrosses, they were by no means averse to killing anything in the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: bird line that came in their way.... Fortunately, serious as were the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: depredations of the poachers, their operations were interrupted before
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: any of the species had been completely exterminated."
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: But the work of the Evil Genius of Laysan did not stop with the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: slaughter of three hundred thousand birds. Mr. Schlemmer introduced
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: rabbits and guinea-pigs; and these rapidly multiplying rodents now are
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: threatening to consume every plant on the island. If the plants
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: disappear, many of the insects will go with them; and this will mean the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: disappearance of the small insectivorous birds.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In February, 1909, President Roosevelt issued an executive order
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: creating the Hawaiian Islands Reservation for Birds. In this are
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: included Laysan and twelve other islands and reefs, some of which are
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: inhabited by birds that are well worth preserving. By this act, we may
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: feel that for the future the birds of Laysan and neighboring islets are
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: secure from further attacks by the bloody-handed agents of the vain
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: women who still insist upon wearing the wings and feathers of wild
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: birds.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: CHAPTER XV
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: UNFAIR FIREARMS, AND SHOOTING ETHICS
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: For considerably more than a century, the States of the American Union
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: have enacted game-protective laws based on the principle that the wild
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: game belongs to the People, and the people's senators, representatives
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and legislators generally may therefore enact laws for its protection,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: prescribing the manner in which it may and may not be taken and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: possessed. The soundness of this principle has been fully confirmed by
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the Supreme Court of the United States in the case of Geer vs.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Connecticut, on March 2, 1896.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The tendency of predatory man to kill and capture wild game of all kinds
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: by wholesale methods is as old as the human race. The days of the club,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the stone axe, the bow and arrow and the flint-lock gun were
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: contemporaneous with the days of great abundance of game. Now that the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: advent of breech-loaders, repeaters, automatics and fixed ammunition has
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: rendered game scarce in all localities save a very few, the thoughtful
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: man is driven to consider measures for the checking of destruction and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the suppression of wholesale slaughter.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: First of all, the deadly floating batteries and sail-boats were
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: prohibited. To-day a punt gun is justly regarded as a relic of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: barbarism, and any man who uses one places himself beyond the pale of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: decent sportsmanship, or even of modern pot-hunting. Strange to say,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: although the unwritten code of ethics of English sportsmen is very
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: strict, the English to this day permit wild-fowl hunting with guns of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: huge calibre, some of which are more like shot-cannons than shot-guns.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: And they say, "Well, there are still wild duck on our coast!"
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Beyond question, it is now high time for the English people to take up
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the shot-gun question, and consider what to-day is fair and unfair in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the killing of waterfowl. The supply of British ducks and geese can not
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: forever withstand the market gunners and their shot-cannons. Has not the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: British wild-fowl supply greatly decreased during the past fifteen
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: years? I strongly suspect that a careful investigation would reveal the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: fact that it has diminished. The Society for the Preservation of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Fauna of the Empire should look into the matter, and obtain a series of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: reports on the condition of the waterfowl to-day as compared with what
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: it was twenty years ago.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In the United States we have eliminated the swivel guns, the punt guns
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and the very-big-bore guns. Among the real sportsmen the tendency is
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: steadily toward shot-guns of small calibre, especially under 12-gauge.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: But, outside the ranks of sportsmen, we are now face to face with two
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: automatic and five "pump" shotguns of deadly efficiency. Of these, more
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: than one hundred thousand are being made and sold annually by the five
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: companies that produce them. Recently the annual output has been
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: carefully estimated from known facts to be about as follows:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Winchester Arms Co., New Haven, Conn.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: (1 Automatic and 1 Pump-gun)                           50,000 guns.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Remington Arms Co., Ilion, N.Y.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: (1 Automatic and 1 Pump-gun)                           25,000  "
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Marlin Fire Arms Co., New Haven, Conn. 1 Pump-gun        12,000  "
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Stevens Arms Co., Chicopee Falls, Mass. 1 Pump-gun       10,000  "
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Union Fire Arms Co., 1 Pump-gun                           5,000  "
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: [Illustration: FOUR OF THE SEVEN MACHINE GUNS
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: STEVENS PUMP GUN, 6 SHOTS IN 6 SECONDS.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: WINCHESTER PUMP GUN, 6 SHOTS IN 6 SECONDS.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: REMINGTON AUTOMATIC, 5 SHOTS IN 4 SECONDS.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Loaded and cocked by its own recoil.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: WINCHESTER AUTOLOADING. 5 SHOTS IN 4 SECONDS
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Loaded and cocked by its own recoil.]
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: THE ETHICS OF SHOOTING AND SHOT-GUNS.--Are the American people willing
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: that their wild birds shall be shot by machinery?
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In the ethics of sportsmanship, the anglers of America are miles ahead
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of the men who handle the rifle and shot-gun in the hunting field. Will
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the hunters ever catch up?
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The anglers have steadily diminished the weight of the rod and the size
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of the line; and they have prohibited the use of gang hooks and nets. In
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: this respect the initiative of the Tuna Club of Santa Catalina is worthy
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of the highest admiration. Even though the leaping tuna, the jewfish and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the sword-fish are big and powerful, the club has elected to raise the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: standard of sportsmanship by making captures more difficult than ever
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: before. A higher degree of skill, and nerve and judgment, is required in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the angler who would make good on a big fish; and, incidentally, the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: fish has about double "the show" that it had fifteen years ago.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: That is Sportsmanship!
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: But how is it with the men who handle the shot-gun?
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: By them, the Tuna Club's high-class principle has been exactly reversed!
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In the making of fishing-rods, commercialism plays small part; but in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: about forty cases out of every fifty the making of guns is solely a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: matter of dollars and profits.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Excepting the condemnation of automatic and pump guns, I think that few
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: clubs of sportsmen have laid down laws designed to make shooting more
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: difficult, and to give the game more of a show to escape. Thousands of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: gentlemen sportsmen have their own separate unwritten codes of honor,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: but so far as I know, few of them have been written out and adopted as
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: binding rules of action. I know that among expert wing shots it is an
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: unwritten law that quail and grouse must not be shot on the ground, nor
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: ducks on the water. But, among the three million gunners who annually
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: shoot in the United States how many, think you, are there who in actual
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: practice observe any sentimental principles when in the presence of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: killable game? I should say about one man and boy out of every five
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: hundred.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Up to this time, the great mass of men who handle guns have left it to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the gunmakers to make their codes of ethics, and hand them out with the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: loaded cartridges, all ready for use.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: For fifty years the makers of shot-guns and rifles have taxed their
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: ingenuity and resources to make killing easier, especially for "amateur"
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: sportsmen,--_and take still greater advantages of the game_! Look at
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: this scale of progression:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: FIFTY YEARS' INCREASE IN THE DEADLINESS OF FIREARMS.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Single-shot breech-loader                                   xxxxxx  30
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Double-barrel breech-loader                             xxxxxxxxxx  50
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Choke-bore breech-loader                              xxxxxxxxxxxx  60
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Repeating rifle                                       xxxxxxxxxxxx  60
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

name: Our Vanishing Wild Life
