name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: _The Output of 1911_.--At a recent hearing before a committee of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: House of Representatives at Washington, a representative of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: gun-making industry reported that in the year 1911 ten American
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: manufacturing concerns turned out the following:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 391,875 shot-guns,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 666,643 rifles, and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 580,042 revolvers.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: There are 66 factories producing firearms and ammunition, employing
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: $39,377,000 of invested capital and 15,000 employees.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The sole and dominant thought of many gunmakers is to make the very
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: deadliest guns that human skill can invent, sell them as fast as
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: possible, and declare dividends on their stock. The Remington,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Winchester, Marlin, Stevens and Union Companies are engaged in a mad
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: race to see who can turn out the deadliest guns, and the most of them.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: On the market to-day there are five pump-guns, that fire six shots each,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: in about _six seconds_, without removal from the shoulder, by the quick
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: sliding of a sleeve under the barrel, that ejects the empty shell and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: inserts a loaded one. There are two automatics that fire five shots each
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: in _five seconds or less_, by five pulls on the trigger! _The
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: autoloading gun is reloaded and cocked again wholly by its own recoil_.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Now, if these are not machine guns, what are they?
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In view of the great scarcity of feathered game, and the number of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: deadly machine guns already on the market, the production of the last
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and deadliest automatic gun (by the Winchester Arms Company), _already
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: in great demand_, is a crime against wild life, no less.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Every human action is a matter of taste and individual honor.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: It is natural for the duck-butchers of Currituck to love the automatic
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: shot-guns as they do, because they kill the most ducks per flock. With
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: two of them in his boat, holding _ten shots_, one expert duck-killer
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: can,--and sometimes _actually does_, so it is said,--get every duck out
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of a flock, up to seven or eight.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: It is natural for an awkward and blundering wing-shot to love the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: deadliest gun, in order that he may make as good a bag as an expert shot
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: can make with a double-barreled gun. It is natural for the hunter who
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: does not care a rap about the extermination of species to love the gun
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: that will enable him to kill up to the bag limit, every time he takes
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the field. It is natural for men who don't think, or who think in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: circles, to say "so long as I observe the lawful bag limit, what
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: difference does it make what kind of a gun I use?"
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: It is natural for the Remington, and Winchester, and Marlin gun-makers
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: to say, as they do, "Enforce the laws! Shorten the open seasons! Reduce
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the bag limit, and then it won't matter what guns are used! But,--DON'T
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: touch autoloading guns! Don't hamper Inventive Genius!"
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Is it not high time for American sportsmen to cease taking their moral
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: principles and their codes of ethics from the gun-makers?
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Here is a question that I would like to put before every hunter of game
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: in America:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In view of the alarming scarcity of game, in view of the impending
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: extermination of species by legal hunting, can any high-minded
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: _sportsman_, can any _good citizen_ either sell a machine shot-gun or
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: use one in hunting?
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: A gentleman is incapable of taking an unfair advantage of any wild
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: creature; therefore a gentleman cannot use punt guns for ducks, dynamite
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: for game fish, or automatic or pump guns in bird-shooting. The machine
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: guns and "silencers" are grossly unfair, and like gang-hooks, nets and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: dynamite for trout and bass, their use in hunting must everywhere be
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: prohibited by law. Times have changed, and the lines for protection must
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: be more tightly drawn.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: [Illustration: THE CHAMPION GAME SLAUGHTER CASE
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: One Hour's Slaughter (218 Geese) With Two Automatic Shot-Guns]
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The Supreme Court of Pennsylvania (Judge Orlady) has decided that the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Pennsylvania law against the use of automatic guns in hunting is
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: entirely constitutional, because every state has a right to say how its
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: game may and may not be killed.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: It is up to the American People to say _now_ whether their wild life
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: shall be slaughtered by machinery, or not.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: If they are willing that it should be, then let us be consistent and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: say--away with all "conservation!" The game conservators can endure a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: gameless and birdless continent quite as well as the average citizen
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: can.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: HOW THEY WORK.--There are a few apologists for the automatic and pump
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: guns who cheerfully say, "So long as the bag limit is observed what
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: difference does it make how the birds are killed?"
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: It is strange that a conscientious man should ask such a question, when
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the answer is apparent.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: We reply, "The difference is that an automatic or pump gun will kill
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: fully twice as many waterfowl as a double-barrel, _if not more_; and _it
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: is highly undesirable that every gunner should get the bag limit of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: birds, or any number near it_! The birds can not stand it. Moreover,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: _the best states for ducks and geese have no bag limits on those birds_!"
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: To-day, on Currituck Sound, for example, the market hunters are killing
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: all the waterfowl they can sell. On Marsh Island, Louisiana, one man has
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: killed 369 ducks in one day, and another market gunner killed 430 in one
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: day.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The automatic and the "pump" shot-guns are the favorite weapons of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: game-hog who makes a specialty of geese and ducks. It is no uncommon
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: thing for a gunner who shoots a machine gun to get, with one gun, as
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: high as _eight_ birds out of one flock. A man who has himself done this
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: has told me so.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: _The Champion Game-Slaughter Case_.--Here is a story from California
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: that is no fairy tale. It was published, most innocently, in a western
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: magazine, with the illustration that appears herewith, and in which
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: please notice the automatic shot-gun:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "February 5th, I and a friend were at one of the Glenn County Club's
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: camps.... Neither of us having ever had the pleasure of shooting over
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: live decoys, we were anxious, and could hardly wait for the sport to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: commence. On arriving at the scene we noticed holes which had been dug
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: in the ground, just large enough for a man to crawl into. These holes
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: were used for hiding places, and were deep enough so the sportsmen would
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: be entirely out of sight of the game. The birds are so wild that to move
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: a finger will frighten them....
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "The decoys are wild geese which had been crippled and tamed for this
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: purpose. They are placed inside of silk net fences which are located on
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: each side of the holes dug for hiding places. These nets are the color
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of the ground and it is impossible for the wild geese flying overhead to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: detect the difference.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "After we had investigated everything the expert caller and owner of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: outfit exclaimed: 'Into your holes!'
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "We noticed in the distance a flock of geese coming. Our caller in a few
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: seconds had their attention, and they headed towards our decoys. Soon
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: they were directly over us, but out of easy range of our guns. We were
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: anxious to shoot, but in obedience to our boss had to keep still, and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: soon noticed that the birds were soaring around and in a short time were
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: within fifteen or twenty feet of us. At that moment we heard the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: command, 'Punch 'em!' and the bombardment that followed was beyond
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: imagining. _We had fired five shots apiece and found we had bagged ten
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: geese from this one flock_.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "At the end of one hour's shooting we had 218 birds to our credit and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: were out of ammunition.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "On finding that no more shells were in our pits we took our dead geese
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: to the camp and returned with a new supply of ammunition. We remained in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the pits during the entire day. When the sun had gone behind the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: mountains we summed up our kill and _it amounted to 450 geese_!
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "The picture shown with this article gives a view of _the first hour's
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: shoot_. A photograph would have been taken of the remainder of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: shoot, but it being warm weather the birds had to be shipped at once in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: order to keep them from spoiling.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: [Illustration: SLAUGHTERED ACCORDING TO LAW
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: A Result of a Faulty System. Such Pictures as this are Very Common in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Sportsmen's Magazines Note the Automatic Gun]
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "Supper was then eaten, after which we were driven back to Willows; both
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: agreeing that it was one of the greatest days of sport we ever had, and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: wishing that we might, through the courtesy of the Glenn County Goose
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Club, have another such day. C.H.B."
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Another picture was published in a Canadian magazine, illustrating a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: story from which I quote:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "I fixed the decoys, hid my boat and took my position in the blind. My
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: man started his work with a will and hustled the ducks out of every
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: cove, inlet or piece of marsh for two miles around. I had barely time to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: slip the cartridges into my guns--_one a double and the other a five
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: shot automatic_--when I saw a brace of birds coming toward me. They
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: sailed in over my decoys. I rose to the occasion, and the leader
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: up-ended and tumbled in among the decoys. The other bird, unable to stop
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: quick enough, came directly over me. He closed his wings and struck the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: ground in the rear of the blind.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "More and more followed. Sometimes they came singly, and then in twos
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and threes. I kept busy and attended to each bird as quickly as
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: possible. Whenever there was a lull in the flight I went out in the boat
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and picked up the dead, leaving the wounded to take chances with any
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: gunner lucky enough to catch them in open and smooth water. A bird handy
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: in the air is worth two wounded ones in the water. _Twice I took six
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: dead birds out of the water for seven shots, and both guns empty_.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "The ball thus opened, the birds commenced to move in all directions.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Until the morning's flight was over I was kept busy pumping lead, _first
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: with the 10, then with the automatic_, reloading, picking up the dead,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: etc."
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: And the reader will observe that the harmless, innocent, inoffensive
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: automatic shot gun, that "don't matter if you enforce the bag limit,"
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: figures prominently in both stories and both photographs.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: _A Story of Two Pump Guns and Geese_:--It comes from Aberdeen, S.D.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: (Sand Lake), in the spring of 1911. Mr. J.J. Humphrey tells it, in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: _Outdoor Life_ magazine for July, 1911.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "Smith and I were about a hundred yards from them [the flock of Canada
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: geese], when Murphy scared them. They rose in a dense mass and came
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: directly between Smith and me. We were about gunshot distance apart, and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: they were not over thirty feet in the air when we opened up on them with
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: our pump guns and No. 5 shot. When the smoke cleared away and we had
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: rounded up the cripples we found we had twenty-one geese. I have heard
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of bigger killings out in this country, but never positively knew of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: them."
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: So then: _those two gunners averaged 10-1/2 wild geese per pump gun out
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of one flock_! And yet there are wise and reflective sportsmen who say,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "What difference does the kind of gun make so long as you live up to the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: law?"
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: I think that the pump and automatic guns make about 75 _per-cent of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: difference, against the game_; that is all!
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The number of shot-guns now in use in the United States is almost beyond
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: belief. About six years ago a gentleman interested in the manufacture of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: such weapons informed me, and his statement has never been disputed,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: that _every year_ about 500,000 new shot-guns were sold in the United
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: States. The number of shot cartridges annually produced by our four
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: great cartridge companies has been reliably estimated as follows:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Winchester Arms Co              300,000,000
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Union Metallic Cartridge Co     250,000,000
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Peters Cartridge Co             150,000,000
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Western Cartridge Co             75,000,000
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: We must stop all the holes in the barrel, or eventually lose all the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: water. No group of bird-slaughterers is entitled to immunity. We will
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: not "limit the bag, and enforce the laws," while we permit the makers
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and users of autoloading and pump guns to kill at will, as they demand.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: My dear Mr. Hornaday:--
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: It is with much surprise that I learn through your communication of even
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: date that certain persons are claiming that the National Association of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Audubon Societies for the Protection of Wild Animals and Birds is in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: favor of the use of automatic or pump guns, and consequently is not in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: favor of the passage of laws to prevent the use or sale of such
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: firearms.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: I beg officially to state that the National Association of Audubon
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Societies is absolutely opposed to either the manufacture, sale, or use
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of such firearms, and therefore hopes that the meritorious bill
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: introduced by the New York Zoological Society will become a law.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: I beg further to add that any statement contrary to the above in effect
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: is unauthorized.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: This society is working for the preservation of the wild birds and game
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of North America, and it sincerely should not stultify itself by
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: advocating the use of one of the most potent means of destruction that
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: has ever been devised.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: You are at liberty to use this communication either publicly or
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: privately.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Very sincerely yours,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: [Signature: William Dutcher]
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: President.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: A LETTER THAT TELLS ITS OWN STORY]
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Yes; we _will_ "limit the bag" and "enforce the laws;" but the machine
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: guns and the alien shooters shall be eliminated at the same time! Each
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: state has the power to regulate, absolutely, down to the smallest
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: detail, the manner in which the game of The People shall be taken or not
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: taken; and such laws are absolutely constitutional. If we can legislate
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: punt guns and dynamite out of use, the machine guns and silencers can be
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: treated similarly.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: _No immunity for wild-life exterminators_.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The following unprejudiced testimony from a New York business man who is
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: a sportsman, with a fine game preserve of his own, should be of general
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: interest. It was written to G.O. Shields, March 21, 1906.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: DEAR SIR:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Regarding the use of the automatic shot-gun, would say that I am a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: member of two southern ducking clubs where these guns are used very
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: extensively. I have seen a flock of ducks come into a blind where
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: one, two, or even three of these guns were in use, and have seen as
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: many as eleven shots poured into a single flock.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: We have considerable poaching on one of these clubs, the territory
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: being so extensive that it is impossible to prevent it. We own
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 60,000 acres, and these poachers, I am told, nearly all use the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: automatic guns. They frequently kill six or eight ducks out of one
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: flock--first taking a raking shot on the water, and then getting in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the balance of the magazine before the flock is out of range. In
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: fact, some of them carry two guns, and are able to discharge a part
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of the second magazine into the same flock.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: As I told you the other evening, I am not so much against the gun
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: when in the hands of gentlemen and real sportsmen, but, on account
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of its terrible possibilities for market hunters, I believe that the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: only safe way is to abolish it entirely, and that the better class
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: should be willing to give up this weapon as being the only means of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: putting a stop to this willful game slaughter.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Very truly yours,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: ARTHUR ROBINSON.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: A MODEL BILL TO PROHIBIT THE USE OF AUTOMATIC AND REPEATING SHOT GUNS IN
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: HUNTING
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Section 1. It shall be unlawful to use in hunting or shooting birds
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: or animals of any kind, any automatic or repeating shot gun or pump
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: gun, or any shot-gun holding more than two cartridges at one time,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: or that may be fired more than twice without removal from the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: shoulder for reloading.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Section 2. Violation of any provision of this act shall be punished
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: by a fine of not less than twenty-five nor more than one hundred
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: dollars for each offence; and the carrying, or possession in the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: woods, or in any field, or upon any water of any gun or other weapon
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the use of which is prohibited, as aforesaid, shall be prima facie
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: evidence of the violation of this act.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: _The English 3-barrel "Scatter Rifle," for Ducks_.--All gunners who find
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: machine guns good enough for them will be delighted by the news that an
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Englishman whose identity is concealed under the initials "F.M.M." has
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: invented and manufactured a 3-barreled rifle specially intended to kill
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: ducks that are beyond the reach of a choke-bore shotgun. The weapon
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: discharges all three barrels simultaneously. In the _London Field_, of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Dec. 9, 1911, it is described by a writer who also thoughtfully conceals
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: his identity under a nom-de-plume. After a trial of 48 shots, the writer
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: declares that "the 3-barreled is a really practicable weapon," and that
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: with it one could bag wild-fowl that were quite out of reach of any
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: shot-gun. Just why a Gatling gun or a Maxim should not be employed for
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the same purpose, the writer fails to state. The use of either would be
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: quite as sportsmanlike, and as fair to the game. There are great
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: possibilities in ducking mortars, also.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: _The "Sunday Gun."_--A new weapon of peculiar form and great deadliness
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: to song birds, has recently come into use. Because of the manner of its
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: use, it is known as the "Sunday gun." It is specially adapted to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: concealment on the person. A man could go through a reception with one
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of these deadly weapons absolutely concealed under his dress coat! It is
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: a weapon with two barrels, rifle and shot; and it enables the user to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: kill anything from a humming-bird up to a deer. What the shot-barrel can
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: not kill, the rifle will. It is not a gun that any sportsman would own,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: save as a curiosity, or for target use.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The State Ornithologist of Massachusetts, Mr. E.H. Forbush, informs me
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: that already the "Sunday gun" has become a scourge to the bird life of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: that state. Thousands of them are used by men and boys who live in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: cities and towns, and are able to get into the country only on Sundays.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: They conceal them under their coats, on Sunday mornings, go out into the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: country, and spend the day in shooting small birds and mammals. The dead
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: birds are concealed in various pockets, the Sunday gun goes under the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: coat, and at nightfall the guerrilla rides back to the city with an
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: innocent smile on his face, as if he had spent a day in harmless
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: enjoyment of the beauties of nature.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The "Sunday gun" is on sale everywhere, and it is said to be in use both
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: by American and Italian killers of song-birds. It weighs only two
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: pounds, eight ounces, and its cost is so trifling that any guerrilla who
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: wishes one can easily find the money for its purchase. There are in the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: United States at least a million men and boys quite mean enough to use
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: this weapon on song-birds, swallows, woodpeckers, nuthatches, rabbits
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and squirrels, and like other criminals, hide both weapon and loot in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: their clothing. So long as this gun is in circulation, no small bird is
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: safe, at any season, near any city or town.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Now, what are the People going to do about it?
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: My recommendation is that each state enact a law in the following terms:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Be it enacted, etc.--That from and after the passage of this act it
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: shall be unlawful for any person to use in hunting, or to carry
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: concealed on the person, any shotgun, or rifle, or combination of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: shotgun and rifle, with a barrel or barrels less than twenty-eight
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: inches in length, or with a skeleton stock fixed on a hinge.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The carrying of any rifle or shotgun concealed on the person shall
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: constitute a felony.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The penalties for hunting with any gun specially adapted to concealment
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: should be not less than $50 fine or two months imprisonment at hard
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: labor, and the carrying of such weapons concealed should be $100 or four
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: months at hard labor.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Incidentally, we wonder what will be the next devilish device for the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: destruction of wild life that American inventive genius will produce.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: [Illustration: THE "SUNDAY GUN!"
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: A Deadly Combination of Concealable Rifle-and-Shot-Gun.]
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: [Illustration: THE WILDERNESS OF NORTH AMERICA (SHADED) AND THE ARCTIC
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: PRAIRIES, WELL STOCKED WITH BIG GAME]
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: CHAPTER XVI
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: THE PRESENT AND FUTURE OF NORTH AMERICAN BIG GAME
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The subject of this chapter opens up a vast field of facts and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: conclusions, quite broad enough to fill a whole volume. In the space at
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: our disposal here it is possible to offer only a summary of the subject,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: without attempting to prove our statements by the production of detailed
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: evidence.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: To say that all over the world, the large land mammals are being
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: destroyed more rapidly than they are breeding, would not be literally
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: true, for the reason that there are yet many areas that are almost
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: untouched by the destroying hand of civilized man. It is true, however,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: that all the unspoiled areas rapidly are growing fewer and smaller. It
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: is also true that in all the regions of the earth that are easily
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: penetrable by civilized man, the wild life is being killed faster than
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: it breeds, and of necessity it is disappearing. This is why the British
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: are now so urgently bestirring themselves to create game preserves in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: all the countries that they own.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: It is one of the inexorable laws of Nature, to which I know of not one
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: exception, that large hoofed animals which live on open plains, on open
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: mountains, or in regions that are thinly forested, always are easily
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: found and easily exterminated. All such animals have a weak hold on
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: life. This is because it is so difficult for them to hide, and so very
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: easy for man to creep up within the killing range of modern, high-power,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: long-range rifles. Is it not pitiful to think of animals like the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: caribou, moose, white sheep and bear trying to survive on the naked
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: ridges and bald mountains of Yukon Territory and Alaska! With a modern
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: rifle, the greatest duffer on earth can creep up within killing distance
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of any of the big game of the North.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The gray wolf is practically the only large animal that is able to hide
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: successfully and survive in the treeless regions of the North; but his
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: room is always preferable to his company, because he, too, is a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: destroyer of big game.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: I am tempted to try to map out roughly what are to-day the unopened and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: undestroyed wild haunts of big game in North America. In doing this,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: however, I warn the reader not to be deceived into thinking that because
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: game still exists in those regions, those areas therefore constitute a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: permanent preserve and safe breeding-ground for large mammals. That is
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: very, very far from being the case. The further "opening up" of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: wilderness areas, as I shall call them for convenience, can and surely
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: will quickly wipe out their big game; for throughout nine-tenths of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: those areas it holds to life by very slender threads.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: To-day the unopened and undestroyed wilderness areas of North America,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: wherein large mammals still live in a normal wild state, are in general
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: as follows:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: THE ARCTIC BARREN GROUNDS, or Arctic Prairies, north of the limit of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: trees, embracing the Barren Grounds of northern Canada, the great arctic
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: archipelago, Ellesmere, Melville and Grant Lands and Greenland. This
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: region is the home of the musk-ox and three species of arctic caribou.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: THE ALASKA-YUKON REGION, inhabited by the moose, white mountain sheep,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: mountain goat, four species of caribou, and half a dozen species of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Alaska brown, grizzly and black bears.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: NORTHERN ONTARIO, QUEBEC, LABRADOR AND NEWFOUNDLAND, inhabited by moose,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: woodland caribou, white-tailed deer and black bear.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: BRITISH COLUMBIA, inhabited by a magnificent big-game fauna embracing
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the moose, elk, caribou of two species, white sheep, black sheep,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: big-horn sheep, mule deer, white-tailed deer, mountain goat, grizzly,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: black and inland white bears.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: THE SIERRA MADRE OF MEXICO, containing jaguar, puma, _grizzly_ and black
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: bears, mule deer, white-tailed deer, antelope, mountain sheep and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: peccaries.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: I have necessarily omitted all those regions of the United States and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Canada that still contain a remnant of big game, but have been literally
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "shot to pieces" by gunners.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In the United States and southern Canada there are about fifteen
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: localities which contain a supply of big game sufficient that a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: conscientious sportsman might therein hunt and kill one head per year
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: with a clear conscience. _All others should be closed for five years_!
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Here is the list of availables; and regarding it there will be about as
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: many opinions as there are big-game sportsmen:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: HUNTING GROUNDS IN AND NEAR THE UNITED STATES AND SOUTHERN CANADA
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: WHEREIN IT IS RIGHT TO HUNT BIG GAME
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: THE MAINE WOODS: Well stocked with white-tailed deer.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: NEW BRUNSWICK: Well stocked with moose; a few caribou, deer and black
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: bear.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: WHITE MOUNTAINS OF NEW HAMPSHIRE AND VERMONT: For deer.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: THE ADIRONDACKS, NEW YORK: Well stocked with white-tailed deer, only.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: PENNSYLVANIA MOUNTAINS: Contain many deer and black bears, and soon will
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: contain more.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: NORTHERN MINNESOTA: Deer and moose.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: NORTHERN MICHIGAN AND WISCONSIN: White-tailed deer.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: NORTHWESTERN WYOMING: Thousands of elk in fall and winter; a few deer,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: grizzly and black bears, but no sheep that it would be right to kill.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: WESTERN AND SOUTHWESTERN MONTANA: Elk in season, mule and white-tail
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: deer; no sheep that it would be right to kill.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: NORTHWESTERN MONTANA: Mule and white-tailed deer, only. No sheep, bear,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: moose, elk or antelope _to kill_!
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: WYOMING, EAST OF YELLOWSTONE PARK: A few elk, by migration from the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Park; a few deer, and bear of two species.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: NORTHERN WOODS OF ONTARIO AND QUEBEC: Moose; deer.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: SOUTHERN BRITISH COLUMBIA: Goat, a few sheep and deer; grizzly bear.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Moose, caribou and elk should not be killed.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: NORTHERN BRITISH COLUMBIA: Six fine species of big game.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: NORTHWESTERN ALBERTA: Grizzly bear, big-horn and mountain goat.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Under existing conditions I regard the above-named hunting grounds as
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: _nearly all_ in which it is right or fair for big-game hunting now to be
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: permitted, even on a strict basis. Nearly all others should immediately
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: be closed, for large game, for ten years.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Of course such a proceeding, if carried into effect, would provoke loud
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: protests from sportsmen, gunners, game-hogs, pot-hunters and others; but
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: I only wish to high heaven that we had the power to carry such a program
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: as that into effect! _Then we would see some game in ten years_; and our
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: grand-children would thank us for some real big-game protection at a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: critical period.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Except in the few localities above-mentioned, I regard the big-game
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: situation in the United States and southern Canada as particularly
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: desperate. Unless there is an immediate and complete revolution in this
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: country from an era of slaughter to an era of preservation, as sure as
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the sun rises on the morrow, outside of the hard and fast game
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: preserves, and places like Maine and the Adirondacks, this generation of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Americans and near-Americans will live to see our country _swept clean
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of big game_!
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Two years ago, I did not believe this; but I do now. It is impossible to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: exaggerate the wide extent or the seriousness of this situation. In a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: country where any and every individual can rise and bluster,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "I'm-just-as-good-as-_you_-are," and bellow for his "rights" as a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "tax-payer," there is no stopping the millions who kill whenever there
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: is an open season. And to many Americans, no right is dearer than the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: right to kill the game which by even the commonest law of equity
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: belongs, not to the shooter exclusively, but partly to two thousand
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: other persons who don't shoot at all!
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Unless we come to an "About, face!" in quick time, all our big game
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: outside the preserves is doomed to sure and quick extermination. This is
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: not an individual opinion, merely: it is a _fact_; and a hundred
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: thousand men know it to be such.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Last winter (1911-12), because the deer of Montana were driven by cold
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and hunger out of the mountains and far down into the ranchmen's
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: valleys, eleven thousand of them were ruthlessly slaughtered. State
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Game Warden Avare says that often heads of families took out as many
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: licenses as there were persons in the family, and the whole quota was
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: killed. Such people deserve to go deerless into the future; but we can
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: not allow them to rob innocent people.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: OUR SPECIES OF BIG GAME
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: THE PRONG-HORNED ANTELOPE, unique and wonderful, will be one of _the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: first species of North American big game to become totally extinct_. We
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: may see this come to pass within twenty years. They can not be bred in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: protection, _save in very large fenced ranges_. They are delicate,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: capricious, and easily upset. They die literally "at the drop of a hat."
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: They are quite subject to actinomycosis (lumpy-jaw), which in wild
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: animals is incurable.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Already all the states that possess wild antelope, except Nevada, have
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: passed laws giving that species long close seasons; which is highly
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: creditable to the states that have done their duty. Nevada must get in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: line at the next session of her legislature!
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In 1908, Dr. T.S. Palmer published in his annual report of "Progress in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Game Protection" the following in regard to the prong-horned antelope:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "Antelope are still found in diminished numbers in fourteen western
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: states. A considerable number were killed during the year in Montana,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: where the species seems to have suffered more than elsewhere since the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: season was opened in 1907.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "A striking illustration of the decrease of the antelope is afforded by
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Colorado. In 1898 the State Warden estimated that there were 25,000 in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the state, whereas in 1908 the Game Commissioner places the number at
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: only 2,000. The total number of antelope now in the United States
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: probably does not exceed 17,000, distributed approximately as follows:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Colorado    2,000         Yellowstone Park    2,000
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Idaho         200         Other States        2,000
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Montana     4,000                             -----
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: New Mexico  1,300         Saskatchewan        2,000
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: To-day (1912), Dr. Palmer says the total number of antelope is less than
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: it was in 1908, and in spite of protection the number is steadily
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: diminishing. This is indeed serious news. The existing bands, already
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: small, are steadily growing smaller. The antelope are killed lawlessly,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and the crimes of such slaughter are, in nearly every instance,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: successfully concealed.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Previously, we have based strong hopes for the preservation of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: antelope species on the herd in the Yellowstone Park, but those animals
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: are vanishing fearfully fast. In 1906, Dr. Palmer reported that "About
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: fifteen hundred antelope came down to the feeding grounds near the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: haystacks in the vicinity of Gardiner." In 1908 the Yellowstone Park
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: was credited with two thousand head. _To-day, the number alive, by
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: actual count, is only five hundred head_; and this after twenty-five
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: years of protection! Where have the others gone? This shows, alas! that
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: perpetual close seasons can not _always_ bring back the vanished
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: thousands of game!
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: [Illustration: PRONG-HORNED ANTELOPE]
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Here is a reliable report (June 29, 1912) regarding the prong-horned
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: antelope in Lower California, from E.W. Nelson: "Antelope formerly
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: ranged over nearly the entire length of Lower California, but are now
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: gone from a large part of their ancient range, and their steadily
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: decreasing numbers indicate their early extinction throughout the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: peninsula."
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In captivity the antelope is exasperatingly delicate and short-lived. It
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: has about as much stamina as a pet monkey. As an exhibition animal in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: zoological gardens and parks it is a failure; for it always looks faded,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: spiritless and dead, like a stuffed animal ready to be thrown into the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: discard. Zoologists can not save the prong-horn species save at long
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: range, in preserves so huge that the sensitive little beast will not
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: even suspect that it is confined.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Two serious attempts have been made to transplant and acclimatize the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: antelope--in the Wichita National Bison Range, in Oklahoma, and in the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Montana Bison Range, at Ravalli. In 1911 the Boone and Crockett Club
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: provided a fund which defrayed the expenses of shipping from the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Yellowstone Park a small nucleus herd to each of those ranges. Eight
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: were sent to the Wichita Range, of which five arrived alive. Of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: seven sent to the Montana Range, four arrived alive and were duly set
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: free. While it seems a pity to take specimens from the Yellowstone Park
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: herd, the disagreeable fact is that there is no other source on which to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: draw for breeding stock.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The Provinces of Alberta and Saskatchewan, in Canada, still permit the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: hunting and killing of antelope; which is wholly and entirely wrong.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: THE BIG-HORN SHEEP.--Of North American big game, the big-horn of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Rockies will be, after the antelope, the next species to become extinct
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: outside of protected areas. In the United States that event is fast
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: approaching. It is far nearer than even the big-game sportsmen realize.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: There are to-day only two localities in the four states that still
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: _think_ they have killable sheep, in which it is worth while to go
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: sheep-hunting. One is in Montana, and the other is in Wyoming. In the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: United States a really big, creditable ram may now be regarded as an
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: impossibility. There are now perhaps half a dozen guides who can find
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: killable sheep in our country, but the game is nearly always young rams,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: under five years of age.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: That Wyoming, Montana, Idaho and Washington still continue to permit
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: sheep slaughter is outrageous. Their answer is that "The sportsmen won't
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: stand for stopping it altogether." I will add:--and the great mass of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: people are too criminally indifferent to take a hand in the matter, and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: _do their duty_ regardless of the men of blood.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The seed stock of big-horn sheep now alive in the United States
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: aggregates a pitifully small number. After twenty-five years of unbroken
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: protection in Colorado, Dillon Wallace estimates, after an investigation
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: on the ground, that the state possesses perhaps thirty-five hundred
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: head. He credits Montana and Wyoming with five hundred each--which I
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: think is far too liberal a number. I do not believe that either of those
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: states contains more than one hundred unprotected sheep, at the very
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: utmost limit. If there are more, where are they?
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In the Yellowstone Park there are 210 head, safe and sound, and slowly
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: increasing. I can not understand why they have not increased more
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: rapidly than they have. In Glacier Park, now under permanent protection,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: three guides on Lake McDonald, in 1910, estimated the number of sheep at
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: seven hundred. Idaho has in her rugged Bitter Root and Clearwater
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Mountains and elsewhere, a remnant of possibly two hundred sheep, and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Washington has only what chemists call "a trace." It has recently been
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: discovered that California still contains a few sheep, and in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: southwestern Nevada there are a few more.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In Utah, the big-horn species is probably quite extinct. In Arizona,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: there are a few very small bands, very widely scattered. They are in the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Santa Catalina Mountains, the Grand Canyon country, the Gila Range, and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the Quitovaquita Mountains, near Sonoyta. But who can protect from
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: slaughter those Arizona sheep? Absolutely no one! They are too few and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: too widely scattered for the game wardens to keep in touch with them.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The "prospectors" have them entirely at their mercy, and the world well
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: knows what prospectors' "mercy" to edible big game looks like on the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: ground. It leads straight to the frying-pan, the coyotes and the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: vultures.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The Lower California peninsula contains about five hundred mountain
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: sheep, without the slightest protection save low, desert mountains, heat
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and thirst. But that is no real protection whatever. Those sheep are too
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: fine to be butchered the way they have been, and now are being
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: butchered. In 1908 I strongly called the attention of the Mexican
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Government to the situation; and the Departmento de Fomento secured the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: issue of an executive order forbidding the hunting of any big game in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Lower California without the written authority of the government. I am
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: sure, however, that owing to the political and military upheaval it
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: never stopped the slaughter of sheep. In such easy mountains as those of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Lower California, it is a simple matter to exterminate quickly all the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: mountain sheep that they possess. The time for President Madero and his
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: cabinet to inaugurate serious protective measures has fully arrived.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Both British Columbia and Alberta have even yet fine herds of big-horn,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and we can count three large game preserves in which they are protected.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: They are Goat Mountain Park (East Kootenay district, between the Elk and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Bull Rivers); the Rocky Mountains Park, near Banff, and Waterton Lakes
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Park, in the southwestern corner of Alberta.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In view of the number of men who desire to hunt them, the bag limit on
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: big-horn rams in British Columbia and Alberta still is too liberal, by
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: half. One ram per year for one man is _quite enough_; quite as much so
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: as one moose is the limit everywhere. To-day "a big, old ram" is
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: regarded by sportsmen as a much more desirable and creditable trophy
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: than a moose; because moose-killing is easy, and the bagging of an old
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: mountain ram in real mountains requires five times as much effort and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: skill.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The splendid high and rugged mountains of British Columbia and Alberta
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: form an ideal home for the big-horn (and mountain goat), and it would be
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: an international calamity for that region to be denuded of its splendid
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: big game. With resolute intent and judicial treatment that region can
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: remain a rich and valuable hunting ground for five hundred years to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: come. Under falsely "liberal" laws, it can be shot into a state of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: complete desolation within ten years, or even less.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: OTHER MOUNTAIN SHEEP.--In northern British Columbia, north of Iskoot
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Lake, there lies a tremendous region, extending to the Arctic Ocean, and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: comprehending the whole area between the Rocky Mountain continental
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: divide and the waters of the Pacific. Over the southern end of this
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: great wilderness ranges the black mountain sheep, and throughout the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: remainder, with many sheepless intervals, is scattered the white
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: mountain sheep.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Owing to the immensity of this wilderness, the well-nigh total lack of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: railroads and also of navigable waters, excepting the Yukon, it will not
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: be thoroughly "opened up" for a quarter of a century. The few resolute
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and pneumonia-proof sportsmen who can wade into the country, pulling
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: boats through icy-cold mountain streams, are not going to devastate
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: those millions of mountains of their big game. The few head of game
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: which sportsmen can and will take out of the great northwestern
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: wilderness during the next twenty-five years will hardly be missed from
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the grand total, even though a few easily-accessible localities are shot
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: out. It is the deadly resident trappers, hunters and prospectors who
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: must be feared! And again,--_who_ can control them? Can any wilderness
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: government on earth make it possible? Therefore, _in time, even the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: great wilderness will be denuded of big game_. This is absolutely fixed
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and certain; for within much less than another century, every square rod
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of it will have been gone over by prospectors, lumbermen, trappers and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: skin-hunters, and raked again and again with fine-toothed combs. A
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: railway line to Dawson, the Copper River and Cook Inlet is to-day merely
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the next thing to expect, after Canada's present railway program has
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: been wrought out.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Yes, indeed! In time the wilderness will be opened up, and the big game
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: will _all_ be shot out, save from the protected areas.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: THE MOUNTAIN GOAT.--Even yet, this species is not wholly extinct in the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: United States. It survives in Glacier Park, Montana, and the number
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: estimated in that region by three guide friends is too astoundingly
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: large to mention.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: This animal is much more easily killed than the big-horn. Its white coat
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: renders it fatally conspicuous at long range during the best hunting
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: season; it is almost devoid of fear, and it takes altogether too many
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: chances on man. Thanks to the rage for sheep horns, the average
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: sportsman's view-point regarding wild life ranks a goat head about six
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: contours below "old ram" heads, in desirability. Furthermore, most
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: guides regard the flesh of the goat as almost unfit for use as food, and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: far inferior to that of the big-horn. These reasons, taken together,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: render the goats much less persecuted by the sportsmen, ranchmen and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: prospectors who enter the home of the two species. It was because of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: this indifference toward goats that in 1905 Mr. John M. Phillips and his
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: party saw 243 goats in thirty days in Goat Mountain Park, and only
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: fourteen sheep.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Unless the preferences of western sportsmen and gunners change very
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: considerably, the coast mountains of the great northwestern wilderness
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: will remain stocked with wild mountain goats until long after the last
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: big-horn has been shot to death. Fortunately, the skin of the mountain
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: goat has no commercial value. I think it was in 1887 that I purchased,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: in Denver, 150 nicely tanned skins of our wild white goat _at fifty
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: cents each_! They were wanted for the first exhibit ever made to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: illustrate the extermination of American large mammals, and they were
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: shown at the Louisville Exposition. It must have cost the price of those
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: skins to tan them; and I was pleased to know that some one lost money on
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the venture.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: [Illustration MAP OF THE FORMER AND EXISTING RANGES OF THE AMERICAN ELK
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: From "Life History of Northern Animals," Copyright 1909 by E.T. Seton]
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: At present the mountain goat extends from north-western Montana to the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: head of Cook Inlet, but it is not found in the interior or in the Yukon
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: valley. Whenever man decides that the species has lived long enough, he
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: can quickly and easily exterminate it. It is one of the most picturesque
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and interesting wild animals on this continent, and there is not the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: slightest excuse for shooting it, save as a specimen of natural history.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Like the antelope, it is so unique as a natural curiosity that it
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: deserves to be taken out of the ranks of animals that are regularly
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: pursued as game.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: THE ELK.--The story of the progressive extermination of the American
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: elk, or wapiti, covers practically the same territory as the tragedy of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the American bison--one-third of the mainland of North America. The
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: former range of the elk covered absolutely the garden ground of our
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: continent, omitting the arid region. Its boundary extended from central
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Massachusetts to northern Georgia, southern Illinois, northern Texas and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: central New Mexico, central Arizona, the whole Rocky Mountain region up
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: to the Peace River, and Manitoba. It skipped the arid country west of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the Rockies, but it embraced practically the whole Pacific slope from
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: central California to the north end of Vancouver Island. Mr. Seton
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: roughly calculated the former range of _canadensis_ at two and a half
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: million square miles, and adds: "We are safe, therefore, in believing
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: that in those days there may have been ten million head."
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The range of the elk covered a magnificent domain. The map prepared by
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Mr. Ernest T. Seton, after twenty years of research, is the last word on
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the subject. It appears on page 43, Vol. I, of his great work, "Life
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Histories of Northern Animals," and I have the permission of author and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: publisher to reproduce it here, as an object lesson in wild-animal
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: extermination. Mr. Seton recognizes (for convenience, only?) four forms
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of American elk, two of which, _C. nannodes_ and _occidentalis_, still
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: exist on the Pacific Coast. The fourth, _Cervus merriami_, was
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: undoubtedly a valid species. It lived in Arizona and New Mexico, but
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: became totally extinct near the beginning of the present century.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In 1909 Mr. Seton published in the work referred to above a remarkably
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: close estimate of the number of elk then alive in North America.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Recently, a rough count--the first ever made--of the elk in and around
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the Yellowstone Park, revealed the real number of that largest
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: contingent. By taking those results, and Mr. Seton's figures for elk
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: outside the United States, we obtain the following very close
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: approximation of the wild elk alive in North America in 1912:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: LOCALITY                         NUMBER             AUTHORITY
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Yellowstone Park and vicinity    47,000     U.S. Biological Survey.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Idaho (permanently),                600
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Washington                        1,200 Game Warden Chris. Morgenroth.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Oregon                              500
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: California                          400
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: New York, Adirondacks               400 State Conservation Commission.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Minnesota                            50       E.T. Seton.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Vancouver Island                  2,000       E.T. Seton.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: British Columbia (S.-E.)            200       E.T. Seton.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Alberta                           1,000       E.T. Seton.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Saskatchewan                        500       E.T. Seton
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In various Parks and Zoos         1,000       E.T. Seton.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Total, for all America.          54,850
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In 1905, a herd of twenty of the so-called dwarf elk of the San Joaquin
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Valley, California, were taken to the Sequoia National Park, and placed
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: in a fenced range that had been established for it on the Kaweah River.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The extermination of the wapiti began with the settlement of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: American colonies. Naturally, the largest animals were the ones most
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: eagerly sought by the meat-hungry pioneers, and the elk and bison were
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the first game species to disappear. The colonists believed in the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: survival of the fittest, and we are glad that they did. The one thing
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: that a hungry pioneer cannot withstand is--temptation--in a form that
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: embraces five hundred pounds of succulent flesh. And let it not be
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: supposed that in the eastern states there were only a few elk. The
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Pennsylvania salt licks were crowded with them, and the early writers
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: describe them as existing in "immense bands" and "great numbers."
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Of course it is impossible for wild animals of great size to exist in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: countries that are covered with farms, villages and people. Under such
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: conditions the wild and the tame cannot harmonize. It is a fact,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: however, that elk could exist and thrive in every national forest and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: national park in our country, and also on uncountable hundreds of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: thousands of rough, wild, timbered hills and mountains such as exist in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: probably twenty-five different states. There is no reason, except man's
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: short-sighted greed and foolishness, why there are not to-day one
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: hundred thousand elk living in the Allegheny Mountains, furnishing each
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: year fifty thousand three-year-old males as free food for the people.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The trouble is,--the greedy habitants _could not_ be induced to kill
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: only the three-year-old-males, in the fall, and let the cows, calves and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: breeding bulls alone! By sensible management the Rocky Mountains, the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Sierra Nevadas and the Coast Range would support enough wild elk to feed
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: a million people. But we Americans seem utterly incapable of maintaining
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: anywhere from decade to decade a large and really valuable supply of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: wild game. Outside the Yellowstone Park and northwestern Wyoming, the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: American elk exists only in small bands--mere remnants and samples of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the millions we could and should have.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: _If_ they could be protected, and the surplus presently killed according
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: to some rational, working system, then _every national forest in the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: United States should be stocked with elk_! In view of the awful cost of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: beef (to-day 10-1/2 cents per pound in Chicago _on the hoof_!), it is
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: high time that we should consider the raising of game on the public
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: domain on such lines that it would form a valuable food supply without
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: diminishing the value of the forests.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Just now (1912) the American people are sorely puzzled by a remarkable
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: elk problem that each winter is presented for solution in the Jackson
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Hole country, Wyoming. Driven southward by the deep snows of winter, the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: elk thousands that in summer graze and grow fat in the Yellowstone Park
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: march down into Jackson Hole, to find in those valleys less snow and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: more food. Now, it happens that the best and most of the former winter
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: grazing grounds of the elk are covered by fenced ranches! As a result,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the elk that strive to winter there, about fifteen thousand head, are
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: each winter threatened with starvation; and during three or four winters
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of recent date, an aggregate of several thousand calves, weak yearlings
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and weakened cows perished of hunger. The winters of 1908, 1909 and 1910
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: were progressively more and more severe; and 1911 saw about 2500 deaths,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: (S.N. Leek).
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In 1909-10, the State of Wyoming spent $7,000 for hay, and fed it to the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: starving elk. In 1911, Wyoming spent $5,000 more, and appealed to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Congress for help. Thanks to the efforts of Senator Lodge and others,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Congress instantly responded with a splendid emergency appropriation of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: $20,000, partly for the purpose of feeding the elk, and also to meet the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: cost of transporting elsewhere as many of the elk as it might seem best
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: to move. The starving of the elk ceased with 1911.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: _Outdoor Life_ magazine (Denver, Colo.) for August, 1912, contains an
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: excellent article by Dr. W.B. Shore, entitled, "Trapping and Shipping
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Elk." I wish I could reprint it entire, for the solid information that
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: it contains. It gives a clear and comprehensive account of last spring's
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: operations by the Government and by the state of Montana in capturing
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and shipping elk from the Yellowstone Park herd, for the double purpose
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of diminishing the elk surplus in the Park and stocking vacant ranges
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: elsewhere.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The operations were conducted on the same basis as the shipping of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: cattle--the corral, the chute, the open car, and the car-load in bulk.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Dr. Shore states that the undertaking was really no more difficult than
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the shipping of range cattle; but the presence of a considerable
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: proportion of young and tender calves, such as are never handled with
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: beef cattle, led to 8.8 per cent of deaths in transit. The deaths and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the percentage are nothing at which to be surprised, when it is
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: remembered, that the animals had just come through a hard winter, and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: their natural vitality was at the lowest point of the year.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life
