name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The total deaths in transit and after, of 36 elk out of 305, amounted to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 11.4 per cent.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: All those shipped to Montana points were shipped by the state of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Montana.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In order to provide adequate winter grazing grounds for the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Yellowstone-Wyoming elk, it seems imperative that the national
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: government should expend between $30,000 and $40,000 in buying back from
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: ranchmen certain areas in the Jackson valley, particularly a tract known
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: as "the swamp," and others on the surrounding foothills where the herds
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: annually go to graze in winter, A measure to render this possible was
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: presented to Congress in the winter of 1912, and without opposition an
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: appropriation of $45,000 was made.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The splendid photographs of the elk herds that recently have been made
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: by S.N. Leek, of Jackson Hole, clearly reveal the fact that the herds
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: now consist chiefly of cows, calves, yearlings and young bulls with
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: small antlers. In one photograph showing about twenty-five hundred elk,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: there are not visible even half a dozen pairs of antlers that belong to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: adult bulls. There should be a hundred! This condition means that the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: best bulls, with the finest heads, are constantly being selected and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: killed by sportsmen and others who want their heads; and the young,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: immature bulls are left to do the breeding that alone will sustain the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: species.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: [Illustration: HUNGRY ELK IN JACKSON HOLE, WYOMING
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Part of a Herd of About 2,500 Head, being fed on hay, in the Winter of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 1910-11 Note the Absence of Adult Bulls. Copyright, 1911, by S.N.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Leek]
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: It is a well-known principle in stock-breeding that sires should be
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: fully adult, of maximum strength, and in the prime of life. No
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: stockbreeder in his senses ever thinks of breeding from a youthful,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: immature sire. The result would be weak offspring not up to the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: standard.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: This inexorable law of inheritance and transmission is just as much a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: law for the elk, moose and deer of North America as it is for domestic
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: cattle and horses. If the present conditions in the Wyoming elk herds
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: continue to prevail for several generations, as sure as time goes on we
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: shall see a marked deterioration in the size and antlers of the elk.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: If the foundation principles of stock-breeding are correct, then it is
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: impossible to maintain any large-mammal species at its zenith of size,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: strength and virility by continuous breeding of the young and immature
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: males. By some sportsmen it is believed that through long-continued
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: killing of the finest and largest males, the red deer of Europe have
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: been growing smaller; but on that point I am not prepared to offer
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: evidence.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In regard to the in-breeding of the elk herds in large open parks and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: preserves throughout North America, there are positively _no ill effects
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: to fear_. Wild animals that are _closely_ confined generation after
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: generation are bound to deteriorate physically; but with healthy wild
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: animals living in large open ranges, feeding and breeding naturally, the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: in-breeding that occurs produces no deterioration.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In the twin certainties of over-population, and deterioration from
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: excessive killing of the good sires, we have to face two new problems of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: very decided importance. Nothing short of very radical measures will
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: provide a remedy. For the immediate future, I can offer a solution.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: While it seems almost impossible deliberately to kill females, I think
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: that the present is a very exceptional case, and one that compels us to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: apply the painful remedy that I now propose.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: _Premises_:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 1.--There are at present _too many_ breeding cows in the Yellowstone
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: herds.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 2.--There are far too few good breeding bulls.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: _Conclusion_:--For five years, entirely prohibit the killing of adult
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: male elk, and kill only females, and young males. This would gradually
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: diminish the number of calves born each year, by about 2,500, and by the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: end of five years it would reduce the number, _and the annual birth_, of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: females to a figure sufficiently limited that the herds could be
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: maintained on existing ranges.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: _Corollary_.--At the end of five years, stop killing females, and kill
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: only _young_ males. This plan would permit a large number of bull elk to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: mature; and then the largest and strongest animals would do the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: breeding,--just as Nature always intends shall be done.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: SOUTH AMERICA
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Of all the big-game regions of the earth, South America is the poorest.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Of hoofed game she possesses only a dozen species that are worth the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: attention of sportsmen; and like all other animal life in that land of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: little game, they are desperately hard to find. In South America you
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: must work your heart out in order to get either game or specimens that
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: will be worth showing.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: At present, we need not worry about the marsh deer, the pampas deer, the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: guemal, or the venado, nor the tapir, jaguar, ocelot and bears. All
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: these species are abundantly able to take care of themselves; and to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: find and kill any one of them is a man's task. In Patagonia the natives
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: do wastefully slaughter the guanacos; and there are times also when
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: great numbers of guanacos come down in winter to certain mountain lakes,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: presumably in search of food, and perish by hundreds through starvation.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: (H. Hesketh Prichard.)
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: MEXICO
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: About ten years more will see the extinction of the mountain sheep of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Lower California,--in the wake of the recently exterminated Mexican
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: sheep of the Santa Maria Lakes region. In 1908, I solemnly warned the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: government of President Diaz, and at that time the Mexican government
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: expressed much concern.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: It is a great pity that just now political conditions are completely
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: estopping wild-life protection in Mexico; but it is true. If the code of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: proposed laws that I drew up (by request) in 1908 and submitted to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Minister Molina were adopted, it would have a good effect on the fauna
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of Mexico.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In Mexico there is little hoofed game to kill,--deer of the white-tail
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: groups, seven or eight species; the desert mule deer; the brocket; the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: prong-horned antelope, the mountain sheep and the peccary. The deer will
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: not so easily be exterminated, but the antelope and sheep will be
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: utterly destroyed. They will be the first to go; and I think they can
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: not by any possibility last longer than ten years. Is it not too bad
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: that Mexico should permit her finest species of hoofed and horned game
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: to be obliterated before she awakens to the desirability of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: conservation! The Mexicans could protect their small stock of big game
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: if they would; but in Lower California they are leasing huge tracts of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: land to cattle companies, and they permit the lessees to kill all the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: wild game they please on their leased lands, even with the aid of dogs.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: This is a vicious and fatal system, and contrary to all the laws of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: nations.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: CHAPTER XVII
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: PRESENT AND FUTURE OF NORTH AMERICAN BIG GAME
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: (Concluded)
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: THE WHITE-TAILED DEER.--Five hundred years hence, when the greed and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: rapacity of "civilized" man has completed the loot and ruin of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: continent of North America, the white-tailed deer will be the last
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: species of our big game to be exterminated. Its mental traits, its size,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: its color and its habits all combine to render it the most persistent of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: our large animals, and the best fitted to survive. It neither bawls nor
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: bugles to attract its enemies, it can not be called to a sportsman, like
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the moose, and it sticks to its timber with rare and commendable
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: closeness. When it sees a strange living thing walking erect, it does
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: not stop to stare and catch soft-nosed bullets, but dashes away in quest
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of solitude.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The worst shooting that I ever did or saw done at game was at running
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: white-tailed deer, in the Montana river bottoms.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: For the reasons given, the white-tail exists and persists in a hundred
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: United States localities from which all other big game save the black
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: bear have been exterminated. For example, in our Adirondacks the moose
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: were exterminated years and years ago, but the beloved wilderness called
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the "North Woods" still is populated by about 20,000 deer, and about
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 8,000 are killed annually. The deer of Maine are sufficiently numerous
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: that in 1909 a total of 15,879 were killed. With some assistance from
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the thin sprinkling of moose and caribou, the deer of Maine annually
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: draw into that state, for permanent dedication, a huge sum of money,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: variously estimated at from $1,000,000 to $2,000,000. In spite of heavy
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: slaughter, and vigorous attempts at extermination by over-shooting, the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: deer of northern Michigan obstinately refuse to be wiped out.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: There is, however, a large group of states in which this species has
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: been exterminated. The states comprising it are Ohio, Indiana, Illinois,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Iowa, and adjacent portions of seven other states.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: As if to shame the people of Iowa, a curious deer episode is recorded.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In 1885, W.B. Cuppy, of Avoca, Iowa, purchased five deer, and placed
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: them in a paddock on his 600-acre farm. By 1900 they had increased to 32
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: head; and then one night some one kindly opened the gate of their
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: enclosure, and gave them the freedom of the city. Mr. Cuppy made no
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: effort to capture them, possibly because they decided to annex his farm
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: as their habitat. When a neighbor led them with a bait of corn to their
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: owner's door, he declined to impound them, on the ground that it was
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: unnecessary.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: By 1912, those deer had increased to 400, and the portion of this story
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: that no one will believe is this: they spread all through the suburbs
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and hinterland farms of Avoca, and _the people not only failed to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: assassinate all of them and eat them, but they actually killed only a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: few, protected the rest, and made pets of many!_ Queer people, those men
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and boys of Avoca. Nearly everywhere else in the world that I know, that
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: history would have been ended differently. Here in the East, 90 per cent
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of our people are like the Avocans, but the other 10 per cent think only
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of slaying and eating, sans mercy, sans decency, sans law. Now the State
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of Iowa has taken hold, to capture some of those deer, and set them free
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: in other portions of the state.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Elsewhere I shall note the quick and thorough success with which the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: white-tailed deer has been brought back in Vermont, Massachusetts,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Connecticut, and southern New York.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: No state having waste lands covered with brush or timber need be without
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the ubiquitous white-tailed deer. Give them a semblance of a fair show,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and they will live and breed with surprising fecundity and persistence.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: If you start a park herd with ten does, soon you will have more deer
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: than you will know how to dispose of, unless you market them under a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Bayne law, duly tagged by the state. In close confinement this species
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: fares rather poorly. In large preserves it does well, but during the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: rutting season the bucks are to be dreaded; and those that develop
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: aggressive traits should be shot and marketed. This is the only way in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: which the deer parks of England are kept safe for unarmed people.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Dr. T.S. Palmer has taken much pains to ascertain the number of deer
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: killed in the eastern United States. His records, as published in May,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 1910, are as follows:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: New Hampshire       (a)         (a)        (a)
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: New Jersey                      (a)        120
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Pennsylvania        500         500        800
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: West Virginia       107          51         49
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Maryland             16          13          6
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Virginia            207         210        224
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: North Carolina      (a)         (a)         (a)
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: South Carolina    1,000         (a)         (a)
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Georgia             (a)         367        369
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Alabama             152         148        132
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Mississippi         411         458        500
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Massachusetts                            1,281
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: (a) No statistics available.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: At this date deer hunting is not permitted at any time in Indiana,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Illinois, Iowa, Nebraska and Kansas,--where there are no wild deer; nor
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: in Rhode Island, Connecticut, Delaware, Tennessee or Kentucky. The long
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: close seasons in Massachusetts, Connecticut and southern New York have
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: caused a great migration of deer into those once-depopulated
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: regions,--in fact, right down to tide-water.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: THE MULE DEER.--This will be the first member of the Deer Family to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: become extinct in North America outside of the protected portions of its
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: haunts. Its fatal preference for open ground and its habit of pausing to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: stare at the hunter have been, and to the end will be, its undoing.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Possibly there are now two of these deer in the United States and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: British Columbia for every 98 that existed forty years ago, but no more.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: It is a deer of the bad lands and foothills, and its curiosity is fatal.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The number of sportsmen who have hunted and killed this fine animal in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: its own wild and picturesque bad-lands is indeed quite small. It has
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: been four-fifths exterminated by the resident hunter and ranchman, and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: to-day is found in the Rocky Mountain region most sparingly. Ten years
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: ago it seemed right to hunt the so-called Rocky Mountain "black-tail" in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: northwestern Montana, because so many deer were there it did not seem to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: spell extermination. Now, conditions have changed. Since last winter's
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: great slaughter in northwestern Montana, of 11,000 hungry deer, the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: species has been so reduced that it is no longer right to kill mule deer
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: anywhere in our country, and a universal close season for five years is
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the duty of every state which contains that species.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: THE REAL BLACK-TAILED DEER, of the Pacific coast, (_Odocoileus
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: columbianus_) is, to most sportsmen of the Rocky Mountains and the East
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: actually less known than the okapi! Not one out of every hundred of them
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: can recognize a mounted head of it at sight. It is a small,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: delicately-formed, delicately-antlered understudy of the big mule deer,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and now painfully limited in its distribution. It is _the_ deer of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: California and western Oregon, and it has been so ruthlessly slaughtered
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: that today it is going fast. As conditions stand to-day, and without a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: radical change on the part of the people of the Pacific coast, this very
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: interesting species is bound to disappear. It will not be persistent,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: like the white-tailed deer, but in the heavy forests, it will last much
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: longer than the mule deer.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: My information regarding this deer is like the stock of specimens of it
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: in museum collections,--meager and unsatisfactory. We need to know in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: detail how that species is faring to-day, and what its prospects are for
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the immediate future. In 1900, I saw great piles of skins from it in the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: fur houses of Seattle, and the sight gave me much concern.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: THE CARIBOU, GENERALLY.--I think it is not very difficult to forecast
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the future of the Genus _Rangifer_ in North America, from the logic of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the conditions of to-day. Thanks to the splendid mass of information
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: that has been accumulated regarding this group, we are able to draw
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: certain conclusions. I think that the caribou of the Canadian Barren
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Grounds and northeastern Alaska will survive in great numbers for at
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: least another century; that the caribou herds of Newfoundland will last
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: nearly as long, and that in fifty years or less all the caribou of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: great northwestern wilderness will be swept away.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The reasons for these conclusions are by no means obscure, or
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: farfetched.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In the first place, the barren-ground caribou are to-day enormously
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: numerous,--undoubtedly running up into millions. It can not be possible
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: that they are being killed faster than they are breeding; and so they
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: must be increasing. Their food supply is unlimited. They are protected
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: by two redoubtable champions,--Jack Frost and the Mosquito. Their
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: country never will contain a great human population. The natives are so
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: few in number, and so lazy, that even though they should become supplied
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: with modern firearms, it is unlikely that they ever will make a serious
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: impression on the caribou millions. The only thing to fear for the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: barren-ground caribou throngs is disease,--a factor that is beyond human
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: prediction.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: It is reasonably certain that the Barren Grounds never will be netted by
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: railways,--unless gold is discovered over a wide area. The fierce cold
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and hunger, and the billions of mosquitoes of the Barren Grounds will
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: protect the caribou from the wholesale slaughter that "civilized" man
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: joyously would inflict--if he had the chance.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The caribou thousands of Newfoundland are fairly accessible to sportsmen
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and pot-hunters, but at the same time the colonial government can
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: protect them from extermination if it will. Already much has been done
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: to check the reckless and wicked slaughter that once prevailed. A bag
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: limit of three bull caribou per annum has been fixed, which is enforced
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: as to non-residents and sportsmen, but in a way that is much too
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "American" it is often ignored by residents in touch with the game. For
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: instance, the guide of a New York gentleman whom I know admitted to my
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: friend that each year he killed "about 25" caribou for himself and his
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: family of four other persons. He explained thus: "When the inspector
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: comes around, I show him two caribou hanging in my woodshed, but back in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the woods I have a little shack where I keep the others until I want
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: them."
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The real sportsmen of the world never will make the slightest
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: perceptible impression on the caribou of Newfoundland. For one thing,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the hunting is much too tame to be interesting. If the caribou of that
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Island ever are exterminated, it will be strictly by the people of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Newfoundland, themselves. If the government will tighten its grip on the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: herds, they need never be exterminated.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The caribou of New Brunswick, Quebec and Ontario are few and widely
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: scattered. Unless carefully conserved, they are not likely to last long;
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: for their country is annually penetrated in every direction by armed
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: men, white and red. There is no means by which it can be proven, but
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: from the number of armed men in those regions I feel sure that the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: typical woodland caribou species is being shot faster than it is
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: breeding. The sportsmen and naturalists of Canada and New Brunswick
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: would render good service by making a close and careful investigation of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: that question.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The caribou of the northwestern wilderness are in a situation peculiarly
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: their own. They inhabit a region of naked mountains and _thin_ forests,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: wherein they are conspicuous, easily stalked and easily killed. Nowhere
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: do they exist in large herds of thousands, or even of many hundreds.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: They live in small bands of from ten to twenty head, and even those are
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: far apart. The region in which they live is certain to be thoroughly
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: opened up by railways, and exploited. Fifty years from now we will find
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: every portion of the now-wild Northwest fairly accessible by rail. The
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: building of the railways will be to the caribou--and to other big
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: game--the day of doom. In that wild, rough region, no power on
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: earth,--save that which might be able to deprive _all_ the inhabitants
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and all visitors of firearms,--can possibly save the game outside of a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: few preserves that are diligently patroled.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The big game of the northwest region, in which I include the interior of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Alaska, _will go_! It is only a question of time. Already the building
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of the city of Fairbanks, and the exploitation of the mining districts
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: surrounding it, have led to such harassment and slaughter of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: migrating caribou that the great herd which formerly traversed the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Tanana country once a year has completely changed its migration route,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and now keeps much farther north. The "crossing" of the Yukon near Eagle
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: City has been abandoned. A hundred years hence, the northwestern
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: wilderness will be dotted with towns and criss-crossed with railways;
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: but the big game of it will be gone, except in the preserves that are
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: yet to be made. This will particularly involve the caribou, moose, and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: mountain sheep of all species, which will be the first to go. The
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: mountain goat and the forest bears will hold out longer than their more
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: exposed neighbors of the treeless mountains.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: THE MOOSE.--In the United States the moose is found in five
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: states,--Maine, Minnesota, Montana, Wyoming and Idaho. There are 550 in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the Yellowstone Park. In Maine and Minnesota only may moose be hunted
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and killed. In the season of 1909, 184 moose were killed in Maine,--a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: large number, considering the small moose population of that state. In
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: northern Minnesota, we now possess a great national moose preserve of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 909,743 acres; and in 1908 Mr. Fullerton, after a personal inspection in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: which he saw 189 moose in nine days, estimated the total moose
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: population of the present day at 10,000 head. This is a moose preserve
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: worth while.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Outside of protected areas, the moose is the animal that is most easily
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: exterminated. Its trail is easily followed, and its habits are
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: thoroughly known, down to three decimal places. As a hunter's reward it
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: is Great. Strange to say, New Brunswick has found that the moose is an
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: animal that it is possible, and even easy, to protect. The death of a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: moose is an event that is not easily concealed! Wherever it is
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: thoroughly understood that the moose law will be enforced, the would-be
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: poacher pauses to consider the net results to him of a jail sentence.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In New Brunswick we have seen two strange things happen, during our own
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: times. We have seen the moose migrate into, and permanently occupy, an
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: extensive area that previously was destitute of that species. At the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: same time, we have seen a reasonable number of bull moose killed by
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: sportsmen without disturbing in the least the general equanimity of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: general moose population! And at this moment, the moose population of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: New Brunswick is almost incredible. Every moose hunter who goes there
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: sees from 20 to 40 moose, and two of my friends last year saw, "in round
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: numbers, about 100!" Up to date the size of adult antlers seem to be
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: maintaining a high standard.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In summer, the photographing of moose in the rivers, lakes and ponds of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Maine and New Brunswick amounts to an industry. I am uneasy about the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: constant picking off of the largest and best breeding bulls of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Mirimachi country, lest it finally reduce the size and antlers of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: moose of that region; but only the future can tell us just how that
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: prospect stands to-day.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In Alaska, our ever thoughtful and forehanded Biological Survey of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Department of Agriculture has by legal proclamation at one stroke
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: converted the whole of the Kenai Peninsula into a magnificent moose
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: preserve. This will save _Alces gigas_, the giant moose of Alaska, from
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: extermination; and New Brunswick and the Minnesota preserve will save
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: _Alces americanus_. But in the northwest, we can positively depend upon
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: it that eventually, wherever the moose may legally be hunted and killed
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: by any Tom, Dick or Harry who can afford a twenty-dollar rifle and a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: license, the moose surely will disappear.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The moose laws of Alaska are strict--toward sportsmen, only! The miners,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "prospectors" and Indians may kill as many as they please, "for food
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: purposes." This opens the door to a great amount of unfair slaughter.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Any coffee-cooler can put a pan and pick into his hunting outfit, go out
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: after moose, and call himself a "prospector."
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: I grant that the _real_ prospector, who is looking for ores and minerals
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: with an intelligent eye, and knows what he is doing, should have special
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: privileges on game, to keep him from starving. The settled miner,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: however, is in a different class. No miner should ask the privilege of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: living on wild game, any more than should the farmer, the steamboat man,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the railway laborer, or the soldier in an army post. The Indian should
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: have no game advantages whatever over a white man. He does not own the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: game of a region, any more than he owns its minerals or its water-power.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: He should obey the general game laws, just the same as white men. In
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Africa, as far as possible, the white population wisely prohibits the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: natives from owning or using firearms, and a good idea it is, too. I am
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: glad there is one continent on which the "I'm-just-as-good-as-you-are"
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: nightmare does not curse the whole land.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: THE MUSK-OX.--Now that the north pole has been safely discovered, and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the south pole has become the storm-center of polar exploration, the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: harried musk-ox herds of the farthest north are having a rest. I think
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: that most American sportsmen have learned that as a sporting proposition
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: there is about as much fun and glory in harrying a musk-ox herd with
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: dogs, and picking off the members of it at "parade rest," as there is in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: shooting range cattle in a round-up. The habits of the animal positively
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: eliminate the real essence of sport,--difficulty and danger. When a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: musk-ox band is chased by dogs, or by wolves, the full-grown members of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: it, bulls and cows alike, instantly form a close circle around the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: calves, facing outward shoulder to shoulder, and stand at bay. Without
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the aid of a gunner and a rifle, such a formation is invincible! Mr.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Paul Rainey's moving pictures tell a wonderful story of animal
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: intelligence, bravery and devotion to the parental instinct.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: For some reason, the musk-ox herds do not seem to have perceptibly
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: increased since man first encountered them. The number alive to-day
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: appears to be no greater than it was fifty years ago; and this leads to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the conclusion that the present delicate balance could easily be
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: disturbed the wrong way. Fortunately, it seems reasonably certain that
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the Indians of the Canadian Barren Grounds, the Eskimo of the far north,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and the stray explorers all live outside the haunts of the species, and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: come in touch only with the edge of the musk-ox population as a whole.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: This leads us to hope and believe that, through the difficulties
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: involved in reaching them, the main bodies of musk-ox of both species
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: are safe from extermination.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: At the same time, the time has come for Canada, the United States and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Denmark to join in formulating a stiff law for the prevention of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: wholesale slaughter of musk-ox for sport. It should be rendered
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: impossible for another sportsman to kill twenty-three head in one day,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: as once occurred. Give the sportsman a bag of three bulls, and no more.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: To this, no true sportsman will object, and the objections of game-hogs
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: only serve to confirm the justice of the thing they oppose.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: THE GRIZZLY BEAR.--To many persons it may seem strange that anyone
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: should feel disposed to accord protection to such fierce predatory
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: animals as grizzly bears, lions and tigers. But the spirit of fair play
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: springs eternal in some human breasts. The sportsmen of the world do not
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: stick at using long-range, high-power repeating rifles on big game, but
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: they draw the line this side of traps, poisons and extermination. The
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: sportsmen of India once thought,--for about a year and a day,--that it
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: was permissible to kill troublesome and expensive tigers by poison. Mr.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: G.P. Sanderson tried it, and when his strychnine operations promptly
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: developed three bloated and disgusting tiger carcasses, even his native
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: followers revolted at the principle. That was the alpha and omega of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Sanderson's poisoning activities.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: I am quite sure that if the extermination of the tiger from the whole of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: India were possible, and the to-be or not-to-be were put to a vote of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the sportsmen of India, the answer would be a thundering _"No!"_ Says
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Major J. Stevenson-Hamilton in his "Animal Life in Africa:" "It is
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: impossible to contemplate the use against the lion of any other weapon
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: than the rifle."
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The real sportsmen and naturalists of America are decidedly opposed to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the extermination of the grizzly bear. They feel that the wilds of North
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: America are wide enough for the accommodation of many grizzlies, without
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: crowding the proletariat. A Rocky Mountain without a grizzly upon it, or
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: at least a bear of some kind, is only half a mountain,--commonplace and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: tame. Put one two-year-old grizzly cub upon it, and presto! every cubic
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: yard of its local atmosphere reeks with romantic uncertainty and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: fearsome thrills.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: A few persons have done considerable talking and writing about the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: damage to stock inflicted by bears, but I think there is little
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: justification for such charges. Certainly, there is not one-tenth enough
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: real damage done by bears to justify their extermination. At the present
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: time, we hear that the farmers (!) of Kadiak Island, Alaska, are being
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: seriously harassed and damaged by the big Kadiak bear,--an animal so
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: rare and shy that it is very difficult for a sportsman to kill one! I
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: think the charges against the bears,--if the Kadiak Islanders ever
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: really have made any,--need to be proven, by the production of real
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: evidence.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In the United States, outside of our game preserves, I know of not one
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: locality in which grizzly bears are sufficiently numerous to justify a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: sportsman in going out to hunt them. The California grizzly, once
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: represented by "Monarch" in Golden Gate Park, is almost, if not wholly,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: extinct. In Montana, outside of Glacier Park it is useless to apply for
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: wild grizzlies. In the Bitter Root Mountains and Clearwater Mountains of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Idaho, there are grizzlies, but they hide so effectually under the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: snow-bent willows on the "slides" that it is almost impossible to get a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: shot. Northwestern Wyoming still contains a few grizzlies, but there are
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: so many square miles of mountains around each animal it is now almost
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: useless to go hunting for them. British Columbia, western Alberta and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the coast mountains at least as far as Skaguay, and Yukon Territory
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: generally, all contain grizzlies, and the sportsman who goes out for
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: sheep, caribou and moose is reasonably certain to see half a dozen bears
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and kill at least one or two. In those countries, the grizzly species
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: will hold forth long after all killable grizzlies have vanished from the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: United States.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: I think that it is now time for California, Montana, Washington, Oregon,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Idaho and Wyoming to give grizzly bears protection of some sort.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Possibly the situation in those states calls for a five-year close
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: season. Even British Columbia should now place a bag limit on this
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: species. This has seemed clear to me ever since two of my friends killed
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: (in the spring of 1912) _six_ grizzlies in one week! But Provincial Game
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Warden A. Bryan Williams says that at present it would be impossible to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: impose a bag limit of one per year on the grizzlies of British Columbia;
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and Mr. Williams is a sincere game-protector.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: THE BROWN BEARS OF ALASKA.--These magnificent monsters present a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: perplexing problem, which I am inclined to believe can be satisfactorily
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: solved by the Biological Survey only in short periods, say of three or
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: four years each. Naturally, the skin hunters of Alaska ardently desire
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the skins of those bears, for the money they represent. That side of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: bear problem does not in the least appeal to the ninety odd millions of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: people who live this side of Alaska. The skins of the Alaskan brown
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: bears have little value save as curiosities, nailed upon the wall, where
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: they can not be stepped upon and injured. The _hunting_ of those bears,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: however, is a business for men; and it is partly for that reason they
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: should be preserved. A bear-hunt on the Alaska Peninsula, Admiralty or
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Montagu Islands, is an event of a lifetime, and with a bag limit of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: _one_ brown bear, the species would be quite safe from extermination.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: [Illustration: THE WICHITA NATIONAL BISON HERD
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Presented by the New York Zoological Society]
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In Alaska there is some dissatisfaction over the protection accorded the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: big brown bears; but those rules are right _as far as they go_! A
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: governor of Alaska once said to me: "The preservation of the game of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Alaska should be left to the _people_ of Alaska. It is their game; and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: they will preserve it all right!"
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The answer? _Not by a long shot_!
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Only three things were wrong with the ex-governor's view:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 1.--The game of Alaska does _not_ belong to the people who live in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Alaska--with the intent to get out to-morrow! It belongs to the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 93,000,000 people of the Nation.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 2.--The preservation of the Alaskan fauna on the public domain should
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: not be left unreservedly to the people of Alaska, because
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 3.--As sure as shooting, they will _not_ preserve it!
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Congress is right in appropriating $15,000 for game protection in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Alaska. It is very necessary that the regulations for conserving the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: wild life should be fixed by the Secretary of Agriculture, with the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: advice of the Biological Survey.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: THE BLACK BEAR is an interesting citizen. He harms nobody nor anything;
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: he affords good sport; he objects to being exterminated, and wherever in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: North America he is threatened with extermination, he should at once be
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: given protection! A black bear _in the wilds_ is harmless. In captivity,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: posed as a household "pet," he is decidedly dangerous, and had best be
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: given the middle of the road. In big forests he is a grand stayer, and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: will not be exterminated from the fauna of the United States until
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Washington is wrecked by anarchists.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: THE AMERICAN BISON.--I regard the American bison species as now
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: reasonably secure against extermination. This is due to the fact that it
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: breeds persistently and successfully in captivity, and to the great
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: efforts that have been put forth by the United States Government, the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Canadian Government, the American Bison Society, the New York Zoological
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Society, and several private individuals.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The species reached its lowest ebb in 1889, when there were only 256
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: head in captivity and 835 running wild. The increase has been as
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: follows:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 1888--W.T. Hornaday's census                     1,300
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 1902--S.P. Langley's census                      1,394
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 1905--Frank Baker's census                       1,697
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 1908--W.T. Hornaday's census                     2,047
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 1910--W.P. Wharton's census (in North America)   2,108
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 1912--W.P. Wharton's census (in North America)   2,907
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: To-day, nearly one-half of the living bison are in very large
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: governmental parks, perpetually established and breeding rapidly, as
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: follows:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: IN THE UNITED STATES.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Yellowstone Park fenced herd, founded by Congress                   125
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Montana National Bison Range, founded by The American Bison Society  69
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Wichita Bison Range, founded by The New York Zoological Society      39
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Wind Cave Bison Range, S. Dakota, founded by Am. Bison Society    To be
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: stocked
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Niobrara (Neb.) National Bison Range, now in process of creation  To be
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: stocked
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: IN CANADA.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Buffalo Park, Wainwright, Alberta        1,052
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Elk Island Park, Alberta                    53
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Rocky Mountains Park, Banff, Alberta        27
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Total National and Provincial Preserves  1,365
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Of wild bison there are only three groups: 49 head in the Yellowstone
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: National Park, about 75 Pablo "outlaws" around the Montana Bison Range,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and between 300 and 400 head in northern Athabasca, southwest of Fort
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Resolution, existing in small and widely scattered bands.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The efforts of man to atone for the great bison slaughter by preserving
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the species from extinction have been crowned with success. Two
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: governments and two thousand individuals have shared this task,--solely
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: for sentimental reasons. In these facts we find reason to hope and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: believe that other efforts now being made to save other species from
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: annihilation will be equally successful.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: CHAPTER XVIII
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: THE PRESENT AND FUTURE OF AFRICAN GAME
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Thanks to the diligence with which sportsmen and field naturalists have
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: recorded their observations in the haunts of big game, it is not at all
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: difficult to forecast the immediate future of the big game of the world.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: We may safely assume that all lands well suited to agriculture, mining
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and grazing will become populated by rifle-bearing men, with the usual
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: result to the wild mammals and birds. At the same time, the game of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: open mountains everywhere is thinly distributed and easily exterminated.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: On the other hand, the unconquerable forest jungles of certain portions
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of the tropics will hold their own, and shelter their four-footed
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: inhabitants for centuries to come.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: On the open mountains of the world and on the grazing lands most big
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: game is now being killed much faster than it breeds. This is due to the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: attacks of five times too many hunters, open seasons that are too long,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and bag limits that are far too liberal. As an example, consider Africa
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Viewed in any way it may be taken, the bag limit in British East Africa
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: is appallingly high. Notice this astounding array of wild creatures that
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: _each hunter_ may kill under a license costing _only $250!_
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 2 Buffalo
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 2 Rhinoceros
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 2 Hippopotamus
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 1 Eland
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 2 Grevy Zebra
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 20 Common Zebra

name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 4 Beisa Antelope
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 4 Waterbuck

txt: 1 Sable Antelope
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 1 Roan Antelope
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 1 Greater Kudu
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 4 Lesser Kudu

txt: 10 Topi
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

name: Our Vanishing Wild Life
