name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The grand total is a possible 300 large hoofed and horned animals
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: representing _44 species_! Add to this all the lions, leopards,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: cheetahs, cape hunting dogs and hyaenas that the hunter can kill, and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: it will be enough to stock a zoological garden!
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Quite a number of these species, like the sable antelope, kudu, Hunter's
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: antelope, bongo and sitatunga are already rare, and therefore they are
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: all the more eagerly sought.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Into the fine grass-lands of British East Africa, suitable for crops and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: stock grazing, settlers are steadily going. Each one is armed, and at
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: once becomes a killer of big game. And all the time the visiting
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: sportsmen are increasing in number, going farther from the Uganda
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Railway, and persistently seeking out the rarest and finest of the game.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The buffalo has recovered from the slaughter by rinderpest only in time
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: to meet the onset of oversea sportsmen.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Mr. Arthur Jordan has seen much of the big game of British East Africa,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and its killing. Him I asked to tell me how long, in his opinion, the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: big game of that territory will last outside of the game preserves, as
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: it is now being killed. He said, "Oh, it will last a long time. I think
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: it will last fifteen years!"
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: _Fifteen years!_ And this for the richest big-game fauna of any one spot
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: in the whole world, which Nature has been _several million years in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: developing and placing there_!
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: At present the marvelous herds of big game of British East Africa and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Uganda constitute the grandest zoological spectacle that the world ever
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: has seen in historic times. For such an area, the number of species is
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: incredible, and until they are seen, the thronging masses of individuals
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: are beyond conception. It is easy to say "a herd of 3,000 zebras;" but
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: no mere words can give an adequate impression of the actual army of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: stripes and bars, and hoofs thundering in review over a grassy plain.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: But the settlers say, "The zebras must go! They break through our best
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: wire fences, ruin our crops, despoil us of the fruits of long and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: toilsome efforts, and much expenditure. We simply can not live in a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: country inhabited by herds of wild zebras." And really, their contention
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: is well founded. When it is necessary to choose between wild animals and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: peaceful agriculture for millions of men, the animals must give way.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In those portions of the great East African plateau region that are
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: suited to modern agriculture, stretching from Buluwayo to northern
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Uganda, the wild herds are doomed to be crowded out by the farmer and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the fruit-grower. This is the inevitable result of civilization and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: progress in wild lands. Marauding battalions of zebras, bellicose
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: rhinoceroses and murderous buffaloes do not fit in with ranches and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: crops, and children going to school. Except in the great game preserves,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the swamps and the dense jungles it is certain that the big game of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: whole of eastern Africa is foredoomed to disappear,--the largest and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: most valuable species first.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Five hundred years from now, when North America is worn out, and wasted
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: to a skeleton of what it now is, the great plateau region of East Africa
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: between Cape Town and Lake Rudolph will be a mighty empire, teeming
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: with white population. Giraffes and rhinoceroses now are trampling over
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the sites of the cities and universities of the future. Then the herds
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of grand game that now make Africa a sportsman's wonderland will exist
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: only in closed territory, in books, and in memory.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: [Illustration: MAP SHOWING THE DISAPPEARANCE OF THE LION
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Incidentally, it is also an Index of the Disappearance of African Big
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Game Generally. From an Article in the Review of Reviews, for August,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 1912, by Cyrus C. Adams, and Based Largely upon the Exhaustive Studies
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of Dr. C.M. Engel, of Copenhagen.]
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: From what has befallen in South Africa, we can easily and correctly
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: forecast the future of the big game of British East Africa and Uganda.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Less than fifty years ago, Cape Colony, Natal, Zululand, and every
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: country up to the Zambesi was teeming with herds of big wild animals,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: just as the northern provinces now are. As late as 1890, when Rhodesia
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: was taken over by the Chartered Company, and the capital city of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Salisbury was staked out, an American boy in the Pioneer Corps, now
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Honorable William Harvey Brown, of Salisbury, wrote thus of the Gwibi
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Flats, near Salisbury:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "That evening I beheld on those flats a sight which probably will never
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: again be seen there to the end of the world. The variety deploying
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: before me was almost incredible! There, within the range of my vision
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: were groups of roan, sable and tsessebi antelopes, Burchell zebras, [now
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: totally extinct!] elands, reedbucks, steinbucks and ostriches. It was
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: like Africa in the days of Livingstone. As I sat on my horse, viewing
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: with amazement this wonderful panorama of wild life, I was startled by a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: herd that came galloping around a small hill just behind me."--("_On the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: South African Frontier_," p. 114.)
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: That was in 1890. And how is it to-day?
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Salisbury is a modern city, endorsed by two lines of railway. The Gwibi
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Flats are farms. There is some big game yet, in Rhodesia south of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Zambesi, but to find it you must go at least a week's journey from the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: capital, to the remote corners that have not yet been converted into
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: farms or mining settlements. North of the Zambesi, Rhodesia yet contains
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: plenty of big game. The Victoria Falls station is a popular starting
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: point for hunting expeditions headed northeast and northwest. In the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: northwest the game is yet quite in a state of nature. Unfortunately the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Barotse natives of that region can procure from the Portuguese traders
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: all the firearms and ammunition that they can pay for, and by treaty
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: they retain their hunting rights. The final result will
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: be--extermination of the game.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Elsewhere throughout Rhodesia the natives are not permitted to have guns
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and gunpowder,--a very wise regulation. In Alaska our Indians are
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: privileged to kill game all the year round, and they have modern
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: firearms with which to do it.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: And how is it with the game of that day?
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The true Burchell's zebra is now regarded as _extinct_! In Cape Colony
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and Natal, that once teemed with big game in the old-fashioned African
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: way, they are _counting the individual wild animals that remain_! Also,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: they are making game preserves, literally everywhere.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Now that the best remaining game districts of Africa are rapidly coming
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: under British control, it is a satisfaction to observe that the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: governing bodies and executive officers are alive to the necessity of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: preserving the big game from actual extinction. Excepting German East
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Africa, from Uganda to Cape Colony the game preserves form an almost
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: continuous chain. It is quite impossible to enumerate all of them; but
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the two in British East Africa are of enormous size, and are well
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: stocked with game. South Africa contains a great many smaller preserves
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and a few specimen herds of big game, but that is about all. Except in a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: few localities the hunting of big game in that region is done forever.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The Western Districts Game and Trout Protective Association of South
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Africa recently, (1911), has made careful counts and estimates of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: number of individual game animals remaining in Cape Colony, with the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: following result:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: BIG GAME IN THE CAPE PROVINCE
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: From information kindly placed at the disposal of the Association by the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Government, it was found that the following varieties of big game are
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: still found in the Province. The numbers, however, are only approximate:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: _Blesbok_: About 400 in Steynsburg, and 35 in Queen's Town divisions.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: _Bontebok_: About 30 in Bredasdorp and 45 in Swellendam divisions.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: _Buffalo_: About 340 in Uitenhage, 120 in Alexandria, and 75 in Bathurst
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: divisions.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: _Elephants_: About 130 in Alexandria, 160 in Uitenhage, 40 in Bathurst,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and 20 in Knysna divisions.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: _Gemsbok_: About 2,450 in Namaqualand, 4,500 in Vryburg, 4,000 in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Gordonia, and 670 in the Kenhardt, Mafeking and Barkly West divisions.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: _Koodoo_: About 10,000, found chiefly in the divisions of Albany, Barkly
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: West, Fort Beaufort, Hay, Herbert, Jansenville, Kuruman, Ladismith,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Mafeking, Mossel Bay, Oudtshoorn, Riversdale, Steytlerville, Uitenhage,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Victoria East and Vryburg.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: _Oribi_: About 120, in the divisions of Albany and Alexandria.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: _Rietbok_: About 170, in the Komgha division.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: _Zebra_: About 560, most of which are to be found in the divisions of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Cradock, George and Oudtshoorn. A few are to be found in the divisions
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of Uniondale and Uitenhage.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: _Springbok_: Being migratory, it is difficult to estimate their number.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In some years they are compelled by drought to invade the Province in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: large numbers. They are then seen as far south as Calvinia and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Fraserburg. Large numbers are, however, fenced in on private estates in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: various parts of the Province.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: _Klipspringers_: About 11,200, in the following divisions, viz.:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Namaqualand, 6,559; Kuruman, 2,100; Steytlerville, 1,530; Oudtshoorn,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 275; Hay, 250; Ladismith, 220; Graaff-Reinet, 119; Kenhardt, 66; and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Cradock, 56.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: _Hartebeest_: About 9,700, principally in the divisions of Vryburg,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Gordonia, Kuruman, Mafeking, Kimberley, Hay and Beaufort West.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: _Wildebeest_: About 3,450 in Vryburg, 80 each in Gordonia and Kuruman,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 65 in Mafeking, 20 in Queen's Town, and a few in the Bredasdorp
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: divisions.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: _Eland_: About 12 in the Graaff-Reinet division, privately bred.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The above showing of the pitifully small numbers of the specimens that
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: constitute the remnant of the big-game of the Cape suggest just one
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: thing:--a universal close season throughout Cape Colony, and no hunting
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: whatever for ten years. And yet, what do we see?
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The Report from which the above census was taken contains half a column
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of solid matter, in small type, giving a list of the _open seasons_ all
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: over Cape Colony, during which killing may be done! So it seems that the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: spirit of slaughter is the same in Africa that it is in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: America,--_kill_, as long as there is _anything_ alive to kill!
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: This list is of startling interest, because it shows how closely the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: small remnants of big game are now marked down in South Africa.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In view of the success with which Englishmen protect their game when
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: once they have made up their minds to do so, it is fair to expect that
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the herds now under protection, as listed above, will save their
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: respective species from extinction. It is alarming, however, to note the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: wide territory covered by the deadly "open seasons," and to wonder when
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the bars really will be put up.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: To-day, Mashonaland is a very-much-settled colony. The Cape to Cairo
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: railway and trains de luxe long ago attained the Palls of the Zambesi,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and now the Curator of the Salisbury Museum will have to search
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: diligently in far off Nyassaland, and beyond the Zambesi River, to find
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: enough specimens to fill his cases with representatives of the vanished
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Rhodesian fauna. Once (1892) the white rhinoceros was found in northern
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Rhodesia; but never again. In Salisbury, elands and zebras are nearly as
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: great a curiosity as they are in St. Louis.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: But for the discovery of white rhinoceroses in the Lado district, on the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: western bank of the Nile below Gondokoro, we would now be saying that
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: _Rhinoceros simus_ is within about ten specimens of total extinction.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: From South Africa, as far up as Salisbury, in central Rhodesia, at least
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 99 per cent of the big game has disappeared before the white man's
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: rifle. Let him who doubts this scan the census of wild animals still
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: living in Cape Colony.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: From all the other regions of Africa that are easily accessible to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: gunners, the animal life is vigorously being shot out, and no man in his
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: senses will now say that the big game is breeding faster than it is
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: being killed. The reverse is painfully true. Mr. Carl Akeley, in his
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: quest for a really large male elephant for the American Museum found and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: looked over _a thousand_ males without finding one that was really fine
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and typical. All the photographs of elephant herds that were taken by
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Kermit Roosevelt and Akeley show a striking absence of adult males and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of females with long tusks. There are only young males, and young
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: females with small, short tusks. The answer is--the white ivory hunters
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: have killed nearly all the elephants bearing good ivory.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The slaughter of big game is going on furiously in British East Africa
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: because the Uganda Railway opens up the entire territory to hunters.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Anyone, man or woman, who can raise $5,000 in cash can go there and make
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: a huge "bag" of big game. With a license costing only $250 he can kill
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: enough big game to sink a ship.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The bag limit in British East Africa is ruinously extravagant. If the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: government desires the extermination of the game, such a bag limit
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: surely will promote that end. It is awful to think that for a petty sum
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: any man may buy the right to kill 300 _head_ of hoofed and horned
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: animals, of 44 species, not counting the carnivorous animals that also
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: may be killed. That bag limit should _immediately_ be reduced _75 per
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: cent_!
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: As matters stand to-day in British East Africa, the big game of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: country, outside the three preserves, is absolutely certain to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: disappear, in about one-fourth of the time that it took South Africa to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: accomplish the same result. The reasons are obvious:--superior
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: accessibility, more deadly rifles, expert professional guides, and a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: widespread craze for killing big game. With care and economy, British
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: East Africa should furnish good hunting for two centuries, but as
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: things are going on to-day, twenty years will see a tremendous change
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: for the worse, and a disappearance of game that will literally astonish
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the natives.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: German East Africa and Uganda will not exterminate their quotas of big
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: game quite so soon. The absence of railways is a great factor in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: game-existence. The Congo Free State contains game and sporting
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: possibilities--on the unexplored uplands _between the rivers_,--that are
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: as yet totally unknown to sportsmen at large. We are accustomed to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: thinking of the whole basin of the Congo as a vast, gloomy and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: impenetrable forest.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: There is to-day in Africa a vast reserve supply of grand game. It
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: inhabits regions that are either unknown, or most difficult to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: penetrate. As a species in point, consider the okapi. Only the boldest
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and most persistent explorers ever have set foot in its tangled and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: miasmatic haunts. It may be twenty years before a living specimen can be
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: brought out. The gorilla and the chimpanzee are so well protected by the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: density of their jungles that they never can be exterminated--until the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: natives are permitted to have all the firearms that they desire! When
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: that day arrives, it is "good-night" to all the wild life that is large
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: enough to eat or to wear.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The quagga and the blaubok became _extinct_ before the world learned
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: that their existence was threatened! The giant eland, the sable
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: antelope, the greater kudu, the bontebok, blessbok, the mountain and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Burchell zebras, all the giraffes save that of Nigeria, the big
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: waterbucks, the nyala, the sitatunga, the bongo, and the gerenuk--all
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: will go in the same way, everywhere outside the game preserves. The
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: buffalo, zebra and rhinoceros are especially marked for destruction, as
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: annoyances to colonists. You who read of the killing of these species
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: to-day will read of their total disappearance to-morrow. So long as the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: hunting of them is permitted, their ultimate disappearance is fixed and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: certain. It is not the way of rifle-shooting English colonists to permit
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: herds of big game to run about merely to be looked at.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Naturally, the open plains of Africa, and the thin forests of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: plateau regions, will be the first to lose their big game. In the gloomy
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: fastnesses of the great equatorial forests, and other really dense
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: forests wherever found, the elephants, the Derby eland, the bongo, the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: okapi, the buffaloes (of three species), the bush-pigs, the bushbucks
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and the forest-loving antelopes generally will live, for possibly one
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: hundred years,--_or until the natives secure plenty of modern firearms
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and ammunition_. Whenever and wherever savages become supplied with
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: rifles, then it is time to measure each big-game animal for its coffin.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The elephants of the great equatorial forest westward of the lake region
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: will survive long after the last eastern elephant has bitten the dust.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The pygmy elephant of the lower Congo region (_Elephas pumilio_) will be
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the last African elephant species to disappear--because it inhabits
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: dense miasmatic jungles, its tusks are of the smallest size, and it has
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the least commercial value.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: CHAPTER XIX
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: THE PRESENT AND FUTURE OF THE GAME OF ASIA
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: After a successful survival of man's influence through two thousand
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: years, at last the big game of India has made a good start on the road
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: to vanishment. Up to 1870 it had held its own with a tenacity that was
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: astonishing. In 1877, I found the Ganges--Jumna dooab, the Animallai
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Hills, the Wynaad Forest and Ceylon literally teeming with herds of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: game. The Animallais in particular were a hunter's paradise. In each day
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of hunting, large game of some kind was a certainty. The Nilgiri Hills
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: had been quite well shot out, but in view of the very small area and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: open, golf-links character of the whole top of that wonderful sky
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: plateau, that was no cause for wonderment.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In those days no native shikaree owned and operated a gun,--or at the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: most very, very few of them did. If a rogue elephant, a man-eating tiger
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: or a nasty leopard became a public nuisance, it was a case for a sahib
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: to come and doctor it with a .577 double-barreled express rifle, worth
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: $150 or more; and the sahibs had shooting galore.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: I think that no such great wild-life sights as those of the plateau
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: regions of Africa ever were seen in southern Asia. Conditions there are
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: different, and usually the game is widely scattered. The sambar deer and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: muntjac of the dense forests, the axis of the bamboo glades, the thameng
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: deer of the Burmese jungles, the sladang, or gaur, of the awful Malay
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: tangle, and the big cats and canines will last long and well. The
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: ibexes, markhors, tahr and all the wild sheep eventually will be shot
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: out by sportsmen who are "sheep crazy." The sheep and goats of Asia will
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: disappear soon after the plains animals of Africa, because no big game
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: that lives in the open can much longer endure the modern, inexpensive
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: long-range rifles of deadly accuracy and limitless repetition of fire.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Eventually, I fear that by some unlucky turn of Fortune's wheel all the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: native hunters of Asia will obtain rifles; and when they do, we soon
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: will see the end of the big game.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Even to-day we find that the primitive conditions of 1877 have been
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: greatly changed. In the first place, about every native shikaree
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: (hunter) owns a rifle, at a cost of about $25; and many other natives
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: possess guns, and assume to hunt with them. The logical conclusion of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: this is more hunting and less game. The development of the country has
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: reduced the cover for game. New roads and railways have made the game
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: districts easily accessible, and real sportsmen are now three or four
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: times as numerous as they were in 1877.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: At Toonacadavoo, in the Animallai Hills where thirty-five years ago
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: there modestly nestled on the ridge beside the river only Forest Ranger
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Theobold's bungalow, built of mud and covered with grass thatch and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: bamboo rats, there is now a regular hill station lighted by electricity,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: a modern sanatorium high up on the bluff, a _club_, golf links, and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: other modern improvements. In my day there were exactly four guns on the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Animallais. Now there are probably one hundred; and it is easy to guess
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: how much big game remains on the Delectable Mountains in comparison with
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the golden days of 1877. I should say that there is now only one game
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: animal for every twenty-five that were there in my day.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: I am told that it is like that all over India. Beyond question, the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: gun-sellers and gun-users have been busy there, as everywhere else. The
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: game of India is on the toboggan slide, and the old days of abundance
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: have gone forever.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The first fact that strikes us in the face is the impending fate of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: great Indian rhinoceros, an animal as wonderful as the Titanothere or
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the Megatherium. It is like a gift handed down to us straight out of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Pleistocene age, a million years back. The British paleontologists
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: to-day marvel at _Elephas ganesa_, and by great labor dig his bones out
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of the Sewalik rocks, but what one of them all has yet made a move to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: save _Rhinoceros indicus_ from the quick extermination that soon will be
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: his portion unless he is accorded perpetual and real protection from the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: assaults of man?
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Let the mammalogists of the world face this fact. The available cover of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the Indian rhinoceros is _alarmingly_ decreasing, throughout Assam and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Bengal where the behemoth of the jungle has a right to live. It is
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: believed that the few remaining rhinos are being shot much faster then
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: they are breeding; and what will be the effect of this upon an animal
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: that requires fourteen years to reach full maturity? To-day, the most
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: wonderful hoofed mammal of all Asia is booked for extermination, and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: unless very radical measures for its preservation are at once carried
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: into effect, it is probable that twenty years more will see the last
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Indian rhino go down to rise no more. One remedy would be a good, ample
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: rhinoceros preserve; and another, the most absolute and permanent
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: protection for the species, all along the line. Half-way measures will
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: not suffice. It is time to ring in a general alarm.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: During the past eighteen years, only three specimens of that species
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: have come out of India for the zoological gardens and parks of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: world, and I think there are only five in captivity, all told.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: We are told that in India now the natives are permitted to have about
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: all the firearms they can pay for. Naturally, in a country containing
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: over 300,000,000 people this is a deadly thing. Of course there are
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: shooting regulations, many of them; but their enforcement is so
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: imperfect that it is said that the natives are attacking the big game on
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: all sides, with deadly effect. I fear it is utterly impossible for the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Indian government to put enough wardens into the field to watch the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: doings of the grand army of native poachers.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Fortunately, the Indian native,--unlike the western frontiersman,--does
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: not contend that _he owns_ the big game, or that "all men are born free
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and equal." At the same time, he means to have his full share of it, to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: eat, and to sell in various forms for cash. Even in India, the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: sale-of-game dragon has reared its head, and is to-day in need of being
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: scotched with an iron hand.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: When I received direct from a friend in the native state of Kashmir a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: long printed circular setting forth the hunting laws and game-protective
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: measures of that very interesting principality, it gave me a shock. It
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: was disquieting to be thus assured that the big game of Kashmir has
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: disappeared to such an extent that strong protective measures are
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: necessary. It was as if the Chief Eskimo of Etah had issued a strong
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: proclamation for the saving of the musk-ox.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In Kashmir, the destruction of game has become so serious that a Game
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Preservation Department has been created, with the official staff that
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: such an organization requires. The game laws are printed annually, and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: any variations from them may be made only by the authority of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Maharajah himself. Up to date, _eight_ game preserves have been created,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: having a total area of about thee hundred square miles. In addition to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: these, there are twelve small preserves, each having an area of from
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: twenty-five to fifty square miles. By their locations, these seem to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: provide for all the species of big game that are found in Kashmir,--the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: ibex, two forms of markhor, the tahr. Himalayan bighorn sheep, burrhel
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and goral.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In our country we have several states that are very large, very
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: diversified in surface, and still inhabited by large game. Has any one
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of those states created a series of game preserves even half way
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: comparable with those of Kashmir? I think not. Montana has made a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: beginning with two preserves,--Snow Creek and the Pryor Mountains,--but
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: beside the splendid series of Kashmir they are not worthy of serious
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: mention.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: And then following closely in the wake of that document came a lengthy
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: article in the "Proceedings of the Zoological Society of London," by
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: E.C. Stebbing, in which a correspondent of the Indian _Field_ clearly
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: sets forth the fact that the big game of the Himalayas now is menaced by
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: a peril new to our consideration, but of a most deadly character. Hear
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: him:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "In this inventory (of game destroyers in India), the Gurkha soldier
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: does not find a place, for he belongs to a class which he amply fills by
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: himself with his small but very important personality. He deserves
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: separate notice. From the banks of the Sarda on the frontier of Nepal,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: to the banks of the Indus, the battalions of these gallant little men
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: are scattered in cantonments all along the outer spurs of the Himalayan
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: range. In seven or eight of these locations there are at least 14,000 of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: these disciplined warriors, who, in the absence of opportunities for
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: spilling human blood legitimately, are given a free hand for
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: slaughtering wild animals, along five-hundred miles of the best hunting
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: grounds of Upper India."
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Now, since those facts must be true as reported, do they not in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: themselves constitute a severe arraignment of the Indian government? Why
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: should that state of game slaughter endure, when a single executive
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: order to the C.O. of each post would effectually stop it?
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In the making of game preserves, or "sanctuaries" as they are called out
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: there, the Government of India has shown rare and commendable diligence.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The total number is too great for enumeration here. The native state of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Mysore has seven, and the Nilgiri Hills have sanctuaries aggregating
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: about 100,000 acres in area. In the Wynaad Forest, my old
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: hunting-grounds at Mudumallay have been closed to bison shooting,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: because of the alarming decrease of bison (gaur) through shooting and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: disease. The Kundah Forest Reserve has been made a partial game
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: preserve, but the door might as well have been left wide open as so
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: widely ajar.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In eastern Bengal and Assam, several game preserves have been created.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: On the whole, by the diligence and thoroughness with which sanctuaries,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: as they are termed, have been created quite generally throughout India,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: it is quite evident that the government and the sportsmen of India have
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: become thoroughly alarmed by the great decrease of the game, and the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: danger of the extermination of species. In the past India has been the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: finest and best-stocked hunting-ground of all Asia, quite beyond
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: compare, and the destruction of her once-splendid fauna of big game
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: would be a zoological calamity.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: _Tibet_.--As yet, Tibet offers free hunting, without legal let or
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: hindrance, to every sportsman who can climb up to her lofty, wind-swept
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and whizzing-cold plateau. The man who hunts the _Ovis poli_, superb
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: creature though it be, pays in full for his trophies. The ibex of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: south help out the compensatory damages, but even with that, the list of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: species available in southern Tibet is painfully small. The Mitchell
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: takin can be reached from China, via Chungking, after a long, hard
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: journey, over Consul Mason Mitchell's trail; but the takin is about the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: only large hoofed game available.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: _The Altai Mountains_, of western China, contain the magnificent
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Siberian argali, the grandfather of all sheep species, whose horns must
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: be seen to be believed. Through a quest for that species the Russian
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: military authorities played upon Mr. George L. Harrison and his comrade
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: a very grim and unsportsmanlike joke. At the frontier military post, on
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the Russo-Chinese border, the two Americans were courteously halted,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: hospitably entertained, and _prevented_ from going into the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: argali-infested mountains that loomed up before them only a few miles
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: away! The Russian officers said:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "Sheep? Why, if you really want sheep, we will send out some of our
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: brave soldiers to shoot some for you; but there is no need for _you_ to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: take the trouble to go after them!"
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: After Mr. Harrison and his comrade had spent $5,000, and traveled half
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: way around the world for those sheep, that is in brief the story of how
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the cup of Tantalus was given them by the Russians, actually _at their
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: goal_! As spoil-sports, those Russian officers were the champions of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: world.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Seven hundred miles southeastward of the Altai Mountains of western
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: China, guarded by the dangerous hostility of savage native tribes, there
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: exists and awaits the scientific explorer, according to report, an
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: undiscovered wild horse. The Bicolored Wild Horse is black and white,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and joy awaits the zoologist or sportsman who sees it first. Evidently
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: it will not soon be exterminated by modern rifles.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: _The Impenetrable Forests_.--Although the mountains of central Asia will
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: in time be cleared of their big game,--when by hook and by crook the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: natives secure plenty of modern firearms,--there are places in the Far
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: East that we know will contain big game forever and a day. Take the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Malay Peninsula, Borneo and Sumatra as examples.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Mr. C. William Beebe, who recently has visited the Far East, has
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: described how the state of Selangor, between Malacca and Penang, has
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: taken on many airs of improvement since 1878, and sections of Sarawak
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Territory are being cut down and burned for the growing of rubber.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Despite this I am trying to think that those developments menace the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: total volume of the wild life of those regions but little. I wonder if
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: those tangled, illimitable, ever-renewing jungles yet know that their
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: faces have been scratched. White men never will exterminate the big game
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of the really dense jungles of the eastern tropics; but with enough
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: axes, snares, guns and cartridges _the natives_ may be able to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: accomplish it!
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In Malayana there are some jungles so dense, so tangled with lianas and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: so thorny with Livistonias and rattan that nothing larger than a cat can
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: make way through them. There are thousands of square miles so boggy, so
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: swampy, so dark, gloomy and mosquito-ridden that all men fear them and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: avoid them, and in them rubber culture must be impossible. In those
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: silent places the gaur, the rhino, the Malay sambar, the clouded leopard
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and the orang-utan surely are measurably safe from the game-bags and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: market gunners of the shooting world. It is good to think that there is
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: an equatorial belt of jungle clear around the world, in Central and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: South America as well as in the old World, in which there will be little
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: extermination in our day, except of birds for the feather market. But
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the open plains, open mountains, and open forests of Asia and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Australasia are in different case. Eventually they will be "shot out."
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: China, all save Yunnan and western Mongolia, is now horribly barren of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: wild life. Can it ever be brought back? We think it can not. The
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: millions of population are too many; and except in the great forest
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: tracts, the spread of modern firearms will make an end of the game.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Already the pheasants are being swept out of China for the London
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: market, and extinction is staring several species in the face. On the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: whole, the pheasants of the Old World are being hit hard by the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: rubber-planting craze. Mr. Beebe declares that owing to the inrush of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: aggressive capital, the haunts of many species of pheasants are being
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: denuded of all their natural cover, and some mountain species that are
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: limited to small areas are practically certain to be exterminated at an
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: early date.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: DESTRUCTION OF ANIMALS FOR FUR.--In the far North, only the interior of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Kamchatka seems to be safe from the iron heel of the skin-hunter. A
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: glance at the list of furs sold in London last year reveals one or two
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: things that are disquieting. The total catch of furs for the year 1911
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: is enormous,--considering the great scarcity of wild life on two
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: continents. Incidentally it must be remembered that every trapper
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: carries a gun, and in studying the fur list one needs no help in trying
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: to imagine the havoc wrought with firearms on the edible wild life of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the regions that contributed all that fur. I have been told by trappers
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: that as a class, trappers are great killers of game.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In order that the reader may know by means of definite figures the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: extent to which the world is being raked and combed for fur-bearing
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: animals, we append below a statement copied from the _Fur News Magazine_
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: for November, 1912, of the sales of the largest London fur house during
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the past two years.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: With varying emotions we call attention to the wombat of Australia,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 3,841; grebe, 51,261, and house cat, 92,407. Very nearly all the totals
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of Lampson & Co. for each species are much lower for the sales of 1912
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: than for those of 1911. Is this fact significant of a steady decline?
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life
