txt: CHAPTER XX
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: THE DESTRUCTION OF BIRDS IN THE FAR EAST[G]
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: BY C. WILLIAM BEEBE
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Curator of Birds, New York Zoological Park
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: [Footnote G: The observations which furnished this valuable chapter were
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: made by Mr. Beebe in 1911 while conducting an expedition in southern
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Asia, Borneo and Java for the purpose of studying in life and nature all
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the members of the Pheasant Family inhabiting that region. The results
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of these studies and collections will shortly appear in a very complete
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: monograph of the Phasianidae.--W.T.H.]
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In chapter XIII, treating of the "Extermination of Birds for Women's
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Hats," Dr. Hornaday has dealt fully with the feather and plumage traffic
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: after it enters the brokers' hands, and has proved conclusively that the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: plumes of egrets are gathered from the freshly killed birds. We may
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: trace the course of the plumes and feathers backward through the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: tightly-packed bales and boxes in the holds of the vessels to the ports
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of the savage lands whence they were shipped; then to the skilful, dark
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: hands of Mexican peon, Venezuelan Indian, African negro or Asiatic
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Chinaman or Malay, who stripped the skin from the flesh; and finally to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the jungle or mountain side or terai where the bird gave up its life to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: blowpipe, cross-bow, blunderbuss or carefully set snare.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In various trips to Mexico, Venezuela and other countries in the tropics
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of the New World I have seen many such scenes, but not until I had
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: completed a seventeen months' expedition in search of pheasants, through
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: some twenty wild countries of Asia and the East Indies, did I realize
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the havoc which is being wrought week by week everywhere on the globe.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: While we were absent even these few months from the great centers of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: civilization, tremendous advances had been made in air-ships and the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: thousand and one other modern phases of human development, but evolution
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: in the world of Nature as we observed it was only destructive--a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: world-wide katabolism--a retrogression often discernible from month to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: month. We could scarcely repeat the trip and make the same observations
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: upon pheasants, so rapidly is this group of birds approaching
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: extinction.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The causes of this destruction of wild life are many and diverse, and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: resemble one another only in that they all emanate from mankind. To the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: casual traveller the shooting and trapping of birds for millinery
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: purposes at first seems to hold an insignificant place among the causes.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: But this is only because in many of the larger ports, the protective
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: laws are more or less operative and the occupation of the plume hunter
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: is carried on in secret ways. But it is as far-reaching and insidious
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: as any; and when we add to the actual number of birds slain, the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: compound interest of eggs grown cold, of young birds perishing slowly
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: from hunger, of the thousands upon thousands of birds which fall wounded
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: or dead among the thick tropical jungle foliage and are lost, the total
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: is one of ghastly proportions.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Not to weaken my argument with too many general statements, let me take
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: at once some concrete cases. First, that of the Himalayan pheasants and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: game-birds. In a recent interesting article by E.P. Stebbing[H] the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: past, present and hoped-for future of game birds and animals in India is
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: reviewed. Unfortunately, however, most of the finest creatures in Asia
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: live beyond the border of the British sphere of influence, and though
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: within sight, are absolutely beyond reach of civilized law. The heart of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the Himalayas,--the haunts of some of the most beautiful birds in the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: world, the tragopans, the blood and impeyan pheasants--lies within the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: limits of Nepal, a little country which time and time again has bade
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: defiance to British attacks, and still maintains its independence. From
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: its northern border Mt. Everest looks down from its most exalted of all
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: earthly summits and sees valley after valley depleted of first one bird
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and then another. I have seen and lived with Nepalese shepherds who have
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: nothing to do month after month but watch their flocks. In the lofty
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: solitudes time hangs heavy on their hands, and with true oriental
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: patience they weave loop after loop of yak-hair snares, and then set
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: them, not in dozens or scores, but in hundreds and thousands up and down
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the valleys.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: [Footnote H: "Game Sanctuaries and Game Protection in India,"
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Proc. Zool. Soc., London, 1912. pp. 23-35.]
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In one locality seven great valleys had been completely cleared of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: pheasants, only a single pair of tragopans remaining; and from one of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: these little brown men I took two hundred nooses which had been prepared
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: for these lone survivors. In these cases, the birds were either cooked
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and eaten at once, or sold to some passing shepherd or lama for a few
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: annas. But in other parts of this unknown land systematic collecting of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: skins goes on, for bale after bale of impeyan and red argus (tragopan)
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: pheasant skins goes down to the Calcutta wharves, where its infamous
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: contents, though known, are safe from seizure under the Nepal Raja's
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: seal! Thus it is that the London feather sales still list these among
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the most splendid of all living birds. And shame upon shame, when we
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: read of 80 impeyan skins "dull," or "slightly defective," we know that
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: these are female birds. Then, if ever, we realize that the time of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: bird and the beast is passing, the acme of evolution for these wonderful
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: beings is reached, and at most we can preserve only a small fragment of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: them.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: To the millinery hunter, what the egret is to America, and the bird of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: paradise to New Guinea, the impeyan pheasant is to India--the most
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: coveted of all plumages. There is a great tendency to blame the native
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: hunter for the decrease of this and other pheasants, and from what I
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: have personally seen in many parts of the Himalayas there is no question
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: that the Garwhalese and Nepalese hill-men have wrought havoc among the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: birds. But these men are by no means the sole cause. As long ago as 1879
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: we read that "The great demand for the brilliant skins of the moonal
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: that has existed for many years has led to their almost total
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: extermination in some parts of the hills, as the native shikaris shoot
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and snare for the pot as well as for skins, and kill as many females as
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: males. On the other hand, though for nearly thirty years my friend Mr.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Wilson has yearly sent home from 1,000 to 1,500 skins of this species
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and the tragopan, there are still in the woods whence they were obtained
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: as many as, if not more than, when he first entered them, simply because
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: he has rigidly preserved females and nests, and (as amongst English
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: pheasants) one cock suffices for several hens."
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: [Illustration: PHEASANT SNARES
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Made of Yak Hair, Taken from a Shepherd in Nepal by Mr. Beebe]
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Ignoring the uncertainty of the last statement, it is rather absurd to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: think of a single man "preserving" females and nests in the Himalayas
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: from 1850 to 1880, when the British Government, despite most efficient
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: laws and worthy efforts is unable to protect the birds of these wild
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: regions to-day. The statement that after thirty to forty-five thousand
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: cock impeyans were shot or snared, as many or more than the original
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: quota remained, could only emanate from the mind of a professional
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: feather-hunter, and Hume should not be blamed for more than the mere
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: repetition of such figures. Let it be said to the credit of Wilson, the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: slaughterer of something near forty-five thousand impeyans, that he was
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: a careful observer of the birds' habits, and has given us an excellent
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: account, somewhat coloured by natives, but on the whole, the best we
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: have had in the past. But it is not pleasant to read of his waiting
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: until "twenty or thirty have got up and alighted in the surrounding
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: trees, and have then walked up to the different trees and fired at those
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: I wished to procure without alarming the rest, only those very close to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the one fired at being disturbed at each report."
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Hume's opinion that in 1879 there were scores of places where one might
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: secure from ten to eighteen birds in a day, is certainly not true
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: to-day. Indeed, as early as 1858 we read that "This splendid bird, once
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: so abundant on the Western Himalayas is now far from being so, in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: consequence of the numbers killed by sportsmen on account of its beauty.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Whole tracts of mountain forest once frequented by the moonal are now
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: almost without a single specimen." The same author goes on naively to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: tell the reader that "Among the most pleasant reminiscences of bygone
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: days is a period of eleven days, spent by the author and a friend on the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Choor Mountain near Simia, when among other trophies were numbered
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: sixty-eight moonal pheasants, etc."
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: [Illustration: SILVER PHEASANT SKINS SEIZED AT RANGOON, BRITISH BURMA
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: About 600 Skins out of Several Thousand Confiscated in the Custom House,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: on their way to the London Feather Market. Photographed by Mr. Beebe]
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: For some unaccountable reason there is, or was for many years, a very
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: prevalent idea that the enormous number of skins which have poured into
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the London market were from birds bred in the vicinity of Calcutta. When
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: we remember the intense heat of that low-lying city, and learn from the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: records of the Calcutta Zoological Garden that impeyans and tragopans
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: are even shorter-lived than in Europe, the absurdity of the idea is
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: apparent. In spite of numberless inquiries throughout India, I failed to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: learn of a single captive young bird ever hatched and reared even in the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: high, cool, hill-stations. The commercial value of an impeyan skin has
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: varied from five dollars to twenty dollars, according to the number
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: received annually. In 1876 an estimate placed the monthly average of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: impeyans received in London at from two to eight hundred.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In such a case as Nepal, direct protective laws are of no avail. All
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: humane arguments are useless, but if the markets at the other end _can
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: be closed_, the slaughter will cease instantly and automatically.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: [Illustration: DEADFALL TRAPS IN BURMA
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: A Long Series set Across a Valley, by the Kachins of the Burma-Chinese
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Border. A Wholesale Method of Wild-life Slaughter, Photographed by C.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: William Beebe, 1910]
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: As a contrast to the millinery hunter of fifty years ago it is
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: refreshing to find that at last sincere efforts are being made in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: British possessions to stop this traffic. I happened to be at Rangoon
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: when six large bales of pheasant skins were seized by the Custom
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: officials. A Chinaman had brought them from Yunnan via Bhamo, and was
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: preparing to ship them as ducks' feathers. Two of the bales were opened
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: for my inspection. The first contained about five hundred Lady Amherst
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: pheasant skins, falling to pieces and lacking heads and legs. The second
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: held over four hundred silver pheasants, in almost perfect condition.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The chief collector had put the absolutely prohibitive fine of 200
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: pounds on them, and was waiting for the expiration of the legal number
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of days before burning the entire lot. They must have represented years
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of work in decimating the pheasant fauna of western China.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Far up in the wilderness of northern Burma, and over the Yunnan border,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: we often came upon some of the most ingenious examples of native
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: trapping, a system which we found repeated in the Malay States, Borneo,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: China and other parts of the Far East. A low bamboo fence is built
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: directly across a steep valley or series of valleys, about half way from
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the summit to the lower end, and about every fifteen feet a narrow
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: opening is left, over which a heavy log is suspended. Any creature
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: attempting to make its way through, treads upon several small sticks and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: by so doing springs the trap and the dead-fall claims a victim. When a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: country is systematically strung with traps such as these, sooner or
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: later all but a pitiful remnant of the smaller mammals, birds and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: reptiles are certain to be wiped out. Morning after morning I have
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: visited such a runway and found dead along its path, what must have been
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: all the walking, running or crawling creatures which the night before
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: had sought the water at the bottom; pheasants, cobras, mouse-deer,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: rodents, civets, and members of many other groups. In some countries
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: nooses instead of dead-falls guard the openings, but the result is
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: equally deadly.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: I have described this method of trapping because of its future
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: importance in the destruction of wild life in the Far East. The Chinaman
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: in all his many millions is undergoing a remarkably swift and radical
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: evolution both of character and dress. In many ways, if only from the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: viewpoint of the patient, thrifty store-keeper he is a most powerful
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: factor in the East, and is becoming more so. In many cases he imitates
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the white nations by cutting off his queue and altering his dress. In
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: some mysterious correlated way his diet seems simultaneously affected,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and while for untold generations rice and fish has satisfied all his
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: gastronomic desires, a new craving, that for meat, has come to him. The
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: result is apparent in many parts of the East. The Chinaman is willing
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and able to pay for meat, and the native finds a new market for the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: creatures about him. Again and again when I wished a few specimens of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: some certain pheasant I had but to hail passing canoes and bid a few
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: annas or "cash" or "ringits" higher than the prospective Chinese
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: purchaser would give, and the pheasants were mine.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In the catalogues of the brokers' sales of feathers we read of many
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: thousands of the wonderful ocellated wing feathers of the argus
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: pheasant, but no less horrible is the sight of a canoe crammed with the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: bedraggled bodies of these magnificent birds on their way to some
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Chinese hamlet where they will be sold for a pittance, the flesh eaten
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: to the last tendon and the feathers given to the children and puppies to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: play with. The newly-aroused appetite of the Mongolian will soon be an
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: important factor in the extermination of animals and birds, few species
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: being exempt, for the Chinaman lives up to his reputation and is not
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: squeamish as to the nature of his meat.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Before we leave the subject of Chinamen let us consider another recent
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: factor in the destruction of wild life which is at present widely
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: operative in China itself. This is the cold storage warehouse, of which
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: six or eight enormous ones have gone up in different parts of the East.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: To speak in detail only of the one at Hankow, six hundred miles up the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Yangtze, we found it to be the largest structure in the city. Surrounded
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: by a high wall, with each entrance and exit guarded by armed Sikhs, it
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: seemed like the feudal castle of some medieval baron. Why such secrecy
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: is necessary I could not learn, as there are no laws against its
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: business. But so carefully guarded is its premises that until a short
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: time ago even the British consul-general of Hankow had not been allowed
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: to enter. He, however, at last refused to sign the papers for any more
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: outgoing shipments until he should be allowed to see what was going on
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: within the warehouse. I hoped to be able to look over some of the frozen
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: pheasants for interesting scientific material, but of course was not
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: allowed to do so.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Although here in the heart of China, outside changes are not felt so
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: strongly and the newly-acquired meat diet of the border and emigrant
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Chinese is hardly apparent, these warehouses have opened up a new source
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of revenue, which has met with instant response. Thousands and tens of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: thousands of wild shot or trapped pheasants and other birds are now
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: brought to these establishments by the natives from far and near. The
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: birds are frozen, and twice a year shipped on specially refrigerated P.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and O. steamships to England and the continent of Europe where they seem
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: to find a ready sale. Pigs and chickens also figure in the shipments.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Now the pheasants have for centuries existed in enormous numbers in the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: endless ricefields of China, without doing any damage to the crops. In
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: fact they could not be present in such numbers without being an
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: important factor in keeping down insect and other enemies of the grain.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: When their numbers are decimated as they are being at present, there
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: must eventually result a serious upsetting of the balance of nature. Let
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: us hope that in some way this may be avoided, and that the present
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: famine deaths of thirty thousand or more in some provinces will not be
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: increased many fold.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: When I started on this search for pheasants I was repeatedly told by old
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: explorers in the east that my task would be very different from theirs
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of thirty years ago; that I would find steamers, railroads and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: automobiles where formerly were only canoes and jungle. I indeed found
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: this as reported, but while my task was different it was made no easier.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Formerly, to be sure, one had from the start to paddle slowly or push
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: along the trails made by natives or game animals. But then the wild life
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: was encountered at once, while I found it always far from the end of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: steamer's route or the railroad's terminal, and still to be reached only
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: by the most primitive modes of travel.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: I cite this to give point to my next great cause of destruction; the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: burning and clearing of vast stretches of country for the planting of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: rubber trees. The East seems rubber mad, and whether the enormous output
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: which will result from the millions of trees set out month after month
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: will be profitable, I cannot say. I can think only of the vanishing of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the _entire fauna_ and _flora_ of many districts which I have seen as a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: direct result of this commercial activity. One leaves Port Swettenham on
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the west coast of Selangor, and for the hour's run to Kuala Lumpur sees
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: hardly anything but vast radiating lines of spindling rubber trees, all
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: underbrush cleared, all native growths vanished. From Kuala Lumpur to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Kuala Kubu at the very foot of the mountain backbone of the Malay
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Peninsula, the same holds true. And where some area appears not under
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: cultivation, the climbing fern and a coarse, useless "lalang" grass
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: covers every inch of ground. One can hardly imagine a more complete
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: blotting out of the native fauna and flora of any one limited region.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: And ever-extending roads for the increasing motor cars are widening the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: cleared zone, mile after mile to the north and south.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In this region, as we pushed on over the mountains into the wilderness
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of Pahang, we saw little of the actual destruction of the primeval
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: native growth, but elsewhere it became a common sight. Once, for many
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: days we studied the wonderful life of a jungle which stretched up to our
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: very camp. Troops of rollicking wa-was or gibbons frequented the forest;
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: squirrels, tupaias, birds and insects in myriads were everywhere during
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the day. Great fruit-bats, flying lemurs, owls and other nocturnal
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: creatures made the evenings and nights full of interest.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: And then, one day without warning came the sound of an ax, and another
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and another. From that moment the songs, cries, chirps and roars of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: jungle were seldom heard from our camp. Every day saw new phalanxes of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: splendid primeval trees fallen, or half suspended in their rigging of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: lianas. The leaves withered, the flower petals fell and we heard no more
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the crackling of bamboos in the wind. Then the pitiful survivors of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: destruction were brought to us; now a baby flying lemur, flung from its
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: hole by the falling of some tree; young tupaias, nestling birds; a few
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: out of the thousands of creatures from insects to mammals which were
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: slain so that a Chinaman or Malay might eke a few dollars, four or five
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: years hence, from a grove of rubber trees. I do not say it is wrong. Man
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: has won out, and might is right, as since the dawn of creation; but to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the onlooker, to the lover of nature and the animal world it is a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: terrible, a hopeless thing.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: One cannot at present leave the tourist line of travel in the East
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: without at once encountering evidence of the wholesale direct slaughter
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of wild life, or its no less certain extermination by the elimination of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the haunts and the food plants of the various beasts and birds.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: CHAPTER XXI
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: THE SAVAGE VIEW-POINT OF THE GUNNER
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The mental attitude of the men who shoot constitutes a deadly factor in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the destruction of wild life and the extermination of species. Fully
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: ninety-five per cent of the sportsmen, gunners and other men and boys
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: who kill game, all over the world and in all nations, regard game birds
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and mammals only as things to be killed _and eaten_, and not as
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: creatures worth preserving for their beauty or their interest to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: mankind. This is precisely the viewpoint of the cave-man and the savage,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and it has come down from the Man-with-a-Club to the Man-with-a-Gun
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: absolutely unchanged save for one thing: the latter sometimes is
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: prompted to save to-day in order to slaughter to-morrow.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The above statement of an existing fact may seem harsh; and some persons
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: may be startled by it; but it is based on an acquaintance with thousands
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of men who shoot all kinds of game, all over the world. My critics
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: surely will admit that my opportunities to meet the sportsmen and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: gunners of the world are, and for thirty-five years have been, rather
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: favorable. As a matter of fact, I think the efforts of the hunters of my
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: personal acquaintance have covered about seven-tenths of the hunting
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: grounds of the world. If the estimate that I have formed of the average
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: hunter's viewpoint is wrong, or even partially so, I will be glad to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: have it proven in order that I may reform my judgment and apologize.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In working with large bodies of bird-shooting sportsmen I have
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: steadily--and also painfully--been impressed by their intentness on.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: killing, and by the fact that _they seek to preserve game only to kill
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: it!_ Who ever saw a bird-shooter rise in a convention and advocate the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: preservation of any species of game bird on account of its beauty or its
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: esthetic interest _alive?_ I never did; and I have sat in many
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: conventions of sportsmen. All the talk is of open seasons, bag limits
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and killing rights. The man who has the hardihood to stand up and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: propose a five-year close season has "a hard row to hoe." Men rise and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: say: "It's all nonsense! There's plenty of quail shooting on Long Island
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: yet."
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Throughout the length and breadth of America, the ruling passion is to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: kill as long as anything killable remains. The man who will openly
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: advocate the stopping of quail-shooting because the quails are of such
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: great value to the farmers, or because they are so _beautiful_ and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: companionable to man, receives no sympathy from ninety per cent of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: bird-killing sportsmen. The remaining ten per cent think seriously about
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the matter, and favor long close seasons. It is my impression that of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the men who shoot, it is only among the big-game hunters that we find
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: much genuine admiration for game animals, or any feeling remotely
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: resembling regard for it.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The moment that a majority of American gunners concede the fact that
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: game birds are worth preserving for their beauty, and their value as
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: living neighbors to man, from that moment there is hope for the saving
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of the Remnant. That will indeed be the beginning of a new era, of a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: millennium in fact, in the preservation of wild life. It will then be
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: easy to enact laws for ten-year close seasons on whole groups of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: species. Think what it would mean for such a close season to be enacted
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: for all the grouse of the United States, all the shore-birds of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: United States, or the wild turkey wherever found!
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: To-day, the great--indeed, the _only_--opponents of long close seasons
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: on game birds are the gunners. Whenever and wherever you introduce a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: bill to provide such a season, you will find that this is true. The gun
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: clubs and the Downtrodden Hunters' and Anglers' Protective Associations
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: will be quick to go after their representatives, and oppose the bill.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: And state senators and assemblymen will think very hard and with strong
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: courage before they deliberately resolve to do their duty regardless of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the opposition of "a large body of sportsmen,"--men who have votes, and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: who know how to take revenge on lawmakers who deprive them of their
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "right" to kill. The greatest speech ever made in the Mexican Congress
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: was uttered by the member who solemnly said: "I rise to sacrifice
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: ambition to honor!"
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Unfortunately, the men who shoot have become possessed of the idea that
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: they have certain inherent, God-given "rights" to kill game! Now, as a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: matter of fact, a sportsman with a one-hundred-dollar Fox gun in his
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: hands, a two-hundred-dollar dog at his heels and five one-hundred-dollar
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: bills in his pocket has no more "right" to kill a covey of quail on Long
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Island than my milkman has to elect that it shall be let alone for the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: pleasure of his children! The time has come when the people who don't
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: shoot must do one of two things:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 1. They must demonstrate the fact that they have rights in the wild
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: creatures, and demand their recognition, or
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 2. See the killable game all swept off the continent by the Army of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Destruction.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Really, it is to me very strange that gunners never care to save game
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: birds on account of their beauty. One living bob white on a fence is
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: better than a score in a bloody game-bag. A live squirrel in a tree is
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: poetry in motion; but on the table a squirrel is a rodent that tastes as
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: a rat smells. Beside the ocean a flock of sandpipers is needed to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: complete the beautiful picture; but on the table a sandpiper is beneath
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: contempt. A live deer trotting over a green meadow, waving a triangular
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: white flag, is a sight to thrill any human ganglion; but a deer lying
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: dead,--unless it has an exceptionally fine head,--is only so much
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: butcher's meat.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: One of the finest sights I ever saw in Montana was a big flock of sage
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: grouse slowly stalking over a grassy flat thinly sprinkled with
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: sage-brush. It was far more inspiring than any pile of dead birds that I
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: ever saw. I remember scores of beautiful game birds that I have seen and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: not killed; but of all the game birds that I have eaten or tried to eat
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: in New York, I remember with sincere pleasure only _one_. Some of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: ancient cold-storage candidates I remember "for cause," as the lawyers
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: say.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: [Illustration: ONE MORNING'S CATCH OF TROUT, NEAR SPOKANE
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Another Line of Extermination According to law. Three Times too Many
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Fish for one rod. In those Cold Mountain Streams, Fish Grow Slowly, and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: a Stream is Quickly "Fished out"]
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Sportsmen and gunners, for God's sake elevate your viewpoint of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: game of the world. Get out of the groove in which man has run ever since
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the days of Adam! There is something in a game bird over and above its
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: pound of flesh. You don't "need" the meat any longer; for you don't know
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: what hunger is, save by reading of it. Try the field-glass and the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: camera, instead of the everlasting gun. Any fool can take a five-dollar
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: gun and kill a bird; but it takes a genius to photograph one wild bird
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and get "a good one." As hunters, the camera men have the best of it.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: One good live-bird photograph is more of a trophy and a triumph than a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: bushel of dead birds. The birds and mammals now are literally dying for
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: _your_ help in the making of long close seasons, and in the real
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: stoppage of slaughter. Can you not hear the call of the wild remnant?
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: It is time for the people who don't shoot to call a halt on those who
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: do; "and if this be treason, then let my enemies make the most of it!"
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Since the above was written, I have read in the _Outdoor World_ for
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: April, 1912, the views of a veteran sportsman and writer, Mr. Emerson
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Hough, on the wild-life situation as it seems to him to-day. It is a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: strong utterance, even though it reaches a pessimistic and gloomy
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: conclusion which I do not share. Altogether, however, its breadth of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: view, its general accuracy, and its incisiveness, entitle it to a full
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: hearing. The following is only an extract from a lengthy article
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: entitled, "God's Acre:"
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: EMERSON HOUGH'S VIEW OF THE SITUATION
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The truth is none the less the truth because it is unpleasant to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: face. There is no well posted sportsman in America, no manufacturer
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of sporting goods in America, no man well versed in American outdoor
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: matters, who does not know that we are at the evening of the day of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: open sport in America. Our old ways have failed, all of them have
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: failed. The declining fortunes of the best sportsman's journals of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: America would prove that, if proof were asked. Our sportsmanship has
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: failed. Our game laws have failed, and we know they have failed. Our
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: game is almost gone, and we know it is almost gone. America has
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: changed and we know that it has changed, although we have not
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: changed with it. The old America is done and it is gone, and we know
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: that to be the truth. The old order passeth, and we know that the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: new order must come soon if it is to work any salvation for our wild
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: game and our life in the open in pursuit of it.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: There are many reasons for this fact, these facts. Perhaps the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: greatest lies in the steady advance of civilization into the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: wilderness, the usurpation for agricultural or industrial use of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: many of the ancient breeding and feeding places of the wild game.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: All over the West and now all over Canada, the plow advances, that
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: one engine which cannot be gainsaid, which never turns a backward
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: furrow.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Another great agency is the rapid perfection of transportation all
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: over the world. Take the late influx of East African literature. If
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: there really were not access to that country we would not have this
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: literature, would not have so many pictures from that country. And
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: if even Africa will soon be overrun, if even Africa soon will be
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: shot out, what hope is there for the game of the wholly accessible
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: North American continent?
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: It is all too easy now for the slaughterer to get to his work, all
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: too easy for him to transport the fruits of the slaughter. At the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: hands of the ignorant, the unscrupulous and the unsparing, our game
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: has steadily disappeared until it is almost gone. We have handled it
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: in a wholly greedy, unscrupulous and selfish fashion. This has been
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: our policy as a nation. If there is to be success for any plan to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: remedy this, it must come from a few large-minded men, able to think
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and plan, and able to do more than that--to follow their plans with
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: deeds.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: I have seen the whole story of modern American sportsmanship, so
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: called. It has been class legislation and organized
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: selfishness--that is what it has been, and nothing else. I do not
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: blame country legislators, game dealers, farmers, for calling the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: sportsmen of America selfish and thoughtless. I do not blame them
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: for saying that the so-called protective measures advanced by
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: sportsmen have been selfish measures, and looking to destruction
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: rather than to protection. At least that has been their actual
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: result. I have no more reverence for a sportsman than for anyone
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: else, and no reverence for him at all because he is or calls himself
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: a sportsman. He has got to be a man. He has got to be a citizen.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: I have seen millions of acres of breeding and feeding grounds pass
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: under the drain and under the plow in my own time, so that the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: passing whisper of the wild fowl's wing has been forgotten there now
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: for many years. I have seen a half dozen species of fine game birds
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: become extinct in my own time and lost forever to the American
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: people.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: And you and I have seen one protective society after another,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: languidly organized, paying in a languid dollar or so per capita
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: each year, and so swiftly passing, also to be forgotten. We have
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: seen one code and the other of conflicting and wholly selfish game
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: laws passed, and seen them mocked at and forgotten, seen them all
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: fail, as we all know.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: We have seen even the nation's power--under that Ark of the Covenant
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: known as the Interstate Commerce Act--fail to stop wholly the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: lessening of our wild game, so rapidly disappearing for so many
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: reasons.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: We have seen both selfish and unselfish sportsmen's journals attempt
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: to solve this problem and fail to do so. Some of them were great and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: broad-minded journals. Their record has not been one of disgrace,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: although it has been one of defeat; for some of them really desired
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: success more than they desired dividends. These, all of them, bore
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: their share of a great experiment, an experiment in a new land,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: under a new theory of government, a theory which says a man should
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: be able to restrain himself, and to govern himself. Only by
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: following their theory through to the end of that experiment could
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: they know that it was to fail in one of its most vitally interesting
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and vitally important phases.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: But now, as we know, all of these agencies, selfish or unselfish,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: have failed to effect the salvation of American wild game. Not by
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: any scheme, device, or theory, not by any panacea can the old days
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of America be brought back to us.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Mr. Hough's views are entitled to respectful consideration; but on one
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: vital point I do not follow him.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: I believe most sincerely--in fact, _I know_,--that it is _possible_ to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: make a few new laws which, in addition to the many, many good protective
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: laws we already have, will bring back the game, just as fast and as far
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: as man's settlements, towns, railroads, mines and schemes in general
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: ever can permit it to come back.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: If the American People as a whole elect that our wild life shall be
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: saved, and to a reasonable extent brought back, then by the Eternal it
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: will be saved and brought back! The road lies straight before us, and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the going is easy--_if_ the Mass makes up its mind to act. But on one
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: vital point Mr. Hough is right. The sportsman alone never will save the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: game! The people who do not kill must act, independently.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: PART II.--PRESERVATION
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: CHAPTER XXII
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: OUR ANNUAL LOSSES BY INSECTS
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "You take my life when you do take the means whereby I live."
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "In no country in the world," says Mr. C.L. Marlatt, of the U.S.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Department of Agriculture, "do insects impose a heavier tax on farm
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: products than in the United States." These attacks are based upon an
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: enormous and varied annual output of cereals and fruits, and a great
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: variety and number of trees. For every vegetable-eating insect, native
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and foreign, we seem to have crops, trees and plant food galore; and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: their ravages rob the market-basket and the dinner-pail. In 1912 there
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: were riots in the streets of New York over the high cost of food.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In 1903, this state of fact was made the subject of a special inquiry by
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the Department of Agriculture, and in the "Yearbook" for 1904, the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: reader will find, on page 461, an article entitled, "The Annual Loss
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Occasioned by Destructive Insects in the United States." The article is
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: not of the sensational type, it was not written in an alarmist spirit,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: but from beginning to end it is a calm, cold-blooded analysis of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: existing facts, and the conclusions that fairly may be drawn from them.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The opinions of several experts have been considered and quoted, and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: often their independent figures are stated.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: With the disappearance of our birds generally, and especially the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: slaughter of song and other insect-eating birds both in the South and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: North, the destruction of the national wealth by insects forges to the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: front as a subject of vital importance. The logic of the situation is so
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: simple a child can see it. Short crops mean higher prices. If ten per
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: cent of our vegetable food supply is destroyed by insects, as certain as
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: fate we will feel it _in the increased cost of living_.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: I would like to place Mr. Marlatt's report in the hands of every man,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: boy and school-teacher in America; but I have not at my disposal the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: means to accomplish such a task. I cannot even print it here in full,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: but the vital facts can be stated, briefly and in plain figures.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: CROPS AND INSECTS.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: CORN.--The principal insect enemies of corn are the chinch bug,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: corn-root worm (_Diabrotica longicornis_), bill bug, wire worm,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: boll-worm or ear-worm, cut-worm, army worm, stalk worm, grasshopper,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and plant lice, in all a total of about fifty important species! Several
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of these pests work secretly. At husking time the wretched ear-worm that
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: ruins the terminal quarter or fifth of an immense number of ears, is
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: painfully in evidence. The root-worms work insidiously, and the moles
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and shrews are supposed to attack them and destroy them. The corn-root
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: worm is charged with causing an annual loss of two per cent of the corn
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: crop, or $20,000,000; the chinch bug another two per cent; the boll or
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: ear-worm two per cent more. The remaining insect pests are charged with
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: two per cent, which makes eight per cent in all, or a total of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: $80,000,000 lost each year to the American farmer through the ravages of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: insects. This is not evenly distributed, but some areas suffer more than
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: others.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: [Illustration: THE CUT-WORM, (_Peridroma Sancia_)
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Very Destructive to Crops]
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: WHEAT.--Of all our cereal crops, wheat is the one that suffers most from
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: insects. There are three insects that cause to the wheat industry an
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: annual loss of about ten per cent. The _chinch bug_ is the worst, and it
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: is charged with five per cent ($20,000,000) of the total loss. The
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: _Hessian fly_ comes next in order, and occasionally rolls up enormous
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: losses. In the year 1900, that insect caused to Indiana and Ohio alone
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the loss of 2,577,000 _acres_ of wheat, and the total cost to us of that
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: insect in that year "undoubtedly approached $100,000,000." Did that
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: affect the price of wheat or not? If not, then there is no such thing as
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: a "law of supply and demand."
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: _Wheat plant-lice_ form collectively the third insect pest destructive
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: to wheat, of which it is reported that "the annual loss occasioned by
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: wheat plant-lice probably does not fall short of two or three per cent
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of the crop."
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: HAY AND FORAGE CROPS.--These are attacked by locusts, grasshoppers, army
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: worms, cut-worms, web worms, small grass worms and leaf hoppers. Some of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: these pests are so small and work so insidiously that even the farmer is
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: prone to overlook their existence. "A ten per cent shrinkage from these
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and other pests in grasses and forage plants is a minimum estimate."
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: COTTON.--The great enemies of the cotton-planter are the cotton boll
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: weevil, the bollworm and the leaf worm; but other insects inflict
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: serious damage. In 1904 the loss occasioned by the boll weevil, chiefly
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: in Texas, was conservatively estimated by an expert, Mr. W.D. Hunter, at
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: $20,000,000. The boll worm of the southwestern cotton states has
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: sometimes caused an annual loss of $12,000,000, or four per cent of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: crops in the states affected. Before the use of arsenical poisons, the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: leaf worm caused an annual loss of from twenty to thirty million
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: dollars; but of late years that total has been greatly reduced.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: FRUITS.--The insects that reduce our annual fruit crop attack every
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: portion of the tree and its product. The woolly aphis attacks the roots
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of the fruit tree, the trunk and limbs are preyed upon by millions of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: scale insects and borers, the leaves are devastated by the all-devouring
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: leaf worms, canker worms and tent caterpillars, while the fruit itself
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: is attacked by the codling moth, curculio and apple maggot. To destroy
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: fruit is to take money out of the farmer's pocket, and to attack and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: injure the tree is like undermining his house itself. By an annual
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: expenditure of about $8,250,000 in cash for spraying apple trees, the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: destructiveness of the codling moth and curculio have been greatly
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: reduced, but that money is itself a cash loss. Add to this the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: $12,000,000 of actual shrinkage in the apple crop, and the total annual
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: loss to our apple-growers due to the codling moth and curculio is about
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: $20,000,000. In the high price of apples, a part of this loss falls upon
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the consumer.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In 1889 Professor Forbes calculated that the annual loss to the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: fruit-growers of Illinois from insect ravages was $2,375,000. In 1892,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: insects caused to Nebraska apple-growers a loss computed at $2,000,000
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and, in 1897, New York farmers lost $2,500,000 from that cause. "In many
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: sections of the Pacific Northwest the loss was from fifty to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: seventy-five per cent." (Yearbook, page 470.)
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: FORESTS.--"The annual losses occasioned by insect pests to forests and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: forest products (in the United States) have been estimated by Dr. A.D.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Hopkins, special agent in charge of forest insect investigations, at not
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: less than $100,000,000.... It covers both the loss from insect
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: damages to standing timber, and to the crude and manufactured forest
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: products. The annual loss to growing timber is conservatively placed at
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: [Illustration: THE GYPSY MOTH, (_Portheria dispar_)
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Very Destructive to the Finest Shade Trees]
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: There are other insect damages that we will not pause to enumerate
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: here. They relate to cattle, horses, sheep and stored grain products of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: many kinds. Even cured tobacco has its pest, a minute insect known as
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the cigarette beetle, now widespread in America and "frequently the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: cause of very heavy losses."
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The millions of the insect world are upon us. Their cost to us has been
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: summed up by Mr. Marlatt in the table that appears below.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: ANNUAL VALUES OF FARM PRODUCTS, AND LOSSES CHARGEABLE
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: TO INSECT PESTS.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: _Official Report in the Yearbook of the Department of Agriculture,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: % OF
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: PRODUCT              VALUE            LOSS    AMOUNT OF LOSS
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Miscellaneous Crops      58,000,000     10         5,800,000
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Natural Forests and                              100,000,000
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Forest Products
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Products in Storage                              100,000,000
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The millions of the insect world are upon us. The birds fight them for
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: us, and when the birds are numerous and have nestlings to feed, the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: number of insects they consume is enormous. They require absolutely
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: nothing at our hands save _the privilege of being let alone while they
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: work for us!_ In fighting the insects, our only allies in nature are the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: songbirds, woodpeckers, shore-birds, swallows and martins, certain
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: hawks, moles, shrews, bats, and a few other living creatures. All these
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: wage war at their own expense. The farmers might just as well lose
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: $8,250,000 through a short apple crop as to pay out that sum in labor
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and materials in spraying operations. And yet, fools that we are, we go
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: on slaughtering our friends, and allowing others to slaughter them,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: under the same brand of fatuous folly that leads the people of Italy to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: build anew on the smoking sides of Vesuvius, after a dozen generations
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: have been swept away by fire and ashes.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In the next chapter we will consider the work of our friends, The Birds.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: CHAPTER XXIII.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: THE ECONOMIC VALUE OF BIRDS
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: To-day, from Halifax to Los Angeles, and from Key West to Victoria, a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: deadly contest is being waged. The fruit-growers, farmers, forest owners
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and "park people" are engaged in a struggle with the insect hordes for
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the possession of the trees, shrubs and crops. Go out into the open,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: with your eyes open, and you will see it for yourself. Millions of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: dollars are being expended in it. Look at this exhibit of what is going
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: on around me, at this very moment,--July 19, 1912:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The bag insects, in thousands, are devouring the leaves of locust and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: maple trees.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The elm beetles are trying to devour the elms; and spraying is in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: progress.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The hickory-bark borers are slaughtering the hickories; and even some
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: park people are neglecting to take the measures necessary to stop it!
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The tent caterpillars are being burned.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The aphis (scale insects) are devouring the tops of the _white potatoes_
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: in the New York University school garden, just as the potato beetle
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: does.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The codling moth larvae are already at work on the apples.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The leaves affected by the witch hazel gall fly are being cut off and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: burned.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: These are merely the most conspicuous of the insect pests that I now see
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: daily. I am not counting those of second or third-rate importance.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Some of these hordes are being fought with poisonous sprays, some are
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: being killed by hand, and some are being ignored.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In view of the known value of the remaining trees of our country, each
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: woodpecker in the United States is worth twenty dollars in cash. Each
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: nuthatch, creeper and chickadee is worth from five to ten dollars,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: according to local circumstances. You might just as well cut down four
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: twenty-inch trees and let them lie and decay, as to permit one
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: woodpecker to be killed and eaten by an Italian in the North, or a negro
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: in the South. The downy woodpecker is the relentless enemy of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: codling moth, an insect that annually inflicts upon our apple crop
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: damages estimated by the experts of the U.S. Department of Agriculture
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: at twelve million dollars!
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Now, is a federal strong-arm migratory bird law needed for such birds or
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: not? Let the owners of orchards and forests make answer.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: THE CASE OF THE CODLING MOTH AND CURCULIO.--The codling moth and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: curculio are twin terrors to apple-growers, partly because of their
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: deadly destructiveness, and partly because man is so weak in resisting
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: them. The annual cost of the fight made against them, in sprays and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: labor and apparatus, has been estimated at $8,250,000. And what do the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: birds do to the codling moth,--when there are any birds left alive to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: operate? The testimony comes from all over the United States, and it is
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: worth while to cite it briefly as a fair sample of the work of the birds
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: upon this particularly deadly pest. These facts and quotations are from
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the "Yearbook of the Department of Agriculture," for 1911.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: [Illustration: DOWNY WOODPECKER]
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: _The Downy Woodpecker_ is the champion tree-protector, and also one of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the greatest enemies of the codling moth. When man is quite unable to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: find the hidden larvae, Downy locates it every time, and digs it out. It
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: extracts worms from young apples so skillfully that often the fruit is
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: not permanently injured. Mr. F.M. Webster reports that the labors of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: this bird "afford actual and immediate relief to the infected fruit."
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Testimony in favor of the downy woodpecker has come from New York, New
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Jersey, Texas and California, "and no fewer than twenty larvae have been
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: taken from a single stomach."
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Take the _Red-Shafted Flicker_ vs. the codling moth. Mr. A.P. Martin of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Petaluma, Cal., states that during the early spring months (of 1890)
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: they were seen by hundreds in his orchard, industriously examining the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: trunks and larger limbs of the fruit trees; and he also found great
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: numbers of them around sheds where he stored his winter apples and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: pears. As the result of several hours' search, Mr. Martin found only one
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: worm, and this one escaped only by accident, for several of the birds
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: had been within a quarter of an inch of it. "So eager are woodpeckers in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: search, of codling moths that they have often been known to riddle the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: shingle traps and paper bands which are placed to attract the larvae
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: about to spin cocoons."
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Behold the array of birds that devour the larvae of the codling moth to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: an important extent.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life
