txt: have seen, we make the estimate that _fully one-third_ of the total area
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of the United States is incapable of supporting the husbandman who
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: depends for his existence upon tillage of the soil. People may talk and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: write about "dry farming" all they please, but I wish to observe that
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: from Dry-Farming to Success is a long shot, with many limbs in the way.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: When it rains sufficiently, dry farming is a success; but otherwise it
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: is not; and we heartily wish it were otherwise.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The logical conclusion of our land that is utterly unfit for agriculture
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: is a great area of land available for occupancy by valuable wild
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: animals. Every year the people of the United States are wasting
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: uncountable millions of pounds of venison, because we are neglecting our
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: opportunities for producing it practically without cost. Imagine for a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: moment bestowing upon land owners the ability to stock with white-tailed
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and Indian sambar deer all the wild lands of the United States that are
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: suitable for those species, and permitting only bucks over one year of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: age to be shot. With the does even reasonably protected, the numerical
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: results in annual pounds of good edible flesh fairly challenges the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: imagination.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: About six years ago, Mr. C.C. Worthington's deer, in his fenced park, at
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Shawnee-on-Delaware, Pennsylvania, became so numerous and so burdensome
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: that he opened his fences and permitted about one thousand head to go
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: free.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: We are losing each year a very large and valuable asset in the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: intangible form of a million hardy deer that we might have raised but
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: did not! Our vast domains of wooded mountains, hills and valleys lie
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: practically untenanted by big game, save in a few exceptional spots. We
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: lose because we are lawless. We lose because we are too improvident to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: conserve large forms of wild life unless we are compelled to do so by
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the stern edict of the law! The law-breakers, the game-hogs, the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: conscienceless doe-and-fawn slayers are everywhere! Ten per cent of all
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the grown men now in the United States are to-day poachers, thieves and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: law-breakers, or else they are liable to become so to-morrow. If you
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: doubt it, try risking your new umbrella unprotected in the next mixed
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: company of one hundred men that you encounter, in such a situation that
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: it will be easy to "get away" with it.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: We could raise two million deer each year on our empty wild lands; but
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: without fences it would take half a million real game-wardens, on duty
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: from dawn until dark, to protect them from destructive slaughter. At
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: present our land of liberty contains only 9,354 game wardens.[J] The
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: states that contain the greatest areas of wild lands naturally lack in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: population and in tax funds, and not one such state can afford to put
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: into the field even half enough salaried game wardens to really protect
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: her game from surreptitious slaughter. The surplus of "personal liberty"
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: in this liberty-cursed land is a curse to the big game. The average
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: frontiersman never will admit the divine right of kings, but he does
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: ardently believe in the divine right of settlers,--to reach out and take
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: any of the products of Nature that they happen to fancy.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: [Footnote J: Of this force, there are only 1,200 salaried wardens. The
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: most of those who serve without salaries naturally render but little
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: continuous or regular service.]
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: WILD MEAT AS A FOOD SUPPLY.--We hear much these days about the high cost
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of living, but thus far we have made no move to mend the situation. With
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: coal going straight up to ten dollars per ton, beef going up to fifteen
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: dollars per hundred on the hoof and wheat and hay going-up--heaven alone
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: knows where, it is time for all Americans who are not rich to arouse and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: take thought for the morrow. _What are we going to do about it_? The
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: tariff on the coarser necessities of life is now booked to come down;
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: but what about the fresh meat supply?
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: I desire to point out that between Bangor and San Diego and from Key
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: West to Bellingham, our country contains millions of acres of wild,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: practically uninhabited forests, rough foot-hills, bad-lands and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: mountains that could produce two million deer each year, without
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: deducting $50,000 a year from the wealth of the country. I grant that in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the total number of deer that would be necessary to produce two million
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: deer per annum, the farms situated on the edges of forests, and actually
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: within the forests, would suffer somewhat from the depredations of those
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: deer. As I will presently show by documentary records, every one of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: those individual damages that exceeds two dollars in value could be
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: compensated in cash, and afterward leave on the credit side of the deer
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: account an enormous annual balance.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Stop for a moment, you enterprising and restless men and women who
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: travel all over the United States, and think of the illimitable miles of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: unbroken forest that you have looked upon from your Pullman windows in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the East, in the South, in the West and in southern Canada. Recall the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: wooded mountains of the Appalachian system, the White Mountain region,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the pine forests of the Atlantic Coast and the Gulf States, the forests
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of Tennessee, Arkansas and southern Missouri; of northern Minnesota, and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: every state of the Rocky Mountain region. Then, think of the silent and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: untouched forests of the Pacific Coast and tell me whether you think
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: five million deer scattered through all those forests would make any
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: visible impression upon them. That would be only about twenty-five times
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: as many as are there now! I think the forests would not be over
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: populated; and they would produce _two million killable deer each year_!
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Last year, 11,000 deer were forced down out of their hiding places in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the Rocky Mountains, and were killed in Montana. Even the natives had
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: not dreamed there were so many available; and they were slaughtered not
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: wisely but too ill. It is not right that six members of one family
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: should "hog" twelve deer in one season. At present no deer supply can
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: stand such slaughter.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Assuming that the people of the United States _could_ be educated into
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the idea of so conserving deer that they could draw two million head per
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: year from the general stock, what would it be worth?
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: It is not very difficult to estimate the value of a deer, when the whole
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: animal can be utilized. In various portions of the United States, deer
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: vary in size, but I shall take all this into account, and try to strike
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: a fair average. In some sections, where deer are large and heavy, a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: full-grown buck is easily worth twenty-five dollars. Let him who doubts
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: it, try to replace those generous pounds of flesh with purchased beef
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and mutton and veal, and see how far twenty-five dollars will go toward
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: it. Every man who is a householder knows full well how little meat one
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: dollar will buy at this time.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: I think that throughout the United States as a whole every full-grown
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: deer, male or female contains on an average ten dollars worth of good
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: meat. I know of one large preserve which annually sells its surplus of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: deer at that price, wholesale, to dealers; and in New York City
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: (doubtless in many other cities, also) venison often has sold in the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: market at one dollar per pound!
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Two million deer at $10 each mean $20,000,000. The licenses for the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: killing of two million deer should cost one million men one dollar each;
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and that would pay 1,666 new game wardens each fifty dollars per month,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: all the year round. The damages that would need to be paid to farmers,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: on account of crops injured by deer, would be so small that each county
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: could take care of its own cases, from its own treasury, as is done in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the State of Vermont.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: There are certain essentials to the realization of a dream of two
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: million deer per year that are absolutely required. They are neither
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: obscure nor impossible.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Each state and each county proposing to stock its vacant woods with deer
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: must resolutely educate its own people in the necessity of playing fair
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: about the killing of deer, and giving every man and every deer a square
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: deal. This is _not_ impossible! Not as a general thing, even though it
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: may be so in some specially lawless communities. If the _leading men_ of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the state and the county will take this matter seriously in hand, it can
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: be done in two years' time. The American people are not insensible to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: appeals to reason, when those appeals are made by their own "home
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: folks." The governors, senators, assemblymen, judges, mayors and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: justices of the peace could, _if they would_, make a campaign of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: education and appeal that would result in the creation of an immense
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: volume of free wild food in every state that possesses wild lands.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: When the shoe of Necessity pinches the People hard enough, remember the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: possibilities in deer.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: [Illustration: WHITE-TAILED DEER
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: If Honestly and Intelligently Conserved, this Species could be made to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Produce on our Wild Lands Two Million Deer per annum, as a new Food Supply
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: From the "American Natural History"]
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The best wild animal to furnish a serious food supply is the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: white-tailed deer. This is because of its persistence and fertility. The
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: elk is too large for general use. An elk carcass can not be carried on a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: horse; it is impossible to get a sled or a wagon to where it lies; and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: so, fully half of it usually is wasted! The mule deer is good for the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Rocky Mountains, and can live where the white-tail can not; but it is
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: _too easy to shoot_! The Columbian black-tail is the natural species for
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the forests of the Pacific states; but it is a trifle small in size.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: THE EXAMPLE OF VERMONT.--In order to show that all the above is not
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: based on empty theory,--regarding the stocking of forests with deer,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: their wonderful powers of increase, and the practical handling of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: damage question,--let us take the experience and the fine example of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Vermont.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In April, 1875, a few sportsmen of Rutland, of whom the late Henry W.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Cheney was one, procured in the Adirondacks thirteen white-tailed deer,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: six bucks and seven does. These were liberated in a forest six miles
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: from Rutland, and beyond being protected from slaughter, they were left
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: to shift for themselves. They increased, slowly at first, then rapidly,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and by 1897, they had become so numerous that it seemed right to have a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: short annual open season, and kill a few. From first to last, many of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: those deer have been killed contrary to law. In 1904-5, it was known
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: that 294 head were destroyed in that way; and undoubtedly there were
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: others that were not reported.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: ACCOUNT OF DEER KILLED IN VERMONT, OF RECORD SINCE KILLING
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: BEGAN, IN 1897
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: _From John W. Titcomb, State Game Commissioner, Lyndonville, Vt.,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: By       By       By   Wounded By       By       Average Gross
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Year Hunters, Hunters, Dogs Deer    Railroad Various  Weight  Weight
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Legally  Illegally     Killed  Trains   Accidents (lbs.) (lbs.)
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: * First open season after deer restored to state in 1875.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: DAMAGES TO CROPS BY DEER.--For several years past, the various counties
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of Vermont have been paying farmers for damages inflicted upon their
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: crops by deer. Clearly, it is more just that counties should settle
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: these damages than that they should be paid from the state treasury,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: because the counties paying damages have large compensation in the value
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of the deer killed each year. The hunting appears to be open to all
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: persons who hold licenses from the state.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In order that the public at large may know the cost of the Vermont
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: system, I offer the following digest compiled from the last biennial
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: report of the State Fish and Game Commissioner:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: DAMAGES PAID FOR DEER DEPREDATIONS IN VERMONT DURING
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: TWO YEARS
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Total damages paid from June 8, 1908, to June 22, 1910    $4,865.98
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Total number of claims paid                                     311
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Total number of claims under $5                                  80
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Number between $5 and $10, inclusive                            102
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Number over $25 and under $51                                    23
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Number between $50 and $100                                      11
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Number in excess of $100                                          4
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Number in excess of $200                                          1
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Largest claim paid                                          $326.50
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: VALUE OF WHITE-TAILED DEER.--Having noted the fact that in two years
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: (1908-9), the people of Vermont paid out $4,865 in compensation for
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: damages inflicted by deer, it is of interest to determine whether that
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: money was wisely expended. In other words, did it pay?
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: We have seen that in the years 1908 and 9, the people of Vermont killed,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: legally and illegally, and converted to use, 7,186 deer. This does not
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: include the deer killed by dogs and by accidents.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Regarding the value of a full-grown deer, it must be remembered that
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: much depends upon the locality of the carcass. In New York or Pittsburg
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: or Chicago, a whole deer is worth, at wholesale, at least twenty-five
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: dollars. In Vermont, where deer are plentiful, they are worth a less
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: sum. I think that fifteen dollars would be a fair figure,--at least low
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: enough!
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Even when computed at fifteen dollars per carcass, those deer were worth
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: to the people of Vermont $107,790. It would seem, therefore, that the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: soundness of Vermont's policy leaves no room for argument; and we hope
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: that other states, and also private individuals, will profit by
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Vermont's very successful experiment in bringing back the deer to her
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: forests, and in increasing the food supply of her people.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: KILLING FEMALE DEER.--To say one word on this subject which might by any
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: possibility be construed as favoring it, is like juggling with a lighted
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: torch over a barrel of gunpowder. Already, in Pennsylvania at least one
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: gentleman has appeared anxious to represent me as favoring the killing
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of does, which in nine hundred and ninety-nine cases out of every
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: thousand I distinctly and emphatically do not. The slaughter of female
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: hoofed game animals is necessarily destructive and reprehensible, and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: not one man out of every ten thousand in this country ever will see the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: place and time wherein the opposite is true.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: At present there are just two places in America, and I think only two,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: wherein there exists the slightest exception on this point. The state of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Vermont is becoming overstocked with deer, and the females have in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: _some_ counties (not in all), become so tame and destructive in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: orchards, gardens and farm crops as to constitute a great annoyance. For
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: this reason, the experiment is being made of permitting does to be
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: killed under license, until their number is somewhat reduced.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The first returns from this trial have now come in, from the county game
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: wardens of Vermont to the state game warden. Mr. John W. Titcomb. I will
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: quote the gist of the opinion of each.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The State Commissioner says: "This law should remain in force at least
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: until there is some indication of a decrease in the number of deer."
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Warden W.H. Taft (Addison County) says: "The killing of does I believe
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: did away with a good many of these tame deer that cause most of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: damage to farmers' crops." Harry Chase (Bennington County) says the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: doe-killing law is "a good law, and I sincerely trust it will not be
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: repealed." Warden Hayward of Rutland County says: "The majority of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: farmers in this county are in favor of repealing the doe law.... A great
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: many does and young deer (almost fawns) were killed in this county
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: during the hunting season of 1909." R.W. Wheeler, of Rutland County
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: says: "Have the doe law repealed! We don't need it!" H.J. Parcher of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Washington County finds that the does did more damage to the crops than
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the bucks, and he thinks the doe law is "a just one." R.L. Frost, of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Windham County, judicially concludes that "the law allowing does to be
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: killed should remain in force one or two seasons more." C.S Parker, of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Orleans County, says his county is not overstocked with deer, and he
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: favors a special act for his county, to protect females.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: A summary of the testimony of the wardens is easily made. When deer are
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: too plentiful, and the over-tame does become a public nuisance too great
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: to be endured, the number should be reduced by regular shooting in the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: open season; but,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: As soon as the proper balance of deer life has been restored, protect
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the does once more.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The pursuit of this policy is safe and sane, provided it can be wrought
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: out without the influence of selfishness, and reckless disregard for the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: rights of the next generation. On the whole, its handling is like
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: playing with fire, and I think there are very, very few states on this
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: earth wherein it would be wise or safe to try it. As a wise friend once
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: remarked to me, "Give some men a hinch, and they'll always try to take a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: hell." In Vermont, however, the situation is kept so well in hand we may
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: be sure that at the right moment the law providing for the decrease of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the number of does will be repealed.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: HIPPOPOTAMI AND ANTELOPES.--Last year a bill was introduced in the lower
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: House of Congress proposing to provide funds for the introduction into
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: certain southern states of various animals from Africa, especially
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: hippopotami and African antelopes. The former were proposed partly for
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the purpose of ridding navigation of the water hyacinths that now are
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: choking many of the streams of Louisiana and Mississippi. The antelopes
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: were to be acclimatized as a food supply for the people at large.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: This measure well illustrates the prevailing disposition of the American
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: people to-day,--to ignore and destroy their own valuable natural stock
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of wild birds and mammals, and when they have completed their war of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: extermination, reach out to foreign countries for foreign species.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Instead of preserving the deer of the South, the South reaches out for
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the utterly impossible antelopes of Africa, and the preposterous
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: hippopotamus. The North joyously exterminates her quail and ruffed
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: grouse, and goes to Europe for the Hungarian partridge. That partridge
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: is a failure here, and I am _heartily glad of it_, on the ground that
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the exterminators of our native species do not deserve success in their
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: efforts to displace our finest native species with others from abroad.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The hippo-antelope proposition is a climax of absurdity, in proposing
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the replacing of valuable native game with impossible foreign species.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: CHAPTER XXV
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: LAW AND SENTIMENT AS FACTORS IN PRESERVATION
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: There is grave danger that through ignorance of the true character of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: about 80 per cent of the men and boys who shoot wild creatures, a great
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: wrong will be done the latter. Let us not make a fatal mistake.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: After more than thirty years of observation among all kinds of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: sportsmen, hunters and gunners, I am convinced that it is utterly futile
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and deadly dangerous to rely on humane, high-class sentiment to diminish
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the slaughter of wild things by game-hogs and pot-hunters.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In some respects, the term "game-hog" is a rude, rough word; but it is
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: needed in the English language, and it has come to stay. It is a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: disagreeable term, but it was brought into use to apply to a class of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: very disagreeable persons.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: A "game-hog" is a hunter of game who knows no such thing as sentiment or
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: conscience in the killing of game, so long as he keeps within the limit
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of the law. Regardless of the scarcity of game, or of its hard struggle
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: for existence, he will kill right up to the bag limit every day that he
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: goes out, provided it is possible to do so. He uses the "law" as a salve
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: for the spot where his conscience should be. He will shoot with any
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: machine gun, or gun of big calibre, in every way that the law allows,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and he knows no such thing as giving the game a square deal. He brags of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: his big bags of game, and he loves to be photographed with a wagon-load
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of dead birds as a background. He believes in automatic and pump guns,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: spring shooting, longer open seasons and "more game." He is quite
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: content to shoot half tame ducks in a club preserve as they fly between
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: coop and pond, whenever he secures an opportunity. He will gladly sell
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: his game whenever he can do so without being found out, and sometimes
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: when he is.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Often a true sportsman drifts without realizing it into some one way of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the confirmed game-hog; but the moment he is made to realize his
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: position, he changes his course and his standing. The game-hog is
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: impervious to argument. You can shame a horse away from his oats more
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: easily than you can shame him from doing "what the Law allows."
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: There are hundreds of thousands of gentlemen and gentlewomen who never
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: once have come in touch with real cloven-footed game-hogs, who do not
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: understand the species at all, and do not recognize its ear-marks.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Thousands of such persons will tell you: "In my opinion, the best way to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: save the wild life is to _educate the people_!" I have heard that, many,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: many times.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: For right-hearted people, a little law is quite sufficient; and the best
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: people need none at all! But the game-hogs are different. For them, the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: strict letter of the law, backed up by a strong-arm squad, is the only
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: controlling influence that they recognize. To them it is necessary to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: say: "You shall!" and "You shall not!"
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Only yesterday the latest game-hog case was related to me by a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: game-protector from Kansas. Into a certain county of southern Kansas,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: from which the prairie-chicken had been totally gone for a dozen years
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: or more, a pair of those birds entered, settled down and nested. Their
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: coming was to many habitants a joyous event. "Now," said the People, "we
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: will care for these birds, and they will multiply, and presently the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: county will be restocked."
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: But Ahab came! Two men from another county, calling themselves sportsmen
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: but not entitled to that name, heard of those birds, and resolved to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "get them." They waited until the young were just leaving the nest: and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: they went down and camped near by. On the first day they killed the two
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: parent birds and half the flock of young birds, and the next day they
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: got all the rest.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: But there is a sequel to this story. One of those men was a dealer in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: guns and ammunition; and when his customers heard what he had done,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "they simply put him out of business, by refusing to trade with him any
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: more." He is now washing dirty dishes in a restaurant; but at heart he
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: is a game-hog, just the same.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Near Bridgeport, Connecticut, a gentleman of my acquaintance owns a fine
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: estate which is adorned with a trout stream and a superfine trout pond.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Once he invited a business man of Bridgeport to be his guest, and fish
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: for trout in his pond. On that guest, during a visit of three days all
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the finest forms of hospitality were bestowed.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Two weeks later, my friend's game-warden caught that guest, early on a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Sunday morning, _poaching_ on the trout-pond, and spoiled his carefully
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: arranged get-away.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In his book "Saddle and Camp in the Rockies," Mr. Dillon Wallace tells a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: story of a man from New York who in the mountains of Colorado
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: deliberately corrupted his guides with money or other influences, shot
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: mountain sheep _in midsummer_, and "got away with it."
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In northern Minnesota, George E. Wood has been having a hand-to-hand
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: fight with the worst community of game-hogs and alien-born poachers of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: which I have heard. There appears to be no game law that they do not
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: systematically violate. The killers seem determined to annihilate the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: last head of game, in spite of fines and imprisonments. The foreigners
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: are absolutely uncontrollable. The latest feature of the war is the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: discovery of a tannery in the woods, where the hides of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: illegally-slaughtered deer and moose are dressed. Apparently the only
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: kind of a law that will save the game of northern Minnesota is one that
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: will totally disarm the entire population.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In Pennsylvania, there exists an association which was formed for the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: express purpose of fighting the State Game Commission, preventing the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: enactment of a hunter's license law and repealing the law against the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: killing of female deer and hornless fawns. The continued existence of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: that organization on that basis would be a standing disgrace to the fair
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: name of Pennsylvania. I think, however, that that organization was
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: founded on secret selfish purposes, and that ere long the general body
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of members will awaken to a realizing sense of their position, and range
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: themselves in support of the excellent policies of the commission.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: A POT-HUNTER is a man or boy who kills game as a business, for the money
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: that can be derived from its sale, or other use. Such men have the same
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: feelings as butchers. From their point of view, they can see no reason
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: why all the game in the world should not be killed and marketed. Like
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the feather-dealers, they wish to get out of the wild life all the money
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: there is in it; that is all. Left to themselves, with open markets they
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: would soon exterminate the land fauna of the habitable portions of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: globe.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: No one can "educate" such people. For the gunners, game-hogs and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: pot-hunters, there is no check, save specific laws that sternly and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: amply safeguard the rights of the wild creatures that can not make laws
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: for themselves.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Nor can anyone educate the heartless woman of fashion who is determined
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: to wear aigrettes as long as her money can buy them. The best women of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the world have _already been educated_ on the bird-millinery subject,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and they are already against the use of the gaudy badges of slaughter
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and extermination. But in the great cities of the world there are
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: thousands of women who are at heart as cruel as Salome herself, and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: whose vicious tastes can be curbed only by the strong hand of the law.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "Sentiment" for wild birds is not in them.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Because of the vicious and heartless elements among men and women, we
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: say, Give us _far-reaching, iron-bound_ LAWS for the protection of wild
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: life, _and plenty of courageous men to enforce them_.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: CHAPTER XXVI
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: THE ARMY OF THE DEFENSE
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: It now seems that the friends of wild life who themselves are not on the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: firing-line should be afforded some definite information regarding the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Army of the Defense, and its strength and weakness. It is an interesting
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: subject, but the limitations of space will not permit an extended
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: treatment.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Over the world at large, I think the active Destroyers outnumber the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: active Defenders of wild life at least in the ratio of 500 to 1; and the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: money available to the Destroyers is to the funds of the Defenders as
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 500 is to 1. The _average_ big-game sportsman cheerfully expends from
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: $500 to $1,000 on a hunting trip, but resents the suggestion that he
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: should subscribe from $50 to $100 for wild life preservation. If he puts
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: down $10, he thinks he has done a Big Thing. Worse than this, I am
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: forced to believe that at least 75 per cent of the big-game sportsmen of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the world never have contributed one dollar in money, or one hour of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: effort, to that cause. But there are exceptions; and I can name at least
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: fifty sportsmen who have subscribed $100 each to campaign funds, and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: some who have given as high as $1,000.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Once I sat down beside a financially rich slaughterer of game, and asked
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: him to subscribe a sum of real money in behalf of a very important
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: campaign. I needed funds very much; and I explained, exhorted and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: besought. I pointed out his duty--_to give back something_ in return for
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: all the game slaughter that he had _enjoyed_. For ten long minutes he
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: stood fire without flinching, and without once opening his lips to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: speak. He made no answer no argument, no defense and finally he never
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: gave up one cent.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Wherever the English language is spoken, from Tasmania to Scotland, and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: from Porto Rico to the Philippines, the spirit of wild life protection
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: exists. Elsewhere there is much more to be said on this point. To all
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: cosmopolitan sportsmen, the British "Blue Book" on game protection, the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: annual reports of the two great protective societies of London, and the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: annual "Progress" report of the U.S. Department of Agriculture are
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: reassuring and comforting. It is good to know that Uganda maintains a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Department of Game Protection (A.L. Butler, Superintendent), that so
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: good a man as Maj. J. Stevenson-Hamilton is in control of protection in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the Transvaal, and that even the native State of Kashmir officially
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: recognizes the need to protect the Remnant.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: There are of course many parts of the world in which game laws and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: limits to slaughter are quite unknown: all of which is entirely wrong,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and in need of quick correction. No state or nation can be accounted
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: wholly civilized that fails to recognize the necessity to protect wild
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: life. I am tempted to make a list of the states and nations that were at
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: latest advices destitute of game laws and game protectors, but I fear to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: do injustice through lack of the latest information. However, the time
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: has come to search out delinquents, and hold up to each one a mirror
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: that will reflect its shortcomings.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Naturally, we are most interested in our own contingent of the Army of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the Defense.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: THE UNITED STATES GOVERNMENT.--To-day the feeling in Congress, toward
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the conservation of wild life and forests is admirable. Both houses are
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: fully awake to the necessity of saving while there is yet something to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: be saved. The people of the United States may be assured that the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: national government is active and sympathetic in the prosecution of such
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: conservation measures as it might justly be expected to promote. For
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: example, during the past five years we have seen Congress take favorable
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: action on the following important causes, nearly every one of which cost
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: money:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The saving of the American bison, in four National ranges.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The creation of fifty-eight bird refuges.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The creation of five great game preserves.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The saving of the elk in Jackson Hole.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The protection of the fur seal.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The protection of the wild life of Alaska.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: There are many active friends of wild life who confidently expect to see
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: this fine list gloriously rounded out by the passage in 1913 of an ideal
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: bill for the federal protection of all migratory birds. To name the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: friends of wild life in Congress would require the printing of a list of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: at least two hundred names, and a history of the rise and progress of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: wild life conservation by the national government would fill a volume.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Such a volume would be highly desirable.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: When the story of the national government's part in wild-life protection
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: is finally written, it will be found that while he was president,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: THEODORE ROOSEVELT made a record in that field that is indeed enough to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: make a reign illustrious. He aided every wild-life cause that lay within
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the bounds of possibility, and he gave the vanishing birds and mammals
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the benefit of every doubt. He helped to establish three national bison
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: herds, four national game preserves, fifty-three federal bird refuges,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and to enact the Alaska game laws of 1902 and 1907.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: It was in 1904 that the national government elected to accept its share
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of the white man's burden and enter actively into the practical business
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of wild life protection. This special work, originally undertaken and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: down to the present vigorously carried on by Dr. Theodore S. Palmer, has
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: considerably changed the working policy of the Biological Survey of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Department of Agriculture, and greatly influenced game protection
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: throughout the states. The game protection work of that bureau is alone
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: worth to the people of this country at least twenty times more per annum
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: than the entire annual cost of the Bureau. Next to the splendid services
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of Dr. Palmer, all over the United States, one great value of the Bureau
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: is found in the fact-and-figure ammunition that it prepares and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: distributes for general use in assaults on the citadels of Ignorance and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Greed. The publications of the Bureau are of great practical value to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the people of the United States.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: [Illustration: NOTABLE PROTECTORS OF WILD LIFE (1)
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: MADISON GRANT
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Secretary and Chairman Executive Committee, New York Zoological Society
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: HENRY FAIRFIELD OSBORN
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: President, New York Zoological Society
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: JOHN F. LACEY
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Ex-Member of Congress; Author of the "Lacey Bird Law"
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: WILLIAM DUTCHER
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Founder and President, National Association of Audubon Societies]
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Dr. Palmer is a man of incalculable value to the cause of protection.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: No call for advice is too small to receive his immediate attention, no
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: fight is too hot and no danger-point too remote to keep him from the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: fray. Wherever the Army of Destruction is making a particularly
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: dangerous fight to repeal good laws and turn back the wheels of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: progress, there will he be found. As the warfare grows more intense,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Congress may find it necessary to enlarge the fighting force of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Biological Survey.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The work that has been done by the Bureau in determining the economic
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: value or lack of value of our most important species of insectivorous
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: birds, has been worth millions to the agricultural interests of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: United States. Through it we know where we stand. The reasons why we
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: need to strive for protection can be expressed in figures and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: percentages; and it seems to me that they leave the American people no
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: option but to _protect_!
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: STATE GAME COMMISSIONS.--Each of our states, and each province of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Canada, maintains either a State Game Commission of several persons, one
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Commissioner, or a State Game Warden. All such officers are officially
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: charged with the duty of looking after the general welfare of the game
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and other wild life of their respective states. Theoretically one of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: chief duties of a State Game Commission is to initiate new legislative
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: bills that are necessary, and advocate their translation into law. The
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: official standing of most game commissioners is such that they can
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: successfully do this. In 1909 Governor Hughes of New York went so far as
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: to let it be known that he would sign no new game bill that did not meet
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the approval of State Game Commissioner James S. Whipple. As a general
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: working principle, and quite aside from Mr. Whipple, that was wrong;
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: because even a State game commissioner is not necessarily infallible, or
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: always on the right side of every wild-life question.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: As a rule, state commissioners and state wardens are keenly alive to the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: needs of their states in new game protective legislation, and a large
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: percentage of the best existing laws are due to their initiative. Often,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: however, their usefulness is limited by the trammels of public office,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and there are times when such officers can not be too aggressive without
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the risk of arousing hostile influences, and handicapping their own
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: departmental work. For this reason, it is often advisable that bills
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: which propose great and drastic reforms, and which are likely to become
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: storm-centers, should originate outside the Commissioner's office, and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: be pushed by men who are perfectly free to abide the fortunes of open
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: warfare. It should be distinctly understood, however, that lobbying in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: behalf of wild-life measures is _an important part of the legitimate
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: duty of every state game commissioner_, and is a most honorable calling.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: [Illustration: NOTABLE PROTECTORS OF WILD LIFE (II)
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: EDWARD HOWE FORBUSH
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Massachusetts State Ornithologist
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: T. GILBERT PEARSON
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Secretary, National Association of Audubon Societies
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: JOHN B. BURNHAM
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: President, American Game Protective and Propagation Association
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: ERNEST NAPIER
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: President, Fish and Game Commission of New Jersey]
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Of the many strong and aggressive state game commissions that I would
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: like to mention in detail, space permits the naming of only a very few,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: by way of illustration.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: NEW YORK.--Thanks to the great conservation Governor of this state, John
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: A. Dix, the year 1911 saw our forest, fish and game business established
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: on an ideal business basis. Realizing the folly of requiring a single
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: man to manage those three great interests, and render to each the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: attention that it deserves and requires, by a well-studied legislative
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: act a State Conservation Commission was created, consisting of three
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: commissioners, one for each of the three great natural departments.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: These are salaried officers, who devote their entire time to their work,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and are properly equipped with assistants. The state force of game
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: wardens now consists of 125 picked men, each on a salary of $900 per
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: year, and through a rigid system of daily reports (inaugurated by John
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: B. Burnham) the activities and results of each warden promptly become
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: known in detail at headquarters.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Fortunately, New York contains a very large number of true sportsmen,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: who are ever ready to come forward in support of every great measure for
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: wild-life protection. The spirit of real protection runs throughout the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: state, and in time I predict that it will result in a great recovery of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the native game of the commonwealth. That will be after we have stopped
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: all shooting of upland game birds and shore birds for about eight years.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Even the pinnated grouse could be successfully introduced over one-third
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of the state, if the people would have it so. It was our great body of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: conscientious sportsmen who made possible the Bayne-Blauvelt law, and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the new codification of the game laws of the state.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: TENNESSEE.--Clearly, Honorable Mention belongs to the unsalaried State
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Commissioner of Tennessee, Col. J.H. Acklen, "than whom," says Dr.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Palmer, "there is no more active and enthusiastic game protectionist in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: this country. Whatever has been accomplished in that state is due to his
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: activity and public spirit. Col. Acklen, who is now president of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: National Association of Game Commissioners, is a prominent lawyer, and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: enjoys the distinction of being the only commissioner in the country who
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: not only serves without pay, but also defrays a large part of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: expenses of game protection out of his own pocket."
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Surely the Commonwealth of Tennessee will not long permit this
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: unsupported condition of such a game commissioner to endure. That state
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: has a wild fauna worth preserving for her sons and grandsons, and it is
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: inconceivable that the funds vitally necessary to this public service
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: can not be found.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: ALABAMA.--I cite the case of Alabama because, in view of its position in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: a group of states that until recently have cared little about game
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: protection, it may be regarded as an unusual case. Commissioner John H.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Wallace, Jr., has evolved order out of chaos,--and something approaching
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: a reign of law out of the absence of law. To-day the State of Alabama
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: stands as an example of what can be accomplished by and through one
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: clear-headed, determined man who is right, and knows that he is right.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: NEW JERSEY.--Alabama reminds one of New Jersey, and of State Game
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Commissioner Ernest Napier. I have seen him on the firing-line, and I
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: know that his strong devotion to the interests of the wild life of his
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: state, his determination to protect it at all costs, and his resistless
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: confidence in asking for what is right, have made him a power for good.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The state legislature believes in him, and enacts the laws that he says
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: are right and necessary. He serves without salary, and gives to the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: state time, labor and money. It is a pleasure to work with such a man.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In 1912 Commissioner Napier won a pitched battle with the makers of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: automatic and pump guns, both shotguns and rifles, and debarred all
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: those weapons from use _in hunting_ in New Jersey unless satisfactorily
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: reduced to two shots.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: MASSACHUSETTS.--The state of Massachusetts is fortunate in the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: possession of a very fine corps of ornithologists, nature lovers,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: sportsmen and leading citizens who on all questions affecting wild life
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: occupy high ground and are not afraid to maintain it. It would be a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: pleasure to write an entire chapter on this subject. The record of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Massachusetts Army of the Defense is both an example and an inspiration
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: to the people of other states. Not only is the cause of protection
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: championed by the State Game Commission but it also receives constant
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and powerful support from the State Board of Agriculture, which
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: maintains on its staff Mr. E.H. Forbush as State Ornithologist. The
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: bird-protection publications of the Board are of great economic value,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and they are also an everlasting credit to the state. The very latest is
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: a truly great wild-life-protection volume of 607 pages, by Mr. Forbush,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: entitled "_Game Birds, Wild-Fowl and Shore Birds_." It is a publication
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: most damaging to the cause of the Army of Destruction, and I heartily
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: wish a million copies might be printed and placed in the hands of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: lawmakers and protectors.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The fight last winter and spring for a no-sale-of-game law was the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Gettysburg for Massachusetts. The voice of the People was heard in no
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: uncertain tones, and the Destroyers were routed all along the line. The
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: leaders in that struggle on the protection side were E.H. Forbush,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: William P. Wharton, Dr. George W. Field, Edward N. Goding, Lyman E.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Hurd, Ralph Holman, Rev. Wm. R. Lord and Salem D. Charles. With such
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: leaders and such supporters, any wild-life cause can be won, anywhere!
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: PENNSYLVANIA.--The case of Pennsylvania is rather peculiar. As yet there
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: is no large and resistless organized body of real sportsmen to rally to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the support of the State Game Commission in great causes, as is the case
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: in New York. As a result, with a paltry fund of only $20,000 for annual
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: maintenance, and much opposition from hunters and farmers, the situation
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: is far from satisfactory. Fortunately Dr. Joseph Kalbfus, Secretary of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the Commission and chief executive officer, is a man of indomitable
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: courage and determination. But for this state of mind he would ere this
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: have given up the fight for the hunter's license law (of one dollar per
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: year), which has been bitterly opposed by a very aggressive and noisy
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: group of gunners who do not seem to know that they are grievously
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: misled.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Fortunately, Commissioner John M. Phillips, of Pittsburgh is the ardent
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: supporter of Dr. Kalbfus and a vigorous fighter for justice to wild
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: life. He devotes to the cause a great amount of time and effort, and in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: addition to serving without salary he pays all his campaign expenses out
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of his own pocket. His only recompense for all this is the sincere
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: admiration of his friends, and the consciousness of having done his full
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: duty toward the wild life and the people of his native state.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: THE STATE AUDUBON SOCIETIES.--It is impossible to estimate the full
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: value of the influence and work of the State Audubon Societies of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: United States. Thus far these societies exist in thirty-nine states.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: From the beginning, their efforts have tended especially toward the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: preservation of the non-game birds, and it is well that the song and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: other insectivorous birds have thus been specially championed.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Unfortunately, however, if that policy is pursued exclusively, it leaves
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 154 very important species of game birds practically at the mercy of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Army of Destruction! It would seem that the time has come when all
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Audubon Societies should take up, as a part of their work, active
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: co-operation in helping to save the game birds from extermination.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: THE NATIONAL ORGANIZATIONS OF NEW YORK CITY
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: On January 1, 1895, the United States of America contained, so far as I
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: am aware, not one organization of national scope which was devoting any
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: large amount of its resources and activities to the protection of wild
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: life. At that time the former activities of the A.O.U. Committee on Bird
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Protection had lapsed. To-day the city of New York contains six national
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: organizations, and it is now a great center of nation-wide activities in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: behalf of preservation. Furthermore, these activities are steadily
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: growing, and securing practical results.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: THE NEW YORK ZOOLOGICAL SOCIETY.--In 1895 there was born into the world
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: a scientific organization having for its second declared object "the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: preservation of our native animals." It was the first scientific society
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: or corporation ever formed, so far as I am aware, having a specifically
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: declared object of that kind. It owes its existence and its presence in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the field of wild-life conservation to the initiative and persistence of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Mr. Madison Grant and Prof. Henry Fairfield Osborn. For sixteen years
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: these two officers have worked together virtually as one man. It is not
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: strange to find a sportsman like Mr. Grant promoting the wild-life
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: cause, but it is a fact well worthy of note that of all the zoologists
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of the world, Professor Osborn is the only one of real renown who has
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: actively and vigorously engaged in this cause, and taken a place in the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: front rank of the Defenders.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Mr. Grant's influence on the protection cause has been strong and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: far-reaching,--far more so than the majority of his own friends are
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: aware. He has promoted important protectionist causes from Alaska to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Louisiana and Newfoundland, and helped to win many important victories.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: THE BOONE AND CROCKETT CLUB.--This organization of big game sportsmen
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: was founded in 1885, and is the oldest of its kind in the United
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: States. Its members always have supported the cause of protection, by
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: law and by the making of game preserves. In all this work Mr. George
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Bird Grinnell, for twenty-five years editor of _Forest and Stream_,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: has been an important factor. As stated elsewhere, the club's written
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and unwritten code of ethics in big-game hunting is very strict. In
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: course of time a Committee on Game Protection was formed, and it
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: actively entered that field.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: [Illustration: NOTABLE PROTECTORS OF WILD LIFE (III)
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: JOSEPH KALBFUS
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Chief Game Protector and Secretary, Pennsylvania Board of Game
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Commissioners
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: JOHN M. PHILLIPS
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Member, Pennsylvania Board of Game Commissioners
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: EDWARD A. McILHENNY
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Founder of Wild-Fowl Preserves in Louisiana
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: CHARLES WILLIS WARD
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Founder of Wild-Fowl preserves in Louisiana]
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: THE NATIONAL ASSOCIATION OF AUDUBON SOCIETIES.--This organization was
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: founded by William Dutcher, in 1902, and in 1906 it was endowed to the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: extent of $322,000 by the bequest of Albert Wilcox. Subsequent
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: endowments, together with the annual contributions of members and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: friends, now give the Association an annual income of $60,000. It
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: maintains eight widely-separated field agents and lecturers and forty
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: special game wardens of bird refuges. It maintains Secretary T. Gilbert
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Pearson and a number of other good men constantly on the firing-line;
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and these forces have achieved many valuable results. After years of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: stress and struggle, it now seems almost certain that this organization
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: will save the two white egrets,--producers of "the white badge of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: cruelty,"--to the bird fauna of the United States, as in a similar
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: manner it has saved the gulls, terns and other sea birds of our lakes
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and coast line.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: This splendid organization is one of the monuments to William Dutcher.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: More than two years ago he was stricken with paralysis, and now sits in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: an invalid's chair at his home in Plainfield, New Jersey. His mind is
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: clear and his interest in wild-life protection is keen, but he is unable
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: to speak or to write. While he was active, he was one of the most
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: resourceful and fearless champions of the cause of the vanishing birds.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: To him the farmers of America owe ten times more than they ever will
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: know, and a thousand times more than they ever will repay, either to him
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: or to his cause.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: THE CAMP-FIRE CLUB OF AMERICA.--Although founded in 1897, this
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: organization did not, as an organization, actively enter the field of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: protection until 1909. Since that time its work has covered a wide
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: field, and enlisted the activities of many of its members. In order to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: provide a permanent fund for its work, each year the club members pay
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: special annual dues that are devoted solely to the wild-life cause. The
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Committee on Game Protective Legislation and Preserves is a strong,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: hard-working body, and it has rendered good service in the lines of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: activity named in its title.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: THE AMERICAN GAME PROTECTIVE AND PROPAGATION ASSOCIATION.--This is the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: youngest protective organization of national scope, having been
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: organized in 1911. Its activities are directed by John B. Burnham, for
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: five years Chief Game Protector of the State of New York, and a man
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: thoroughly conversant with the business of protection. The organization
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: is financed chiefly by means of a large annual fund contributed by
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: several of the largest companies engaged in manufacturing firearms and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: ammunition, whose directors feel that the time has come when it is both
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: wise and necessary to take practical measures to preserve the remnant of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: American game. Already the activities of this organization cover a wide
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: range, and it has been particularly active in enlisting support for the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Weeks bill for the federal protection of migratory birds.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: THE WILD LIFE PROTECTIVE ASSOCIATION came into existence in 1910, rather
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: suddenly, for the purpose of promoting the cause of the Bayne
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: no-sale-of-game bill, and other measures. It raised the fund that met
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the chief expenses of that campaign. Since that time it has taken an
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: important part in three other hotly contested campaigns in other states,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: two of which were successful.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: At the present moment, and throughout the future, these New York
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: organizations need _large sums of money_ with which to meet the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: legitimate expenses of active campaigns for great measures. They need
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: _some_ money from outside the state of New York! _Too much of the burden
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of national campaigning has been and is being left to be borne by the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: people of New York City_. This policy is growing monotonous. There is
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: every reason why Chicago, St. Louis, Cincinnati, Pittsburgh, Cleveland,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Philadelphia, Baltimore and Boston should each year turn $100,000 into
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the hands of these well-equipped and well managed national organizations
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: whose officers know _how to get results_, all over our country.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Such organizations as these do not exist in other cities; and this is
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: very unfortunate. New Orleans should be a center of protectionist
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: activity for the South, San Francisco for the Pacific slope, and Chicago
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: for the Middle West. Will they not become so?
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: TWO INDEPENDENT WORKERS.--At the western edge of the delta of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Mississippi there have arisen two men who loom up into prominence at an
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: outpost of the Army of Defense which they themselves have established.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: For what they already have done in the creation of wild-fowl preserves
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: in Louisiana, Edward A. McIlhenny and Charles Willis Ward deserve the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: thanks of the American People-at-large. An account of their splendid
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: activities, and the practical results already secured, will be found in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Chapter XXXVIII, on "Private Game Preserves," and in the story of Marsh
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Island. Already the home of these gentlemen, Avery Island, Louisiana,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: has become an important center of activity in wild-life protection.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: CHAPTER XXVII
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: HOW TO MAKE A NEW GAME LAW
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: THE LINE OF ACTION.--In the face of a calamity, the saving of life and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: property and the check of fire and flood depends upon good judgment and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: quick action at the critical moment. In emergencies, the slow and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: academic method will not serve. It is the run, the jump, the short cut
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and the violent method that saves life. If a woman is drowning, the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: sensible man does not wait for an introduction to her; nor does he run
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: to an acquaintance to borrow his boat, or stop to put on a collar and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: necktie. He seizes the first boat that he can find, and breaks its lock
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and chain if necessary; or, failing that, he plunges in without one.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: When he reaches the imperiled party, he doesn't say, "Will you kindly
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: let me save you?" He seizes her by the hair, and tries to keep her head
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: above water, without ceremony.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: That is to-day the condition and the treatment necessary regarding our
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: remnant of wild life. We are compelled to act quickly, directly, and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: even violently at times, if we save anything worth while.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: There is _no time_ to depend upon the academic "education" of the public
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: by the seductive illustrated lecture on birds, or the article about the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: habits of mammals. Those methods are all well enough in their places,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life
