txt: but we must not depend upon them in emergencies like the present, for
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: they do not pass laws or arrest lawbreakers. Give the public all of that
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: material that you can supply, and the more the better, but for heaven's
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: sake _do not_ depend upon the spread of bird-lore "education" to stop
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the work of the game-hogs! If you do, all the wild life will be
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: destroyed while the educational work is going on.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Often you can educate a gunner, and make him a protectionist; but you
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: never can do it by showing him pictures of birds. He needs strong
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: reasoning and exhortation, not bird-lore. To-day it is necessary to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: employ the most direct, forceful and at times even rude methods. Where
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: slaughtering cannot be stopped by moral suasion, it must be stopped with
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: a hickory club. The thing to do is to _get results, and get them
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: quickly, before it is too late_!
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: If the business section of a town is burning down, no one goes into the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: suburbs to lecture on architecture, or exhibit pictures of fire
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: apparatus. The rush is for water, fire-engines, red-blooded men and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: dynamite. When the birds all around you are being shot to death by
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: poachers who fear not God nor regard man, and you need help to stop it
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: on the instant, run to your neighbor's house, and ring his bell. If he
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: fails to hear the bell, pound on his door until you jar the whole house.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: When he comes down half-dressed, blinking and rubbing his eyes, shout
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: at him:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "Come out! Your birds are all being shot to pieces!"
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "Are they?" he will say. "But what can _I_ do about it? I can't help it!
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: I'm no game warden."
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "Put on your clothes, get your shot-gun and come out and drive off the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: killing gang."
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "But what good will that do? They will come back again."
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "Not if we do our duty. We must have them arrested, and appear against
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: them in court."
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "But," says the sleepy citizen, "That won't do much good. The laws are
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: not strict enough; and besides, they are not well enforced, even as they
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: are!"
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "Then let's make it our business to see that the present laws are
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: enforced, and go to our members of the legislature, and have them pass
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: some stronger laws."
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: And this brings me to a very important subject:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: HOW TO PASS A NEW LAW
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: We venture to say that the average citizen little realizes how possible
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: it is to secure the passage of a law that is clearly necessary for the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: better protection of wild life and forests. Because of this, and of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: necessity for exact knowledge, I shall here set down specific
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: instructions on this subject.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: THE PERSONAL EQUATION.--One determined man can secure the passage of a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: good law, provided he is reasonably intelligent and sufficiently
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: determined. The man who starts a movement must make up his mind to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: follow it up, direct its fortunes, stay with it when the storms of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: opposition beat upon it, and never give up until it is signed by the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: governor. He must be willing to sacrifice his personal convenience, many
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of his pleasures, and work when his friends are asleep or pleasuring.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In working for the protection of wild life there is one mighty and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: unfailing source of consolation. It is this:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: _Your cause always gains in strength, and the cause of the destroyers
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: always loses strength!_
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: THE CHOICE OF A CAUSE.--Be broad-minded. Do not rush to the legislature
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: with a demand for a law to permit the taking of bull-heads with
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: June-bugs in the creeks of your township, or to give your county a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: specially early open season on quail in order that your boy may try his
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: new gun before he goes back to college. _Don't propose any "local"
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: legislation_; for in progressive states, local game legislation is
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: coming strongly into disfavor,--just as it should! Legislate for your
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: whole state, and nothing less.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Do not bother your legislature with a trivial bill. Choose a cause that
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: is worth while to grown men, and it shall be well with you. It takes no
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: more time to pass a large bill than a small one; and big men prefer to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: be identified with big measures.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Before you have a bill drawn, advise with men whose opinions are worth
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: having. If the end you have in mind is a great and good one, _go ahead_,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: whether you secure support in advance or not. If the needs of the hour
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: clearly demand the measure, _go ahead_, even though you start absolutely
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: alone. A good measure never goes far without attracting company.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: DRAFTING A BILL.--As a rule, the members of a legislative body do not
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: have time to draft bills on subjects that are new or strange to them. A
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: short bill is easily prepared by your own representative; but a lengthy
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: bill, covering a serious reform, is a different matter. Hire a lawyer to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: draft the bill for you. A really good lawyer will not charge much for
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: drafting a bill that is to benefit the public, and grind no private axe;
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: but if the bill is long, and requires long study, even the good citizen
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: must charge something.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Your bill must fully recognize existing laws. It must be either
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: prohibitory or permissive; which means that it can say what shall not be
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: done, or else that which may be done according to law, all other acts
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: being forbidden. Your lawyer must decide which form is best. For my
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: part, I greatly prefer the prohibitive form, as being the stronger and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: more impressive of the two. I think it is the province of the law _to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: forbid_ the destruction of wild life and forests, under penalties.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: PENALTIES.--Every law should provide a penalty for its infringement; but
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the penalty should not be out of all proportion to the offense. It is
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: just as unwise to impose a fine of one dollar for killing song-birds for
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: food as it is to provide for a fine of three hundred dollars. A fine
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: that is too small fails to impress the prisoner, and it begets contempt
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: for the law and the courts! A fine that is altogether too high is apt to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: be set aside by the court as "excessive." In my opinion, the best fines
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: for wild life slaughter would be as follows:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Shooting, netting or trapping song-birds, and other non-game
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: birds, each bird                                          $5 to $25
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Killing game birds out of season, each bird                 10 to  50
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Selling game contrary to law, each offense                 100 to 200
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Dynamiting fish                                            100 to 200
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Seining or netting game fishes                              50 to 200
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Shooting birds with unfair weapons                          10 to 100
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Killing an egret, Carolina parakeet or whooping crane      100 to 200
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Killing a mountain sheep or antelope anywhere in the U.S.         500
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Killing an elk contrary to law                                     50
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Killing a female deer, or fawn without horns, each offense         50
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Trapping a grizzly bear for its skin                              100
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: For killing a man "by mistake," the fine should be $500, payable in five
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: annual instalments, to the court, for the family of the victim.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Whenever fines are not paid, the convicted party should be sentenced to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: imprisonment at hard labor at the rate of one-half day for each dollar
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of the fine imposed; and a sentence at hard labor should be the _first
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: option of the court_! Many a rich and reckless poacher snaps his fingers
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: at fines; but a sentence to hard labor would strike terror to the heart
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of the most brazen of them. To all such men, "labor" is the twin terror
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: to "death."
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: THE INTRODUCTION OF A BILL.--Much wisdom is called for in the selection
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of legislative champions for wild-life bills. It is possible to state
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: here only the leading principles involved.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Of course it is best to look for an introducer within the political
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: party that is in the majority. A man who has many important bills on his
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: hands is bound to give his best attention to his own pet measures; and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: it is best to choose a man who is not already overloaded. If a man has a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: host of enemies, pass him by. By all means choose a man whose high
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: character and good name will be a tower of strength to your cause; and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: if necessary, _wait for him to make up his mind_. Mr. Lawrence W.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Trowbridge waited three long and anxious weeks in the hope that Hon.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: George A. Blauvelt would finally consent to champion the Bayne bill in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the New York Assembly. At last Mr. Blauvelt consented to take it up; and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the time spent in waiting for his decision was a grand investment! He
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: was the Man of all men to pilot that bill through the Assembly.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Very often the "quiet man" of a legislative body is a good man to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: champion a new and drastic measure. The quiet man who makes up his mind
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: to take hold of "a hard bill to pass" often astonishes the natives by
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: his ability to get results. Representative John F. Lacey, of Iowa, made
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: his name a household word all over the United States by the quiet,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: steady, tireless and finally resistless energy with which for three long
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: years in Congress he worked for "the Lacey bird bill." For years his
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: colleagues laughed at him, and cheerfully voted down his bill. But he
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: persisted. His cause steadily gained in strength; and his final triumph
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: laid the axe at the root of a thousand crimes against wild life,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: throughout the length and breadth of this land. He rendered the people
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of America a service that entitles him to our everlasting gratitude and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: remembrance.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: AFTER THE INTRODUCTION OF A BILL.--As soon as a bill is introduced it is
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: referred to a committee, to be examined and reported upon. If there is
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: opposition,--and to every bill that really does something worth while
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: there always is opposition,--then there is a "hearing." The committee
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: appoints a day, when the friends and foes of the bill assemble, and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: express their views.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The week preceding a hearing is your busy week. You must plan your
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: campaign, down to the smallest details. Pick the men whom you wish to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: have speak (for ten minutes each) on the various parts of your bill, and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: divide the topics and the time between them. Call upon the friends of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the bill in various portions of the state to attend and "say something."
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Go up with a strong body of fine men. _Have as many organizations
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: represented as you possibly can_! The "organizations" represent the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: great mass of people, and the voters also.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: When you reach the hearing, hand to your bill's champion, who will be
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: floor manager for your side, a clear and concise list of your speakers,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: carefully arranged and stating who's who. That being done, you have only
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: to fill your own ten minutes and afterward enjoy the occasion.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: THE VALUE OF ACCURACY.--It is unnecessary to say, in working for a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: bill,--_always be sure of your facts_. Never let your opponents catch
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: you tripping in accuracy of statement. If you make one serious error,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: your enemies will turn it against you to the utmost. Better understate
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: facts than overstate them. This shrewd old world quickly recognizes the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: careful, conservative man whose testimony is so true and so rock-founded
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: that no assaults can shake it. Legislators are quick to rely on the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: words and opinions of the man who can safely be trusted. If your enemies
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: try to overwhelm you with extravagant statements, that are unfair to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: your cause, the chances are that the men who judge between you will
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: recognize them by their ear-marks, and discount them accordingly.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: WORK WITH MEMBERS.--Sometimes a subject that is put before a legislative
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: body is so new, and the thing proposed is so drastic, it becomes
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: necessary to take measures to place a great many facts before each
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: member of the body. Under such circumstances the member naturally
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: desires to be "shown." The cleanest and finest campaigning for a reform
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: measure is that in which both sides deal with facts, rather than with
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: personal importunities. With a good cause in hand, it is a pleasure to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: prepare concise statements of facts and conditions from which a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: legislator may draw logical conclusions. Whenever a bill can be won
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: through in that way, game protection work becomes a delight.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In all important new measures affecting the rights and the property of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the whole people of a state, the conscientious legislator wishes to know
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: how the people feel about it. When you tell him that "The wild life
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: belongs to the whole people of the state; and this bill is in their
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: interest," he needs to know for certain that your proposition is true.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Sometimes there is only one way in which he can be fully convinced; and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: that is by the people of his district.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Then it becomes necessary to send out a general alarm, and call upon the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: People to write to their representatives and express _their_ views. Give
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: them, in printed matter, the _latest facts_ in the case, forecast the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: future as you think it should be forecast, then demand that the men and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: women who are interested do write to their senators and assemblyman, and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: express _their_ views, in _their own way!_ Let there be no "machine
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: letters" sent out, all ready for signature; for such letters are a waste
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of effort, and belong in the waste baskets to which they are quickly
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: consigned. The members of legislative bodies hate them, and rightly,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: too. They want to hear from men who can think for themselves, give
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: reasons of their own, and express their desires in their own way.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: THE PRESS AND THE NEWSPAPERS.--It is impossible to overestimate the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: influence of the newspapers and the periodical press in general, in the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: protection of wild life. But for their sympathy, their support and their
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: independent assaults upon the Army of Destruction, our game species
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: would nearly all of them have been annihilated, long ago. Editors are
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: sympathetic and responsive good-citizens, as keenly sensitive regarding
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: their duties as any of the rest of us are, and from the earliest times
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of protection they have been on the firing line, helping to beat back
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the destroyers. It is indeed a rare sight to see an editor giving aid,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: comfort or advice to the enemy. I can not recall more than a score of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: articles that I have seen or heard of during thirty years in this field
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: that opposed the cause of wild life protection.[K] At this moment, for
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: instance, I bear in particularly grateful remembrance the active
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: campaign work of the following newspapers:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: [Footnote K: Just one hour after the above paragraph was written, a long
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: telegram from San Francisco advised me that the _Examiner_ of that city
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: had begun an active and aggressive campaign for the sale of all kinds of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: game.]
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The New York Times
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The New York Tribune
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The New York Herald
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The New York Globe
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The New York Mail and Express
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The New York World
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The New York Sun
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The Springfield (Mass.) Republican
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The Chicago Inter-Ocean
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The San Francisco Call
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The Rochester Union and Advertiser
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The Victoria Colonist
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The Brooklyn Standard-Union
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The New York Evening Post
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The New York Press
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The Buffalo News
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The Minneapolis Journal
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The Pittsburgh Index-Appeal
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The St. Louis Globe-Democrat
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The Philadelphia North American
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The Utica Observer
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The Washington Star.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: These magazines have done good service in the cause; and some of them
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: have spent many years on the firing line:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Forest and Stream
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The American Field
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Field and Stream
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Recreation (old and new)
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Rod and Gun in Canada
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In the Open
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Sports Afield
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Western Field
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Outdoor Life
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Shield's Magazine
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Sportsman's Review
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Outing
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Collier's Weekly
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The Independent
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Country Life
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Outdoor World
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Bird Lore
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In campaigning, always appeal for the help of the newspapers. If there
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: are no private axes to grind, they help generously. The weekly journals
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: are of value, but the monthlies are printed so long in advance of their
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: dates of issue that they seldom move fast enough to keep abreast of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: procession. Their mechanical limitations are many and serious.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Every newspaper likes "exclusive" news, letters and articles. On that
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: basis they will print about all the live matter that you can furnish.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: But at the same time, the important news of the campaign _must_ be sent
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: to the press broadcast, in the form of printed slips all ready for the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: foreman. Many of these are never used, but the others are; and it pays.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The news in every slip must be vouched for by the sender, or it will not
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: be used. Often it will appear as a letter signed by the sender; which is
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: all right, only the news is most effective when printed without a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: signature. Do not count on the Associated Press; because its peculiar
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: demands render it almost impossible for it to be utilized in game
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: protection work.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: HOW TO MEET OPPOSITION.--There is no rule for the handling of opposition
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: that is fair and open. For opposition that is unfair and under-handed,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: there is one powerful weapon,--Publicity. The American people love fair
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: play, and there is nothing so fatal to an unfair fighter as a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: searchlight, turned full on him without fear and without mercy. If it is
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: reliably and persistently reported that some citizen who ought to be on
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the right side has for some dark reason become active on the wrong side,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: print the reports in a large newspaper, and ask him publicly if they are
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: true. If the reports are false, he can quickly come out in a letter and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: say so, and end the matter. If they are true, the public will soon know
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: it, and act accordingly.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: ETERNAL VIGILANCE.--The progress of a bill must be watched by some
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: competent person from day to day, and finally from hour to hour. I know
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: one bill that was saved from defeat only because its promoter dragged
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: it, almost by force, out of the hands of a tardy clerk, and accompanied
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: it in person to the senate, where it was passed in the last hour of a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: session.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: A bill should not be left to a long slumber in the drawer of a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: committee. Such delays nearly always are dangerous.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: SIGNING THE BILL.--The promoter of a great measure always seeks the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: sympathy of the Chief Executive early in the day; but he should not make
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the diplomatic error of trying to exact promises or pledges in advance.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Good judges do not give away their decisions in advance.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Because a Chief Executive remarks after a bill has been sent to him for
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: signing that he "cannot approve it," it is no reason to give up in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: despair. Many an executive approval has been snatched at the last
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: moment, as a brand from the burning. _Ask for a hearing before the bill
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: is acted upon_. At the hearing, and before it and after, the People who
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: wish the bill to become a law must express themselves,--by letter, by
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: telegram, and by appeal in person. If the governor becomes convinced
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: that an _overwhelming majority_ of his people desire him to sign the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: bill, _he will sign it_, even though personally he is opposed to it! The
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: hall mark of a good governor is a spirit of obedience to the will of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: great majority.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Not until your bill has been signed by the governor are you ready to go
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: home with a quiet mind, take off your armor, and put your ear to the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: telephone while you hear some one say as your only reward,--"Well done,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: good and faithful servant."
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: AS TO "CREDIT."--Do not count upon receiving any credit for what you do
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: in the cause of game protection, outside the narrow circle of your own
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: family and your nearest friends. This is a busy world; and the human
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: mind flits like a restless bird from one subject to another. The men who
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: win campaigns are forgotten by the general public, in a few hours! There
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: is nothing more fickle or more fleeting than the bubble called "popular
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: applause." Judging by the experiences of great men, I should say that it
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: has no substance, whatever. The most valuable reward of the man who
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: fights in a great cause, and helps to win victories, is the profound
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: satisfaction that comes to every good citizen who bravely does his whole
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: duty, and leaves the world better than he found it, without the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: slightest thought of gallery applause.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: CHAPTER XXVIII
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: NEW LAWS NEEDED: A ROLL-CALL OF THE STATES
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The principles of wild-life protection and encouragement are now so
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: firmly established as to leave little room for argument regarding their
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: value. When they are set forth before the people of any given state, the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: only question is of willingness to do the right thing; of duty or a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: defiance of duty; of good citizenship or the reign of selfishness. Men
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: who do not wish to do their duty purposely befog great issues by noisy
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: talk and tiresome academic discussions of trivial details; and such men
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: are the curse and scourge of reform movements.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: There are a very few persons who foolishly assert that "there are too
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: many game laws!" It is entirely wrong for any person to make such a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: statement, for it tends to promote harmful error. The fact that our laws
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: are _too lenient_, or are not fully enforced, is no excuse for
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: denouncing their purposes. We have all along been too timid, too self
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: indulgent, and too much afraid of hurting the feelings of the game-hogs.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Give me the power to make the game laws of any state or province and I
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: will guarantee to save the _non-migratory_ wild life of that region. I
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: will not only make adequate laws, but I will also provide means, men and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: penalties by which _they will be enforced_! It is easy and simple, for
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: men who are not afraid.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: I have been at considerable pains to analyze the game laws of each
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: state, ascertain their shortcomings, and give a list of the faults that
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: need correction by new legislation. It has required no profound wisdom
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: to do this, because the principles involved are so plain that any
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: intelligent schoolboy fifteen years old can master them in one hour. I
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: have performed this task hopefully, in the belief that in many states
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the real issues have not been plainly put before the people. Hereafter
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: no state shall destroy its wild life through ignorance of the laws that
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: would preserve it.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Let no man say that "it is too late to save the wild life"; for
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: excepting the dead-and-gone species, that is not true. Let no man say
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: that "we can not save the wild life by law"; for that is not true,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: either. As long as laws are lax, even law-abiding people will take
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: advantage of them.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: There are millions of men who think it is _right to kill all the game
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: that the law allows_! There are thousands of women who think it is right
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: to wear aigrettes as long as the law permits their sale! And yet, if we
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: are resolute and diligent there is plenty of hope for the future. During
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the past three years, to go no farther back, we have seen the whole
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: state of New York swept clean of the traffic in native wild game by the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Bayne law, and of the traffic in wild birds' plumage on women's hats
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: through the Dutcher law. To-day, in this state, we find ninety-nine
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: women out of every one hundred wearing flowers, and laces, and plush and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: satin on their hats, instead of the heads, bodies and feathers of wild
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: birds that were the regular thing until three years ago. The change has
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: been a powerful commentary on the value of good laws for the protection
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of wild life. The Dutcher law has caused the plumage of wild birds
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: _almost wholly to disappear from the State of New York_!
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: We shall here point out the plain duty of each state; and then it will
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: be up to them, individually, to decide whether they can stand the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: blood-test or not.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: A state or a nation can be ungentlemanly, unfair or mean, just the same
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: as an individual. No state has a right to maintain shambles for the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: slaughter of migratory game or song birds that belong in part to sister
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: states. _Every state holds its migratory bird life in trust, for the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: benefit of the people of the nation at large_. A state is just as
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: responsible for its treatment of wild life as any individual; and it is
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: time to open books of account.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: It is robbery, as well as murder, for any southern state to slaughter
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the robins of the northern states, where no robins may be killed. _No
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: southern gentleman can permit such doings, after the crime has been
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: pointed out to him_! In the North, the men who are caught shooting
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: robins are instantly haled to court, and fined or imprisoned. If we of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the North should kill for food the mockingbirds that visit us, the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: people of the South instantly would brand us as monsters of greed and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: meanness; and they would be perfectly justified in so doing.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Let us at least be honest in "agreeing upon a state of fact," as the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: lawyers say, whether we act sensibly and mercifully or not. Just so long
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: as there remains in this land of ours a fauna of game birds, and the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: gunners of one-half the states are allowed to dictate the laws for the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: slaughter of it, just so long will our present protection remain utterly
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: absurd and criminally inadequate. Look at these absurdities:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: New York, New Jersey and many other northern states rigidly prohibit the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: late winter and spring shooting of waterfowl and shore birds, and limit
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the bag; North Carolina, South Carolina, Florida, and other southern
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: states not only slaughter wild fowl and shore birds all winter and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: spring, without limit, but several of them kill certain non-game birds
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: besides!
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: All the northern states protect the robin, for the good that it does;
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: but in North Carolina, Tennessee, Mississippi, Louisiana and some other
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: southern states, thousands of robins are shot for food. Minnesota has
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: stopped spring shooting; but her sister state on the south, Iowa,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: obstinately refuses to do so.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: THE UNITED STATES AT LARGE.--There are two great measures that should be
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: carried into effect by the governing body of the United States. One is
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the enactment of a law providing federal protection for all migratory
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: birds; and Canada and Mexico should be induced to join with the United
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: States _in an international treaty to that effect_.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The other necessary measure is the passage of a joint resolution of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Congress _declaring every national forest and forest reserve also a game
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: preserve and general sanctuary for wild life_, in which there shall be
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: no hunting or killing of wild creatures of any kind save predatory
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: animals.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The tendency of the times,--and the universal slaughter of wild life on
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: this continent,--point straight as an arrow flies in that direction.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Soon or late, we have GOT to come to it! If Congress does not take the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: initiatory steps, _the People will_! Such a consummation is necessary;
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: it is justified by common sense and the inexorable logic of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: situation, and when done it will be right.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The time was when the friends of wild life did not dare speak of this
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: subject in Washington save in whispers. That was in the days when the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Appalachian Park bill could not be passed, and when there were angry
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: mutterings and even curses leveled against Gifford Pinchot and the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Forestry Bureau because so many national forests were being set aside.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: That was in the days when a few western sheep-men thought that they
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: owned the whole Rocky Mountains without having bought them. To-day, the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: American people have grown accustomed to the idea of having the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: resources of the public domain saved and conserved for the benefit of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the millions rather than lavished upon a favored few. To-day it is
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: perfectly safe to talk about making every national forest a first class
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: wild-life sanctuary, and it is up to the People to request Congress to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: take that action, at once.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The Weeks bill, the Anthony bill, and the McLean bill now before
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Congress to provide federal protection for migratory birds are
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: practically identical. All three are good bills; and it matters not
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: which one finally becomes a law. Whichever is put forward finally for
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: passage should provide federal protection for _all_ migratory birds that
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: ever enter the United States, Alaska, or Porto Rico. Why favor the duck
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and leave the robin to its fate, or vice versa? It will be just as easy
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: to do this task by wholes as by halves. The time to hesitate, to feel
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: timid, or to be afraid of the other fellow has gone by. To-day the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: millions of honest and serious-minded Americans are ready to back the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: most thorough and most drastic policy, because that has become the most
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: necessary and the best policy. Furthermore, it is the only policy worthy
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of serious consideration.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Some of our states have done rather well in wild-life
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: protection,--considering the absurdity of our national policy as a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: whole; others have done indifferently, and some have been and still are
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: very remiss. Here is where we intend to hew to the line, and without
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: fear or favor set forth the standing of each state according to its
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: merits or its lack of merits. In a life-or-death matter such as now
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: confronts us regarding the wild life of our country, it is time to speak
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: plainly.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In the following call of the States, the glaring deficiencies in state
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: game laws will be set forth in detail, in order that the sore spots may
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: be exposed to the view of the doctors. Conditions will be represented
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: _as they exist at the end of the summer of 1912_, and it is to be hoped
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: that these faults soon may be corrected.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: A ROLL-CALL OF THE STATES
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: ALABAMA:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: It is a satisfaction to be able to open this list with the name of a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: state that is entitled to a medal of honor for game protection. In this
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: particular field of progress and enlightenment, the state of Alabama is
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the pioneer state of the South. New York now occupies a similar position
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: in the North; but New York is an older state, and stronger in her
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: general love of nature. The attainment of advanced protection in any
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: southern state is a very different matter from what it is in the North.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Five years ago Alabama set her house in order. The slaughter of song and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: insectivorous birds has been so far stopped as any Southern state can
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: stop it unaided by the federal government, and those birds are
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: recognized and treated as the farmers' best friends. The absurd system
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of attempted protection through county laws has been abandoned. The sale
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of game has been stopped, and since that stoppage, quail have increased.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The trapping and export of game have ceased, and wild turkeys and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: woodcock are now increasing. It is unlawful to kill or capture non-game
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: birds. Bag limits have been imposed, but _the bag limit laws are all too
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: liberal, and should be reduced_. A hunter's license law is in force, and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the department of game and fish is self-supporting. Night hunting is
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: prohibited, and female deer may not be killed. A comprehensive warden
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: system has been provided. As yet, however, Alabama
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Permits the shooting of waterfowl to March 15, which is too late, by
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: one and one-half months.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The use of automatic and pump guns in hunting should be suppressed.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: There should be a limit of two deer per year, and killing should be
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: restricted to deer with horns not less than three inches long.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The story of game protection in Alabama began in 1907. Prior to that
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: time, the slaughter of wild life was very great. It is known that
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: enormous numbers of quail were annually killed by negro farm hands, who
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: hunted at least three days each week, regardless of work to be done. The
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: slaughter of quail, wild ducks, woodcock, doves, robins and snipe was
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: described as "nauseating."
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The change that has been wrought since 1907 is chiefly due to the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: efforts of one man. Alabama owes her standing to-day to the admirable
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: qualities of John H. Wallace, Jr., her Game and Fish Commissioner,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: author of the State's policy in wild-life conservation. His
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: broad-mindedness, his judgment and his success make him a living object
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: lesson of the power of one determined man in the conservation of wild
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: life.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Commissioner Wallace is an ardent supporter of the Weeks and Anthony
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: bills for federal protection, and as a lawyer of the South, he believes
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: there is "no constitutional inhibition against federal legislation for
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the protection of birds of passage."
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: ALASKA:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The sale of game must be absolutely prohibited, forever.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The slaughter of big game by Indians, miners and prospectors should
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: now be limited, and strictly regulated by law, on rational lines.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The slaughter of walrus for ivory and hides, both in the Alaskan and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Russian waters of Bering Sea, should be totally prohibited for ten
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: years.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The game-warden service should be quadrupled in number of wardens,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and in general effectiveness.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The game-warden service should be supplied with two sea-going
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: vessels, independent for patrol work.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The bag limit on hoofed game is 50 per cent too large.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: To accomplish these ends, Congress should annually appropriate
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: $50,000 for the protection of wild life in Alaska. The present
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: amount, $15,000, is very inadequate, and the great wild-life
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: interests at stake amply justify the larger amount.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: It is now time for Alaska to make substantial advances in the protection
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of her wild life. It is no longer right nor just for Indians, miners and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: prospectors to be permitted by law to kill all the big game they please,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: whenever they please. The indolent and often extortionate Indians of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Alaska,--who now demand "big money" for every service they perform,--are
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: not so valuable as citizens that they should be permitted to feed
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: riotously upon _moose, and cow moose at that_, until that species is
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: exterminated. Miners and prospectors are valuable citizens, but that is
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: no reason why they should forever be allowed to live upon wild game, any
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: more than that hungry prospectors in our Rocky Mountains should be
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: allowed to kill cattle.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Alaska and its resources do not belong to the very few people from "the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: States" who have gone there to make their fortunes and get out again as
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: quickly as possible. The quicker the public mind north of Wrangel is
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: disabused of that idea, the better. Its game belongs to the people of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: this nation of ninety-odd millions, and it is a safe prediction that the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: ninety millions will not continue to be willing that the miners,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: prospectors and Indians shall continue to live on moose meat and caribou
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: tongues in order to save bacon and beef.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Mr. Frank E. Kleinschmidt said to me that at Sand Point, Alaska, he saw
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: eighty-two caribou tongues brought in by an Indian, and sold at fifty
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: cents each, while (according to all accounts) most of the bodies of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: slaughtered animals became a loss.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Governor Clark has recommended in his annual report for 1911 that the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: protection now enjoyed by the giant brown bear _(Ursus middendorffi_) on
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Kadiak Island be removed, for the benefit of settlers _and their stock_!
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: It goes without saying that no one proposes that predatory wild animals
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: shall be permitted to retard the development of any wild country that is
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: required by civilized man. All we ask in this matter is that, as in the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: case of the once-proposed slaughter of sea-lions on the Pacific Coast,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: _the necessity of the proposed slaughter shall be fully and adequately
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: proven before the killing begins_! It is fair to insist that the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: sea-lion episode shall not be repeated on Kadiak Island.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The big game of Alaska can not long endure against a "limit" of two
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: moose, three mountain sheep, three caribou and six deer per year, per
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: man. At that rate the moose and sheep soon will disappear. The limit
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: should be one moose, two sheep, two caribou and four deer,--unless we
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: are willing to dedicate the Alaskan big game to Commercialism. No
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: sportsman needs a larger bag than the revised schedule; and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: commercialists should not be allowed to kill big game anywhere, at any
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: time.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Let us bear in mind the fact that Alaska is being throughly "opened up"
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: to the Man with a Gun. Here is the latest evidence, from the new
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: circular of an outfitter:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "I will have plenty of good horses, and good, competent and courteous
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: guides; also other camp attendants if desired. My intention is to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: establish permanently at that point, as I believe it is the gateway to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the finest _and about the last_ of the great game countries of North
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: America."
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The road is open; the pack-train is ready; the guides are waiting. Go on
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and slay the Remnant!
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: ARIZONA:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The band-tailed pigeons and all non-game birds should immediately be
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: given protection; and a salaried warden system should be established
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: under a Commissioner whose term is not less than four years.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The use of automatic and pump guns, in hunting, should be
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: prohibited.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Spring shooting should be prohibited.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Arizona has good reason to be proud of her up-to-date position in the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: ranks of the best game-protecting states. No other state or territory of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: her age ever has made so good a showing of protective laws. The
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: enactment of laws to cover the points mentioned above would leave little
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: to be desired in Arizona. That state has a bird fauna well worth
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: protecting, and game wardens are extremely necessary.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: ARKANSAS:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The enforcement of game laws should be placed in charge of a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: salaried commissioner.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Spring shooting of wildfowl should be stopped at once.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: A reasonable close season should be provided for water fowl, and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: swans should be protected throughout the year.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: A bag-limit law should be enacted.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: A force of game wardens, salaried and unsalaried, should at once be
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: created.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The killing of female deer and the hounding of deer, should be
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: stopped.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: No buck deer should be shot, unless horns three inches long are seen
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: before firing.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: A hunter's license law is necessary; and the fees should go to the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: support of the game protection department.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The local exemptions in favor of market hunters in Mississippi
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: county should be repealed.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: It appears that in Arkansas the laws for the protection and increase of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: wild life are by no means up to the mark. At this moment, Arkansas is
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: next to Florida, the rearmost of all our states in wild-life protection.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Awake, Arkansas! Consider the peril that threatens your fauna. The Sunk
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Lands, in your northeastern corner along the St. Francis River, are the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: greatest wild-fowl refuge anywhere in the Mississippi Valley between the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Gulf Coast of Louisiana and the breeding-grounds of Minnesota. A duty to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the nation devolves upon you, to protect the migratory waterfowl that
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: visit your great bird refuge from the automatic and pump guns of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: pothunters who shoot for northern markets, and kill all that they can
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: kill. _Protect those Sunken Lands_! Confer a boon on all the people of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the Mississippi Valley by making that region a bird refuge in fact as
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: well as in name.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Heretofore, you have permitted hired market gunners from outside your
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: borders to slaughter the wild-fowl of your Sunk Lands literally by
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: millions, and ship them to northern markets, with very little benefit to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: your people. It is time for that slaughter to cease. Don't maintain a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: duck and goose shambles in Mississippi County, year after year, as North
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Carolina does! Do unto other states as you would have other states do
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: unto you. _Do not_ be afraid to pass nine good laws in one act. Clear
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: your record in the Family of States, and save your fauna before it is
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: too late. It is not fair for you to permit the slaughter of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: insectivorous birds that are like the blood of life to the farmer and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: fruit grower.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: CALIFORNIA:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The sale of all wild game should be forever prohibited.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The use of automatic and pump shotguns, in hunting, should be
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: prohibited.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The killing of pigeons and doves as "game" and "food" should be
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: stopped.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The sage grouse and every other species of bird threatened with
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: extinction should be given ten year close seasons.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The mule deer (if any remain) and the Columbian black-tailed deer in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the southern counties should be accorded a ten-year close season.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: A large state game preserve should be created immediately, on or
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: near Mount Shasta and abundantly stocked with nucleus herds of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: antelope, black-tailed deer, bison and elk.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: A suitable preserve in the southern part of the state should be set
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: aside for the dwarf elk.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: As game laws are generally regarded, California has on her books a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: series that look rather good to the eye, but which are capable of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: considerable improvement. All along the line, the birds and quadrupeds
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of the Golden State are vanishing! Under that heading, a vigorous
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: chapter could be written; but space forbids its development here. Just
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: fancy laws that permit gunning and hunting with dogs, from August until
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: January--one-half the entire year! Think of the nesting birds that are
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: disturbed or killed by dogs and gunners after other birds!
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: California's wild ducks and geese have been slaughtered to an extent
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: almost beyond belief. The splendid sage grouse and the sharp-tailed
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: grouse are greatly reduced in numbers. Of her hundreds of thousands of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: antelope, once the cheapest game in the market, scarcely "a trace"
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: remains. Her mountain sheep and mule deer are almost extinct. Her
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: grizzly bears are gone!
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The most terrible slaughter ever recorded for automatic guns occurred
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: in Glenn County, Cal., on Feb. 5, 1906, when two men (whose story was
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: published in _Outdoor Life_, xvii, p. 371, April, 1906), killed 450
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: geese in one day, and actually bagged 218 of them in _one hour_!
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Every person who has paid attention to game protection on the Pacific
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: coast well knows that during the past eight years or more, the work of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: game protection in California has been in a state of frequent turmoil.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: At times the lack of harmony between the State Fish and Game Commission
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and the sportsmen of the state has been damaging to the interests of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: wild life, and deplorable. In the case of Warden Welch, in Santa Cruz
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: County, pernicious politics came near robbing the state of a splendid
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: warden, but the courts finally overthrew the overthrowers of Mr. Welch,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and reinstated him.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The fish and game commissioners of any state should be broad-minded,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: non-partisan, strictly honest and sincere. So long as they possess these
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: qualities, they deserve and should have the earnest and aggressive
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: support of all sportsmen and all lovers of wild life. The remnant of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: wild life is entitled to a square deal, and harmony in the camp of its
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: friends. Fortunately California has an excellent force of salaried game
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: wardens (82 in all) and 577 volunteer wardens serving without salary.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: COLORADO:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The State of Colorado should instantly stop the sale of native wild
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: game to be used as food.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: It should stop all late winter and spring shooting of native wild
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: birds.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: It should give the sage grouse, pinnated grouse and all shore birds
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: a ten year close season, remove the dove from the list of game
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: birds, and give it a permanent close season.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: It should remove the crane and the swan from the list of game birds.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In twenty-five short years we have seen in Colorado a waste of wild life
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and the destruction of a living inheritance that has few parallels in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: history. Possibly the people of Colorado are satisfied with the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: residuum; but some outsiders regard all Rocky Mountain shambles with a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: feeling of horror.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: A brief quarter-century ago, Colorado was a zoological park of grand
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: scenery and big game. The scenery remains, but of the great wild herds,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: only samples are left, and of some species not even that.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The last bison of Colorado were exterminated in Lost Park by scoundrels
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: calling themselves "taxidermists," in 1897. Of the 200,000 mule deer
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: that inhabited Routt County and other portions of Colorado, not enough
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: now remain to make deer hunting interesting. A perpetual close season
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: was put on mountain sheep just in time to save a dozen small flocks as
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: seed stock. Those flocks have been permitted to live, and they have bred
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: until now there are perhaps 3,500 sheep in the state. Of elk, only a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: remnant is left, now protected for fifteen years.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The grizzly bear is so thoroughly gone that one is seen only by a rare
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: accident; but black bears and pumas are sufficiently numerous to afford
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: fair sport, provided the hunter has a fine outfit of dogs, horses and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: guides. Of prong-horned antelope, several bands remain, but it is
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: reported that they are steadily diminishing. The herds and herders of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: domestic sheep are blamed for the decrease, and I have no doubt they
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: deserve it. The sheep and their champions are the implacable enemies of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: all wild game, and before them the game vanishes, everywhere.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The lawmakers of Colorado have tried hard to provide adequate statutes
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: for the protection of the wild life of the state. In fact, I think that
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: no state has put forth greater or more elaborate efforts in that
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: direction. For example, in 1899, under the leadership of Judge D.C.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Beaman of Denver, Colorado initiated the "more game movement," by
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: enacting a very elaborate law providing for the establishment of private
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: game preserves and farms for the breeding of game under state license,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and the tagging and sale of preserve-bred game under state supervision.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: [Illustration: BAND-TAILED PIGEON
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Often Mistaken for the Passenger Pigeon. The rapid Slaughter
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of this Species has Alarmed the Ornithologists of California,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: who now fear its Extinction]
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The history of game destruction in Colorado is a repetition of the old,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: old story,--plenty of laws, but a hundred times too many hunters,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: killing the game both according to law and contrary to it, and doing it
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: five times as fast as the game could breed. That combination can safely
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: be warranted to wipe out the wild life of any country in the world, and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: accomplish it right swiftly.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: As a big-game country, Colorado is distinctly out of the running. Her
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: people are too lawless, and her frontiersmen are, in the main, far too
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: selfish to look upon plenteous game without going after it. Some of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: these days, a new call of the wild will arise in Colorado, demanding an
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: open season on mountain sheep. Those who demand it will say, "What harm
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: will it do to kill a few surplus bucks? It will improve the breed, and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: make the herds increase faster!"
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: By all means, have an "open season" on the Colorado big-horn and the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: British Columbia elk. It will "do them good." The excitement of ram
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: slaughter will be good for the females, will it not? Of course, they
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: will breed faster after that,--with all the big rams dead. Any "surplus"
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: wild life is a public nuisance, and should promptly be shot to pieces.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In Colorado there is some desire that Estes Park should be acquired as a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: national park, and maintained by the government; but the strong reasons
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: for this have not yet appeared. As yet we have not heard any reason why
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the State of Colorado should not herself take it and make of it a state
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: park and game preserve. If done, it could be offered as a partial
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: atonement for her wastefulness in throwing away her inheritance of grand
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: game.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Colorado has work to do in the preservation of her remnant of bird life.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In several respects she is behind the times. The present is no time to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: hesitate, or to ask the gunners what _they_ wish to have done about new
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: laws for the saving of the remnant of game. The dictates of common sense
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: are plain, and inexorable. Let the lawmakers do their whole duty by the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: remnant of wild life, whether the game killers like it or not.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: _The Curse of Domestic Sheep Upon Game and Cattle_.--Much has been said
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: in print and out of print regarding the extent to which domestic sheep
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: have destroyed the cattle ranges and incidentally many game ranges of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the West; but the half hath not been told. The American people as a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: whole do not realize that the domestic sheep has driven the domestic
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: steer from the free grass of the wild West, with the same speed and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: thoroughness with which the buffalo-hunters of the 70's and 80's swept
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: away the bison. I have seen hundreds of thousands of acres of what once
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: were beautiful and fertile cattle-grazing lands in Montana, that has
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: been left by grazing sheep herds looking precisely as if the ground had
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: been shaven with razors and then sandpapered. The sheep have driven out
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the cattle, and the price of beef has gone up accordingly. Neither
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: cattle, horses nor wild game can find food on ground that has been
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: grazed over by sheep.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The following is the testimony of a reliable eye witness, Mr. Dillon
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Wallace, and the full text appears in his book, "_Saddle and Camp in the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Rockies_," (page 169):--
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Domestic sheep and sheep herders are the greatest enemies of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: antelope, as well as of other game animals and birds in the regions
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: where herders take their flocks. The ranges over which domestic
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: sheep pasture are denuded of forage and stripped of all growth, and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: antelope will not remain upon a range where sheep have been.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Thus the sheep, sweeping clean all before them and leaving the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: ranges over which they pass unproductive, for several succeeding
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: seasons, of pasturage for either wild or domestic animals, together
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: with the destructive shepherds, are the worst enemies at present of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Utah's wild game, particularly of antelope, sage hens, and grouse.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In Iron county, which has already become an extensive sheep region,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: settlers tell us that before the advent of sheep, grass grew so
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: luxuriously that a yearling calf lying in it could not be seen. Not
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: only has the grass here been eaten, but the roots tramped out and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: killed by the hoofs of thousands upon thousands of sheep, and now
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: wide areas, where not long since grass was so plentiful, are as bare
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and desolate as sand-piles.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: CHAPTER XXIX
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: NEW LAWS NEEDED IN THE STATES
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: (Continued)
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: CONNECTICUT:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The sale of all native wild game, regardless of its source, should
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: be prohibited at all times. Enact at once a five-year close season
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: law on the remnant of ruffed grouse, quail, woodcock, snipe, and all
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: shore birds.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Even in the home of the newest and deadliest "autoloading" shotgun,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: those guns and pump guns should be prohibited in hunting.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The enormous bag limits of 35 rail and 50 each per day of plover,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: snipe and shore birds is a crime! They should be replaced by a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: ten-year close season law for all of those species.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The terms of the game commissioners should be not less than four
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: years.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Like so many other states, Connecticut has recklessly wasted her
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: wild-life inheritance. During the fifteen years preceding the year 1898,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the bird life of that state had decreased 75 per cent. On March 6, 1912,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Senator Geo. P. McLean, of Connecticut stated at the hearing held by his
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Committee on Forest Reservations and the Protection of Game this fact:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "We have more cover than there was thirty or forty years ago, more brush
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: probably, but there is not one partridge [ruffed grouse] today where
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: there were twenty ten years ago!"
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: First of all, Connecticut needs a ten-year close season law to save her
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: remnant of shore birds before it is completely annihilated. Then she
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: needs a Bayne law, and needs it badly. Under such a law, and the tagging
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: system that it provides, the state game wardens would have so strong a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: grip on the situation that the present unlawful sale of game would be
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: completely stopped. Half-way measures in preventing the sale of game
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: will not answer. Already Connecticut has wasted thousands of dollars in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: fruitless efforts to restock her desolated woodlands and farms with
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: quail, and to introduce the Hungarian partridge; but even yet she _will
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: not_ protect her own native species!
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Men of Connecticut, save the last remnants of your native game birds
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: before they are all utterly exterminated within your borders! Don't ask
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the killers of game what _they_ will agree to, but make the laws what
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: _you know_ they should be! If you want a gameless state, let the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life
