txt: destruction go on as it now is going, with _16,000 licensed gunners_ in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the field each year, and you will surely have it, right soon.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: DELAWARE:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Stop all spring shooting, at once; stop killing shore birds for ten
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: years, and protect swans indefinitely.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Enact bag-limit laws, in very small figures.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Stop the sale of all native wild game, regardless of its use, by
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: enacting a Bayne law.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Enact a resident license law, and provide for a force of paid game
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: wardens.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Stop the use of machine shot-guns in killing your birds.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The state of Delaware is nearly twenty years behind the times. Can it be
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: possible that her Governor and her people are really satisfied with that
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: position? We think not. I dare say they are afflicted with apathy, and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: game-hogs. The latter can easily back up General Apathy to an extent
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: that spells "no game laws." In one act, and at one bold stroke, Delaware
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: can step out of her position at the rear of the procession of states,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and take a place in the front rank. Will she do it? We hope so, for her
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: present status is unworthy of any right-minded, red-blooded state this
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: side of the Philippines.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: DISTRICT OF COLUMBIA:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The sale of all native wild game, regardless of its source, should
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: be stopped immediately, by the enactment of a complete Bayne law.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: If game-shooting within the District is continued, on the marshes of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the Eastern Branch and on the Potomac River, common decency demands
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the enactment of bag-limit laws and long close-season laws of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: most modern pattern.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Just why it is that gross abuses against wild life have so long been
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: tolerated in the territorial center of the American nation, remains to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: be ascertained. But, whatever the reason the situation is absurd and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: intolerable, and Congress should terminate it immediately. As late as
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 1897, and I think for two or three years thereafter, thousands of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: _robins_ were sold every year in the public markets of Washington as
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: food! As a spectacle for gods and men, behold to-day the sale of quail,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: ruffed grouse, wild turkeys and other American game, half way between
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the Capitol and the White House! Look at Center Market as a national
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "fence" for the sale of game stolen by market gunners from Maryland,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Virginia, the Carolinas and Pennsylvania.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: It is time for Congress to bring the District of Columbia sharply into
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: line; for Washington must be made to toe the mark beside New York. The
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: reputation of the national capital demands it, whether the gods of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: cafes will consent or not.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: FLORIDA:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Shooting shore birds and waterfowl in late winter and spring should
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: be stopped.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The sale of all native wild game should be prohibited.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: A State Game Commissioner whose term of office should be not less
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: than four years, and a force of salaried game wardens, should be
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: appointed.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: A general resident license should be required for hunting.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The killing of does and fawns should be stopped, and no deer should
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: be killed save bucks with horns at least three inches long.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The bag limit of five deer per year should be two deer; of twenty
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: quail, and two turkeys per day should be ten quail and one turkey.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The open season on all game birds should end on February 1, for
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: domestic reasons.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Protection should be accorded doves, and robins should be removed
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: from the game list.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In the destruction of wild life, I think the backwoods population of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Florida is the most lawless and defiant that can be found anywhere in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the United States. The "plume-hunters" have practically exterminated the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: plume-bearing egrets, wholly annihilated the roseate spoonbill, the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: flamingo, and also the Carolina parrakeet. On July 8, 1905, one of them
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: killed an Audubon Association Warden, Guy M. Bradley, whose business it
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: was to enforce the state laws protecting the egret rookeries. The people
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: really to blame for the shooting of Guy Bradley, and the extermination
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of the egrets by lawless and dangerous men, are the vain and merciless
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: women who wear the "white badges of cruelty" as long as they can be
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: purchased! They have much to answer for!
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Originally, Florida was alive with bird life. For number of species,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: abundance of individuals, and general dispersal throughout the whole
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: state, I think no other state in America except possibly California ever
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: possessed a bird fauna quite comparable with it. Once its bird life was
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: one of the wonders of America. But the gunners began early to shoot, and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: shoot, and shoot. During the fifteen years preceding 1898, the general
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: bird life of Florida decreased in volume 77 per cent. In 1900 it was at
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: a very low point, and it has steadily continued to decrease. The
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: rapidly-growing settlement and cultivation of the state has of course
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: had much to do with the disappearance of wild life generally, and the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: draining and exploitation of the Everglades will about finish the birds
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of southern Florida.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The brown pelicans' breeding-place on Pelican Island, in Indian River,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: has been taken in hand by the national government as a bird refuge, and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: its marvelous spectacle of pelican life is now protected. Nine other
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: islands on the coast of Florida have been taken as national bird
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: refuges, and will render posterity good service.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The great private game and bird preserve of Dr. Ray V. Pierce, at
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Apalachicola, known as St. Vincent Island, containing twenty square
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: miles of wonderful woods and waters, is performing an important function
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: for the state and the nation.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The Florida bag limit on quail is entirely too liberal. I know one man
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: who never once exceeded the limit of twenty birds per day, but in the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: season of 1908-9 he killed _865 quail_! Can the quail of any state long
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: endure such drains as that?
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: From a zoological point of view, Florida is in bad shape. A great many
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of her people who shoot are desperately lawless and uncontrollable, and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the state is not financially able to support a force of wardens
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: sufficiently strong to enforce the laws, even as they are. It looks as
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: if the slaughter would go on until nothing of bird life remains. At
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: present I can see no hope whatever for saving even a good remnant of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: wild life of the state.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The present status of wild-life protective laws in Florida was made the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: subject of an article in _Forest and Stream_ of August 10, 1912, by John
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: H. Wallace, Jr., Game Commissioner of the State of Alabama, in an
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: article entitled "The Florida Situation." In view of his record, no one
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: will question either the value or the honest sincerity of Mr. Wallace's
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: opinions. The following paragraphs are from that article:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The enactment of a model and modern game law for the State of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Florida is absolutely imperative in order to save many of the most
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: valuable species of birds and game of that State from certain
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: depletion and threatened extinction. The question of the protection
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of the birds and game in Florida is not a local one, but is national
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: in its scope. Birds know no state lines, and while practically all
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the States lying to the north of Florida protect migratory birds and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: waterfowl, yet these are recklessly slaughtered in that state to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: such an extent as to be appalling to all sportsmen and bird lovers.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: So alarming has become the decrease of the birds and game of Florida
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: that unless a halt is called on the campaign of reckless
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: annihilation that has been ceaselessly waged in that state, the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: sport and recreation enjoyed by primeval nimrods will linger only in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: history and tradition.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: It is the sincerest hope of all lovers of wild life of the American
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: continent that a strong and invincible sentiment, relative to the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: imperative necessity of real conservation legislation, be
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: crystallized in the minds of the members elect of the Florida
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Legislature, to the end that the next Legislature will spread upon
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the statute books of the State of Florida a model and modern law for
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the preservation and protection of the birds and game of that State,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: which when put into practical operation will elicit the thanks of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: all good citizens, and likewise the gratitude of future generations.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: GEORGIA:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Prohibit late winter and spring shooting, and provide rational
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: seasons for wild fowl.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Reduce the limit on deer to two bucks a season, with horns not less
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: than three inches long.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Protect the meadow lark and stop forever the killing of doves and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: wood-ducks.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Prohibit the use of automatic and pump shot-guns in hunting.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Extend the term of the game commissioner to four years.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: We are glad to report that Georgia has already begun to take up the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: white man's burden. The protection of wild life is now a gentleman's
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: proposition, and in it every real man with red blood in his veins has a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: duty to perform. The state of Georgia has recently awakened, and under
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the comprehensive law of 1911 has resolutely undertaken to do her whole
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: duty in this matter.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: IDAHO:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The imperative duties of Idaho are as follows:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Stop all hunting of mountain sheep, mountain goat and elk.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Give the sage grouse and sharp-tail ten-year close seasons, at once,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: to forestall their extermination.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Stop the killing of doves as "game."
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Stop the killing of female deer, and of bucks with horns less than
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: three inches long.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Enact the model law to protect non-game birds.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Prohibit the use of machine shot-guns in hunting.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Extend the State Warden's term to four years.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Like Montana, Wyoming and Colorado, the state of Idaho has wasted her
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: stock of game, and it is to be feared that several species are now about
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: to disappear from that state. I am told that the sage grouse is almost
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "gone"; and I think that the antelope, caribou, and mountain sheep are
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: in the same condition of scarcity.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: If the people of Idaho wish to save their wild fauna, they must be up
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and doing. The time to temporize, theorize, be conservative and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: easy-going has gone by. It is that fatal policy that causes men to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: slumber until it is too late to act; and we will watch with keen
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: interest to see whether the real men of Idaho are big enough to do their
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: whole duty in time to benefit their state.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In 1910, Dr. T.S. Palmer credited Idaho with the possession of about
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: five hundred moose and two hundred antelope.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: There is one feature of the Idaho game law that may well stand
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: unchanged. The open season on "ibex," of which one per year may be
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: killed, may as well be continued. One myth per year is not an
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: extravagant bag for any intelligent hunter; and it seems that the "ibex"
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: will not down. Being officially recognized by Idaho, its place in our
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: fauna now seems assured.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: ILLINOIS:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Enact a Bayne law, and stop the sale of all native wild game,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: regardless of source, and regardless of the gay revelers of Chicago.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In Illinois the bag limits on birds are nearly all at least 50 per
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: cent too high. They should be as follows: No squirrels, doves or
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: shore birds; six quail, five woodcock, ten coots, ten rail, ten
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: ducks, three geese and three brant, with a total limit of ten
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: waterfowl per day.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Doves should be removed from the game list.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: All tree squirrels and chipmunks should be perpetually protected, as
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: companions to man, unfit for food.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The sale of aigrettes should be stopped, and Chicago placed in the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: same class as Boston, New York, New Orleans and San Francisco.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The use of all machine shotguns in hunting should be prohibited.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The chief plague-spots for the grinding up of American game are Chicago,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Philadelphia, Baltimore, New Orleans and San Francisco. St. Louis
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: cleared her record in 1909. New York thoroughly cleaned her Augean
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: stable in 1911, and Massachusetts won her Bayne law by a desperate
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: battle in 1912. In 1913, Pennsylvania probably will enact a Bayne law.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Fancy a city in the center of the United States sending to Norway for
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 1,500 ptarmigan, to eat, as Chicago did in 1911; and that was only one
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: order.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: For forty years the marshes, prairies, farms and streams of the whole
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: upper Mississippi Valley have been combed year after year by the guns of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the market shooters. Often the migratory game was located by telegraphic
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: reports. Game birds were slain by the wagon-load, boat-load, barrel, and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: car-load, "for the Chicago market." And the fool farmers of the Middle
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: West stolidly plowed their fields and fed their hogs, and permitted the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: slaughter to go on. To-day the sons of those farmers go to the museums
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and zoological parks of the cities to see specimens of pinnated grouse,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: crane, woodcock, ducks and other species that the market shooters have
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "wiped out"; and their fathers wax eloquent in telling of the flocks of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: pigeons that "darkened the sky," and the big droves of prairie chickens
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: that used to rise out of the corn-fields "with a roar like a coming
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: storm."
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: To-day, Chicago stands half-way reformed. Her markets are open to only
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: one-half the game killable in Illinois, but they are wide open to all
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "_legally_ killed game imported from other states, from Oct. 1 to Feb.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 1." Through that hole in her game laws any game-dealer can drive a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: moving-van! Of course, any game offered in Chicago has been "legally
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: killed in some other state!" Who can prove otherwise?
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In addition to the imported game illegally killed in other states, the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: starving population of Chicago may also buy for cash, and consume with
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: their champagne in November and December, all the Illinois doves that
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: can be combed out by the market-gunners.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: After the awful Iroquois Theatre fire in Chicago, in 1903, the game
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: dealers reported a heavy falling off in the consumption of game! The
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: tragedy caused the temporary closing of the theaters, and the falling
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: off in after-theater suppers may be said to have taken away the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: appetites of thousands of erstwhile consumers of game. Incidentally it
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: showed who consumes purchased game.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The people of Illinois should now enact a full-fledged Bayne law,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: without changing a single word, and bring Chicago up to the level of New
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: York, St. Louis and Boston.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The present bag limits on Illinois game birds are fatally high. As they
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: stand, with 190,000 licensed gunners in the field each year, what else
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: do they mean than extermination? The men of Illinois have just two
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: alternatives between which to choose: drastic and immediate
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: preservation, or a gameless state. Which shall it be?
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: INDIANA:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Indiana should hasten to stop spring shooting.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: She should enact a law, prohibiting the sale for millinery purposes
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of the plumage of all wild birds save ducks killed in their open
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: season.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: A Bayne law, absolutely prohibiting the sale of all native wild
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: game, should be enacted at once.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The killing of squirrels should be prohibited; because they are not
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: white men's game.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Ruffed grouse and quail should have five year close seasons.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The use of pump and autoloading guns in hunting should be
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: prohibited.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In Indiana the white-tailed deer is extinct. This means very close
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: hunting, and a bad outlook for all other game larger than the sparrow.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: On October 2, 1912, eleven heads of greater bird of paradise, with
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: plumes attached, were offered for sale within one hundred feet of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: headquarters of the Fourth National Conservation Congress. The prices
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: ranged from $35 to $47.50; and while we looked, two ladies came up, one
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of whom pointed to a bird-of-paradise corpse and said: "There! I want
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: one o' them, an' I'm a-goin' to _have_ it, too!"
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: IOWA:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Spring shooting should be stopped, at once and forever.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The killing of all tree squirrels and chipmunks should cease.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: All shore birds that visit Iowa deserve a five-year close season.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Especially is the shooting of plover, sandpiper, marsh and beach
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: birds, rail, duck, geese and brant from September 1, to April 15, an
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: outrage.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Iowa should prohibit the use of the machine guns, and it is to be
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: hoped that she will awaken sufficiently to do so.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: It is said that the Indian word "Iowa" means "the drowsy, or sleepy
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: ones." Politically, and educationally, Iowa is all right, but in the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: protection of wild life she is ten years behind the times, in almost
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: everything save the prohibition of the sale of game. _Iowa knows better
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: than to pursue the course that she does_! She boasts about her corn and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: hogs, but she is deaf to the appeals of the states surrounding her on
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the subject of spring shooting. For years Minnesota has set her a good
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: example; but nothing moves her to step up where she belongs in the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: phalanx of intelligent game-protecting states.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The foregoing may sound harsh, but in view of what other states have
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: endured from Iowa's stubbornness regarding migratory game, the time for
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: silent treatment of her case has gone by. She is to-day in the same
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: class as North Carolina, South Carolina and Maryland,--at the tail end
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of the procession of states. She cares everything for corn and hogs, but
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: little for wild life.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: KANSAS:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Spring shooting should be stopped, at once: with apologies for not
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: having done so long ago.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The continued shooting of prairie chickens when the species is near
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: extermination is outrageous, and should be prohibited for ten years.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Doves should be removed permanently from the game list, partly as a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: measure of self respect.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Kansas should treat herself to a force of salaried game wardens
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: rendering real service.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: She should bar out the machine guns as unfit for use in a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: well-regulated State.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Kansas has calmly witnessed the extermination of her bison, elk, deer,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: antelope, wild turkeys, sage grouse, whooping cranes, and the beginning
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of the end of her pinnated grouse, without a pang. What is wild game in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: comparison with fat hogs, and seventy-bushels-to-the-acre!
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Draw a line around the hog-and-corn area of the United States, and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: within it you will find more spring shooting, more sale of game and more
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: extermination of species than in any other area in the United States. I
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: refer to Nebraska, Kansas, Iowa, Missouri, Illinois, Indiana, Ohio,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Kentucky and Tennessee. In not one of these states except Missouri is
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: there any big game hunting, and in the majority of them spring shooting
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: is lawful!
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In the Island of Mauritius, it was swine that exterminated the dodo. In
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the United States, hogs and game extermination still go hand in hand.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Since the days of the dodo, however, a new species of swine has been
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: developed. It is now widely known as the "game-hog," and it has been
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: officially recognized by both bench and bar.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: KENTUCKY:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Nearly everything that a state should maintain in the line of wild life
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: protection _Kentucky lacks_! It is easier to tell what she has than to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: recite what she should have. Kentucky _permits spring shooting_; she has
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: _no bag limits_, and she has _long open seasons_ on everything save
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: introduced pheasants; She protects from sale only quail, grouse and wild
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: turkey _killed within her own borders_. This means that her markets are
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: practically wide open.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Until recently the people of Kentucky have been very indifferent to the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: value of her wild-life; but with the new law enacted this year providing
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: for a game commission and a game protection fund, surely every member of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the Army of the Defense will wish God-speed to her efforts in game
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: conservation, and stand ready to lend a helping hand whenever help can
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: be utilized.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Kentucky should at one grand coup _stop spring shooting and all sale of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: wild game, accord long close seasons to all species that are verging on
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: extinction, protect doves, establish moderate bag limits and stop the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: use of machine guns_. If she takes up these measures at the rate of only
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: one at each legislative session, by the time her laws are perfect _all
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: her game will be gone_!
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: LOUISIANA:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: On more counts than one, Louisiana is in the list of Great Delinquents;
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: for behold the things that she needs to do:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Protect deer for five years.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Instantly take the robin, red-winged black-bird, dove, grosbeak,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: wood-duck and gull off the list of birds that may be killed as
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "game."
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Stop all late winter and spring shooting.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Stop the sale of all native game, and the possession and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: transportation of game sold or intended for sale. In short,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Enact a Bayne law.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Re-establish a game warden system.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In legally permitting the slaughter of the robin, red-winged blackbird,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: dove, grosbeak, wood-duck and gull the state of Louisiana is very
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: culpable.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: For good reasons, forty states of the American Union strictly prohibit
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the killing of song and insectivorous birds. The duty of every state to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: protect those birds is not a debatable proposition. I put this question
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: to the people of Louisiana, Mississippi, North Carolina, Tennessee and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: other states where the robin is treated as a game bird: Is it fair of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: you to kill and eat robins when that species is carefully protected by
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: forty other states of our country for grave economic reasons? What would
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: you say of the people of the North if they slaughtered your mockingbird
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: _to eat_!
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Remember this proportion:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The Robin : The North :: The Mockingbird : The South.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: CHAPTER XXX
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: NEW LAWS NEEDED IN THE STATES
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: (Continued)
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: MAINE:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: There are reasons for the belief that Maine is conserving her large game
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: better than any other state or province in North America. One glance
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: over her laws is sufficient to convince anyone that instead of studying
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the clamor of her shooting population, Maine has actually been studying
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the needs of her game, and providing for those needs. If all other
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: states were doing equally well, the task of writing a book of admonition
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: would have been unnecessary. The proof of Maine's alertness is to be
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: found in the number of her extra short, or entirely closed, seasons on
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: game. For example:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Cow and calf moose are permanently protected.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Only bull moose, with at least two 3-inch prongs on its horns, may
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: be killed.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Caribou have had a close season since 1899.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: On gray and black squirrels, doves and quail, there is no open
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: season.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The open season for deer varies from ten weeks to four weeks, and in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: parts of three counties there is no open season at all.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Silencers are prohibited, and firearms in forests may be prohibited
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: by the Governor during droughts.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Nearly all wild-fowl shooting ends January 1, but in two places, on
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: December 1.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: People who have not learned the facts habitually think of Maine as a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: vast killing-ground for deer; and it is well for it to be known that the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: hunting-grounds have been carefully designated, according to the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: abundance or scarcity of game.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Maine has wisely chosen to regard her hunting-grounds and her deer as a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: valuable asset, and she manages them accordingly. To be a guide in that
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: state is to be a good citizen, and a protector of game from illegal
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: slaughter. No non-resident may hunt without a licensed guide. The
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: licenses for the thousands of deer killed in Maine each year, and the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: expenses of the visiting sportsmen who hunt them, annually bring into
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the state and leave there a huge sum of money, variously estimated at
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: from $2,000,000 to $3,000,000. One can only guess at the amount from the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: number of non-resident licenses issued; but certainly the total can not
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: be less than $1,000,000.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Although Mr. L.T. Carleton is no longer chairman of the Commission of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Inland Fisheries and Game, the splendid services that he rendered the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: state of Maine during his thirteen years of service, especially in the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: creation of a good code of game laws, constitute an imperishable
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: monument to his name and fame.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: There is very little that Maine needs in the line of new legislation,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: or better protection to her game. With the enactment of a resident
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: license law and a five-year close season for woodcock, plover, snipe and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: sandpipers, I think her laws for the protection of wild life would be
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: sufficiently perfect for all practical purposes. The Pine-Tree State is
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: to be congratulated upon its wise and efficient handling of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: wild-life situation.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: MARYLAND:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: How has it come to pass that Maryland _lacks_ more good wild-life laws
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: than any other state in the Union except North Carolina? Of the really
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: fundamental protective laws, embracing the list that to every
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: self-respecting state seems indispensable, Maryland has almost none save
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: certain bag-limit laws! Otherwise, the state is wide open! It is indeed
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: high time that she should abandon her present attitude of hostility to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: wild life, and become a good neighbor. She should do what is _fair_ and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: _right_ about the protection of the migratory game and bird life that
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: annually passes twice through her territory!
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: At the last session of the Maryland legislature, the law preventing the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: use of power boats in wild-fowl shooting was repealed. That was a step
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: ten years backward; and Maryland should be ashamed of it!
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The list of things that Maryland must do in order to clear her record is
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: a long one. Here it is:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Local regulations should be replaced by a uniform state law.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The sale of all native wild game should be stopped.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Spring and late winter shooting of game should be stopped.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: All non-game birds not already included under the statutes should be
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: protected.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The exportation of all game should be prohibited, unless accompanied
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: by the man who shot it, bearing his license, and the law should be
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: state-wide instead of depending upon a separate enactment for each
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: county.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: There should be a hunter's license law for all who hunt.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The use of machine shotguns in hunting should be stopped, at once.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Stop the use of power boats in wild-fowl shooting.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: MASSACHUSETTS:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In 1912 the state of Massachusetts moved up into the foremost rank of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: states, where for one year New York had stood alone. She passed a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: counterpart of the New York law, absolutely prohibiting the sale of all
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: wild American game in Massachusetts, but providing for the sale of game
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: that has been reared in preserves and tagged by state officers. This
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: victory was achieved only after three months of hard fighting. The
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: coalition of sportsmen, zoologists and friends of wild life in general
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: proved irresistible, just as a similar union of forces accomplished the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Bayne law in New York in 1911. The victory is highly instructive, as
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: great victories usually are. It proves once more that whenever the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: American people can be aroused from their normal apathy regarding wild
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: life, _any good conservation legislation can be enacted!_ The prime
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: necessities to success are good measures, good management, a reasonable
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: campaign fund, and tireless energy and persistence. Massachusetts is to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: be roundly congratulated on having so thoroughly cleaned up her
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: sale-of-game situation.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Incidentally, five bills for the repeal of the Massachusetts law against
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: spring shooting were introduced, and each one went down to the defeat
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: that it deserved. _The repeal of a spring-shooting law, anywhere, is a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: step backward ten years!_
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Massachusetts needs a bag-limit law more in keeping with her small
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: remnant of wild life; and that she will have ere long. Very soon, also,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: her sportsmen will raise the standard of ethics in shotgun shooting, by
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: barring out the automatic and pump shotguns so much beloved by the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: market shooters. As matters stand at this date (1912) the Old Bay State
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: needs the following new laws:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Low bag limits on all game.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Five-year close seasons on all shore birds, snipe and woodcock.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Expulsion of the automatic and pump shotguns, in hunting.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: MICHIGAN:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: On the whole, the game laws of Michigan are in excellent shape, and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: leave little to be desired in the line of betterment except to be
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: simplified. All the game protected by the laws of the state is debarred
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: from sale; squirrels, pinnated grouse, doves and wild turkeys enjoy long
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: close seasons; the bag limits on deer and game birds are reasonably low;
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: spring shooting still is possible on nine species of ducks; and this
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: should be stopped without delay.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Only three or four suggestions are in order:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: All spring shooting should be prohibited.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: All shore birds should have a five-year close season.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The use of the machine shotguns in hunting should be stopped.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The laws should permit the sale, under tag, of all species of game
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: that can successfully be reared in preserves on a commercial basis.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Two or three state game preserves, for deer, each at least four
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: miles square, should be established without delay.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: MINNESOTA:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: This state should at once enact a bag-limit law that will do some
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: good, instead of the statutory farce now on the books. Make it
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: fifteen birds per day of waterfowl, all species combined, and no
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: grouse or quail.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: There should be five-year close seasons enacted for quail, grouse,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: plover, woodcock, snipe, and all other shore birds.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: A law should be enacted prohibiting the use of firearms by
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: unnaturalized aliens, and a $20 license for all naturalized aliens.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Provision should be made for a large state game refuge in southern
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Minnesota.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The state should prohibit the use of machine guns in hunting.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: To-day, direct and reliable advices show that the game situation in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Minnesota is far from encouraging. Several species are threatened with
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: extinction at an early date. In northern Minnesota it is reported that
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: much game is surreptitiously trapped and slaughtered. The bob white is
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: reported as threatened with total extinction at an early date; but I
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: think the prairie chicken will be the first bird species to go. Moose
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: will soon be extinct everywhere in Minnesota except in the game
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: preserves. Apparently there is now about one duck in Minnesota for every
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: ten ducks that were there only ten years ago.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Now, what is Minnesota going to do about all this? Is she willing
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: through Apathy to become a gameless state? Her people need to arouse
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: themselves _now_, and pass several _strong_ laws. Her bag limit of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: forty-five birds _per day_ of quail, grouse, woodcock and plover, and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: _fifty_ per day of the waterbirds, is a joke, and nothing more; but it
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: is no laughing matter. It spells extermination.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: MISSISSIPPI:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The legalized slaughter of robins, cedar birds, grosbeaks and doves
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: should cease immediately, on the basis of economy of resources and a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: square deal to all the states lying northward of Mississippi.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The shooting of all water-fowl should cease on January 1.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: A reasonable limit should be established on deer.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: A hunting license law should be passed at once, fixing the fee at $1
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and devoting the revenue to the pay of a corps of non-political game
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: wardens, selected on a basis of ability and fitness.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The administration of the game laws should be placed in charge of a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: salaried game commissioner.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: It is seriously to the discredit of Mississippi that her laws actually
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: classify robins, cedar-birds, grosbeaks and doves as "game," and _make
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: them killable as such from Sept. 1 to March 1!_ I should think that if
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: no economic consideration carried weight in Mississippi, state pride
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: alone would be sufficient to promote a correction of the evil. If we of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the North were to slaughter mockingbirds for food, when they come North
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: to visit us, the men of the South would call us greedy barbarians; and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: they would be quite right.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: MISSOURI:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The Missouri bag limits that permit the killing or possession of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: fifty birds per day are absurd, and fatally liberal. The utmost
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: should be twenty-five; and even that is too high.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Doves should be taken off the list of game birds, and protected
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: throughout the year; and so should all tree squirrels.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Spring shooting of shore birds and waterfowl should be prohibited
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: without delay.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: A law against automatic and pump guns should be enacted at the next
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: legislative session, as a public lesson on the raising of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: standard of ethics in shooting.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The state of Missouri is really strong in her position as a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: game-protecting state. She perpetually protects such vanishing species
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: as the ruffed grouse, prairie chicken (pinnated grouse), woodcock, and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: all her shore birds save snipe and plover. She prohibits the sale of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: native game and the killing of female deer; but she wisely permits the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: sale of preserve-bred elk and deer under the tags of the State Game
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Commission. For nearly all the wild game that is accessible, her markets
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: are tightly closed.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: We heartily congratulate Missouri on her advanced position on the sale
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of game, and we hope that the people of Iowa will even yet profit by her
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: good example.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: MONTANA:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Like Colorado and Wyoming, Montana is wasting a valuable heritage of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: wild game while she struggles to maintain the theory that she still is
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: in the list of states that furnish big-game hunting. It is a fact that
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: ten years ago most sportsmen began to regard Montana as a has-been for
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: big game, and began to seek better hunting-grounds elsewhere. British
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Columbia, Alberta and Alaska have done much for the game of Montana by
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: drawing sportsmen away from it. Mr. Henry Avare, the State Game Warden,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: is optimistic regarding even the big game, and believes that it is
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: holding its own. This is partially true of white-tailed deer, or it was
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: up to the time of great slaughter. It is said that in 1911, 11,000 deer
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: were killed in Montana, all in the western part of the state, seventy
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: per cent of which were white-tails. The deep snows and extreme cold of a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: long and unusually severe winter drove the hungry deer down out of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: mountains into the settlements, where the ranchmen joyously slaughtered
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: them. The destruction around Kalispell was described by Harry P.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Stanford as "sickening."
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Mr. Avare estimates the prong-horned antelope in Montana at three
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: thousand head, of which about six hundred are under the quasi-protection
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of four ranches.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The antelope need three or four small ranges, such as the Snow Creek
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Antelope Range, where the bad lands are too rough for ranchmen, but
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: quite right for antelopes and other big game.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: All the grouse and ptarmigan of Montana need a five-year close
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: season. The splendid sage grouse is now extinct in many parts of its
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: previous range. Fifty-eight thousand licensed gunners are too many
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: for them!
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The few mountain sheep and mountain goats that survive should have a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: five-year close season, at once.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The killing of female hoofed animals should be prohibited by law.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Montana has not yet adopted the model law for the protection of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: non-game birds. Only seven states have failed in that respect.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The use of automatic and pump shotguns, and silencers, should
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: immediately be prohibited.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Montana's bag-limits are not wholly bad; but the grizzly bear has almost
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: been exterminated, save in the Yellowstone Park. Some of these days, if
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: things go on as they are now going, the people of Montana will be rudely
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: awakened to the fact that they have 50,000 licensed hunters but no
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: longer any killable game! And then we will hear enthusiastic talk about
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "restocking."
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: NEBRASKA:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: No other state has bestowed close seasons upon as many extinct species
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of game as Nebraska. Behold how she has resolutely locked the doors of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: her empty cage after all these species have flown: Elk, antelope, wild
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: turkey, passenger pigeon, whooping crane, sage grouse, ptarmigan and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: curlew. In a short time the pinnated grouse can be added to the list of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: has-beens.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: There is little to say regarding the future of the game of Nebraska; for
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: its "future" is now history.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Provision should be made for one or more state game preserves.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Spring shooting of shore birds and waterfowl should be prohibited.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: A larger and more effective warden service should be provided.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Doves should be removed from the game list.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: NEVADA:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The sage grouse should be given a ten-year close season, for
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: recuperation.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: All non-game birds should have perpetual protection.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The cranes, now verging on extinction, and the pigeons and doves
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: should at once be taken out of the list of game birds, and forever
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: protected.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: All the shore birds need five years of close protection.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: A State Game Warden whose term of office is not less than four years
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: should be provided for.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: A corps of salaried game protectors should be chosen for active and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: aggressive game protection.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Nevada's bag limits are among the best of any state, the only
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: serious flaw being "10 sage grouse" per day: which should be 0!
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Nevada still has a few antelope; and _we beg her to protect them all
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: from being hunted or killed!_ It is my belief that if the antelope is
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: really saved anywhere in the United States outside of national parks and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: preserves, it will be in the wild and remote regions of Nevada, where it
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: is to be hoped that lumpy-jaw has not yet taken hold of the herds.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: NEW HAMPSHIRE:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Speaking generally, the New Hampshire laws regulating the killing and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: shipment of game are defective for the reason that on birds, and in fact
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: all game save deer, there appear to be no "bag" limits on the quantity
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: that may be killed in a day or a season. The following bag limits are
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: greatly needed, forthwith:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Gray Squirrel, none per day, or per year; duck (except wood-duck),
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: ten per day, or thirty per season; ruffed grouse, four per day,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: twelve per season; hare and rabbit, four per day, or twelve per
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: season.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Five-year close seasons should immediately be enacted for the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: following species: quail, woodcock, jacksnipe and all species of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: shore or "beach" birds.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The sale of all native wild game should be prohibited; and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: game-breeding in preserves, and the sale of such game under state
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: supervision, should be provided for.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The use of automatic and pump guns in hunting should be
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: barred,--through state pride, if for no other reason.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: NEW JERSEY:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: New Jersey enjoys the distinction of being the second state to break
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the strangle-hold of the gun-makers of Hartford and Ilion, and cast out
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the odious automatic and pump guns. It was a pitched battle,--that of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 1912, inaugurated by Ernest Napier, President of the State Game and Fish
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Commission and his fellow commissioners. The longer the contest
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: continued, the more did the press and the people of New Jersey awaken to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the seriousness of the situation. Finally, the gun-suppression bill
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: passed the two houses of the legislature with a total of only fourteen
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: votes against it, and after a full hearing had been granted the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: attorneys of the gunmakers, was promptly signed by Governor Woodrow
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Wilson. _Governor Wilson could not be convinced that the act was
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "unconstitutional," or "confiscatory" or "class legislation."_
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: This contest aroused the whole state to the imperative necessity of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: providing more thorough protection for the remnant of New Jersey game,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and it was chiefly responsible for the enactment of four other excellent
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: new protective laws.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: New Jersey always has been sincere in her desire to protect her wild
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: life, and always has gone _as far as the killers of game would permit
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: her to go!_ But the People have made one great mistake,--common to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: nearly every state,--of permitting the game-killers to dictate the game
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: laws! _Always and everywhere, this is a grievous mistake_, and fatal to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the game. For example: In 1866 New Jersey enacted a five-year
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: close-season law on the "prairie fowl" (pinnated grouse); but it was too
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: late to save it. Now that species is as dead to New Jersey as is the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: mastodon. The moral is: Will the People apply this lesson to the ruffed
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: grouse, quail and the shore birds generally before they, too, are too
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: far gone to be brought back? If it is done, it must be done _against the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: will of the gunners;_ for they prefer to shoot,--and shoot they will if
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: they can dictate the laws, until the last game bird is dead.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In 1912, New Jersey is spending $30,000 in trying to restock her
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: birdless covers with foreign game birds and quail. In brief, here are
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the imperative duties of New Jersey:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Provide eight-year close seasons for quail, ruffed grouse, woodcock,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: snipe, all shore birds and the wood-duck.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Prohibit the sale of all native wild game; but promote the sale of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: preserve-bred game.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Prevent the repeal of the automatic gun law, which surely will be
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: attempted, each year.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Prohibit all bird-shooting after January 10, each year, until fall.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Prohibit the killing of squirrels as "game."
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: NEW MEXICO:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: All things considered, the game laws of New Mexico are surprisingly up
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: to date, and the state is to be congratulated on its advanced position.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: For example, there are long close seasons on antelope, elk (now
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: extinct!), mountain sheep, bob white quail, pinnated grouse, wild pigeon
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and ptarmigan,--an admirable list, truly. It is clear that New Mexico is
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: wide awake to the dangers of the wild-life situation. On two counts, her
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: laws are not quite perfect. There is no law prohibiting spring shooting,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and there is no "model law" protecting the non-game birds. The sale of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: game will not trouble New Mexico, because the present laws prevent the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: sale of all protected game except plover, curlew and snipe,--all of them
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: species by no means common in the arid regions of the Southwest.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: A law prohibiting spring shooting of shore birds and waterfowl
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: should be passed at the next session of the legislature.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The enactment of the "model law" should be accomplished without
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: delay to put New Mexico abreast of the neighboring states of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Colorado, Oklahoma and Texas.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The term of the State Warden should be extended to four years.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: NEW YORK:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In the year of grace, 1912, I think we may justly regard New York as the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: banner state of all America in the protection of game and wild life in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: general. This proud position has been achieved partly through the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: influence of a great conservation Governor, John A. Dix, and the State
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Conservation Commission proposed and created by his efforts. In these
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: days of game destruction, when our country from Nome to Key West is
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: reeking with the blood of slaughtered wild creatures, it is a privilege
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and a pleasure to be a citizen of a state which has thoroughly cleaned
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: house, and done well nigh the utmost that any state can do to clear her
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: bad record, and give all her wild creatures a fair chance to survive.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The people of the Empire State literally can point with pride to the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: list of things accomplished in the discharge of good-citizenship toward
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the remnant of wild life, and toward the future generations of New
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Yorkers. That we of to-day have borne our share of the burden of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: bringing about the conditions of 1912, will be a source of satisfaction,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: especially when the sword and shield hang useless upon the walls of Old
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Age.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: New York began to protect her deer in 1705 and her heath hens in 1708.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In 1912 she stopped the killing of female deer, and of bucks having
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: horns less than three inches in length. Spring shooting was stopped in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 1903. A comprehensive law protecting non-game birds was enacted in 1862.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: New York's first law against the sale of certain game during close
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: seasons was enacted in 1837.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In 1911 New York enacted, with only one adverse vote, a law prohibiting
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the sale of all native wild game throughout the state, no matter where
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: killed, and providing liberally for the encouragement of game-breeding,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and the sale of preserve-bred game.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In 1912 a new codification of the state game laws went into effect,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: through the initiative of Governor Dix and Conservation Commissioners
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Van Kennen, Moore and Fleming, assisted (as special counsel) by Marshall
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: McLean, George A. Lawyer and John B. Burnham. This code contains many
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: important new provisions, one of the most valuable of which is a clause
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: giving the Conservation Commission power, at its discretion, to shorten
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: or to close any open season on any species of game in any locality
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: wherein that species seems to be threatened with extermination. This
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: very valuable principle should be enacted into law in every state!
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In 1910, William Dutcher and T. Gilbert Pearson and the National
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Association of Audubon Societies won, after a struggle lasting five
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: years, the passage of the "Shea plumage bill," prohibiting the sale of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: aigrettes or other plumage of wild birds belonging to the same families
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: as the birds of New York (Chap. 256). This law _should be duplicated in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: every state._
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: _Two things_ remain to be done in the state of New York.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: All the shore birds, quail and gray squirrels of the state should be
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: given five-year close seasons, by the action of the State
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Conservation Commission.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: For the good name of the state, and the ethical standing of its
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: sportsmen, as an example to other states, and the last remaining
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: duty toward our wild life, the odious automatic and pump shotguns
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: should be barred from use in hunting, unless their capacity is
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: reduced to two shots without reloading.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: CHAPTER XXXI
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: NEW LAWS NEEDED IN THE STATES
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: (Concluded)
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: NORTH CAROLINA:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The game laws of North Carolina form a droll crazy-quilt of local and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: state measures, effective and ineffective. In 1909, a total of 77 local
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: game laws were enacted, and only two of state-wide application. During
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the ten years ending in 1910, a total of 316 game laws were enacted! She
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: sedulously endeavors to protect her quail, which do not migrate, but in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Currituck County she persistently maintains the bloodiest slaughter-pen
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: for waterfowl that exists anywhere on the Atlantic Coast. There is no
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: bag limit on waterfowl, and unlimited spring shooting. So far as
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: waterfowl are concerned, conditions could hardly be worse, except by the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: use of punt guns. Doves, _larks_ and _robins_ are shot and eaten as
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "game" from November 1 to March 1! Twenty-one counties have local
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: restrictions on the sale of game, but the state at large has only
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: one,--on quail.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The market gunners of Currituck Sound are a scourge and a pest to the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: wild-fowl life of the Atlantic Coast. For their own money profit, they
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: slaughter by wholesale the birds that annually fly through twenty-two
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: states. It is quite useless to suggest anything to North Carolina in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: modern game laws. As long as a killable bird remains, she will not stop
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the slaughter. Her standing reply is "It brings a lot of money into
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Currituck County; and the people want the money." Even the members of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the sportsmen's clubs can shoot wild fowl in Currituck County, quite
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: without limit; and I am told that the privilege often is abused. Quite
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: recently I heard of a member of one of the clubs who shot 164 ducks and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: geese in two days!
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Apparently any suggestions made to North Carolina would not be treated
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: seriously, especially if they would tend really to elevate the sport of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: game shooting, or better protect the game. There is, however, a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: melancholy interest attached to the framing of good game laws, whether
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: they ever are likely to be adopted or not. Here is the duty of North
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Carolina:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Stop the killing of robins, doves and larks for food, absolutely and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: forever. This measure is necessary to agriculture and to the good
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: name of the state.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Stop the shooting of any game for sale, prohibit the possession of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: game for sale, and the sale of wild native game.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Establish bag limits on all waterfowl, and on all other game birds
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and mammals.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Prepare to protect, at an early date, the wild turkey and quail;
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: for soon they will need it. Moreover, enact a law prohibiting the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: use of automatic and pump guns in hunting, covering the entire
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: state.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Provide a resident-license system and thereby make the game
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: department self-sustaining, and render it possible to employ a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: salaried State Game Commissioner.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: It is quite wrong for the people of North Carolina to hold grudges
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: against northern members of the ducking clubs of Currituck for the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: passage of the Bayne law. They had nothing whatever to do with it, and I
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: can say this because I was in a position which enabled me to know.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: NORTH DAKOTA:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In 1911, this sovereign state enacted a law _prohibiting the use of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: automobiles_ in hunting wild-fowl; also rifles. North Dakota was the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: first state to recognize officially the fact that the use of automobiles
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: in hunting is a serious menace to some forms of wild life. Beyond all
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: question, the machines do indeed bring an extra number of birds within
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: reach of the gun! They increase the annual slaughter; and it is right
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and necessary to prohibit by law their use in hunting game of any kind.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In Putman County, New York, I have seen them in action. A load of three
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: or four gunners is whirled up to a likely mountain-side for ruffed
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: grouse, and presently the banging begins. After an hour or so spent in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: combing out the birds, the hunters jump in, whirl away in a dust-cloud
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: to another spot two miles away, and "bang-bang-bang" again. After that,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: a third locality; and so on, covering six or eight times the territory
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: that a man in a buggy, or on foot, could possibly shoot over in the same
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: time!
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: North Dakota has done well, in the passage of that act. On certain other
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: matters, she is not so sound.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: For instance:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The killing of pinnated grouse should be stopped for ten years; and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: it should be done immediately.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The killing of cranes as "game" should stop, instantly and forever.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: It is barbarous.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Fifty dead birds in possession at one time is fully thirty too many.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The game cannot stand such slaughter!
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: All shore birds (_Order Limicolae_) should have at least a five-year
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: close season, before they are exterminated.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The use of machine guns in hunting should be stopped, forever.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: It is to the credit of the state that antelope are absolutely protected
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: until 1920, and an unlimited close season has been accorded the quail,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: dove and swan.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: OHIO:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: I think that Ohio comes the nearest of all the states to being gameless.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: With but slight exceptions her laws are about as correct as those of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: most other states, but the desire to "kill" is so strong, and the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: majority of her gunners are so thoroughly selfish about their "rights"
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: that the game has ruthlessly been swept away _according to law!_ Ohio
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: is a striking example of the deplorable results of _legalized_
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: slaughter. The spirit of Ohio is like that of North Carolina. Her
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "sportsmen" will not have an automatic gun law! Oh, no! "Limit the bag,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: shorten the season, and the gun won't matter!"
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: To-day, the visible game supply of Ohio does not amount to anything; and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: when the last game bird of that state falls before the greediest
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: shooter, we shall say, "A gameless state is just what you deserve!"
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: It is useless to make any suggestions to Ohio. Her shooting Shylocks
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: want the last pound of flesh from wild life, and I think they will get
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: it very soon. Ohio is in the area of barren states. The seed stock has
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: been too thoroughly destroyed to be recuperated. I think that Ohio's
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: last noteworthy exploit in lawmaking for the preservation (!) of her
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: game was in 1904, when she put all her shore birds into the list of
