name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: killable game, and bravely prohibited the shooting of doves _on the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: ground!_ Great is Ohio in game conservation!
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: OKLAHOMA:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: For a state so young, the wild-life laws of Oklahoma are in admirable
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: shape; but it is reasonably certain that there, as elsewhere, the game
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: is being killed much faster than it is breeding. The new commonwealth
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: must arouse, and screw up the brakes much tighter.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Recently, an observing friend told me that on a trip of 250 miles
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: westward from Lawton and back again, watching sharply for game all the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: way, he saw only five pinnated grouse! And this in a good season for
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "prairie chickens."
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Oklahoma must stop all spring shooting.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The prairie chicken must have a ten-year close season, immediately.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Next time, her legislature will pass the automatic gun bill that
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: failed last year only because the session closed too soon for its
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: consideration.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Oklahoma is wise in giving long protection to her quail, and "wild
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: pigeon," and such protection should be made equally effective in the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: case of the dove. She is wise in rigidly enforcing her law against the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: exportation of game.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The Wichita National Bison herd, near Cache, now contains forty head of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: bison, all in good condition. The nucleus herd consisted of fifteen head
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: presented by the New York Zoological Society in 1907.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: OREGON:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The results of the efforts that have been made by Oregon to provide
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: special laws for each individual shooter are painful to contemplate.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Like North Carolina, Oregon has attempted the impossible task of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: pleasing everybody, and at the same time protecting her wild life. The
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: two propositions can be blended together about as easily as asphalt and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: water. The individual shooter desires laws that will permit him to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: shoot--_when_ he pleases, _where_ he pleases, and _what_ he pleases! If
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: you meet those conditions all over a great state, then it is time to bid
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: farewell to the game; for it surely is doomed.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: No, decidedly no! Do not attempt to pass game laws that will "please
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: everybody." The more the game-hogs are _displeased_, the better for the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: game! The game-hogs form a very small and very insignificant minority of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the whole People. Why please one man at the expense of ninety-nine
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: others? The game of a state belongs to The People as a whole, not to the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: gunners alone. The great, patient,--and sometimes sleepy,--majority has
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: vested rights in it, and it is for it to say how it shall and shall not
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: be killed. Heretofore the gunning minority has been dictating the game
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: laws of America, and the result is--progressive extermination.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: First of all, Oregon should bury the pernicious idea of individual
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and local laws.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: She should enact a concise, clearly cut, and thoroughly effective
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: code of wild life laws, just as New York did last winter.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Her game seasons should be uniform in application, all over the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: state.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Every species of bird, mammal or fish that is threatened with
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: extermination should be given a close season of from five to ten
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: years.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: It is now time to protect the white goose and brant. Squirrels,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: band-tailed pigeons and doves should be perpetually protected.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The State Game Commission should have power to close the shooting
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: seasons on any species of game in any locality, whenever a species
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: is threatened with extinction.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The sale of native wild game, from all sources, should be
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: permanently stopped, by a Bayne law.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The use of automatic, "autoloading" and pump shot guns in hunting
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: should be perpetually barred.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: PENNSYLVANIA:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: As a game protecting state, Pennsylvania is a close second to New York
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and Massachusetts. She protects all native game from sale; _she has the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: courage to prohibit aliens from owning guns; she bars out automatic
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: shot-guns in hunting_; she makes refuges for deer, and feeds her quail
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: in winter, and she permits the killing of no female deer, or fawns with
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: horns less than three inches in length. Her splendid State Game
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Commission is fighting hard for a hunter's license law, and will win the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: fight for it at the next session of the legislature (1913).
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: But there are certain things that Pennsylvania should do:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: She should stop all spring shooting. She must stop killing doves,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: blackbirds, wild turkeys, sandpipers, and all the squirrels save the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: red squirrel.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: She should give all her shore birds a rest of at least five years,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: for recuperation.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: She should enact a comprehensive Dutcher plumage law, stopping the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: sale of aigrettes.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: She should provide a resident license to furnish her Game Commission
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: with adequate funds to carry on its work and exterminate
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: game-killing vermin.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: RHODE ISLAND:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Little Rhody needs some good, small bag limits; for now (1912) she
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: has none!
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: She should enact a Bayne law, a Pennsylvania law against aliens,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and a New Jersey law against the automatic and pump guns.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: She should stop killing the beautiful wood-duck, and gray squirrel.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: She should stop all spring shooting of waterfowl.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: SOUTH CAROLINA:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: She should save her game while she still has some to save.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: First of all, stop spring shooting; secondly, enact a Bayne law.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In the name of mystery, who is there in South Carolina who desires
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: to kill grackles? And why?
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: And where is the gentleman sportsman who has come down to killing
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: foolish and tame little doves for "sport?" Stop it at once, for the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: credit of the state.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Enact a dollar resident license law and thus provide adequate funds
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: for game protection.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: South Carolina bag limits are all 50 per cent too high; and they
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: should be reduced.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: It is strange to see one of the oldest of the states lagging in game
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: protection, far behind such new states as New Mexico and Oklahoma; but
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: South Carolina does lag. It is time for her to consider her position,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and reform.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: SOUTH DAKOTA:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: South Dakota should stop all spring shooting.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Her game-bag limits are really no limits at all! They should be
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: reduced about 66 per cent without a moment's unnecessary delay.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The two year term of the State Warden is too short for effective
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: work. It should be extended to four years.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Unless South Dakota wishes to repeat the folly of such states as
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Indiana, Iowa, Illinois, Missouri and Ohio, she needs to be up and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: doing. If her people want a gameless state, except for migratory
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: waterfowl, all they need do is to slumber on, and they surely will have
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: it. Why wait until greedy sportsmen have killed the last game bird of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the state before seriously taking the matter in hand? In one act, all
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the shortcomings of the present laws can be corrected.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: South Dakota needs no Bayne law, because she prohibits at all times the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: sale or exportation of all wild game.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: TENNESSEE:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In wild life protection, Tennessee has much to do. She made her start
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: late in life, and what she needs to do is to draft with care and enact
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: with cheerful alacrity certain necessary amendments.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: We notice that there are open seasons for _blackbirds, robins, doves and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: squirrels_! It seems incredible; but it is true.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Behold the blackbird as a "game" bird, with a lawful open season from
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: September 1 to January 1. Consider its stately carriage, its rapid
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: flight on the wing, its running and hiding powers when attacked. As a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: test of marksmanship, as the real thing for the expert wing shot, is it
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: not great? Will not any self-respecting dog be proud to point or
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: retrieve them? And what flesh for the table!
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Fancy an able-bodied sportsman going out in a fifty-dollar hunting suit,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: carrying a fifteen-dollar gun behind a seven-dollar dog, and returning
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: with a glorious bag of twenty-five blackbirds! Or robins! Or doves!
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Proud indeed, would we be to belong (which we don't) to a club of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "sportsmen" who go out shooting blackbirds, and robins, and foolish
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: little doves, as "game!" "Game" indeed, are those birds,--for little
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: lads of seven who do not know better; but not for boys of twelve who
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: have in their veins any inheritance of sporting blood. (I am proud of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the fact that at twelve years of age,--and ever so keen to "go
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: hunting,"--I knew without being told that squirrels and doves were not
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: _real_ "game" for real boys.)
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The killers of doves, squirrels, blackbirds and robins belong in the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: same class as the sparrow-and-linnet-killing Italians of Venice, Milan
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and Turin, and in that company we will leave them.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Tennessee needs:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: A resident license system to provide funds for game protection.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: A salaried warden force.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: A law prohibiting spring shooting of shore birds and waterfowl.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: A law protecting robins, doves and other non-game birds not covered
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: by the present statute.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: TEXAS:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: I remember well when the great battle was fought in Texas by the gallant
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: men and women of the State Audubon Society, to compel the people of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Texas to learn the economic value to agriculture and cotton of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: insectivorous birds. The name of the splendid Brigadier-General who led
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the Army of the Defense was Capt. M.B. Davis. That was in 1903.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Since that great fight was won, Texas has been a partly reformed state,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: at times quite jealous of her bird life; but still she tolerates spring
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: shooting and has not made adequate close seasons for her waterfowl;
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: which is wrong. To-day, the people of Texas do not need to be told that
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: forty-three species of birds feed on the cotton boll weevil; for they
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: know it.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: On the whole, and for a southern state, the wild-life laws of Texas are
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: in fairly good shape. On account of the absence of game-scourge markets,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: a Bayne law is not so imperatively necessary there as in certain other
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: states. All the game of the state is protected from sale.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: We do assert, however, that if robins are slaughtered as F.L. Crow, the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: former Atlantan asserts, all robin shooting should be forever stopped;
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: that the pinnated grouse should be given a seven-year close season, and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: that doves should be taken off the list of game birds and perpetually
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: protected, both for economic and sentimental reasons, and also because
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the too weak and confiding dove is not a "game" bird for red-blooded
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: men.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Texas should enact without delay a law providing close seasons for
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: ducks, geese and other waterfowl;
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: A law prohibiting spring shooting, and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: A provision reducing the limit on deer to two bucks a season.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: UTAH:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The laws of Utah are far from being up to the requirements of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: present hour. One strange thing has happened in Utah.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: When I spent a week in Salt Lake City in 1888, and devoted some time to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: inquiring into game conditions, the laws of the state were very bad. At
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the mouth of Bear River, ducks were being slaughtered for the markets by
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the tens of thousands. The cold-blooded, wide open and utterly shameless
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: way in which it was being done, right at the doors of Salt Lake City,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: was appalling.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: At the same time, the law permitted the slaughter of _spotted fawns_. I
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: saw a huge drygoods box filled to the top with the flat skins of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: slaughtered innocents, _260 in number_, that a rascal had collected and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: was offering at fifty cents each. In reply to a question as to their
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: use, he said: "I tink de sportsmen like 'em for to make vests oud of."
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: He lived at Rawlins, Wyo.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: After a long and somnolent period, during which hundreds of thousands of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: ducks, geese, brant and other birds had been slaughtered for market at
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the Bear River shambles and elsewhere, the state awoke sufficiently to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: abate a portion of the disgrace by passing a bag-limit law (1897).
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: And then came Nature's punishment upon Utah for that duck slaughter. The
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: ducks of Great Salt Lake became afflicted with a terrible epidemic
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: disease (intestinal coccidiosis) which swept off thousands, and stopped
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the use of Utah ducks as food! It was a "duck plague," no less. It has
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: prevailed for three years, and has not yet by any means been stamped
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: out. It seems to be due to the fact that countless thousands of ducks
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: have been feeding on the exposed alluvial flats at the mouth of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: creek that drains off the _sewage of Salt Lake City_. The conditions are
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: said to be terrible.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: To-day, Utah is so nearly destitute of big game that the subject is
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: hardly worthy of mention. Of her upland game birds, only a fraction
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: remains, and as her laws stand to-day, she is destined to become in the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: near future a gameless state. In a dry region like this, the wild life
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: always hangs on by a slender thread, and it is easy to exterminate it!
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Utah should instantly stop the sale of game that she now legally
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: provides for,--twenty-five shore birds and waterfowl per day to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: private parties!
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Deer should be given a ten-year close season, at once. All bag
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: limits should instantly be reduced one-half. The sage grouse, quail,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: swans, woodcock, dove, and all shore birds should be given a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: ten-year close season,--and rigidly protected,--before the stock is
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: all gone.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The model law for the protection of non-game birds should be enacted
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: at once.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The absolute protection of elk, antelope and sheep (until 1913)
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: should be extended for twenty years.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Utah should create a big-game preserve, at once.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: If Utah proposes to save even a remnant of her wild life for posterity,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: she must be up and doing.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: VERMONT:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In view of all conditions, it must be stated that the game laws of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Vermont are, with but slight exceptions, in good condition. It is a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: pleasure to see that there is no spring shooting; that there is no
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "open" season of slaughter for the moose, caribou, wood-duck, swan,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: upland plover, dove or rail; that no buck deer with antlers less than
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: three inches long may be killed; and that there is a law under which
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: damages by deer to growing crops may be assessed and paid for by the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: county in which they occur. Moreover, if there is to be any killing of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: game, her bag limits are not extravagant. All the game protected by the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: state is immune from sale for food purposes, but preserve-reared game
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: may legally be sold. We recommend the following new measures:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Absolute close seasons of five-years' duration for ruffed grouse,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: quail, woodcock, snipe and all shore birds without a single
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: exception.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The gray squirrel should be perpetually protected,--because he is
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: too beautiful, too companionable and too unfit for food to be
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: killed. Even the hungry savages of the East Indies do not eat
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: squirrels.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Pass an automatic pump-gun law.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Extend the term of the Fish and Game Commissioner to four years.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Vermont's great success in introducing and colonizing deer is both
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: interesting and valuable. Fifty years ago, she had no wild deer, because
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the species had been practically exterminated. In 1875, thirteen deer
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: were imported from the Adirondacks and set free in the mountains. The
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: increase has been enormous. In 1909 the number of deer killed for the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: year was about 5,311, which was possible without adversely affecting the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: herds. It is a striking object-lesson in restoring the white-tailed deer
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: to its own, and it will be found more fully described in chapter XXIV.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: VIRGINIA:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Virginia is far below the position that she should occupy in wild-life
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: conservation. To set her house in order, and come up to the level of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: states that have been born during the past twenty years, she must bestir
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: herself in these ways:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: She must provide for a resident hunting license, a State Game
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Commissioner and a force of salaried wardens.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: She must prohibit spring shooting.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: She must impose small bag limits on game-slaughter.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: She must resolutely stop the sale of all wild game.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: She must stop the killing of female deer, and of bucks with horns
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: under three inches long.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: She must stop killing gray squirrels and doves as "game."
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: She should not permit the beautiful wood-duck to be killed as
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "game."
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: She should accord a five-year close season to grouse, and all shore
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: birds.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: She should rule out the machine shot-guns which gentlemen can no
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: longer use in hunting.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: She should adopt at once a comprehensive code of game laws, and clean
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: her house in one siege, instead of fiddling and fussing with all these
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: matters one by one, through a series of ten long, weary years. The time
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: for puttering with game protection has gone by. It is now time to make
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: short cuts to comprehensive results, and save the game before it is too
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: late.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: WASHINGTON:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The state of Washington still flatters herself that she has all kinds of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: big game to kill,--moose, antelope, goat, sheep, caribou and deer.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Evidently this is on the theory that so long as a species is not
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: extinct, it is "legal" and right to pursue it with rifles during a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: specified "open season."
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The people of Washington need to be told that conditions have greatly
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: changed, and it is now high time to put on the brakes. It is time for
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: them to realize that if they wait any longer for the sportsmen to take
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the initiative in securing the enactment of really adequate preservation
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: laws, all their big game will be dead before those laws are born! Every
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: man shrinks from cutting off his own pet privilege.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Some of the game laws of Washington are up to date; and her big-game
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: laws look all right to the unaided eye, but are not. Her bird laws are a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: chaotic jumble of local exceptions and special privileges. As a net
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: result of all her shortcomings, the remnant of a once fine fauna of big
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: game and feathered game is surely being _exterminated according to law._
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: A few local exceptions will not disprove the general truthfulness of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: this assertion.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Ten years ago a few men in Seattle resented the idea of outside
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: co-operation in the protection of Washington game. They said they were
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: abundantly able to take care of it; but the march of events has proven
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: that they overestimated their capacity. To-day the wild-life laws of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: that state are only half baked. Come what may to me, I shall set down
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: without malice the things that the great and admirable State of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Washington should do to set her house in order. It is not good for the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: resourceful and progressive men of the Great Northwest to be clear
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: behind the times in these matters.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: _Stop local game legislation, and enact a code of laws covering the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: entire state, uniformly. County legislation is twenty years behind the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: times!_
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: For ten (10) full years, stop the killing of elk, mountain sheep,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: mountain goat, caribou, moose, and antelope. Regarding deer, I am in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: doubt.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Prohibit the sale of all wild game, no matter where killed, by the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: enactment of a Bayne law, complete, which will also
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Promote the breeding, killing and sale of domestic game for food
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: purposes.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Make a careful investigation of the present status of your sage
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: grouse, every other grouse, quail, and all species of shore birds,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: then give a five-year close season, all over the state, to every
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: species that is "becoming scarce." This will embrace certainly
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: one-half of the whole number, if not two-thirds.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Provide two bird refuges in the eastern portion of the state, where
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: they are very greatly needed to supplement the good effects of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: State Game Preserve established on Puget Sound in 1911.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Bar the use in hunting of the odious automatic and pump shotguns
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: that are now so generally in use all over the United States to the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: great detriment of the game and the people.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: WEST VIRGINIA:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Considering the fact that West Virginia contains no plague-spot city for
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the consumption of commercial wild game, that the sale of all game is
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: prohibited at all times, and the game of the state may not be exported
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: for sale elsewhere, the wild life of West Virginia is reasonably secure
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: from the market gunner,--if an adequate salaried warden force is
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: provided. Without such a force her game must continue to be destroyed in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the future as in the past to supply the markets of Pittsburgh,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Philadelphia, Baltimore and Washington. The deer law is excellent, and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the non-game birds, and the dove and wood-duck are perpetually
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: protected.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: One fly in the ointment is--spring shooting; which for ducks, geese and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: brant continues from September 1 to April 20. Unfortunately the law
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: enacted in 1875 against spring shooting has been _repealed,_ and so has
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the resident hunting license law (1911).
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In view of the impossibility of imagining a good reason for the repeal
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of a good law, we recommend:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: That the law against spring shooting be re-enacted.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: That the resident hunter's license law be re-enacted, and the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: proceeds specifically devoted to the preservation and increase of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: game.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: That a force of regular salaried wardens be provided to enforce the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: laws.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: That the bag limit on quail should be 10 per day or 40 per season,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: instead of 12 and 96; and on ruffed grouse it should be 3 per day
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: (as in New York) or 12 per season. One wild turkey per day, or three
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: per season is quite enough for one man. The visible supply will not
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: justify the existing limit of two and six.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: WISCONSIN:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In spite of the fierce fight made in 1910-11 by the saloon-element
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: game-shooters of Milwaukee for the control of the wild-life situation,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and the repeal of the best protective laws of the state, the Army of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Defense once more defeated the Allied Destroyers, and drove them off the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: field. Once more it was proven that when The People are aroused, they
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: are abundantly able to send the steam roller over the enemies of wild
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: life.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Alphabetically, Wisconsin may come near the end of the roll-call; but by
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: downright merit in protection, she comes mighty close to the head of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: list of states. Her slate of "Work to be done" is particularly clean;
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and she has our most distinguished admiration. Her force of game wardens
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: is not a political-machine force. It amounts to something. The men who
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: get within it undergo successfully a civil service examination that
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: certainly separates the sheep from the goats. For particulars address
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Dr. T.S. Palmer, Department of Agriculture, Washington.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: According to the standards that have been dragging along previous to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: this moment, Wisconsin has a good series of game laws. But the hour for
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: a Reformation of ideas and principles has struck. We heard it first in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: April, 1911. The wild life of America must not be exterminated according
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: to law, contrary to law, or in the absence of law! Wisconsin must take
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: a fresh grip on her game situation, or it will get away from her, after
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: all.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Not another prairie chicken or woodcock should be killed in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Wisconsin between 1912 and 1922. When any small bird becomes so
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: scarce that the bag limit needs to be cut down to five, as it now is
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: for the above in Wisconsin, it is time to stop for ten years, before
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: it is too late.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Wisconsin should immediately busy herself about the creation of bird
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and game preserves.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: For goodness sake, Wisconsin, stop killing squirrels as "game!" You
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: ought to know better--and you do! Leave that form of barbarism for
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the Benighted States.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: And pass a law shutting out the machine guns. They are a disgrace to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: our country, and a scourge to our game. Continually are they leading
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: good men astray.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Extend the term of your State Warden to four years.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: WYOMING:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The State of Wyoming once had a magnificent heritage of game. It
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: embraced the Rocky Mountain species, and also those of the great plains.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: First and last, the state has worked hard to protect her wild life, and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: hold the killing of it down to a decent basis.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: As far back as 1889, I met on the Shoshone River a very wide-awake
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: warden, actually "on his job," who was maintained by a body of private
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: citizens headed by Col. Pickett and known as the Northern Wyoming Game
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Protective Association. And even then we saw that the laws were too
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: liberal for the game. In one man's cold-storage dug-out we saw enough
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: sheep, deer and elk meat to subsist a company of hungry dragoons, all
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: killed and possessed according to law.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In the protection of her mountain game, Wyoming has had a hard task. In
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the Yellowstone Park between 1889 and 1894, the poachers for the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: taxidermists of Livingston and elsewhere slaughtered 270 bison out of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 300; and Howell was the only man caught. England can protect game in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: far-distant mountains and wildernesses; but America can not,--or at
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: least _we don't!_ With us, men living in remote places who find wild
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: game about them say "To h--- with the law!" They kill on the sly, in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: season and out of season, females and males; and the average local jury
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: simply _will not_ convict the average settler who is accused of such a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: trifling indiscretion as killing game out of season when he "needs the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: meat."
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: And so, with laws in full force protecting females, the volume of big
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: game steadily disappears, _everywhere west of the Alleghanies where the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: law permits big-game hunting!_ An interesting chapter might be written
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: on game exterminated according to law.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The deadly defects in the protection of western big game are:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Structural weakness in the enforcement of the laws;
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Collusion between offenders for the suppression of evidence;
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Perjury on the witness stand;
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Dishonesty and disloyalty on the part of local jurors when friends,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: are on trial;
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Sympathy of judges for "the poor man" who wants to eat the game to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: save his cattle and sheep.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: [Illustration: (Map of) STATES AND PROVINCES WHICH REQUIRE RESIDENTS TO
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: OBTAIN HUNTING LICENSES, 1912
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In Connecticut, New Jersey, New York, Oklahoma and Rhode Island an
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: additional fee of 10 to 20 cents is charged for issuing the license.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Inclosed names indicate States which permit residents to hunt on
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: their own land without license. Nova Scotia has a $5 resident
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: license and exempts landowners.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Note that many of the States adopt the French method of exempting
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: landowners, while some, particularly in the West follow the English
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: method of requiring everyone who hunts to obtain a license.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: From Farmers' Bulletin No. 510, U-S. Dept. of Agriculture]
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Elsewhere there appears a statement regarding the elk of Jackson Hole,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and the efforts made and being made to save them. At this point we are
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: interested in the game of Wyoming as a whole.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: First of all, the killing of mountain sheep should absolutely cease,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: for ten years.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: A similar ten-year close season should be accorded moose and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: prong-horned antelope.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: All grouse should now be classed with doves and swans (no open
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: season), and kept there for ten years.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Spring shooting is wrong in principle and vicious in practice; and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: it should be stopped in Wyoming, as elsewhere.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The automatic and pump shotguns when used in hunting are a disgrace
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: to Wyoming, as they are to other states, and should be suppressed;
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and the silencer for use in hunting is in the black list.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: CHAPTER XXXII
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: NEED FOR A FEDERAL MIGRATORY BIRD LAW, NO-SALE-OF-GAME LAW, AND OTHERS
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: We are assuming that the American people sincerely desire the adequate
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: protection and increase of bird life, for reasons that are both
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: sentimental and commercial. Surely every good citizen dislikes to see
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: millions of dollar's worth of national wealth foolishly wasted, and he
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: dislikes to pay any unnecessary increased cost of living. There must be
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: several millions of Americans who feel that way, and who are disposed to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: demand a complete revolution in bird protection.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: There are four needs of wild bird life that are fundamental, and that
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: can not be ignored, any more than a builder can ignore the four
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: cornerstones of his building. Listed in the order of their importance,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: they are as follows:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 1.--_The federal protection of all migratory birds._
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 2.--_The total suppression of the sale of native wild game_.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 3.--_The total suppression of spring shooting and of shooting in the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: breeding season, and_
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 4.--_Long close seasons for all species that are about to be "shot
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: out_."
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: If the gunners of America wish to have a gameless continent, all they
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: need do to secure it is to oppose these principles, prevent their
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: translation into law, and maintain the status quo. If they do this, then
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: _all our best birds are doomed to swift destruction_. Let no man make a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: mistake on that point. The "open seasons" and "bag limits" of the United
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: States to-day are just as deadly as the 5,000,000 sporting guns now in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: use, and the 700,000,000 annual cartridges. It is only the ignorant or
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the vicious who will seriously dispute this statement.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: THE FEDERAL PROTECTION OF MIGRATORY BIRDS.--The bill now before Congress
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: for the protection of all migratory birds by the national government is
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the most important measure ever placed before that body in behalf of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: wild life. A stranger to this proposition will need to pause for thought
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: in order to grasp its full meaning, and appreciate the magnitude of its
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: influence.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The urgent necessity for a law of this nature is due to the utter
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: inadequacy of the laws that prevail throughout some portions of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: United States concerning the slaughter and preservation of birds. Any
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: law that is not enforced is a poor law. There is not one state in the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Union, nor a single province in Canada, in which the game birds, and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: other birds criminally shot as game, are not being killed far faster
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: than they are breeding, and thereby being exterminated.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Several states are financially unable to employ a force of salaried game
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: wardens; and wherever that is true, the door to universal slaughter is
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: wide open. Let him who questions this take Virginia as a case in point.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: A loyal Virginian told me only this year that in his state the warden
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: system is an ineffective farce, and the game is not protected, because
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the wardens can not afford to patrol the state for nothing.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: This condition prevails in a number of states, north and south,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: especially south. It is my belief that throughout nine-tenths of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: South, the negroes and poor whites are slaughtering birds exactly as
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: they please. It is the _permanent residents_ of the haunts of birds and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: game that are exterminating the wild life.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The value of the birds as destroyers of noxious insects, has been set
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: forth in Chapter XXIII. Their total value is enormous--or it _would_ be
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: if the birds were alive and here in their normal numbers. To-day there
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: are about one-tenth as many birds as were alive and working thirty years
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: ago. During the past thirty years the destruction of our game birds has
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: been enormous, and the insectivorous birds have greatly decreased.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The damages annually inflicted upon the farm, orchard and garden crops
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of this country are very great. When a city is destroyed by earthquake
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: or fire, and $100,000,000 worth of property is swept away, we are racked
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: with horror and pity; and the cities of America pour out money like
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: water to relieve the resultant distress. We are shocked because we can
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: _see_ the flames, the smoke and the ruins.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: And yet, we annually endure with perfect equanimity (_because we can not
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: see it_?) a loss of nearly $400,000,000 worth of value that is destroyed
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: by insects. The damage is inflicted silently, insidiously, without any
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: scare heads or wooden type in the newspapers, and so we pay the price
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: without protest. We know--when we stop to think of it--that not all this
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: loss falls upon the producer. We know that every consumer of bread,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: cereals, vegetables and fruit _pays his share of this loss_! To-day,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: millions of people are groaning under the "increased cost of living."
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The bill for the federal protection of all migratory birds is directly
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: intended to decrease the cost of living, by preventing outrageous waste;
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: but of all the persons to whom the needs of that bill are presented, how
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: many will take the time to promote its quick passage by direct appeals
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: to their members of Congress? We shall see.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The good that would be accomplished, annually, by the enactment of a law
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: for the federal protection of all migratory birds is beyond computation;
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: but it is my belief that within a very few years the increase in bird
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: life would prevent what is now an annual loss of $250,000,000. It is
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: beyond the power of man to protect his crops and fruit and trees as the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: bird millions would protect them--if they were here as they were in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 1870. The migratory bird bill is of vast importance because it would
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: throw the strong arm of federal protection around 610 species of birds.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The power of Uncle Sam is respected and feared in many places where the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: power of the state is ignored.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The list of migratory birds includes most of the perching birds; all the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: shore birds (_great_ destroyers of bad insects); all the swifts and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: swallows; the goat-suckers (whippoorwill and nighthawk); some of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: woodpeckers; most of the rails; pigeons and doves; many of the hawks;
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: some of the cranes and herons and all the geese, ducks and swans.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: A movement for the federal protection of migratory game birds was
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: proposed to Congress by George Shiras, 3rd, who as a member of the House
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: in the 58th Congress introduced a bill to secure that end. An excellent
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: brief on that subject by Mr. Shiras appeared in the printed hearing on
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the McLean bill, held on March 6, 1912, page 18. Omitting the bills
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: introduced in the 59th, 60th and 61st sessions, mention need be made
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: only of the measures under consideration in the present Congress. One of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: these is a bill introduced by Representative J.W. Weeks, of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Massachusetts, and another is the bill of Representative D.R. Anthony,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Jr., of Kansas, of the same purport.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Finally, on April 24, 1912, an adequate and entirely reasonable bill was
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: introduced in the Senate by Senator George P. McLean, of Connecticut, as
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: No. 6497 (Calendar No. 606). This bill provides federal protection for
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: _all_ migratory birds, and embraces all save a very few of the species
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: that are specially destructive to noxious insects. The bill provides
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: national protection to the farmer's and fruit-grower's best friends. It
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: is entitled to the enthusiastic support of 90,000,000 of people, native
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and alien. Every producer of farm products and every consumer of them
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: owes it to himself to write at once to his member of Congress and ask
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: him (1) to urge the speedy consideration of the bill for the federal
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: protection of all migratory birds, (2) to vote for it, and (3) to work
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: for it until it is passed. It matters not which one of the three bills
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: described finally becomes a law. Will the American people act rationally
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: about this matter, and protect their own interests?
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: SUPPRESS THE SALE OF ALL NATIVE WILD GAME.--The deadly effect of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: commercial slaughter of game and its sale for food is now becoming well
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: understood by the American people. One by one the various state
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: legislatures have been putting up the bars against the exportation or
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: sale of any "game protected by the state." The U.S. Department of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Agriculture says, through Henry Oldys, that "free marketing of wild game
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: leads swiftly to extermination;" and it is literally true.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Up to March, 1911, it appears that several states prohibited the sale of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: game, sixteen states permitted the sale of all unprotected game, and in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: eight more there was partial prohibition. Unfortunately, however, many
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of these states permitted the sale of _imported_ game. Now, since it
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: happened to be a fact that the vast majority of the states prohibit the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: _export_ of their game, as well as the sale of it, a very large quantity
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of such game as quail, ruffed grouse, snipe, woodcock and shore birds
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: was illegally shot for the market, exported in defiance both of state
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: laws and the federal Lacey Act, and sold to the detriment of the states
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: that produced it. In other words, in the laws of each state that merely
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: sought to protect _their own_ game, regardless of the game of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: neighboring states, there was not merely a loop-hole, but there was a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: gap wide enough to drive through with a coach and four. The ruffed
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: grouse of Massachusetts and Connecticut often were butchered to make
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Gotham holidays in joyous contempt of the laws at both ends of the line.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: As a natural result the game of the Atlantic coast was disappearing at a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: frightful rate.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: [Illustration: EIGHTEEN STATES ENTIRELY PROHIBIT THE SALE OF GAME WHY DO
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: THE OTHERS LAG BEHIND?]
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In 1911, the no-sale-of-game law of New York was born out of sheer
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: desperation. The Army of Destruction went up to Albany well-organized,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: well provided with money and attorneys, with three senators in the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Senate and two assemblymen in the lower house, to wage merciless warfare
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: on the whole wild-life cause. The market gunners and game dealers not
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: only proposed to repeal the law against spring shooting but also to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: defeat all legislation that might be attempted to restrict the sale of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: game, or impose bag limits on wild fowl. The Milliners' Association
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: proposed to wipe off the books the Dutcher law against the use of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: plumage of wild birds in millinery, and an assemblyman was committed to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: that cause as its special champion.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Then it was that all the friends of wild life in the Empire State
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: resolved upon a death grapple with the Destroyers, and a fight to an
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: absolute finish. The Bayne bill, entirely prohibiting the sale of all
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: native wild game throughout the state of New York, was drafted and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: thrown into the ring, and the struggle began. At first the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: no-sale-of-game bill looked like sheer madness, but no sooner was it
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: fairly launched than supporters came flocking in from every side. All
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the organizations of sportsmen and friends of wild life combined in one
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: mighty army, the strength of which was irresistible. The real sportsmen
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of the state quickly realized that the no-sale bill was _directly in the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: interest of legitimate sport_. The great mass of people who love wild
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: life, and never kill, were quick to comprehend the far-reaching
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: importance of the measure, and they supported it, with money and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: enthusiasm.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The members of the legislature received thousands of letters from their
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: constituents, asking them to support the Bayne-Blauvelt bill. They did
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: so. On its passage through the two houses, only _one_ vote was recorded
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: against it! Incidentally, every move attempted by the Army of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Destruction was defeated and in the final summing up the defeat amounted
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: to an utter rout.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In 1912, after a tremendous struggle, the legislature of Massachusetts
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: passed a counterpart of the Bayne law, and took her place in the front
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: rank of states. That was a great fight. The market-gunners of Cape Cod,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the game dealers and other interests entered the struggle with men in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the lower house of the legislature specially elected to look after their
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: interests. Just as in New York in 1911, they proposed to repeal the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: existing laws against spring shooting and throw the markets wide open to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the sale of game. From first to last, through three long and stormy
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: months, the Destroyers fought with a degree of determination and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: persistence worthy of a better cause. They contested with the Defenders
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: every inch of ground. In New York, the Destroyers were overwhelmed by
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the tidal wave of Defenders, but in Massachusetts it was a prolonged
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: hand-to-hand fight on the ramparts. _Five times_ was a bill to repeal
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the spring-shooting law introduced and defeated!
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Even after the bill had passed both houses by good majorities, the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Governor declared that he could not sign it. And then there poured into
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the Executive offices such a flood of callers, letters, telegrams and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: telephone calls that he became convinced that the People desired the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: law; so he signed the bill in deference to the wishes of the majority.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The principle that the sale of game is wrong, and fatal to the existence
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of a supply of game, is as fixed and unassailable as the Rocky
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Mountains. Its universal acceptance is only a question of intelligence
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and common honesty. The open states owe it to themselves and each other
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: to enact both the spirit and the letter of the Bayne law, _and do it
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: quickly_, before it is too late to profit by it! Let them remember the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: heath hen,--amply protected when entirely too late to save it from
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: extinction!
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: It is fairly beyond question that the killing of wild game for the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: market, and its sale in the "open season" _and out of it_, is
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: responsible for the disappearance of at least fifty per cent of our
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: stock of American feathered game. It is the market-gunner, the game-hog
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: who shoots "for sport" and sells his game, and the game dealer, who have
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: swept away the wild ducks, the ruffed grouse, the quail and the prairie
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: chickens that thirty years ago were abundant on their natural ranges.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The foolish farmers of the middle West permitted the market-hunters of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Chicago and the East to slaughter their own legitimate game by the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: barrel and the car-load, and ship it "East," to market. To-day the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: waters of Currituck Sound are a wholesale slaughter-place for migratory
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: wild fowl with which to supply the markets of Baltimore, Washington and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Philadelphia. Furthermore, the market gunners of Currituck are robbing
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the people of 16 states of tens of thousands of wild-fowl that
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: legitimately belong to them, during the annual autumn flight. The
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: accompanying map shows how it is done.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: [Illustration: MAP USED IN THE CAMPAIGN FOR THE BAYNE LAW
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: This map shows how the sale of ducks killed on the Carrituck Sound
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: robs the people of 16 states, for the benefit of a few.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: STOP THE SALE OF GAME!
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: (Signed W.T. Hornaday, March 6, 1911.)]
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: To-day, the cash rewards of the market-hunter who can reach a large city
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: with his product are dangerously great. Observe the following
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: _wholesale_ prices that prevailed in New York city in 1910, just prior
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: to the passage of the Bayne law. They were compiled and published by
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Henry Oldys, of the Biological Survey.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Grouse, domestic     per pair             $3.00
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Grouse, foreign       "    "    $1.25  to  1.75
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Partridge, domestic   "    "     3.50  "   4.00
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Woodcock, domestic    "    "     1.50  "   2.00
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Golden plover        per dozen   2.50  "   3.50
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: English snipe         "    "     2.00  "   3.00
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Canvasback duck      per pair    2.25  "   3.00
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Redhead duck          "    "     1.50  "   2.50
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Mallard duck          "    "           "   1.25
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Bluewing teal         "    "      .75  "   1.00
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Greenwing teal        "    "      .75  "    .90
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Broadbill duck        "    "      .50  "    .75
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Rail, No. 1          per dozen         "   1.00
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Rail, No. 2           "    "           "    .60
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Venison, whole deer  per pound    .22  "    .25
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Venison, saddle       "    "      .30  "    .35
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: All our feathered game is rapidly slipping away from us. _Are we going
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: to save anything from the wreck_? Will we so weakly manage the game
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: situation that later on there will be no legitimate bird-shooting for
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: our younger sons, and our grandsons?
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: All laws that permit the killing of game for the market, and the sale of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: it afterward, are class legislation of the worst sort. They permit a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: hundred men selfishly to slaughter for their own pockets the game that
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: rightfully belongs to a hundred thousand men and boys who shoot for the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: legitimate recreation that such field sports afford. Will any of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: sportsmen of America "stand for" this until the game is _all_ gone?
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The people who pay big prices for game in the hotels and restaurants of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: our big cities are not men who _need_ that game as food. Far from it.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: They can obtain scores of fine meat dishes without destroying the wild
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: flocks. In civilized countries wild game is no longer necessary as
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "food," to satisfy hunger, and ward off starvation. In the United States
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the day of the hungry Indian-fighting pioneer has gone by and there is
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: an abundance of food everywhere.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The time to temporize and feel timid over the game situation has gone
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: by. The situation is desperate; and nothing but strong and vigorous
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: measures will avail anything worth while. The sale of all wild game
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: should be stopped, everywhere and at all seasons, throughout all North
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: America, and throughout the world. To-day this particular curse is being
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: felt even in India.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: It is the duty of every true sportsman, every farmer who owns a gun, and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: every lover of wild life, to enter into the campaign for the passage of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: bills absolutely prohibiting all traffic in wild game no matter what its
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: origin. Of course the market hunters, the game-hogs and the game dealers
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: will bitterly oppose them, and hire a lobby to attempt to defeat them.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: But the fight for no-sale-of-game is now on, and it must not stop short
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of complete victory.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: REASONS WHY THE SALE OF WILD GAME SHOULD CEASE EVERYWHERE
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 1.--Because fully 95 per cent of our legitimate stock of feathered
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: game has already been destroyed.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 2.--Because if market-gunning and the sale of game continue ten
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: years longer, all our feathered game will be swept away.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 3.--Because when the sale of game was permitted one dealer was able
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: to sell 1,000,000 _game birds per year in New York City_, so he
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: himself said.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 4.--Because it is a fixed fact that every wild species of mammal,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: bird or reptile that is pursued for money-making purposes eventually
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: is wiped out of existence. Even the whales of the sea are no
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: exception.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 5.--Because at least 50 per cent of the decrease in our feathered
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: game is due to market-gunning, and the sale of game. Look at the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: prairie chicken of the Mississippi Valley, and the ruffed grouse of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: New England.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 6.--Because the laws that permit the commercial slaughter of wild
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: birds for the benefit of less than five per cent of the inhabitants
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of any state are directly against the interest of the 95 per cent of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: other people, to _whom that game partly belongs_.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 7.--Because game killed "for sale" is not intended to satisfy
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "hunger." The people who eat game in large cities do not know what
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: hunger is, save by hearsay. Purchased game is used chiefly in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: over-feeding; and as a rule it does far more harm than good.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 8.--Because the greatest value to be derived from any game bird is
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: in seeing it, and photographing it, and enjoying its living company
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: in its native haunts. Who will love the forests when they become
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: destitute of wild life, and desolate?
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 9.--Because stopping the sale of game _will help bring back the game
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: birds to us, in a few years_.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 10.--Because the pace that New York and Massachusetts have set in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: this matter will render it easier to procure the passage of Bayne
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: laws in other states.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 11.--Because those who legitimately desire game for their tables can
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: be supplied from the game farms and preserves that now are coming
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: into existence.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: When New York's far-reaching Bayne bill became a law, the following dead
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: birds lay in cold storage in New York City:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Wild duck          98,156
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Plover             48,780
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Quail              14,227
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Grouse             21,202
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Snipe               7,825
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Woodcock              767
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Rail                  419
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: They represented the last slaughterings of American game for New York.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: To-day the remaining plague-spots are Chicago, Philadelphia, San
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Francisco, Baltimore, Washington and New Orleans; but in New Orleans the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: brakes have at last (1912) been applied, and the market slaughter that
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: formerly prevailed in that state has at least been checked.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: As an instance of persistent market shooting on the greatest ducking
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: waters of the eastern United States, I offer this report from a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: trustworthy agent sent to Currituck Sound, North Carolina, in March,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: I beg to submit the following information relative to the number of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: wild ducks and geese shipped from this market and killed in the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: waters of Back Bay and the upper or north end of Currituck Sound,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: from October 20th to March 1st, inclusive.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Approximately there were killed and shipped in the territory above
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: named, 130,000 to 135,000 wild ducks and between 1400 and 1500 wild
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: geese. From Currituck Sound and its tributaries there were shipped
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: approximately 200,000 wild ducks.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: You will see from the above figures that each year the market
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: shooter exacts a tremendous toll from the wild water fowl in these
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: waters, and it is only a question of a short time when the wild duck
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: will be exterminated, unless we can stop the ruthless slaughter. The
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: last few years I have noted a great decrease in the number of wild
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: ducks; some of the species are practically extinct. I have secured
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the above information from a most reliable source, and the figures
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: given approximately cannot be questioned.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The effect of the passage of the Bayne law, closing the greatest
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: American market against the sale of game was an immediate decrease of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: fully fifty per cent in the number of ducks and geese slaughtered on
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Currituck Sound. The dealers refused to buy the birds, and one-half the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: killers were compelled to hang up their guns and go to work. The
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: duck-slaughterers felt very much enraged by the passage of the law, and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: at first were inclined to blame the northern members of Currituck
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: ducking clubs for the passage of the measure; but as a matter of fact,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: not one of the persons blamed took any part whatever in the campaign for
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the new law.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: THE UNFAIRNESS OF SPRING SHOOTING.--The shooting of game birds in late
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: winter and spring is to be mentioned only to be condemned. It is grossly
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: unfair to the birds, outrageous in principle, and most unsportsmanlike,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: no matter whether the law permits it or not. Why it is that any state
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: like Iowa, for example, can go on killing game in spring is more than I
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: can understand. I have endeavored to find a reason for it, in Iowa, but
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the only real reason is:--"The boys want the birds!"
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: I think we have at last reached the point where it may truthfully be
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: said that now no gentleman shoots birds in spring. If the plea is made
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: that "if we don't shoot ducks in the spring we can't shoot them at all!"
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: then the answer is--if you can't shoot game like high-minded,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: red-blooded sportsman, _don't shoot it at all_! A gentleman can not
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: afford to barter his standing and his own self-respect for a few ducks
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: shot in the spring when the birds are going north to lay their eggs. And
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the man who insists on shooting in spring may just as well go right on
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and do various other things that are beyond the pale, such as shoot
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: quail on the ground, shoot does and fawns, and fish for trout with gang
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: hooks.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: There are no longer two sides to what once was the spring shooting
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: question. Even among savages, the breeding period of the wild creatures
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: is under taboo. Then if ever may the beasts and birds cry "King's
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: excuse!" It has been positively stated in print that high-class fox
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: hounds have been known to refuse to chase a pregnant fox, even when in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: full view.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: CHAPTER XXXIII
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: BRINGING BACK THE VANISHED BIRDS AND GAME
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The most charming trait of wild-life character is the alacrity and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: confidence with which wild birds and mammals respond to the friendly
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: advances of human friends. Those who are not very familiar with the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: mental traits of our wild neighbors may at first find it difficult to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: comprehend the marvelous celerity with which both birds and mammals
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: recognize friendly overtures from man, and respond to them.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: At the present juncture, this state of the wild-animal mind becomes a
