name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: factor of great importance in determining what we can do to prevent the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: extermination of species, and to promote the increase and return of wild
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: life.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: I think that there is not a single wild mammal or bird species now
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: living that can not, or does not, quickly recognize protection, _and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: take advantage of it_. The most conspicuous of all familiar examples are
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the wild animals of the Yellowstone Park. They embrace the elk, mountain
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: sheep, antelope, mule deer, the black bear and even the grizzly. No one
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: can say precisely how long those several species were in ascertaining
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: that it was safe to trust themselves within easy rifle-shot of man; but
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: I think it was about five years. Birds recognize protection far more
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: quickly than mammals. In a comparatively short time the naturally wild
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and wary big game of the Yellowstone Park became about as tame as range
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: cattle. It was at least fifteen years ago that the mule deer began to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: frequent the parade ground at the Mammoth Hot Springs military post, and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: receive there their rations of hay.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Whenever you see a beautiful photograph of a large band of big-horn
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: sheep or mule deer taken at short range amid Rocky Mountain scenery, you
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: are safe in labeling it as having come from the Yellowstone Park. The
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: prong-horned antelope herd is so tame that it is difficult to keep it
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: out of the streets of Gardiner, on the Montana side of the line.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: But the bears! Who has not heard the story of the bears of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Yellowstone Park,--how black bears and grizzlies stalk out of the woods,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: every day, to the garbage dumping-ground; how black bears actually have
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: come _into the hotels_ for food, without breaking the truce, and how the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: grizzlies boldly raid the grub-wagons and cook-tents of campers, taking
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: just what they please, because they _know_ that no man dares to shoot
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: them! Indeed, those raiding bears long ago became a public nuisance, and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: many of them have been caught in steel box-traps and shipped to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: zoological gardens, in order to get them out of the way. And yet,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: outside the Park boundaries, everywhere, the bears are as wary and wild
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: as the wildest.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The arrogance of the bears that couldn't be shot once led to a droll
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and also exciting episode.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: During the period when Mr. C.J. Jones ("Buffalo" Jones) was
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: superintendent of the wild animals of the Park, the indignities
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: inflicted upon tourist campers by certain grizzly bears quite abraded
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: his nerves. He obtained from Major Pitcher authority to punish and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: reform a certain grizzly, and went about the matter in a thoroughly
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Buffalo-Jonesian manner. He procured a strong lariat and a bean-pole
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: seven feet long and repaired to the camp that was troubled by too much
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: grizzly.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The particular offender was a full-grown male grizzly who had become a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: notorious raider. At the psychological moment Jones lassoed him in short
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: order, getting a firm hold on the bear's left hind leg. Quickly the end
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of the rope was thrown over a limb of the nearest tree, and in a trice
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Ephraim found himself swinging head downward between the heavens and the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: earth. And then his punishment began.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Buffalo Jones thrashed him soundly with the bean-pole! The outraged bear
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: swung to and fro, whirled round and round, clawing and snapping at the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: empty air, roaring and bawling with rage, scourged in flesh and insulted
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: in spirit. As he swung, the bean-pole searched out the different parts
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of his anatomy with a wonderful degree of neatness and precision.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Between rage and indignation the grizzly nearly exploded. A
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: moving-picture camera was there, and since that day that truly moving
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: scene has amazed and thrilled countless thousands of people.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: When it was over, Mr. Jones boldly turned the bear loose! Although its
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: rage was as boundless as the glories of the Yellowstone Park, it paused
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: not to rend any of those present, but headed for the tall timber, and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: with many an indignant "Woof! Woof!" it plunged in and disappeared. It
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: was two or three years before that locality was again troubled by
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: impudent grizzly bears.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: And what is the mental attitude of _every_ Rocky Mountain black or
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: grizzly bear _outside_ of the Yellowstone Park? It is colossal suspicion
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of man, perpetual fear, and a clean pair of heels the moment man-scent
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: or man-sight proclaims the proximity of the Arch Enemy of Wild
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Creatures. And yet there are one or two men who tell the American public
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: that wild animals do not think, that they do not reason, and are
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: governed only by "instinct"!
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "A little knowledge is a dangerous thing!"
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: TAMING WILD BIRDS.--As incontestable proof of the receptive faculties of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: birds, I will cite the taming of wild birds in the open, by friendly
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: advances. There are hundreds, aye, thousands, of men, women, boys and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: girls who could give interesting and valuable personal testimony on this
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: point.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: My friend J. Alden Loring (one of the naturalists of the Roosevelt
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: African Expedition), is an ardent lover of wild birds and mammals. The
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: taming of wild creatures in the open is one of his pastimes, and his
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: results serve well to illustrate the marvelous readiness of our wild
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: neighbors to become close friends with man _when protected_. I will
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: quote from one of Mr. Loring's letters on this subject:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "Taming wild birds is a new field in nature study, and one never can
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: tell what success he will have until he has experimented with different
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: species. Some birds tame much more easily than others. On three or four
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: occasions I have enticed a chickadee _to my hand_ at the first attempt,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: while in other cases it has taken from fifteen minutes to a whole day.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "Chipping sparrows that frequent my doorway I have tamed in two days. A
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: nuthatch required three hours before it would fly to my hand, although
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: it took food from my stick the first time it was offered. When you find
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: a bird on her nest, it is of course much easier to tame that individual
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: than if you had to follow it about in the open, and wait for it to come
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: within reach of a stick. By exercising extreme caution, and approaching
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: inch by inch, I have climbed a tree to the nest of a yellow-throated
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: vireo, and at the first attempt handed the bird a meal-worm with my
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: fingers. At one time I had two house wrens, a yellow-throated vireo, a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: chipping sparrow and a flock of chickadees that would come to my hand."
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: [Illustration: SIX WILD CHIPMUNKS DINE WITH MR. LORING]
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: It would be possible--and also delightful--to fill a volume with
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: citations of evidence to illustrate the quick acceptance of man's
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: protection by wild birds and mammals. Let me draw a few illustrations
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: from my own wild neighbors.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: On Lake Agassiz, in the N.Y. Zoological Park, within 500 feet of my
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: office in the Administration Building, a pair of wild wood-ducks made
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: their nest last spring, and have just finished rearing nine fine,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: healthy young birds. Whenever you see a wood-duck rise and fly in our
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Park, you may know that it is a wild bird. During the summer of 1912 a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: small flock of wild wood-ducks came every night to our Wild-Fowl Pond,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and spent the night there.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: A year ago, a covey of eleven quail appeared in the Park, and have
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: persistently remained ever since. Last fall and winter they came at
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: least twenty times to a spot within forty feet of the rear window of my
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: office, in order to feed upon the wheat screenings that we placed there
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: for them.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: When we first occupied the Zoological Park grounds, in 1899, there was
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: not one wild rabbit in the whole 264 acres. Presently the species
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: appeared, and rabbits began to hop about confidently, all over the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: place. In 1906, we estimated that there were about eighty individuals.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Then the marauding cats began to come in, and they killed off the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: rabbits until not one was to be seen. Thereupon, we addressed ourselves
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: to those cats, in more serious earnest than ever before. Now the cats
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: have disappeared; and one day last spring, as I left my office at six
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: o'clock, everyone else having previously gone, I almost stepped upon two
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: half-grown bunnies that had been visiting on the front door-mat.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: When we were macadamizing the yards around the Elephant House, with a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: throng of workmen all about every day, a robin made its nest on the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: heavy channel-iron frame of one of the large elephant gates that swung
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: to and fro nearly every day.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In 1900 we planted a young pine tree in front of our temporary office
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: building, within six feet of a main walk; and at once a pair of robins
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: nested in it and reared young there.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: [Illustration: WILD CREATURES QUICKLY RESPOND TO FRIENDLY ADVANCES
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Chickadee and Chipmunk Tamed by Mr. Loring]
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: [Illustration: THE COLORADO OBJECT LESSON IN BRINGING BACK THE DUCKS]
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Up in Putnam County, where for five years deer have been protected, the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: exhibitions that are given each year of the supreme confidence of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: protected deer literally astonish the natives. They are almost unafraid
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of man and his vehicles, his cattle and his horses, but of course they
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: are unwilling to be handled. Strangers are astonished; but people who
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: know something about the mental attitude of wild animals under
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: protection know that it is the natural and inevitable result of _real
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: protection_.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: At Mr. Frank Seaman's summer home in the Catskills, the phoebe birds
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: nest on the beams under the roof of the porch. At my summer home in the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Berkshires, no sooner was our garage completed than a phoebe built her
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: nest on the edge of the lintel over the side door; and another built on
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: a drain-pipe over the kitchen door.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Near Port Jervis, last year a wild ruffed grouse nested and reared a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: large brood in the garden of Mr. W.I. Mitchell, within _two feet_ of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: foundation of the house.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: On the Bull River in the wilds of British Columbia two trappers of my
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: acquaintance, Mack Norboe and Charlie Smith, once formed a friendship
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: with a wild weasel. In a very few visits, the weasel found that it was
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: among friends, and the trappers' log cabin became its home. I have a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: photograph of it, taken while it posed on the door-sill. The trappers
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: said that often when returning at nightfall from their trap-lines, the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: weasel would meet them a hundred yards away on the trail, and follow
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: them back to the cabin.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "Old Ben," the big sea-lion who often landed on the wharf at Avalon,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Santa Catalina, to be fed on fish, was personally known to thousands of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: people.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: AN OBJECT LESSON IN PROTECTION.--A remarkable object lesson in the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: recognition of protection by wild ducks came under my notice in the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: pages of "Recreation Magazine" in June, 1903, when that publication was
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: edited by G.O. Shields. The article was entitled,--" A Haven of Refuge,"
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and the place described well deserved the name. It is impossible for me
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: to impress upon the readers of this volume with sufficient force and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: clearness the splendid success that is easily attainable in encouraging
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the return of the birds. The story of the Mosca "Haven of Refuge" was so
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: well told by Mr. Charles C. Townsend in the publication referred to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: above, that I take pleasure in reproducing it entire.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: One mile north of the little village of Mosca, Colorado, in San Luis
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: valley, lives the family of J.C. Gray. On the Gray ranch there is an
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: artesian well which empties into a small pond about 100 feet square.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: This pond is never entirely frozen over and the water emptying
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: therein is warm even during the coldest winter.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Some five years ago, Mr. Gray secured a few wild-duck eggs, and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: hatched them under a hen. The little ducks were reared and fed on
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the little pond. The following spring they left the place, to return
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: in the fall, bringing with them broods of young; also bringing other
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: ducks to the home where protection was afforded them, and plenty of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: good feed was provided. Each year since, the ducks have scattered in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the spring to mate and rear their families, returning again with
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: greatly increased numbers in the fall, and again bringing strangers
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: to the haven of refuge.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: I drove out to the ranch November 24, 1902, and found the little
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: pond almost black with the birds, and was fortunate enough to secure
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: a picture of a part of the pond while the ducks were thickly
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: gathered thereon. Ice had formed around the edges, and this ice was
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: covered with ducks. The water was also alive with others, which paid
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: not the least attention to the party of strangers on the shore.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: From Mr. Gray I learned that there were some 600 ducks of various
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: kinds on the pond at that time, though it was then early for them to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: seek winter quarters. Later in the year, he assured me, there would
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: be between 2,000 and 3,000 teal, mallards, canvas-backs, redheads
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and other varieties, all perfectly at home and fearless of danger.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The family have habitually approached the pond from the house, which
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: stands on the south side, and should any person appear on the north
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: side of the pond the ducks immediately take fright and flight. Wheat
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: was strewn on the ground and in the water, and the ducks waddled
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: around us within a few inches of our feet to feed, paying not the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: least attention to us, or to the old house-dog which walked near.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Six miles east of the ranch is San Luis lake, to which these ducks
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: travel almost daily while the lake is open. When they are at the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: lake it is impossible to approach within gunshot of the then timid
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: birds. Some unsympathetic boys and men have learned the habit of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: birds, and place themselves in hiding along the course of flight to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and from the lake. Many ducks are shot in this way, but woe to the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: person caught firing a gun on or near the home-pond. When away from
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: home, the birds are as other wild-ducks and fail to recognize any
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: members of the Gray family. While at home they follow the boys
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: around the barn-yard, squawking for feed like so many tame ducks.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: This is the greatest sight I have ever witnessed, and one that I
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: could not believe existed until I had seen it. Certainly it is worth
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: travelling many miles to see, and no one, after seeing it, would
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: care to shoot birds that, when kindly treated, make such charming
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: pets.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Since the above was published, the protected flocks of tame wild ducks
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: have become one of the most interesting sights of Florida. At Palm Beach
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the tameness of the wild ducks when within their protected area, and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: their wildness outside of it, has been witnessed by thousands of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: visitors.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: THE SAVING OF THE SNOWY EGRET IN THE UNITED STATES.--The time was when
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: very many persons believed that the devastations of the plume-hunters
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of Florida and the Gulf Coast would be so long continued and so
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: persistently followed up to the logical conclusion that both species of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: plume-furnishing egrets would disappear from the avifauna of the United
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: States. This expectation gave rise to feelings of resentment,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: indignation and despair.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: It happened, however, that almost at the last moment a solitary
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: individual set on foot an enterprise calculated to preserve the snowy
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: egret (which is the smaller of the two species involved), from final
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: extermination. The splendid success that has attended the efforts of Mr.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Edward A. McIlhenny, of Avery Island, Louisiana, is entitled not only to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: admiration and praise, but also to the higher tribute of practical
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: imitation. Mr. McIlhenny is, first of all, a lover of birds, and a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: humanitarian. He has traveled widely throughout the continent of North
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: America and elsewhere, and has seen much of wild life and man's
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: influence upon it. To-day his highest ambition is to create for the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: benefit of the Present, and as a heritage to Posterity, a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: mid-continental chain of great bird refuges, in which migrating wild
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: fowl and birds of all other species may find resting-places and refuges
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: during their migrations, and protected feeding-grounds in winter. In
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: this grand enterprise, the consummation of which is now in progress, Mr.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: McIlhenny is associated with Mr. Charles Willis Ward, joint donor of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: splendid Ward-McIlhenny Bird Preserve of 13,000 acres, which recently
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: was presented to the State of Louisiana by its former owners.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The egret and heron preserve, however, is Mr. McIlhenny's individual
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: enterprise, and really furnished the motif of the larger movement. Of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: its inception and development, he has kindly furnished me the following
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: account, accompanied by many beautiful photographs of egrets breeding in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: sanctuary, one of which appears on page 27.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In some recent publications I have seen statements to the effect
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: that you believed the egrets were nearing extinction, owing to the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: persecution of plume hunters, so I know that you will be interested
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: in the enclosed photographs, which were taken in my heron rookery,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: situated within 100 yards of my factory, where I am now sitting
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: dictating this letter.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: This rookery was started by me in 1896, because I saw at that time
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: that the herons of Louisiana were being rapidly exterminated by
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: plume hunters. My thought was that the way to preserve them would be
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: to start an artificial rookery of them where they could be
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: thoroughly protected. With this end in view I built a small pond,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: taking in a wet space that contained a few willows and other shrubs
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: which grow in wet places.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In a large cage in this pond, I raised some snowy herons. After
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: keeping the birds in confinement for something over six months I
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: turned them loose, hoping that they would come back the next season,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: as they were perfectly tame and were used to seeing people. I was
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: rewarded the next season by four of the birds returning, and nesting
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: in the willows in the pond. This was the start of a rookery that now
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: covers 35 acres, and contains more than twenty thousand pairs of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: nesting birds, embracing not only the egrets but all the species of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: herons found in Louisiana, besides many other water birds.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: With a view to carrying on the preservation of our birds on a larger
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: scale, Mr. Chas. W. Ward and I have recently donated to the State of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Louisiana 13,000 acres of what I consider to be the finest wild fowl
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: feeding ground on the Louisiana coast, as it contains the only
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: gravel beach for 50 miles, and all of the geese within that space
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: come daily to this beach for gravel. This territory also produces a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: great amount of natural food for geese and ducks.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: SAVING THE GULLS AND TERNS.--But for the vigorous and long-continued
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: efforts of the Audubon Societies, I think our coasts would by this time
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: have been swept clean of the gulls and terns that now adorn it. Twenty
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: years ago the milliners were determined to have them all. The fight for
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: them was long, and hotly contested, but the Audubon Societies won. It
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: was a great victory, and has yielded results of great value to the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: country at large. And yet, it was only a small number of persons who
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: furnished the money and made the fight which inured to the benefit of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the millions of American people. Hereafter, whenever you see an American
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: gull or tern, remind yourself that it was saved to the nation by "the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Audubon people."
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In times of grave emergency, such as fire, war and scarcity of food, the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: wild creatures forget their fear of man, and many times actually
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: surrender themselves to his mercy and protection. At such times, hard is
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the heart and low is the code of manly honor that does not respond in a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: manner becoming a superior species.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The most pathetic wild-animal situation ever seen in the United States
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: on a large scale is that which for six winters in succession forced
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: several thousand starving elk into the settlement of Jackson Hole,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Wyoming, in quest of food at the hands of their natural enemies. The elk
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: lost all fear, partly because they were not attacked, and they
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: surrounded the log-enclosed haystacks, barns and houses, mutely begging
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: for food. Previous to the winter of 1911, thousands of weak calves and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: cows perished around the haystacks. Mr. S.N. Leek's wonderful pictures
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: tell a thrilling but very sad story.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: To the everlasting honor of the people of Jackson Hole, be it recorded
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: that they rose like Men to the occasion that confronted them. In 1909
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: they gave to the elk herds all the hay that their domestic stock could
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: spare, not pausing to ascertain whether they ever would be reimbursed
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: for it. They just handed it out! The famishing animals literally mobbed
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the hay-wagons. To-day the national government has the situation in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: hand.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In times of peace and plenty, the people of Jackson Hole take their toll
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of the elk herds, but their example during starvation periods is to be
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: commended to all men.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: A SLAUGHTER OF RESTORED GAME.--The case of the chamois in Switzerland
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: teaches the world a valuable lesson in how _not_ to slaughter game that
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: has come back to its haunts through protected breeding.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: A few years ago, one of the provinces of Switzerland took note of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: fact that its once-abundant stock of chamois was almost extinct, and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: enacted a law by which the remnant was absolutely protected for a long
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: period. During those years of protection, the animals bred and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: multiplied, until finally the original number was almost restored.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Then,--as always in such cases,--there arose a strong demand for an open
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: season; and eventually the government yielded to the pressure of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: hunters, and fixed a date whereon an open season should begin.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: [Illustration: GULLS AND TERNS OF OUR COASTS, SAVED FROM DESTRUCTION
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: These Birds have been Saved and Brought back to us by the Splendid Efforts
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of the Audubon Societies, and other Bird-Lovers. But for the Anti-Plumage
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Laws, not one Gull or Tern would now Remain on our Atlantic Coast
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: From the "American Natural History"]
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: During the period preceding that fatal date, the living chamois, grown
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: half tame by years of immunity from the guns, were all carefully located
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and marked down by those who intended to hunt them. At daybreak on the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: fatal day, the onset began. Guns and hunters were everywhere, and the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: mountains resounded with the fusillade. Hundreds of chamois were slain,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: by hundreds of hunters; and by the close of that fatal "open season" the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: species was more nearly exterminated throughout that region than ever
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: before. Once more those mountains were nice and barren of game.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Let that bloody and disgraceful episode serve as a warning to Americans
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: who are tempted to demand an open season on game that has bred back from
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the verge of extinction. Particularly do we commend it to the notice of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the people of Colorado who _even now_ are demanding an open season on
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the preserved mountain sheep of that state. The granting of such an open
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: season would be a brutal outrage. Those sheep are now so tame and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: unsuspicious that the killing of them would be _cold-blooded murder!_
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: THE LOGICAL CONCLUSION.--Within reasonable limits, any partly-destroyed
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: wild species can be increased and brought back by giving absolute
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: protection from harassment and slaughter. When a species is struggling
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: to recuperate, it deserves to be left _entirely unmolested_ until it is
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: once more on safe ground.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Every breeding wild animal craves seclusion and entire immunity from
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: excitement and all forms of molestation. Nature simply demands this as
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: her unassailable right. It is my firm belief that any wild species will
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: breed in captivity whenever its members are given a degree of seclusion
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: that they deem satisfactory.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: With species that have not been shot down to a point entirely too low,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: adequate protection generously long in duration will bring back their
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: numbers. If the people of the United States so willed it, we could have
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: wild white-tailed deer in every state and in every county (save city
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: counties) between the Atlantic and the Rocky Mountains. We could easily
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: have one thousand bob white quail for every one now living. We could
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: have squirrels in every grove, and songbirds by the million,--merely by
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: protecting them from slaughter and molestation. From Ohio to the great
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: plains, the pinnated grouse could be made far more common than crows and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: blackbirds.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Inasmuch as all this is true,--and no one with information will dispute
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: it for a moment,--is it not folly to seek to supplant our own splendid
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: native species of game birds (_that we never yet have decently
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: protected!_) with foreign species? Let the American people answer this
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: question with "Yes" or "No."
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The methods by which our non-game birds can be encouraged and brought
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: back are very simple: Protect them, put up shelters for them, give them
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: nest-boxes in abundance, protect them from cats, dogs, and all other
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: forms of destruction, and feed those that need to be fed. I should think
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: that every boy living in the country would find keen pleasure in making
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and erecting nest-boxes for martins, wrens, and squirrels; in putting up
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: straw teepees in winter for the quail, in feeding the quail, and in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: nailing to the trees chunks of suet and fat pork every winter for the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: woodpeckers, nuthatches, and other winter residents.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Will any person now on this earth live long enough to see the present
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: all-pervading and devilish spirit of slaughter so replaced by the love
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of wild creatures and the true spirit of conservation that it will be as
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: rare as it now is common?
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: But let no one think for a moment that any vanishing species can at any
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: time be brought back; for that would be a grave error. The point is
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: always reached, by every such species, that the survivors are too few to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: cope with circumstances, and recovery is impossible. The heath hen could
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: not be brought back, neither could the passenger pigeon. The whooping
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: crane, the sage grouse, the trumpeter swan, the wild turkey, and the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: upland plover never will come back to us, and nothing that we can do
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: ever will bring them back. Circumstances are against those species,--and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: I fear against many others also. Thanks to the fact that the American
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: bison breeds well in captivity, we have saved that species from complete
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: extinction, but our antelope seems to be doomed.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: It is because of the alarming condition of our best wild life that quick
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: action and strong action is vitally necessary. We are sleeping on our
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: possibilities.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: CHAPTER XXXIV
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: INTRODUCED SPECIES THAT HAVE BEEN BENEFICIAL
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Man has made numerous experiments in the transplantation of wild species
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of mammals and birds from one country, or continent, to another. About
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: one-half these efforts have been beneficial, and the other half have
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: resulted disastrously.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The transplantation of any wild-animal species is a leap in the dark. On
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: general principles it is dangerous to meddle with the laws of Nature,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and attempt to improve upon the code of the wilderness. Our best wisdom
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: in such matters may easily prove to be short-sighted folly. The trouble
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: lies in the fact that concerning transplantation it is _impossible for
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: us to know beforehand all the conditions that will affect it, or that it
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: will effect, and how it will work out_. In its own home a species may
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: _seem_ not only harmless, but actually beneficial to man. We do not
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: know, and _we can not know_, all the influences that keep it in check,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and that mould its character. We do not know, and we can not know
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: without a trial, how new environment will affect it, and what new traits
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of character it will develop under radically different conditions. The
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: gentle dove of Europe may become the tyrant dove of Cathay. The
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Repressed Rabbit of the Old World becomes in Australia the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Uncontrollable Rabbit, a devastator and a pest of pests.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: No wild species should be transplanted and set free in a wild state to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: stock new regions without consulting men of wisdom, and following their
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: advice. It is now against the laws of the United States to introduce and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: acclimatize in a wild state, anywhere in the United States, any
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: wild-bird species without the approval of the Department of Agriculture.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The law is a wise one. Furthermore, the same principle should apply to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: birds that it is proposed to transplant from one portion of the United
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: States into another, especially when the two are widely separated.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: On this point, I once learned a valuable lesson, which may well point my
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: present moral. Incidentally, also, it was a narrow escape for me!
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: A gentlemen of my acquaintance, who admires the European magpie, and is
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: well aware of its acceptable residence in various countries in Europe,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: once requested my cooperation in securing and acclimatizing at his
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: country estate a number of birds of that species. As in duty bound, I
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: laid the matter before our Department of Agriculture, and asked for an
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: opinion. The Department replied, in effect, "Why import a foreign magpie
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: when we have in the West a species of our own quite as handsome, and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: which could more easily be transplanted?"
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The point seemed well taken. Now, I had seen much of the American
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: magpie in its wild home,--the Rocky Mountains, and the western border
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of the Great Plains,--and I _thought_ I was acquainted with it. I knew
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: that a few complaints against it had been made, but they had seemed to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: me very trivial. To me our magpie seemed to have a generally
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: unobjectionable record.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Fortunately for me, I wrote to Mr. Hershey, Assistant Curator of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Ornithology in the Colorado State Museum, for assistance in procuring
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: fifty birds, for transplantation to the State of New York. Mr. Hershey
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: replied that if I really wished the birds for acclimatization, he would
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: gladly procure them for me; but he said that in the _thickly-settled
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: farming communities_ of Colorado, the magpie is now regarded as a pest.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: It devours the eggs and nestlings of other wild birds, and not only
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: that, it destroys so many eggs of domestic poultry that many farmers are
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: compelled to keep their egg-laying hens shut up in wire enclosures!
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Now, this condition happened to be entirely unknown to me, because I
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: never had seen the American magpie in action _in a farming community_!
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Of course the proposed experiment was promptly abandoned, but it is
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: embarrassing to think how near I came to making a mistake. Even if the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: magpies had been transplanted and had become a nuisance in this state,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: they could easily have been exterminated by shooting; but the memory of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the error would have been humiliating to the party of the first part.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: THE OLD WORLD PHEASANTS IN AMERICA.--In 1881 the first Chinese
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: ring-necked pheasants were introduced into the United States, twelve
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: miles below Portland, Oregon; twelve males and three females. The next
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: year, Oregon gave pheasants a five-year close season. A little later,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the golden and silver pheasants of China were introduced, and all three
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: species throve mightily, on the Pacific Coast, in Oregon, Washington and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: western British Columbia. In 1900, the sportsmen of Portland and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Vancouver were shooting cock golden pheasants according to law.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The success of Chinese and Japanese pheasants on the Pacific Coast soon
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: led to experiments in the more progressive states, at state expense.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: State pheasant hatcheries have been established in Massachusetts,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Connecticut, New York, New Jersey, Ohio, Illinois, Missouri, Iowa and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: California.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In many localities, the old-world pheasants have come to stay. The rise
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and progress of the ring-neck in western New York has already been
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: noted. It came about merely through protection. That protection was
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: protection in fact, not the false "protection" that shoots on the sly.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: It is the irony of fate that full protection should be accorded a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: foreign bird, in order that it may multiply and possess the land, while
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the same kind of protection is refused the native bob white, and it is
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: now almost a dead species, so far as this state is concerned.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In looking about for grievances against the ring-necked and English
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: pheasant, some persons have claimed that in winter these birds are
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "budders," which means that they harmfully strip trees and bushes of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: buds that those bushes will surely need in their spring opening. On
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: that point Dr. Joseph Kalbfus, Secretary of the Pennsylvania Game
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Commission, sent out a circular letter of inquiry, in response to which
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: he received many statements. With but one exception, all the testimony
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: received was to the effect that pheasants are _not_ bud-eaters, and that
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: generally the charge is unfounded.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The introduction of old-world pheasants, and the attempted introduction
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of the Hungarian partridge, are efforts designed first of all to furnish
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: sportsmen something to shoot, and incidentally to provide a new food
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: supply for the table. The people of this country are not starving, nor
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: are they even very hungry for the meat of strange birds; but as a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: food-producer, the pheasant is all right.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: It disgusts me to the core, however, to see states that wantonly and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: wickedly, through sheer apathy and lack of business enterprise, have
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: allowed the quail, the heath hen, the pinnated grouse and the ruffed
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: grouse to become almost exterminated by extravagant and foolish
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: shooters, now putting forth wonderfully diligent efforts and spending
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: money without end, in introducing _foreign_ species! Many men actually
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: take the ground that our game "can't live" in its own country any
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: longer; but only the ignorant and the unthinking will say so! Give our
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: game birds decent, sensible, _actual_ protection, stop their being
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: slaughtered far faster than they breed, and _they will live anywhere in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: their own native haunts_! But where is there _one species_ of upland
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: game bird in America that has been sensibly and adequately protected?
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: From Portland, Maine, to Portland, Oregon there is _not one,--not a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: single locality in which protection from shooting has been sensible, or
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: just, or adequate_.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: We have universally given our American upland game birds an unfair deal,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and now we are adding insult to slaughter by bringing in foreign game
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: birds to replace them--because our birds "can't live" before five
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: million shot-guns!
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Our American game birds CAN live, anywhere in the haunts where nature
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: placed them that are not to-day actually occupied by cities and towns!
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Give me the making of the laws, and I will make the prairie chicken and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: quail as numerous throughout the northern states east of the Great
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Plains as domestic chickens are outside the regular poultry farms. There
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: is only one reason why there are not ten million quail in the state of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: New York to-day,--one for each human inhabitant,--and that reason is the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: infernal greed and selfishness of the men who have almost exterminated
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: our quail by over-shooting. Don't talk to me about the "hard winters"
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: killing off our quail! It is the hard cheek of the men who shoot them
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: when they ought to let them alone.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The State of Iowa could support 500,000 prairie chickens and never miss
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the waste grain that they would glean in the fields; but now the prairie
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: chicken is practically extinct in Iowa, only a few scattered specimens
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: remaining as "last survivors" in some of the northern counties. The
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: migration of those birds that unexpectedly came down from the north last
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: winter was like the fall of a meteor,--only the birds promptly faded
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: away again. Why should New York, New Jersey and Massachusetts
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: exterminate the heath hen and coddle the ring-necked pheasant and the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Hungarian partridge?
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The introduction of the old-world pheasants interests me very little.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Every one that I see is a painful reminder of our slaughtered quail and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: grouse,--the birds that never have had a square deal from the American
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: people! Thus far the introduction of the Hungarian partridge has not
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: been successful, anywhere. Connecticut, Missouri, New Jersey and I think
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: other states have tried this, and failed. The failure of that species
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: brings no sorrow to me. I prefer our own game birds; and if the American
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: people will not conserve those properly and decently they deserve to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: have no game birds.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: THE EUROPEAN RED DEER IN NEW ZEALAND.--Occasionally a gameless land
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: makes a ten-strike by introducing a foreign game animal that does no
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: harm, and becomes of great value. The greatest success ever made in the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: transplantation of game animals has been in New Zealand.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Originally, New Zealand possessed no large animals, and no "big-game."
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: When Nature passed around the deer, antelopes, sheep, goats, wild cattle
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and bears, New Zealand failed to receive her share. For centuries her
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: splendid forests, her grand mountains and picturesque valleys remained
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: untenanted by big game.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In 1864, the Prince Consort of England caused seven head of European red
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: deer to be taken from the royal park at Windsor, and sent to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Christchurch, New Zealand. Only three of the animals survived the long
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: voyage; a buck and two does. For several weeks the two were kept in a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: barn in Christchurch, where they served no good purpose, and were not
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: likely to live long or be happy. Finally some one said, "Let's set them
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: free in the mountains!"
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The idea was adopted. The three animals were hauled an uncertain number
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of miles into the interior mountains and set free.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: They promptly settled down in their new home. They began to breed, and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: now on the North Island there are probably five thousand European red
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: deer, every one of which has descended directly from the famous three!
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: And here is the strangest part of the story:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The red deer of the North Island represent the greatest case of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: in-and-in breeding of wild animals on record. According to the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: experience of the world in the breeding of domestic cattle (_not
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: horses_), we should expect physical deterioration, the development of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: diseases, and disaster. On the contrary, the usual evil results of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: in-breeding in domestic cattle have been totally absent. _The red deer
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of New Zealand are to-day physically larger and more robust animals,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: with longer and heavier antlers, and longer hair, than any of the red
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: deer of Europe west of Germany_!
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Red deer have been introduced practically all over New Zealand, and the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: total number now in the Islands must be somewhere near forty thousand.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The sportsmen of that country have grand sport, and take many splendid
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: trophies. That transplantation has been a very great success.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Incidentally, the case of the in-bred deer of the North Island, taken
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: along with other cases of which we know, establishes a new and important
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: principle in evolution. It is this:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: _When healthy wild animals are established in a state of nature, either
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: absolutely free, or confined in preserves so large that they roam at
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: will, seek the food of nature and take care of themselves, in-and-in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: breeding produces no ill effects, and ceases to be a factor. The animals
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: develop in physical perfection according to the climate and their food
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: supply; and the introduction of new blood is not necessary_.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: THE FALLOW DEER ON THE ISLAND OF LAMBAY.--In the Irish Sea, a few miles
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: from the southeast coast of Ireland, is the Island of Lambay, owned by
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Cecil Baring, Esq. The island is precisely one square mile in area, and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: some of its sea frontage terminates in perpendicular cliffs. In many
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: ways the island is of unusual interest to zoologists, and its fauna has
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: been well set forth by Mr. Baring.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In the year 1892 three fallow deer (_Dama vulgaris_) a buck and two
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: does, were transplanted from a park on the Irish mainland to Lambay, and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: there set free. From that slender stock has sprung a large herd, which,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: but for the many deer that have been purposely shot, and the really
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: considerable number that have been killed by going over the cliffs in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: stormy weather, the progeny of the original three would to-day number
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: several hundred head. No new blood has been introduced, and _no deer
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: have died of disease_. Even counting out the losses by the rifle and by
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: accidental death, the herd to-day numbers more than one hundred head.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Mr. Baring declares that neither he nor his gamekeeper have ever been
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: able to discover any deterioration in the deer of Lambay, either in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: size, weight, size of antlers, fertility or general physical stamina.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The deterioration through disease, especially tuberculosis, that always
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: is dreaded and often observed in closely in-bred domestic cattle, has
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: been totally absent.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In looking about for wild species that have been transplanted, and that
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: have thriven and become beneficial to man, there seems to be mighty
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: little game in sight! The vast majority belong in the next chapter. We
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: will venture to mention the bob white quail that were introduced into
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Utah in 1871, into Idaho in 1875, and the California valley quail in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Washington in 1857. Wherever these efforts have succeeded, the results
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: have been beneficial to man.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In 1879 a well-organized effort was made to introduce European quail
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: into several of the New England and Middle States,--to take the place of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the bob white, we may suppose,--the bird that "can't stand the winters!"
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: About three thousand birds were distributed and set free,--and went down
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and out, just as might have been expected. During the past twenty years
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: it is safe to say that not less than $500,000 have been expended in the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: northern states, and particularly in the northeastern states, in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: importing live quail from Kansas, the Indian Territory, Oklahoma, Texas,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the Carolinas and other southern states, for restocking areas from which
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the northern bob white had been exterminated by foolish over-shooting! I
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: think that fully nine-tenths of these efforts have ended in total
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: failure. The quail could not survive in their strange environment. I
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: cannot recall a _single instance_ in which restocking northern covers
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: with southern quail has been a success.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: There is no royal road to the restoration of an exterminated bird
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: species. Where the native seed still exists, by long labor and travail,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: thorough protection and a mighty long close season, it can be encouraged
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: to _breed back and return_; but it is an evolution that can not be
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: hurried in the least. Protect Nature, and leave the rest to her.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: With mammals, the case is different. It is possible to restock depleted
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: areas, provided Time is recognized as a dominant factor. I can cite two
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: interesting cases by way of illustration, but this subject will form
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: another chapter.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In the transplantation of fishes, conditions are widely different, and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: many notable successes have been achieved.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: One of the greatest hits ever made by the United States Bureau of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Fisheries in the planting of fish in new localities was the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: introduction of the striped bass or rock-fish (_Roccus lineatus_) of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: our Atlantic coast, into the coast waters of California. In 1879,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 135 live fish were deposited in Karquines Strait, at Martinez, and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: in 1882, 300 more were planted in Suisun Bay, near the first
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: locality chosen.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Twelve years after the first planting in San Francisco Bay, the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: markets of San Francisco handled 149,997 pounds of striped bass. At
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: that time the average weight for a whole year was eleven pounds, and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the average price was ten cents per pound. Fish weighing as high as
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: forty-nine pounds have been taken, and there are reasons for the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: belief that eventually the fish of California will attain as great
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: weight as those of the Atlantic and the Gulf.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The San Francisco markets now sell, annually, about one and one half
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: million pounds of striped bass. This fish has taken its place among
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: anglers as one of the game fishes of the California coast, and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: affords fine sport. Strange to say, however, it has not yet spread
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: beyond the shores of California.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Regarding this species, the records of the United States Bureau of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Fisheries are of interest. In 1897, the California markets handled
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 2,949,642 pounds, worth $225,527.--(American Natural History.)
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Nowhere else in the world, we venture to say, were such extensive,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: costly and persistent efforts put forth in the transplantation of any
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: wild foreign species as the old U.S. Fish Commission, under Prof.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Spencer F. Baird, put forth in the introduction of the German carp into
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the fresh water ponds, lakes and rivers of the United States. It was
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: held that because the carp could live and thrive in waters bottomed with
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: mud, that species would be a boon to all inland regions where bodies of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: water, or streams, were scarce and dear. Although the carp is not the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: best fish in the world for the table, it seemed that the dwellers in the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: prairie and great plains regions would find it far better than
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: bullheads, or no fish at all,--which are about the same thing.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: By means of special fish cars, sent literally all over the United
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: States, at a great total expense, live carp, hatched in the ponds near
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the Washington Monument were distributed to all applicants. The German
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: carp spread far and wide; but to-day I think the fish has about as many
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: enemies as friends. In some places, strong objections have been filed to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the manner in which carp stir up the mud at the bottom of ponds and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: small lakes, greatly to the detriment of all the native fishes found
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: therein.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: CHAPTER XXXV
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: INTRODUCED SPECIES THAT HAVE BECOME PESTS
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The man who successfully transplants or "introduces" into a new habitat
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: any persistent species of living thing, assumes a very grave
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: responsibility. Every introduced species is doubtful gravel until panned
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: out. The enormous losses that have been inflicted upon the world through
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the perpetuation of follies with wild vertebrates and insects would, if
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: added together, be enough to purchase a principality. The most
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: aggravating feature of these follies in transplantation is that never
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: yet have they been made severely punishable. We are just as careless and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: easy-going on this point as we were about the government of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Yellowstone Park in the days when Howell and other poachers destroyed
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: our first national bison herd, and when caught red-handed--as Howell
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: was, skinning seven Park bison cows,--_could not be punished for it,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: because there was no penalty prescribed by any law_.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: To-day, there is a way in which any revengeful person could inflict
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: enormous damage on the entire South, at no cost to himself, involve
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: those states in enormous losses and the expenditure of vast sums of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: money, yet go absolutely unpunished!
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: THE GYPSY MOTH is a case in point. This winged calamity was imported at
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Maiden, Massachusetts, near Boston, by a French entomologist, Mr.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Leopold Trouvelot, in 1868 or '69. History records the fact that the man
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of science did not purposely set free the pest. He was endeavoring with
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: live specimens to find a moth that would produce a cocoon of commercial
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: value to America; and a sudden gust of wind blew out of his study,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: through an open window, his living and breeding specimens of the gypsy
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: moth. The moth itself is not bad to look at, but its larvae is a great,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: overgrown brute, with an appetite like a hog. Immediately Mr. Trouvelot
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: sought to recover his specimens, and when he failed to find them all.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: like a man of real honor, he notified the State authorities of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: accident. Every effort was made to recover all the specimens, but enough
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: escaped to produce progeny that soon became a scourge to the trees of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Massachusetts. The method of the big, nasty-looking mottled-brown
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: caterpillar was very simple. It devoured the entire foliage of every
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: tree that grew in its sphere of influence.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The gypsy moth spread with alarming rapidity and persistence. In course
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of time the state authorities of Massachuestts were forced to begin a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: relentless war upon it, by poisonous sprays and by fire. It was awful!
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Up to this date (1912) the New England states and the United States
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Government service have expended in fighting this pest about $7,680,000!
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The spread of this pest has been retarded, but the gypsy moth never
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: will be wholly stamped out. To-day it exists in Rhode Island,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Connecticut and New Hampshire, and it is due to reach New York at an
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: early date. It is steadily spreading in three directions from Boston,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: its original point of departure, and when it strikes the State of New
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: York, we, too, will begin to pay dearly for the Trouvclot experiment. It
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: is said that General S.C. Lawrence, of Medford, Massachusetts, has spent
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: $75,000 in trying to protect his trees from the ravages of this scourge.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: THE RABBIT PLAGUE IN AUSTRALIA AND NEW ZEALAND.--The rabbit curse upon
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Australia and New Zealand is so well known as to require little comment.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In this case the introduction was deliberate. In the days when the sheep
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: industry was most prosperous, a patriotic gentleman conceived the idea
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: that the introduction of the rabbit, and its establishment as a wild
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: animal, would be a good thing. He reasoned that it would furnish a good
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: food supply, that it would furnish sport, and being unable to harm any
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: other creature of flesh and blood it was therefore harmless.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Accordingly, three pairs of rabbits were imported and set free.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In a short time, the immense number of rabbits that began to overrun the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: country furnished food for reflection, as well as for the table. A very
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: simple calculation brought out the startling information that, under
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: perfectly favorable conditions, a single pair of rabbits could in three
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: years' time produce progeny amounting to 13,718,000 individuals. Ever
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: since that time, in discussing the rabbits of Australia it has been
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: necessary to speak in millions.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "The inhabitants of the colony," says Dr. Richard Lydekker, "soon found
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: that the rabbits were a plague, for they devoured the grass, which was
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: needed for the sheep, the bark of trees, and every kind of fruit and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: vegetable, until the prospects of the colony became a very serious
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: matter, and ruin seemed inevitable. In New South Wales upwards of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 15,000,000 rabbits skins have been exported in a single year; while in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: thirteen years ending with 1889 no less than 39,000,000 were accounted
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: for in Victoria alone.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "To prevent the increase of these rodents, the introduction of weasels,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: stoats, mongooses, etc., has been tried; but it has been found that
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: those carnivores neglected the rabbits and took to feeding on poultry,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and thus became as great a nuisance as the animals they were intended to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: destroy. The attempt to kill them off by the introduction of an epidemic
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: disease has also failed. In order to protect such portions of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: country as are still free from rabbits, fences of wire netting have been
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: erected; one of these fences erected by the Government of Victoria
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: extending for a distance of upwards of one hundred and fifty
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: geographical miles. In New Zealand, where the rabbit has been introduced
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: little more than twenty years, its increase has been so enormous, and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the destruction it inflicts so great, that in some districts it has
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: actually been a question whether the colonists should not vacate the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: country rather than attempt to fight against the plague. The average
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: number of rabbit skins exported from New Zealand is now twelve
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: millions."--(Royal Natural History.)
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: THE FOX PEST IN AUSTRALIA.--And now unfortunate Australia has a new
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: pest, also acquired by importation of an alien species. It is the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: European fox (_Vulpes vulpes_). The only redeeming feature about this
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: fresh calamity is found in the fact that the species was not
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: deliberately introduced into Australia for the benefit of the local
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: fauna. Mr. O.W. Rosenhain, of Melbourne, informs me (1912) that about
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: thirty years ago the Hunt Club brought to Australia about twenty foxes,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: for the promotion of the noble sport of fox hunting. In some untoward
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: manner, the most of those animals escaped. They survived, multiplied,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and have provided New South Wales, Victoria and South Australia with a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: fox pest of the first rank.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The destruction of wild bird life and poultry has become so serious that
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Australia now is making vigorous efforts to exterminate the pest. The
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: government pays ten shillings bounty on fox scalps, besides which each
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: prime fox skin is worth from four to five dollars. It is hoped that
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: these combined values will eliminate the fox pest.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Regarding foxes in Australia, Mr. W.H.D. Le Souef has this to say in his
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: extremely interesting and valuable book, "Wild Life in Australia," page
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "We found that foxes were unfortunately plentiful in this district, and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: in a hollow log that served to shelter some cubs were noticed the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: remains of ducks, fowls, rabbits, lambs, bandicoots and snakes; so they
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: evidently vary their fare, snakes even not coming amiss. They also sneak
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life
