txt: on wild ducks that are nesting by the edge of the water among the rushes
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and tussocky grass, and catch quail also, especially sitting birds.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: _These animals are, and always will be, a great source of trouble in the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: thickly timbered country and stony ranges, and will gradually, like the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: rabbit, extend all over Australia_. They are evidently not contented
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: with ground game only, as Mr. A.F. Kelly, of Barwonleigh, in Victoria,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: states: "When riding past a bull-oak tree about twenty-five feet high,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: with either a magpie's or crow's nest on top. I noticed the nest looked
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: very bulky, and had something red in it. On going nearer I saw a large
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: fox coiled up in it!"
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: THE MONGOOSE.--Circumstances alter cases, and a change of environment
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: sometimes works marvelous changes in the character of an animal species.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Now, _why_ should not the gray Indian mongoose (formerly called the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: ichneumon, _(Herpestes griscus_)) destroy poultry in India, as it does
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: elsewhere? There is poultry in plenty to be destroyed, but
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "Rikki-Tikki-Tavi" elects to specialize on the killing of rats, and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: cobras, and other snakes.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In his own sphere of influence,--India and the orient,--the mongoose is
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: a fairly decent citizen, and he fits into the time-worn economy of that
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: region. As a destroyer of the thrice-anathema domestic rat, he has no
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: equal in the domain of flesh and blood. His temper is so fierce that one
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "pet" mongoose has been known to kill a full grown male giant bustard,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and put a greyhound to flight.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In an evil moment (1872) Mr. W.B. Espeut conceived the idea that it
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: would be a good thing to introduce mongooses to the rats of Barbadoes
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and Jamaica that were pestering the cane-fields to an annoying extent.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: It was done. The mongooses attacked the rats, cleaned them out,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: multiplied, and then looked about for more worlds to conquer. Snakes and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: lizards were few; but they cheerfully killed and devoured all there
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: were. Then, being continuously hungry, they attacked the wild birds and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: poultry, indiscriminately, and with their usual vigor. I have been told
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: that in Barbadoes "they cleaned out every living thing that they could
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: catch and kill, and then they attacked the sugar-cane." The last count
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: in the indictment may seem hard to believe; but it is a fact that the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Indian mongoose often resorts to fruit and vegetable food.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In Jamaica, at the end of the rat-killing period, the planters joyfully
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: estimated that the labors of Herpestes had saved between 500,000 pounds
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and 750,000 pounds to the industries of that island. That was before the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: slaughter of wild birds and poultry began. I am told that up to date the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: damage done by the mongoose far exceeds the value of the benefit it once
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: conferred, but the total has not been computed.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Up to this date, the mongoose has invaded and become a destructive pest
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: in Barbadoes, Jamaica, Cuba, St. Vincent, St. Lucia, Trinidad, Nevis,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Fiji and all the larger islands of the Hawaiian group. It would require
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: many pages to contain a full account of each introduction, awakening,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: reckoning of damages and payment of bounties for destruction that the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: fiendish mongoose has wrought out wherever it has been introduced. The
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: progress of the pest is everywhere the same,--sweeping destruction of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: rats, snakes, wild birds, small mammals, and finally poultry and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: vegetables.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Every country that now is without the mongoose will do well to shut and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: guard diligently all the doors by which it might be introduced.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Throughout its range in the western hemisphere, the mongoose is a pest;
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and the Biological Survey of the Department of Agriculture has done well
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: in securing the enactment of a law peremptorily prohibiting the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: importation of any animals of that species into the United States or any
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of its colonies. The fierce temper, indomitable courage and vaulting
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: appetite of the mongoose would make its actual introduction in any of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the warm portions of the United States a horrible calamity. In the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: southern states, and all along the Pacific slope clear up to Seattle, it
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: could live, thrive and multiply; and the slaughter that it could and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: would inflict upon our wild birds generally, especially all those that
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: nest and live on the ground, saying nothing of the slaughter of poultry,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: would drive the American people crazy.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Fancy an animal with the murderous ferocity of a mink, the agility of a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: squirrel, the penetration of a ferret and the cunning of a rat,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: infesting the thickets and barnyards of this country. The mongoose can
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: live wherever a rat can live, provided it can get a fair amount of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: animal food. Not for $1,000,000 could any one of the southern or Pacific
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: states afford to have a pair of these little gray fiends imported and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: set free. If such a calamity ever occurs, all wheels should stop, and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: every habitant should turn out and hunt for the animals until they are
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: found and pulverized. No matter if it should require a thousand men and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: $100,000, _find them!_ If not found, the cost to the state will soon be
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: a million a year, with no ending.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In spite of the vigilance of our custom house officers, every now and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: then a Hindoo from some foreign vessel sneaks into the country with a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: pet mongoose (and they do make great pets!) inside his shirt, or in the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: bottom of a bag of clothing. Of course, whenever the Department of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Agriculture discovers any of these surreptitious animals, they are at
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: once confiscated, and either killed or sent to a public zoological park
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: for safe-keeping. In New York, the director of the Zoological Park is so
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: genuinely concerned about the possibility of the escape of a female
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: mongoose that he has issued two standing orders: All live mongooses
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: offered to us shall at once be purchased, and every female animal shall
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: immediately be chloroformed.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: If _Herpestes griseus_ ever breaks loose in the United States, the crime
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: shall not justly be chargeable to us.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: THE ENGLISH SPARROW.--In the United States, the English sparrow is a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: national sorrow, almost too great to be endured. It is a bird of plain
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: plumage, low tastes, impudent disposition and persistent fertility.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Continually does it crowd out its betters, or pugnaciously drive them
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: away, and except on very rare occasions it eats neither insects nor weed
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: seeds. It has no song, and in habits it is a bird of the street and the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: gutter. There is not one good reason why it should exist in this
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: country. If it were out of the way, our native insect-eaters of song and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: beauty could return to our lawns and orchards. The English sparrow is a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: nuisance and a pest, and if it could be returned to the land of its
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: nativity we would gain much.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: CHAPTER XXXVI
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: NATIONAL AND STATE GAME PRESERVES, AND BIRD REFUGES
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Out West, there is said to be a "feeling" that game and forest
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: conservation has "gone far enough." In Montana, particularly, the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: National Wool-Growers' Association has for some time been firmly
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: convinced that "the time has come to call a halt." Oh, yes! A halt on
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the conservation of game and forests; but not on the free grazing of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: sheep on the public domain. No, not even while those same sheep are
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: busily growing wool that is so fearfully and wonderfully conserved by a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: sky-high tariff that the truly poor Americans are forced to wear
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: garments made of shoddy because they cannot afford to buy clothing made
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of wool! (This is the testimony of a responsible clothing merchant, in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: We can readily understand the new hue and cry against conservation that
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the sheep men now are raising. Of course they are against all new game
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and forest reserves,--unless the woolly hordes are given the right to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: graze in them!
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Many men of the Great West,--the West beyond the Great Plains,--are
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: afflicted with a desire to do as they please with the natural resources
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of that region. That is the great curse that to-day rests upon our game.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: When the nearest game warden is 50 miles away, and big game is only 5
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: miles away, it is time for that game to take to the tall timber.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: But in the West, and East and South, there are many men and women who
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: believe in reasonable conservation, and deplore destruction. We have not
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: by any means reached the point where we can think of stopping in the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: making of game preserves, or forest preserves. Of the former, we have
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: scarcely begun to make. The majority of the states of our Union know of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: _state_ game preserves only by hearsay. But the time is coming when the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: states will come forward, and perform the serious duty that they neglect
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: to-day.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Let the statesmen of America be not afraid of making too many game
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: preserves! For the next year, one per day would be none too many!
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Remember, that on one hand we have the Army of Destruction, and on the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: other the expectant millions of Posterity. No executor or trustee ever
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: erred in safeguarding an estate too carefully. Fifty years hence, if
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: your successors and mine find that too much land has been set aside for
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the good of the people, they can mighty easily restore any surplus to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the public domain, and at a vastly increased valuation. Give Posterity
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: at least _one_ chance to debate the question: "Were our forefathers too
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: liberal in the making of game and forest reserves?"
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: We can always carve up any useless surplus of the public domain, and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: restore it to commercial uses; but none of the men of to-day will live
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: long enough to see so strange a proceeding carried into effect.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The game preserves of the United States government are so small (with
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the exception of the Yellowstone and Glacier Parks), that very few
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: people ever hear of them, and fewer still know of them in detail. It
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: seems to be quite time that they should be set forth categorically; and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: it is most earnestly to be hoped that this list soon will be doubled.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: THE YELLOWSTONE NATIONAL PARK.--This was the first of the national parks
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and game preserves of the United States. Some of our game preserves are
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: not exactly national parks, but this is both, by Act of Congress.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: It is 62 miles long from north to south, 54 miles wide and contains a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: total area of 3,348 square miles, or 2,142,720 acres. Its western border
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: lies in Idaho, and along its northern border a narrow strip lies in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Montana. It is under the jurisdiction of the Secretary of the Interior,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and it is guarded by a detachment of cavalry from the United States
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Army. The Superintendent is now a commissioned officer of the United
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: States Army. The business of protecting the game is performed partly by
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: four scouts, who are civilians specially engaged for that purpose, but
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the number has always been totally inadequate to the work to be
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: performed.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: At least one-half of the public interest attaching to the Yellowstone
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Park is based upon its wild animals. There, the average visitor sees,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: for the first time, wild mountain sheep, antelope, mule deer, elk,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: grizzly bears and white pelicans, roaming free. But for the tragedy of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the Park bison herd,--slaughtered by poachers from 1890 to 1893, from
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 300 head down to 30--visitors would see wild bison also; but now the few
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: wild bison remaining keep as far as possible from the routes of tourist
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: travel. The bison were slaughtered through an inadequate protective
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: force, and (then) utterly inadequate laws.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Lieut.-Col. L.M. Brett, U.S.A., Superintendent of the Yellowstone Park
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: advises me (July 29, 1912) that the wild big game in the Yellowstone
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Park in the summer of 1912, is as shown below, based on actual counts
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and estimates of the Park scouts, and particularly Scout McBride. "The
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: estimates of buffalo, elk, antelope, deer, sheep and bear are based on
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: actual counts, or very close observations, and are pretty nearly
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: correct." (Col. Brett).
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Wild Buffalo        49
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Moose              550
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Elk (in summer) 35,000
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Antelope           500
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Mountain Sheep     210
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Mule Deer          400
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: White-tailed Deer  100
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Grizzly Bears       50
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Black Bears        100
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Pumas              100
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Gray Wolves       none
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Coyotes            400
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Pelicans         1,000
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The actual count of 49 wild bison in the Park, 10 of which are calves of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 1912, will be to all friends of the bison a delightful surprise.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Heretofore the little band had seemed to be stationary, which if true
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: would soon mean a decline.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The history of the wild game of the Yellowstone Park is blackened by two
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: occurrences, and one existing fact. The fact is: the town of Gardiner is
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: situated on the northern boundary of the Park, in the State of Montana.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In Gardiner there are a number of men, armed with rifles, who toward
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: game have the gray-wolf quality of mercy.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The first stain is the massacre of the 270 wild bison for their heads
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and robes, already noted. The second blot is the equally savage
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: slaughter in the early winter of 1911, by some of the people of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Gardiner, reinforced by so-called sportsmen from other parts of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: state, of all the park elk they could kill,--bulls, cows and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: calves,--because a large band wandered across the line into the shambles
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of Gardiner, on Buffalo Flats.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: If the people of Gardiner can not refrain from slaughtering the game of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the Park--the very animals annually seen by 20,000 visitors to the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Park,--then it is time for the American people to summon the town of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Gardiner before the bar of public opinion, to show cause why the town
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: should not be wiped off the map.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The 35,000 elk that summer in the Park are compelled in winter to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: migrate to lower altitudes in order to find grass that is not under two
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: feet of snow. In the winter of 1911-12, possibly 5,000 went south, into
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Jackson Hole, and 3,000 went northward into Montana. The sheep-grazing
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: north of the Park, and the general settlement by ranchmen of Jackson
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Hole, have deprived the elk herds of those regions of their natural
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: food. For several years past, up to and including the winter of 1910-11,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: some thousands of weak and immature elk have perished in the Jackson
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Hole country, from starvation and exposure. The ranchmen of that region
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: have had terrible times,--in witnessing the sufferings of thousands of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: elk tamed by hunger, and begging in piteous dumb show for the small and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: all-too-few haystacks of the ranchmen.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The people of Jackson Hole, headed by S.N. Leek, the famous photographer
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and lecturer on those elk herds, have done all that they could do in the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: premises. The spirit manifested by them has been the exact reverse of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: that manifested in Gardiner. To their everlasting credit, they have kept
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: domestic sheep out of the Jackson Valley,--by giving the owners of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: invading herds "hours" in which to get their sheep "all out, and over
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the western range."
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In 1909, the State of Wyoming spent in feeding starving elk     $5,000
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In 1911, the State of Wyoming spent in feeding starving elk      5,000
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In 1911, the U.S. Government appropriated for feeding starving elk,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and exporting elk                                              $20,000
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In 1912, the Camp-Fire Club of Detroit gave, for feeding hungry elk
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In 1910-11, about 3,000 elk perished in Jackson Hole
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In 1911-12, Mr. Leek's photographs of the elk herds showed an alarming
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: absence of mature bulls, indicating that now the most of the breeding is
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: done by immature males. This means the sure deterioration of the species.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The prompt manner in which Congress responded in the late winter of 1911
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: to a distress call in behalf of the starving elk, is beyond all ordinary
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: terms of praise. It was magnificent. In fear and trembling, Congress was
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: asked, through Senator Lodge, to appropriate $5,000. Congress and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Senator Lodge made it $20,000; and for the first time the legislature of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Wyoming appealed for national aid to save the joint-stock herds of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Wyoming and the Yellowstone Park.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: GLACIER PARK, MONTANA.--In the wild and picturesque mountains of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: northwestern Montana, covering both sides of the great Continental
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Divide, there is a region that has been splendidly furnished by the hand
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of Nature. It is a bewildering maze of thundering peaks, plunging
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: valleys, evergreen forests, glistening glaciers, mirror lakes and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: roaring mountain streams. Its leading citizens are white mountain goats,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: mountain sheep, moose, mule deer and white-tailed deer, and among those
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: present are black and grizzly bears galore.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Commercially, the 1,400 square miles of Glacier Park, even with its 60
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: glaciers and 260 lakes, are worth exactly the price of its big trees,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and not a penny more. For mining, agriculture, horticulture and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: stock-raising, it is a cipher. As a transcendant pleasure ground and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: recreation wilderness for ninety millions of people, it is worth ninety
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: millions of dollars, and not a penny less. It is a pleasure park of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: which the greatest of the nations of the earth,--whichever that may
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: be,--might well be overbearingly proud; and its accessibility is almost
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: unbelievable until seen.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: This park is bounded on the south by the Great Northern Railway, on the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: east by the Blackfoot Indian Reservation, on the north by Alberta and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: British Columbia, and on the west by West Fork of the Flathead River.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Horizontally, it contains 1,400 square miles; but as the goat climbs,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: its area is at least double that. Its valleys are filled and its lakes
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: are encircled by grand forests of Douglas fir, hemlock, spruce, white
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: pine, cedar and larch; and if ever they are destroyed by fire, it will
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: be a national calamity, a century long.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: _So long as the American people keep out of the poorhouse, let there be
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: no lumber-cutting vandalism in that park, destroying the beauty of every
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: acre of forest that is touched by axe or saw. The greatest beauty of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: those forests is the forest floor, which lumbering operations would
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: utterly destroy_.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Never mind if there is "ripe timber" there! The American nation is not
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: suffering for the dollars that those lovely forest giants would fetch by
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: board measure. What if a tree does fall now and then from old age! We
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: can stand the expense. If Posterity a hundred years hence finds itself
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: lumberless, and wishes to use those trees, then let Posterity pay the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: price, and take them. We are not suffering for them; and our duty is to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: save them inviolate, and hand them down as a heritage that we proudly
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: transmit unimpaired.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: [Illustration: UNITED STATES NATIONAL GAME PRESERVES
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and Five Pacific Bird Refuges]
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The friends of wild life are particularly interested in Glacier Park as
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: a national game reservoir, and refuge for wild life. On the north, in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Alberta, it is soon to be extended by Waterton Lakes Park.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: When I visited Glacier Park, in 1909, with Frederick H. Kennard and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Charles H. Conrad, I procured from three intelligent guides their best
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: estimates of the amount of big game then in the Park. The guides were
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Thomas H. Scott, Josiah Rogers and Walter S. Gibb.[L]
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: [Footnote L: See _Recreation_ Magazine, May, 1910, p. 213]
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: They compared notes, and finally agreed upon these figures:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Elk                         200
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Moose                     2,500
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Mountain Sheep              700
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Mountain Goats           10,500
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Grizzly Bears    1,000 to 1,500
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Black Bears      2,500 to 3,000
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: As previously stated, one of the surprising features of this new wonder
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: land is its accessibility. The Great Northern lands you at Belton. A
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: ride of three miles over a good road through a beautiful forest brings
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: you to the foot of Lake McDonald, and in one hour more by boat you are
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: at the hotels at the head of the lake. At that point you are within
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: three hours' horse-back ride of Sperry Glacier and the marvelous
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: panorama that unrolls before you from the top of Lincoln Peak. At the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: foot of that Peak we saw a big, wild white mountain goat: and another
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: one watched us climb up to the Sperry Glacier.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: MT. OLYMPUS NATIONAL MONUMENT.--For at least six years the advocates of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the preservation of American wild life and forests vainly desired that
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the grand mountain territory around Mount Olympus, in northwestern
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Washington, should be established as a national forest and game
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: preserve. In addition to the preservation of the forests, it was greatly
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: desired that the remnant bands of Olympic wapiti (described as _Cervus
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: roosevelti_) should be perpetuated. It now contains 1,975 specimens of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: that variety. In Congress, two determined efforts were made in behalf of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the region referred to, but both were defeated by the enemies of forests
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and wild life.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In an auspicious moment, Dr. T.S. Palmer, Assistant Chief of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Biological Survey, Department of Agriculture, thought of a law under
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: which it would be both proper and right to bring the desired preserve
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: into existence. The law referred to expressly clothes the President of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the United States with power to preserve any monumental feature of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: nature which it clearly is the duty of the state to preserve for all
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: time from the hands of the spoilers.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: With the enthusiastic approval and assistance of Representative William
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: E. Humphrey, of Seattle, Dr. Palmer set in motion the machinery
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: necessary to the carrying of the matter before the President in proper
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: form, and kept it going, with the result that on March 2, 1909,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: President Roosevelt affixed his signature to the document that closed
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the circuit.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Thus was created the Mount Olympus National Monument, preserving forever
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 608,640 acres of magnificent mountains, valleys, glaciers, streams and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: forests, and all the wild creatures living therein and thereon. The
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: people of the state of Washington have good reason to rejoice in the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: fact that their most highly-prized scenic wonderland, and the last
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: survivors of the wapiti in that state, are now preserved for all coming
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: time. At the same time, we congratulate Dr. Palmer on the brilliant
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: success of his initiative.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: THE SUPERIOR NATIONAL GAME AND FOREST PRESERVE.--The people of Minnesota
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: long desired that a certain great tract of wilderness in the extreme
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: northern portion of that state, now well stocked with moose and deer,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: should be established as a game and forest preserve. Unfortunately,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: however, the national government could go no farther than to withdraw
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the lands (and waters) from entry, and declare it a forest reserve. At
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the right moment, some bright genius proposed that the national
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: government should by executive order create a "_forest_ reserve," and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: then that the legislature of Minnesota should pass an act providing that
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: every national forest of that state should also be regarded as a _state
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: game preserve_!
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Both those things were done,--almost as soon as said! Mr. Carlos Avery,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the Executive Agent of the Board of Game and Fish Commissioners of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Minnesota is entitled to great credit for the action of his state, and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: we have to thank Mr. Gifford Pinchot and President Roosevelt for the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: executive action that represented the first half of the effort.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The new Superior Preserve is valuable as a game and forest reserve, and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: nothing else. It is a wilderness of small lakes, marshes, creeks,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: hummocks of land, scrubby timber, and practically nothing of commercial
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: value. But the wilderness contains many moose, and zoologically, it is
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: for all practical purposes a moose preserve.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In it, in 1908 Mr. Avery saw fifty-one moose in three days, Mr.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Fullerton saw 183 in nine days, and Mr. Fullerton estimated the total
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: number of moose in Minnesota as a whole at 10,000 head.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In area it contains 1,420,000 acres, and the creation of this great
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: preserve was accomplished on April 13, 1909.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: THE WICHITA NATIONAL GAME PRESERVE.--In the Wichita Mountains, of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: southwestern Oklahoma, there is a National game preserve containing
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 57,120 acres. On this preserve is a fenced bison range and a herd of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: thirty-nine American bison which owe their existence to the initiative
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of the New York Zoological Society. On March 25, 1905, the Society
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: proposed to the National Government the founding of a range and herd, on
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: a basis that was entirely new. To the Society it seemed desirable that
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: for the encouragement of Congress in the preservation of species that
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: are threatened with extermination, the scientific corporations of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: America, and private individuals also, should do something more than to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: offer advice and exhortations to the government.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Accordingly, the Zoological Society offered to present to the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Government, delivered on the ground in Oklahoma, a herd of fifteen
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: pure-blood bison as the nucleus of a new national herd, provided
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Congress would furnish a satisfactory fenced range, and maintain the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: herd. The offer was at once accepted by Hon. James Wilson, Secretary of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Agriculture, and the Society was invited to propose a site for a range.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The Society sent a representative to the Wichita National Forest
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Reserve, who recommended a range, and made a report upon it, which the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Society adopted.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: By act of Congress the range was at once established and fenced. Its
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: area is twelve square miles (9,760 acres). In October, 1908, the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Zoological Society took from its herd in the Zoological Park nine female
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and six male bison, and delivered them at the bison range. There were
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: many predictions that all those bison would die of Texas fever within
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: one year; but the parties most interested persisted in trying
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: conclusions with the famous tick of Texas.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Mr. Frank Rush was appointed Warden of the new National Bison Range, and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: his management has been so successful that only two of the bison died of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the fever, the disease has been stamped out, and the herd now contains
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: thirty-nine head. Within five years it should reach the one-hundred
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: mark. Elk, deer and antelope have been placed in the range, and all save
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the antelope are doing well. The Wichita Bison Range is an unqualified
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: success.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: THE MONTANA NATIONAL BISON RANGE.--The opening of the Flathead Indian
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Reservation to settlement, in 1909, afforded a golden opportunity to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: locate in that region another national bison herd. Accordingly, in 1908,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the American Bison Society formulated a plan by which the establishment
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of such a range and herd might be brought about. That plan was
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: successfully carried into effect, in 1909 and '10.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The Bison Society proposed to the national government to donate a herd
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of at least twenty-five bison, provided Congress would purchase a range,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: fence it and maintain the herd. The offer was immediately accepted, and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: with commendable promptness Congress appropriated $40,000 with which to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: purchase the range, and fence it. The Bison Society examined various
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: sites, and finally recommended what was regarded as an ideal location
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: situated near Ravalli, Montana, north of the Jocko River and Northern
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Pacific Railway, and east of the Flathead River. The nearest stations
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: are Ravalli and Dixon.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The area of the range is about twenty-nine square miles (18,521 acres)
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and for the purpose that it is to serve it is beautiful and perfect
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: beyond compare. In it the bison herd requires no winter feeding
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: whatever.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In 1910 the Bison Society raised by subscription a fund of $10,526, and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: with it purchased 37 very perfect pure-blood bison from the famous
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Conrad herd at Kalispell, 22 of which were females. One gift bison was
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: added by Mr. and Mrs. Charles Goodnight, two were presented by the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: estate of Charles Conrad, and three were presented from the famous
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Corbin herd, at Newport, N.H., by the Blue Mountain Forest Association.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Starting with that nucleus (of 43 head) in 1910, the herd has already
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: (1912) increased to 80 head. The herd came through the severe winter of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 1911-1912 without having been fed any hay whatever, and the founders of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: it confidently expect to live to see it increase to one thousand head.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: THE GRAND CANYON NATIONAL GAME PRESERVE of northern Arizona, embraces
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the entire Grand Canyon of the Colorado River, for a meandering distance
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of 101 miles, and adjacent territory to an extent of 2,333 square miles
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: (1,492,928 acres). Owing to certain conditions, natural and otherwise,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: it is not the finest place in the world for the peaceful increase of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: wild game. The Canyon contains a few mountain sheep, and mule deer, but
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Buckskin Mountain, on the northwestern side, is reeking with mountain
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: lions and gray wolves, and both those species should be shot out of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: entire Grand Canyon National Forest. It was on Buckskin and the western
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: wall of the Canyon itself that "Buffalo" Jones, Mr. Charles S. Bird, and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: their party caught nine live mountain lions, in 1909.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: I regret to say that "Buffalo" Jones's catalo experiment on the Kaibab
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Plateau seems to have met an untimely and disappointing fate. For three
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: years the bison and domestic cattle crossed, and produced a number of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: cataloes; but in 1911, practically the whole lot was wiped off the earth
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: by cattle rustlers! Mr. Jones thinks that it was guerrillas from
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: southern Utah who murdered his enterprise, partly for the reason that no
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: other persons were within striking distance of the herd.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: MOUNT RAINIER NATIONAL PARK.--This fine forest park is the great summer
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: outing ground of the people of the state of Washington. Its area is 324
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: square miles, and as its name implies it embraces Mount Rainier. Easily
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: accessible from Seattle and Tacoma, and fairly well--though not
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: _adequately_--provided with roads, trails, tent camps, hotels and livery
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: transportation, it is really the Yellowstone Park of the Northwest.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: THE YOSEMITE NATIONAL PARK in California is so well known that no
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: description of it is necessary. Its area is 1,124 square miles (719,622
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: acres). Its great value lies in its scenery, but along with that it is a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: sanctuary for such of the wild mammals and birds of California as will
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: not wander beyond its borders to the certain death that awaits
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: everything that may legally be killed in that state.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: CRATER LAKE NATIONAL PARK.--Like all the National Parks of America
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: generally, this one also is a game sanctuary. It is situated on the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: summit of the Cascade Mountains of Oregon. The wonderful Crater Lake
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: itself is 62 miles from Klamath Falls, 83 miles from Ashland, and it is
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 6 miles long, 4 miles wide and 200 feet deep. This National Park was
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: created by Act of Congress in 1902. Its area is 249 square miles
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: (159,360 acres), and it contains Columbian black-tailed deer, black
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: bear, the silver-gray squirrel, and many birds, chiefly members of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: grouse family. Owing to its lofty elevation, there are few ducks.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: THE SEQUOIA AND GENERAL GRANT NATIONAL PARKS were created for the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: special purpose of preserving the famous groves of "big trees,"
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: _(Sequoia gigantea_). The former is in Tulare County, the latter in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Tulare and Fresno counties, California, on the western slope of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Sierra Nevadas. The area of Sequoia Park is 169,605 acres, and that of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: General Grant Park is 2,560 acres. They are under the control of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Interior Department. These Parks are important bird refuges, and Mr.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Walter Fry, Forest Ranger, reports in them the presence of 261 species
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of birds, none of which may be hunted or shot. Into Sequoia Park 20
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: dwarf elk and 84 wild turkeys have been introduced, the former from the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: herd of Miller and Lux.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: OTHER NATIONAL PARKS
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: SULLY HILLS NATIONAL PARK, at Devil's Lake (Fort Totten), North Dakota.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Area 960 acres.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: PLATT NATIONAL PARK, Sulphur Springs, Oklahoma; on account of many
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: mineral springs. Area 848 acres.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: MESA VERDE NATIONAL PARK, Southwestern Colorado; on account of cliff
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: dwellings, and wonderful cliff and canyon scenery. Area, 66 square
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: miles.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: NATIONAL MONUMENTS
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Under a special act of Congress, the President of the United States has
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the power forever to set aside from private ownership and occupation any
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: important natural scenery, or curiosity, or wonderland, the preservation
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of which may fairly be regarded as of National importance, and a duty to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the whole people of the United States. This is accomplished by
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: presidential proclamation creating a "national monument."
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Under the terms of this act, 28 national monuments have been created, up
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: to 1912, of which 17 are under the jurisdiction of the Department of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Interior, and 11 are managed by the Department of Agriculture. The full
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: list is as follows:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: ALASKA:                COLORADO:                SOUTH DAKOTA:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Sitka                  Wheeler                  Jewel Cave
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Colorado
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: ARIZONA:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Montezuma Castle     MONTANA:                 UTAH:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Petrified Forest       Lewis & Clark Cavern     Natural Bridges
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Tonto                  Big Hole Battlefield     Mukuntuweap
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Grand Canyon                                    Rainbow Bridge
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Tumacacori
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Navajo               NEW MEXICO:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: El Morro               WASHINGTON:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: CALIFORNIA:              Chaco Canyon           Mount Olympus
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Lassen Peak            Gila Cliff Dwellings

txt: THE NATIONAL BIRD REFUGES.--Says Dr. T.S. Palmer[M]: "National bird
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: reservations have been established during the last ten years by
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Executive order for the purpose of affording protection to important
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: breeding colonies of water birds, or to furnish refuges for migratory
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: species on their northern or southern flights, or during winter. With
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: few exceptions these reservations are either small rocky islets or
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: tracts of marsh land of no agricultural value."
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: [Footnote M: National Reservations for the Protection of Wild Life, by
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: T.S. Palmer, U.S. Dept. of Agriculture, Circular No. 87, Oct. 5, 1912.]
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In addition to the above, the following governmental reservations have
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: been established for the protection of wild life: Yes Bay, Alaska, of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 35,200 acres; Afognak Island, Alaska, 800 sq. miles; Midway Islands
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Naval Reservation, H.T.; Farallon Island, Point Reyes and Ano Nuevo
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: STATE GAME PRESERVES IN THE UNITED STATES
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: PENNSYLVANIA.--The proposition that every state, territory and province
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: in North America and everywhere else, should establish a series of state
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: forest and game preserves, is fairly incontestable. As a business
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: proposition it is to-day no more a debatable question, or open to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: argument, than is the water supply or sewer system of a city. The only
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: perfect way to conserve a water supply for a great human population is
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: by acquiring title to water sheds, and either protecting the forests
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: upon them, or planting forests in case none exist.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In one important matter the state of Pennsylvania has been wide awake,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and in advance of the times. I will cite her system of forest reserves
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and game preserves as a model plan for other states to follow; and I
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: sincerely hope that by the time the members of the present State Game
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Commission have passed from earth the people of Pennsylvania will have
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: learned the value of the work they are now doing, and at least give them
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the appreciation that is deserved by public-spirited citizens who do
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: large things for the People without hope of material reward. At this
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: moment, Commissioner John M. Phillips and Dr. Joseph Kalbfus are putting
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: their heart's blood into the business of preserving and increasing the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: game and other wild life of Pennsylvania; and the utter lack of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: appreciation that is now being shown _in some quarters_ is really
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: distressing. I refer particularly to the utterly misguided and mistaken
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: body of hunters and anglers having headquarters at Harrisburg, whose
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: members are grossly mislead into a wrong position by a man who seeks to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: secure a salaried state position through the hostile organization that
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: he has built up, apparently for his own use. In the belief that those
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: members generally are mislead and not mean-spirited, and that the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: organization contains a majority of conscientious sportsmen, I predict
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: that ere long the evil genius of Pennsylvania game protection will be
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: ordered to the rear, while the organization as a whole takes its place
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: on the side of the Game Commission, where it belongs.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The game sanctuary scheme that Pennsylvania has developed is so new that
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: as yet only a very small fraction of the people of that state either
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: understand it, or appreciate its far-reaching importance.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: To begin with, Pennsylvania has acquired up to date about one million
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: acres of forest lands, scattered through 26 of the 67 counties of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: state. These great holdings are to be gradually increased. These wild
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: lands, including many sterile mountain "farms" of no real value for
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: agricultural purposes, have been acquired, first of all, for the purpose
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of conserving the water supply of the state; and they are called the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: State Forest Reserves.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Next in order, the State Game Commission has created, in favorable
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: localities in the forest reserves, five great game preserves. The plan
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: is decidedly novel and original, but is very simple withal. In the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: center of a great tract of forest reserve, a specially desirable tract
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: has been chosen, and its boundaries marked out by the stringing of a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: single heavy fence wire, surrounding the entire selection. The area
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: within that boundary wire is an absolute sanctuary for all wild
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: creatures save those that prey upon game, and in it no man may hunt
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: anything, nor fire a gun. The boundary wire is by no means a fence, for
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: it keeps nothing out nor in.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Outside of the wire and the sanctuary, men may hunt in the open season,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: but at the wire every chase must end. If the hunted deer knows enough to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: flee to the sanctuary when attacked, so much the better for the deer.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The tide of wild life ebbs and flows under the wire, and beyond a doubt
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the deer and grouse will quickly find that within it lies absolute
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: safety. There the breeding and rearing of young may go on undisturbed.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In view of the fact that hunting may go on in the forest reserve areas
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: surrounding these sanctuaries, no intelligent sportsman needs to be told
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: that in a few years all such regions will be teeming with deer, grouse
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and other game. Where there is one deer to-day there will be twenty ten
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: years hence,--because the law of Pennsylvania forbids the killing of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: does; and then there will be twenty times the legitimate hunting that
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: there is to-day. For example, the Clinton County Game Preserve of 3,200
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: acres is surrounded by 128,000 acres of forest reserve, which form
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: legitimate hunting grounds for the game bred in the sanctuary reservoir.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In Clearfield County the game sanctuary is surrounded by 47,000 acres of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Forest Reserve.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The _game_ preserves created in Pennsylvania up to date are as follows:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In Clinton County        3,200 acres
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In Clearfield County     3,200 acres
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In Franklin County       3,200 acres
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In Perry County          3,200 acres
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In Westmoreland County   2,500 acres
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: It is the deliberate intention of the Game Commission to increase these
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: game preserves until there is at least one in each county.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: It is the policy of the Commission to clear out of the game sanctuaries
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: all the mammals and birds that destroy wild life, such as foxes, mink,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: weasels, skunks and destructive hawks and owls. This is accomplished
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: partly by buying old horses, killing them in the preserves and poisoning
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: them thoroughly with strychnine.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Each preserve now contains a nucleus herd of white-tailed deer, some of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: them imported from northern Michigan. Ruffed grouse are breeding
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: rapidly, and in the Clearfield County Preserve there are said to be at
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: least three thousand. The Game Commission considers it a patriotic duty
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: to preserve the wild turkey, ruffed grouse and quail, rather than have
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: those species replaced at great expense by species imported from the old
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: world. In their work for the protection, preservation and increase of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the game of Pennsylvania--partly for the purpose of providing legitimate
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: hunting for the mechanic as well as the millionaire,--the State Game
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Commissioners are putting a great amount of thought and labor, and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: whenever their efforts are criticized, their motives impugned or their
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: honesty questioned by men who are not worthy to unlace their shoes, it
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: makes me tired and angry.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: NEW YORK:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: THE ADIRONDACK STATE PARK.--With wise and commendable forethought, the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: state of New York has preserved in the Adirondack wilderness, familiarly
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: known as "the North Woods," a magnificent forest domain forever
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: dedicated to campers, outdoorsmen and hunters. At present (1912) it
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: contains 2,031 square miles (1,300,000 acres) of forest-clad hills,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: valleys and mountains, adorned by countless lakes and streams. By some
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: persons it has been believed that in the State's forests the cutting and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: sale of large trees would be justifiable business, and agreeable to the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: public; but it has been demonstrated that this is not the case. The
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: people of the state firmly object to the havoc that is _unavoidably_
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: wrought by logging operations in beautiful forests. The state does not
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: yet need any of the money that could be derived from such operations.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The chief anxiety of the public is that hereafter forest fires shall be
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: prevented, no matter what fire protection may cost! The burning of coal
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: on any railway operated through the Adirondacks should be made a penal
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: offense.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: MONTANA:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In 1911 Governor Norris, Senator Cone and the legislature of Montana, at
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the solicitation of W.R. Felton, L.A. Huffman and others, created the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: SNOW CREEK GAME PRESERVE, fronting for ten miles on the Missouri River,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: in the northern side of Dawson County. It is a magnificent tract of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: bad-lands, very deeply eroded and carved, and highly picturesque. The
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: new state preserve contains 96 square miles, but there is so little
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: grazing ground for antelope and bison it is absolutely imperative that a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: narrow strip of level grass land should be added along the southern
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: border. This proposed addition is being fiercely resisted, by an
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: organized movement of the sheep owners of Montana (the National Wool
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Growers' Association), who naturally want the public domain for the free
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: grazing of their tariff-protected sheep-herds. It remains to be seen
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: whether the _three_ sheep men south of the preserve,--the only men who
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: really are affected,--will be able to thwart a movement that has for its
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: object the development of a very good game preserve for the benefit of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the ninety millions of the general American public. The range is
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: necessary to contain representatives of the big game of the plains that
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: has been so ruthlessly swept away, and particularly the vanishing
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: prong-horned antelope, once very numerous in that region.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In order to relieve the sheep men of all trouble on account of that
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: preserve, the area should be enlarged to the right dimensions and made a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: national preserve. A bill for that purpose (Senate 5,286) is now before
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the Senate, in Senator McLean's Committee, and _help is needed_ to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: overcome the active hostility of the sheep men, _who vow that it never
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: shall be passed_! All persons who read this are invited to take this
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: matter up with their Senators and Representatives, without a moment's
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: delay.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: WYOMING:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: THE TETON STATE PRESERVE.--One of the largest and most important state
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: game preserves thus far established by any of our states is that which
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: was created by Wyoming, in 1904. It is situated along the south of, and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: fully adjoining, the Yellowstone Park, and its area is 900 square miles
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: (576,000 acres). Its special purpose is to supplement for the elk herds
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and other big game the protection from killing that previously had been
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: found in the Yellowstone Park alone. The State Preserve is an admirable
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: half-way house for the migrating herds when they leave the National Park
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: to seek their regular winter ranges in and around the Jackson Valley.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: [Illustration: BIRD RESERVATIONS ON THE GULF COAST AND FLORIDA]
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In 1909, Wyoming established the Big Horn Game Preserve, in the mountain
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: range of that name. Into it 25 elk were taken from Jackson Hole, and set
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: free, in 1910, at the expense of the Sheridan County Sportsmen's Club.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: LOUISIANA:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Great developments for the preservation of wild life have recently been
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: witnessed in Louisiana, all due to the initiative and persistent
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: activities of two men, Edward A. McIlhenny, of Avery Island, La., and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Charles Willis Ward, of Michigan, lumberman and horticulturist.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: THE LOUISIANA STATE WILD FOWL REFUGE on Vermillion Bay, has an area of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 13,000 acres. It was presented to the state by Messrs. Ward and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: McIlhenny, and formally accepted and protected. It contains a great area
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of fresh-water ponds and marshy meadows, wherein grows an abundant
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: supply of food for wild fowl. It contains several miles of gravel beach,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: which during the winter season is visited by thousands of wild geese in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: quest of their indispensable supply of gravel. The ponds within its
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: borders furnish feeding-grounds for canvasback ducks, redhead, mallard,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: blackhead and various species of wild geese.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: CHAPTER XXXVII
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: GAME PRESERVES AND GAME LAWS IN CANADA
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: As now set forth on the map of North America, Canada is a vast country.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: We must no longer think of Ontario and Quebec as "Canada West" and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "Canada East," because the new assistant-nation owns and rules
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: everything from Labrador to British Columbia, and all the northern
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: mainland save Alaska.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Although the fauna of Canada is strictly boreal, it is sufficiently
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: dispersed and diversified to demand wise legislation, and plenty of it.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: For a nation with an outfit of provinces so new, Canada already is well
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: advanced in the matter of game laws and game preserves, and in some
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: respects she has set the pace for her southern neighbors. For example,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: in New Brunswick we see the lordly moose successfully hunted for sport,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: not only without being exterminated but actually on a basis that permits
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: it to increase in number. In Nova Scotia we see a law in force _which
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: successfully prohibits the waste of moose meat_, a loss that
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: characterizes moose hunting everywhere else throughout the range of that
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: animal. All over southern Canada the use of automatic shotguns in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: hunting is strictly prohibited.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: On the other hand, the laws of the Canadians are weak in not preventing
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the sale of all wild game and the killing of antelope. In the matter of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: game-selling, there are far too many open doors, and a sweeping reform
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: is very necessary.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Speaking generally, and with application from Labrador to British
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Columbia, the American process of game extermination according to law is
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: vigorously and successfully being pursued by the people of Canada. The
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: open seasons are too long, and the bag limits are too generous to the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: gunners. As it is elsewhere, the bag-limit laws on birds are a farce,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: because it is impossible to enforce them, save on every tenth man. For
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: example, in his admirable "Final Report of the Ontario Game and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Fisheries Commission" (1912), Commissioner Kelly Evans says:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "The prairie chicken, which formerly was comparatively plentiful
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: throughout the greater portion of the Rainy River District, has now
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: become practically extinct in that region. Various causes have been
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: assigned for this, but it would seem, as usual, to have been mainly the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: fault of indiscriminate and excessive slaughter." (Page 226.)
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Like the United States, the various portions of Canada have their
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: various local troubles in wild-life protection. I think the greatest
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: practical difficulties, and the most real opposition to adequate
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: measures, is found in the Provinces of Quebec and Ontario. Is it because
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the French-descended population is impatient of real restraint, and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: objects to measures that are drastic, even though they are necessary? In
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Ontario, Commissioner Evans has been splendidly supported by the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Government, and by all the real sportsmen of that province; but the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: gunners and guerrillas of destruction have successfully postponed
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: several of the reforms that he has advocated, and which should have been
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: carried into effect.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: So far as _public_ moral support for game protection is concerned I
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: think that the prairie and mountain provinces have the best of it. In
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Manitoba, Saskatchewan, Alberta, Athabasca and British Columbia, the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: spirit of the people is mainly correct, and the chief thing that seems
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: to be lacking is a Kelly Evans in each of those provinces to urge public
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: sentiment into strong action. For example, why should Alberta still
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: permit the hunting and killing of prong-horned antelope, when it is so
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: well known that that species is vanishing like a mist before the morning
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: sun? I think it is because no one seems to have risen up as G.O. Shields
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: did in the United States, to make a big fuss about it, and demand a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: reform. At any rate, all the provinces of Canada that still possess
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: antelope should _immediately pass laws giving that species absolute
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: close seasons for ten years_. Why neglect it longer, when such neglect
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: is now so very wrong? Whether this is done or not, I sincerely hope that
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: hereafter no true American sportsman, will be guilty of killing one of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the vanishing antelope of Canada, even though "the law doth give it."
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: THE GAME PRESERVES OF CANADA
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In the creation of National parks and game preserves, some of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: provinces of the Canadian nation have displayed a degree of foresight
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and enterprise that merits sincere admiration. While in different
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: provinces the exact status of these establishments may vary somewhat,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the main purpose of each is the same,--the preservation of the forests
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and the wild life. In all of them a regulated amount of fishing is
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: permitted, and in some the taking of fur-bearing animals is permitted;
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: but I believe in all the birds and furless mammals are strictly
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: protected. In some parks the carrying of firearms still is permitted,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: but that privilege is quite out of harmony with the spirit and purposes
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of a game preserve, and should be abolished. If it is necessary to carry
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: firearms through a preserve, as often happens in the Yellowstone Park,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: it can be done under seals that are affixed by duly appointed officers
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and thus will temptation be kept out of the way of sinners.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Up to this date I never have seen a publication which set forth in one
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: place even so much as an annotated list of the game preserves of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: various provinces of Canada, and at present exact information regarding
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: them is rather difficult to obtain. It seems that an adequate
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: governmental publication on this subject is now due, and overdue.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: ONTARIO.--"At the present time," says Commissioner Evans in his "Final
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Report," "the Algonquin National Park is the only actual game preserve
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: in the Province, being in fact a game reserve and not a forest reserve;
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: but in the past at least a measure of protection would seem to have been
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: afforded the game in most of the [forest] reserves, owing to the fact
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: that the carrying of firearms therein has been discouraged, and it would
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: appear to require but the passing of an Order-in-Council to render the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: carrying of firearms in all reserves illegal. It is sincerely to be
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: hoped that not only will such action be taken without delay, but also
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: that all the forest reserves will be declared game reserves in the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: strictest sense."
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: To this sentiment all friends of wild life will join a fervent wish for
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: its realization. As conditions are to-day, it is _impossible to have too
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: many game reserves_! There is everything to gain and nothing to lose by
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: making every national forest and forest reserve on the whole continent
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of North America a game preserve in the strictest sense, and we hope to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: live to see that end accomplished, both in the United States and Canada.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: _The Algonquin National Park_ is situated in the Parry Sound region,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: just above the Muskoka Lakes, and it has an area of 1,930 square miles.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: It is well stocked with moose, caribou, white-tailed deer, black bear
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and beaver. During the period of protection the beaver have increased so
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: greatly that about 1,000 were trapped last year for the market, by
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: officers of the government; and about 25 were sold to zoological gardens
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and parks, at $25 each.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: _The Quetico Forest Reserve_, area 1,560 square miles, was created as
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the Canadian complement of the Minnesota National Forest and Game
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Preserve. The two join on the international boundary, and each helps to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life
