txt: protect the other. Both are well stocked with moose, and will render
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: valuable service in the preservation of a mid-continental contingent of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: that species.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: ALBERTA.--In the making of game preserves the province of Alberta has
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: been splendidly progressive and liberal. The total result is fairly
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: beyond the reach of ordinary words of praise. It sets a pace that should
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: result in wide-spread benefits to the wild life of North America. In it
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: there is nothing faint-hearted. It should make some of our States think
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: seriously regarding their own shortcomings in this particular field of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: endeavor.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: ALBERTA'S NATIONAL PARKS
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Acres           Sq. miles
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Rocky Mountains Park             2,764,800           4,320
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Glacier Park                     1,474,560           2,304
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Buffalo Park                       384,000             600
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Elk Island Park                     40,000              62
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Jasper Park                      3,488,000           5,450
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Waterton Lakes Park                 34,560              54
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: _The Rocky Mountains Park_ is near Banff. The _Yoho_ and _Glacier Parks_
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: are near Field. The _Buffalo Park_ is near Wainwright, on the plains,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and it was created and fenced especially as a home for the herd of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: American bison that was purchased in Montana in 1909. It now contains
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 1,052 head of bison, 20 moose, 35 deer, 7 elk, and 6 antelope.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: _The Elk Island Park_ is near Fort Saskatchewan and Lamont, and at this
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: date (1912) it contains 53 bison, 28 elk, 30 deer and 5 moose. The bison
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: subsist entirely by grazing, and upon hay cut within the Park.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: _Jasper Park_, established in 1908, is on the Athabasca River and the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Grand Trunk Pacific Railway, near Strathcona. Sixty miles of the railway
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: line lie within the Park. Scenically, Jasper Park is a rival of Rocky
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Mountains Park, and undoubtedly possesses great attractions for
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: travellers who appreciate the beauties and grandeur of Nature as
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: expressed in mountains, valleys, lakes and streams.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: _Waterton Lakes Park_ is situated in the extreme southwestern corner of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Alberta, in the Rocky Mountains surrounding the Waterton Lakes. At
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: present it is nine miles long from north to south and six miles wide,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: with its southern end resting on the international boundary, and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: adjoining our Glacier Park. It is the home of a few bands of mountain
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: sheep that carry very large horns. Through the initiative of Frederick
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: K. Vreeland, the Camp-Fire Club of America two years ago represented to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the Government of Alberta the great desirability of enlarging this
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: preserve, toward the north and west, the better to protect the mountain
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: sheep and other big game of that region. The suggestion was received in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: a friendly spirit, and there is good reason to hope that at an early
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: date the enlargement will be made.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: BRITISH COLUMBIA.--This province has made an excellent beginning in the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: creation of game preserves. The first agitation on that subject was
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: begun in 1906, by two sportsmen whose names in connection with it have
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: long since been forgotten. On November 15, 1908, the Legislative Council
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of British Columbia issued a proclamation that created a very fine game
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: preserve in the East Kootenai District, between the Elk and Bull Rivers
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and northwestward thereof to the White River country. By an unfortunate
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: oversight, the new preserve never has been officially named, but we may
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: designate it here as
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: _The Elk River Game Preserve_.--This preserve has a total area of about
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 450 square miles, and includes a fine tract of mountains, valleys, lakes
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and streams. It contained in 1908 about 1,000 mountain goats, 200 sheep,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: a few elk and deer, and about 50 grizzly bears. All these have notably
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: increased during the period of absolute protection that they have
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: enjoyed. It is probable that this preserve contains more white mountain
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: goats than any other preserve that thus far has been made. It was in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: this region that Mr. John M. Phillips and Prof. Henry Fairfield Osborne
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: made the first mountain goat photographs ever made at close range. It is
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: to be hoped that the protection of this preserve, both as to its wild
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: life and its timber, will be made perpetual.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: _Frazer River Preserve_.--Next after the above there was created in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: British Columbia a game preserve covering a large portion of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: mountain territory that rises between the North and South Forks of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Fraser River. It is about 75 miles long by 30 miles wide and contains
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: about 2,250 square miles. Concerning its character and wild-life
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: population we have no details.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: _Yalakom Game Preserve_.--On the north side of Bridge River (a western
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: tributary of the Fraser), about twenty miles above Lilloet. there has
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: been established a game preserve having an area of about 215 square
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: miles.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: MANITOBA.--In the making of game preserves, Manitoba has made an
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: excellent beginning. It is good to see from Duck Mountain in the north
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: to Turtle Mountain in the south a chain of four liberal preserves, each
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: one protected in unmistakable terms as follows: "Carrying firearms,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: hunting or trapping strictly prohibited within this area."
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The lake regions of Manitoba, Saskatchewan and Alberta form what is
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: probably the most important wild-fowl breeding-ground in North America.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: To a great extent it rests with those provinces to say whether the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: central United States shall have any ducks and geese, or not! _It is
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: high time that an international treaty should be made between the United
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: States, Canada and Mexico for the federal protection of all migratory
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: birds_.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: These preserves are of course intended to conserve wild-fowl,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: shore-birds, grouse and all other birds, as well as big game. Thanks to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the cooperation of Mr. J.M. Macoun, of the Canadian Geological Survey, I
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: am able to offer the following:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: LIST OF MANITOBA'S GAME PRESERVES
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: DUCK MOUNTAIN PRESERVE   324 sq. miles, 207,360 acres.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: RIDING MOUNTAIN PRESERVE 360 "     "    230,000   "
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: SPRUCE WOODS PRESERVE     64 "     "     40,960   "
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: TURTLE MOUNTAIN PRESERVE 100 "     "     64,000   "
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Manitoba is to be congratulated on this record.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: QUEBEC.--This province has created two huge game preserves, well worthy
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of the fauna that they are intended to conserve when all hunting in them
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: is prohibited!
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: _The Laurentides National Park_ is second in area of all the national
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: parks of Canada, being surpassed only by the Rocky Mountains Park of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: British Columbia. Its area is 3565 square miles, or 2,281,600 acres. It
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: occupies the entire central portion of the great area surrounded by Lake
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: St. John, the Saguenay River, the wide portion of the St. Lawrence, and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the St. Maurice River on the west. Its southern boundary is in several
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: places only 16 miles from the St. Lawrence, while its most northern
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: angle is within 13 miles of Lake St. John. Its greatest width from east
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: to west is 71 miles, and its greatest length from north to south is 79
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: miles. It covers a huge watershed in which over a dozen large rivers and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: many small ones have their sources. It is indeed a forest primeval. The
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: rivers are well stocked with fish, and the big game includes moose,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: woodland caribou, black bear, lynx, beaver, marten, fisher, mink, fox,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and--sad to say--the gray wolf. The caribou live in rather small bands,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: from 10 up to 100.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Unfortunately, hunting under license is permitted in the Laurentian
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: National Park, and therefore it is by no means a _real_ game preserve!
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: It is a near-preserve.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: _The Gaspesian Forest, Fish and Game Preserve_, created in 1906, is in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "the Gaspe country," and it has an area of 2500 square miles situated in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the eastern Quebec counties of Gaspe and Matane.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: _The Connaught National Park_, to be named in honor of H.R.H. the Duke
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of Connaught, has been proposed by Mr. J.M. Macoun, of the Canadian
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Geological Survey. The general location chosen is the mountains and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: forested territory north of Ottawa and the Ottawa River, within easy
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: access from the Canadian capitol. On the map the location recommended
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: lies between the Gatineau River on the east and Wolf Lake on the west.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The proposal is meeting with much popular favor, and it is extremely
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: probable that it will be carried into effect at an early date.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: LABRADOR.--During the past two years Lieut.-Col. William Wood has
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: strongly advocated the making of game preserves in Labrador, that will
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: not only tend to preserve the scanty fauna of that region from
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: extinction but will also aid in bringing it back. While Col. Wood's very
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: energetic and praiseworthy campaign has not yet been crowned with
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: success, undoubtedly it will be successful in the near future, because
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: ultimately such causes always win their objects, provided they are
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: prosecuted with the firm and unflagging persistence which has
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: characterized this particular campaign. We congratulate Col. Wood on the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: success that he _will achieve_ in the near future!
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: GAME LAWS OF THE CANADIAN PROVINCES
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: ALBERTA.--The worst feature of the Alberta laws is the annual open
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: season on antelope, two of which may be killed under each license. This
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: is _entirely wrong_, and a perpetual close season should at once be
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: enacted. Duck shooting in August is wrong, and the season should not
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: open until September. It is not right that duck-killing should be made
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: so easy and so fearfully prolonged that extermination is certain. _All
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: killing of cranes and shore birds should be absolutely stopped, for five
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: years_. No wheat-producing province can afford the expense to the wheat
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: crops of the slaughter of shore birds, _thirty species_ of which are
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: great crop-protectors.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The bag limit of two sheep is too high, by 50 per cent. It should
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: immediately be cut down to one sheep, before sheep hunting in Alberta
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: becomes a lost art. _Sheep hunting should not be encouraged_--quite the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: reverse! There are already too many sheep-crazy sportsmen. The bag limit
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: on grouse and ptarmigan of 20 per day or 200 in a season is simply
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: legalized slaughter, no more and no less, and if it is continued, a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: grouseless province will be the quick result. The birds are not
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: sufficiently numerous to withstand the guns on that basis. Alberta
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: should be wiser than the states below the international boundary that
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: are annihilating their remnants of birds as fast as they can be found.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: BRITISH COLUMBIA.--We note with much satisfaction that the Provincial
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Game Warden, Mr. A. Bryan Williams, has been allowed $37,000 for the pay
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of game wardens, and $28,000 for the destruction of wolves, coyotes,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: pumas and other game-destroying animals. During the past two years the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: following game-destroyers were killed, and bounties were paid upon them:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Wolves               655   518
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Coyotes            1,464 3,653
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Cougars              382   277
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Horned Owls          854 2,285
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Golden Eagles         29    73
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "Now," says Warden Williams in his excellent annual report for 1911, "in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: these two years a total of 2,896 wolves and cougars and 5,141 coyotes
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: were destroyed, as well as a number of others poisoned and not recovered
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: for the bounty. Allowing fifty head for each wolf and cougar and ten for
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: each coyote, by their bounties alone 196,210 head of game and domestic
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: animals were saved. Is it any wonder that deer are increasing almost
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: everywhere?"
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The great horned owl has been and still is a great scourge to the upland
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: game birds, partly because when game is abundant "they become
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: fastidious, and eat only the brains of their prey." The destruction of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 3,139 of them on the Lower Mainland during the last two years has made
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: these owls sing very small, and says the warden, "Is it any wonder that
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: grouse are again increasing?"
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: I have discussed with the Provincial Game Warden the advisability of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: putting a limit of one on the grizzly bear, but Mr. Williams advances
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: good reasons for the opinion that it would be impracticable to do so at
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: present. I am quite sure, however, that the time has already arrived
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: when a limit of one is necessary. During the present year three of my
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: friends who went hunting in British Columbia, _each killed 3 grizzly
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: bears!_ Hereafter I will "locate" no more bear hunters in that country
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: until the bag limit is reduced to one grizzly per year. Since 1905 the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: trapping of bears south of the main line of the Canadian Pacific Railway
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: has been stopped; and an excellent move too. A Rocky Mountain without a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: grizzly bear is like a tissue-paper rose.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The bag limit on the big game of British Columbia is at least twice too
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: liberal,--five deer, two elk, two moose (one in Kootenay County), three
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: caribou and three goats. There is no necessity for such wasteful
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: liberality. Few sportsmen go to British Columbia for the sake of a large
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: lot of animals. I know many men who have been there to hunt, and the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: great majority cared more for the scenery and the wild romance of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: camping out in ground mountains than for blood and trophies.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: MANITOBA.--What are we to think of a "bag limit" of fifty ducks per day
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: in October and November? A "limit" indeed! Evidently, Manitoba is tired
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of having ducks, ruffed grouse, pinnated and other grouse pestering her
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: farmers and laborers. While assuming to fix bag limits that will be of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: some benefit to those species, the limit is distinctly off, and nothing
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: short of a quick and drastic reform will save a remnant that will remain
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: visible to the naked eye.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: NEW BRUNSWICK.--This is the banner province in the protection of moose,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: caribou and deer, even while permitting them to be shot for sport. Of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: course, only males are killed, and I am assured by competent judges that
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: thus far the killing of the finest and largest male moose has had no bad
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: effect upon the stature or antlers of the species as a whole.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: NOVA SCOTIA.--If there is anything wrong with the game laws of Nova
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Scotia, it lies in the wide-open sale of moose meat and all kinds of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: feathered game during the open season. If that province were more
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: heavily populated, it would mean a great destruction of game. Even with
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: conditions as they are, the sale permitted is entirely wrong, and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: against the best interests of 97 per cent of the people.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: As previously mentioned, the law against the waste of moose meat is both
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: novel and admirable. The saving of any considerable portion of the flesh
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of a full-grown bull moose, along with its head, is a large order; but
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: it is right. The degree of accountability to which guides are held for
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the doings of the men whom they pilot into the woods is entirely
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: commendable, and worthy of imitation. If a sportsman or gunner does the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: wrong thing, the guide loses his license.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: SASKATCHEWAN.--This is another of the too-liberal provinces having no
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: real surplus of big game with which to sustain for any length of time an
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: excess of generosity. I am told that in this province there is now a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: great deal of open country around each wild animal. And yet, it
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: cheerfully offers two moose, two elk, two caribou and two _antelope_ per
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: season to each licensed gunner or sportsman. The limit is too generous
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: by half. Why throw away an extra $250 worth of game with each license?
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: That is precisely what the people of Saskatchewan are doing to-day.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: And that antelope-killing! It should be stopped at once, and for ten
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: years.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: YUKON.--This province permits the sale of all the finest and best wild
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: game within its borders,--moose, elk, caribou, _bison_, musk-ox, sheep
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and goats! The flesh of all these may be sold during the open season,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and for sixty days thereafter. Of the species named above, the barren
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: ground caribou is the only one regarding which we need not worry;
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: because that species still exists in millions. The Osborn caribou
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: (_Rangifer osborni_), can be exterminated in our own times, because it is
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: nowhere really numerous, and it inhabits exposed situations.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: CHAPTER XXXVIII
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: PRIVATE GAME PRESERVES
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Primarily, in the early days of the Man-on-Horseback, the self-elected
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and predatory lords of creation evolved the private game preserve as a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: scheme for preventing other fellows from shooting, and for keeping the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: game sacred to slaughter by themselves. The idea of conserving the game
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: was a fourth-rate consideration, the first being the estoppel of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: other man. The old-world owner of a game preserve delights in the annual
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: killing of the surplus game, and we have even heard it whispered that in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the Dark Ages there were kings who enjoyed the wholesale slaughter of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: deer, wild boar, pheasants and grouse. If we may accept as true the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: history of sport in Europe, there have been men who have loved slaughter
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: with a genuine blood-lust that is quite foreign to the real
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: nature-loving sportsman.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In America, the impulse is different. Here, there is raging a genuine
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: fever for private game preserves. Some of those already existing are of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: fine proportions, and cost fortunes to create. Every true sportsman who
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: is rich enough to own a private game preserve, sooner or later acquires
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: one. You will find them scattered throughout the temperate zone of North
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: America from the Bay of Fundy to San Diego. I have had invitations to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: visit preserves in an unbroken chain from the farthest corner of Quebec
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: to the Pacific Coast, and from Grand Island, Lake Superior to the Gulf
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of Mexico. It was not necessarily to hunt, and kill something, but to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: _see_ the game, and the beauties of nature.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The wealthy American and Canadian joyously buys a tract of wilderness,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: fences it, stocks it with game both great and small, and provides game
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: keepers for all the year round. At first he has an idea that he will
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "hunt" therein, and that his guests will hunt also, and actually kill
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: game. In a mild way, this fiction sometimes is maintained for years. The
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: owner may each year shoot two or three head of his surplus big game, and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: his tenderfoot guests who don't know what real hunting is may also kill
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: something, each year. But in most of the American preserves with which I
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: am well acquainted, the gentlemanly "sport" of "hunting big game" is
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: almost a joke. The trouble is, usually, the owner becomes so attached to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: his big game, and admires it so sincerely, he has not the heart to kill
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: it himself; and he finds no joy whatever in seeing it shot down by
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: others!
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In this country the slaughter of game for the market is not considered a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: gentlemanly pastime, even though there is a surplus of preserve-bred
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: game that must be reduced. To the average American, the slaughter of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: half-tame elk, deer and birds that have been bred in a preserve does not
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: appeal in the least. He knows that in the protection of a preserve, the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: wild creatures lose much of their fear of man, and become easy marks;
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and shall a real sportsman go out with a gun and a bushel of cartridges,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: on a pony, and without warning betray the confidence of the wild in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: terms of fire and blood? Others may do it if they like; but as a rule
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: that is not what an American calls "sport." One wide-awake and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: well-armed grizzly bear or mountain sheep outwitted on a mountain-side
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: is worth more as a sporting proposition than a quarter of a mile of deer
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: carcasses laid out side by side on a nice park lawn to be photographed
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: as "one day's kill."
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In America, the shooting of driven game is something of which we know
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: little save by hearsay. In Europe, it is practiced on everything from
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Scotch grouse to Italian ibex. The German Crown Prince, in his
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: fascinating little volume "From My Hunting Day-Book," very neatly fixes
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the value of such shooting, as a real sportsman's proposition, in the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: following sentence:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "The shooting of driven game is merely a question of marksmanship, and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: is after all more in the nature of a shooting exercise than sport."
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: I have seen some shooting in preserves that was too tame to be called
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: sport; but on the other hand I can testify that in grouse shooting as it
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: is done behind the dogs on Mr. Carnegie's moor at Skibo, it is sport in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: which the hunter earns every grouse that falls to his gun. At the same
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: time, also, I believe that the shooting of madly running ibex, as it is
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: done by the King of Italy in his three mountain preserves, is
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: sufficiently difficult to put the best big-game hunter to the test.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: There are times when shooting driven game calls for far more dexterity
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: with the rifle than is ordinarily demanded in the still-hunt.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In America, as in England and on the Continent of Europe, private game
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: preserves are so numerous it is impossible to mention more than a very
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: few of them, unless one devotes a volume to the subject. Probably there
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: are more than five hundred, and no list of them is "up to date" for more
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: than one day, because the number is constantly increasing. I make no
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: pretense even of possessing a list of those in America, and I mention
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: only a few of those with which I am best acquainted, by way of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: illustration.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: One of the earliest and the most celebrated deer parks of the United
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: States was that of Hon. John Dean Caton, of two hundred acres, located
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: near Ottawa, Ill., established about 1859. It was the experiments and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: observations made in that park that yielded Judge Caton's justly famous
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: book on "The Antelope and Deer of America."
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The first game preserve established by an incorporated club was
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "Blooming Grove Park," of one thousand acres, in Pennsylvania, where
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: great success has been attained in the breeding and rearing of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: white-tailed deer.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In the eastern United States the most widely-known game preserve is Blue
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Mountain Forest Park, near Newport, New Hampshire. It was founded in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 1885, by the late Austin Corbin, and has been loyally and diligently
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: maintained by Austin Corbin, Jr., George S. Edgell and the other members
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of the Corbin family. Ownership is vested in the Blue Mountain Forest
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Association. The area of the preserve is 27,000 acres, and besides
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: embracing much fine forest on Croydon Mountain, it also contains many
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: converted farms whose meadow lands afford good grazing.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: This preserve contains a large herd of bison (86 head), elk,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: white-tailed deer, wild boar and much smaller game. The annual surplus
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of bison and other large game is regularly sold and distributed
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: throughout the world for the stocking of other parks and zoological
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: gardens. Each year a few surplus deer are quietly killed for the Boston
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: market, but a far greater number are sold alive, at from $25 to $30 each
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: in carload lots.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In the Adirondacks of northern New York, there are a great many private
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: game preserves. Dr. T.S. Palmer, in his pamphlet on "Private Game
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Preserves" (Department of Agriculture) places the number at 60, and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: their total area at 791,208 acres. Some of them have caused much
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: irritation among some of the hunting, fishing and trapping residents of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the Adirondack region. They seem to resent the idea of the exclusive
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: ownership of lands that are good hunting-grounds. This view of property
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: rights has caused much trouble and some bloodshed, two persons having
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: been killed for presuming to assert exclusive rights in large tracts of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: wilderness property.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "In the upland preserve under private ownership." says Dr. Palmer, "may
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: be found one of the most important factors in the maintenance of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: future supply of game and game birds. Nearly all such preserves are
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: maintained for the propagation of deer, quail, grouse, or pheasants.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: They vary widely in area, character, and purpose, and embrace some of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the largest game refuges in the country. Some of the preserves in North
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Carolina cover from 15,000 to 30,000 acres; several in South Carolina
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: exceed 60,000 acres in extent." The Megantic Club's northern preserve,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: on the boundary between Quebec and Maine, embraces nearly 200 square
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: miles, or upward of 125,000 acres.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Comparatively few of the larger preserves are enclosed, and on such
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: grounds, hunting becomes sport quite as genuine as it is in regions open
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: to free hunting. In some instances part of the tract is fenced, while
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: large unenclosed areas are protected by being posted. The character of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: their tenure varies also. Some are owned in fee simple; others,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: particularly the larger ones, are leased, or else comprise merely the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: shooting rights on the land. In both size and tenure, the upland
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: preserves of the United States are comparable with the grouse moors and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: large deer forests of Scotland.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Of the game preserves in the South, I know one that is quite ideal. It
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: is St. Vincent Island, near Apalachicola, Florida, in the northern edge
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of the Gulf of Mexico. It was purchased in 1909 by Dr. Ray V. Pierce,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and his guests kill perhaps one hundred ducks each year out of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: thousands that flock to the ten big ponds that occupy the eastern third
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of the island. Into those ponds much good duck food has been
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: introduced,--_Potamogeton pectinatus_ and _perfoliatus_. The area of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the island is twenty square miles. Besides being a great winter resort
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: for ducks, its sandy, pine-covered ridges and jungles of palms to and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: live oak afford fine haunts and feeding grounds for deer. Those jungles
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: contain two species of white-tailed deer (_Odocoileus louisiana_ and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: _osceola_), and Dr. Pierce has introduced the Indian sambar deer and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Japanese sika deer _(Cervus sika_), both of which are doing well. We are
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: watching the progress of those big sambar deer with very keen interest,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and it is to be recorded that already that species has crossed with the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Louisiana white-tailed deer.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: [Illustration: MAP OF MARSH ISLAND AND ADJACENT WILD-FOWL PRESERVES]
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: During the autumn of 1912, public attention in the United States was for
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: a time focused on the purchase of Marsh Island, Louisiana, by Mrs.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Russell Sage, and its permanent dedication to the cause of wild-life
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: protection. This delightful event has brought into notice the Louisiana
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: State Game Preserve of 13,000 acres near Marsh Island, and its
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: hinterland (and water) of 11,000 acres adjoining, which constitutes the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Ward-McIlhenny Wild Fowl Preserve. These three great preserves taken
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: together as they lie form a wild-fowl sanctuary of great size, and of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: great value to the whole Mississippi Valley. Now that all duck-shooting
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: therein has been stopped, it is safe to predict that they shortly will
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: be inhabited by a wild-fowl population that will really stagger the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: imagination.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: DUCK-SHOOTING "PRESERVES."--A ducking "preserve" is a large tract of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: land and water owned by a few individuals, or a club, for the purpose of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: preserving exclusively for themselves and their friends the best
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: possible opportunities for killing large numbers of ducks and geese
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: without interference. In no sense whatever are they intended to preserve
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: or increase the supply of wild fowl. The real object of their existence
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: is duck and goose slaughter. For example, the worst goose-slaughter
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: story on record comes to us from the grounds of the Glenn County Club in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: California, whereon, as stated elsewhere, two men armed with automatic
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: shotguns killed 218 geese in one hour, and bagged a total of 452 in one
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: day.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: I shall not attempt to give any list of the so-called ducking
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "preserves." The word "preserve," when applied to them, is a misnomer.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Thirteen states have these incorporated slaughtering-grounds for ducks
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and geese, the greatest number being in California, Illinois, North
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Carolina and Virginia. California has carried the ducking-club idea to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the limit where it is claimed that it constitutes an abuse. Dr. Palmer
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: says that one or two of the club preserves on the western side of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: San Joaquin Valley contain upward of _40 square miles, or 25,000 acres
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: each_! With considerable asperity it is now publicly charged (in the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: columns of _The Examiner_ of San Francisco) that for the unattached
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: sportsmen there is no longer any duck-shooting to be had in California,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: because all the good ducking-grounds are owned and exclusively
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: controlled by clubs. In many states the private game preserves are a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: source of great irritation, and many have been attacked in courts of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: law.[N]
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: [Footnote N: "Private Game Preserves and their Future in the United
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: States," by T.S. Palmer, United States Department of Agriculture, 1910.]
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: But I am not sorrowing over the woes of the unattached duck-hunter, or
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: in the least inclined to champion his cause against the ducking-club
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: member. As slaughterers and exterminators of wild-fowl, rarely
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: exercising mercy under ridiculous bag-limits, they have both been too
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: heedless of the future, and one is just as bad for the game as the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: other. If either of them favored the game, I would be on his side; but I
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: see no difference between them. They both kill right up to the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: bag-limit, as often as they can; and that is what is sweeping away all
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: our feathered game.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Curiously enough, the angry unattached duck-hunters of California are
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: to-day proposing to have revenge on the duck-clubbers by _removing all
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: restrictions on the sale of game_! This is on the theory that the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: duckless sportsmen of the State of California would like to _buy_ dead
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: ducks and geese for their tables! It is a novel and original theory, but
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the sane people of California never will enact it into law. It would be
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: a step just _twenty years backward_!
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: THE PUBLIC vs. THE PRIVATE GAME PRESERVE.--Both the executive and the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: judiciary branches of our state governments will in the future be called
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: upon with increasing frequency to sit in judgment on this case.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Conditions about us are rapidly changing. The precepts of yesterday may
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: be out of date and worthless tomorrow. By way of introspection, let us
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: see what principles of equity toward Man and Nature we would lay down as
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the basis of our action if we were called to the bench. Named in logical
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: sequence they would be about as follows:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 1. Any private game "preserve" that is maintained chiefly as a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: slaughter-ground for wild game, either birds or mammals, may become
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: detrimental to the interests of the people at large.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: [Illustration: EGRETS AND HERONS IN SANCTUARY ON MARSH ISLAND]
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 2. It is not necessarily the duty of any state to provide for the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: maintenance of private death-traps for the wholesale slaughter of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: _migratory_ game.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 3. An oppressive monopoly in the slaughter of migratory game is
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: detrimental to the interests of the public at large, the same as any
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: other monopoly.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 4. Every de facto game preserve, maintained for the preservation of wild
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: life rather than for its slaughter, is an institution beneficial to the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: public at large, and therefore entitled to legal rights and privileges
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: above and beyond all which may rightly be accorded to the so-called
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "preserves" that are maintained as killing-grounds.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 5. The law may justly discriminate between the actual game preserve and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the mere killing-ground.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 6. Whenever a killing-ground becomes a public burden, it may be abated,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the same as any other public infliction.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In private game preserves the time has arrived when lawmakers and judges
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: must begin to apply the blood-test, and separate the true from the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: false. And at every step, _the welfare of the wild life involved_ must
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: be given full consideration. No men, nor body of men, should be
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: permitted to practice methods that spell extermination.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: CHAPTER XXXIX
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: BRITISH GAME PRESERVES IN AFRICA AND AUSTRALIA
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: This brief chapter is offered as an object-lesson to the world at large.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In the early days of America, the founders of our states and territories
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: gave little heed, or none at all, to the preservation of wild life. Even
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: if they thought of that duty, undoubtedly they felt that the game would
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: always last, and that they had no time for such sentimental side issues
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: as the making of game preserves. They were coping with troubles and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: perplexities of many kinds, and it is not to be wondered at that up to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: forty years ago, real game protection in America went chiefly by
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: default.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In South Africa, precisely the same conditions have prevailed until
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: recent times. The early colonists were kept so busy shooting lions and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: making farms that not one game preserve was made. If any men can be
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: excused from the work and worry of preserving game, and making
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: preserves, it is those who spend their lives pioneering and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: state-building in countries like Africa. Men who continually have to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: contend with disease, bad food, rains, insect pests, dangerous wild
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: beasts and native cussedness may well claim that they have troubles
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: enough, without going far into campaigns to preserve wild animals in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: countries where animals are plentiful and cheap. It is for this reason
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: that the people of Alaska can not be relied upon to preserve the Alaskan
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: game. They are busy with other things that are of more importance to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: them.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In May, 1900, representatives of the great powers owning territory in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Africa held a conference in the interests of the wild-animal life of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: that continent. As a result a Convention was signed by which those
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: powers bound themselves "to make provision for the prevention of further
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: undue destruction of wild game." The principles laid down for universal
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: observance were as follows:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 1. Sparing of females and immature animals.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 2. The establishment of close seasons and game sanctuaries.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 3. Absolute protection of rare species.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 4. Restrictions on export for trading purposes of skins, horns,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: tusks, etc.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 5. Prohibition of the use of pits, snares and game traps.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The brave and hardy men who are making for the British people a grand
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: empire in Africa probably are greater men than far-distant people
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: realize. To them, the white man's burden of game preservation is
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: accepted as all in the day's work. A mere handful of British civil
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: officers, strongly aided by the Society for the Preservation of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Fauna of the British Empire, have carved out and set aside a great chain
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of game preserves reaching all the way from Swaziland and the Transvaal
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: to Khartoum. Taken either collectively or separately, it represents
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: grand work, characteristic of the greatest colonizers on earth. Those
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: preserves are worthy stones in the foundation of what one day will be a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: great British empire in Africa. The names of the men who proposed them
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and wrought them out should, in some way, be imperishably connected with
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: them as their founders, as the least reward that Posterity can bestow.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In Major J. Stevenson-Hamilton's fine work, "Animal Life in Africa,"[O]
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the author has been at much pains to publish an excellent series of maps
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: showing the locations of the various British game preserves in Africa,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and the map published herewith has been based chiefly on that work. It
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: is indeed fortunate for the wild life of Africa that it has today so
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: powerful a champion and exponent as this author, the warden of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Transvaal Game Preserves.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: [Footnote O: Published by Heinemann, London, 1912.]
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Events move so rapidly that up to this date no one, so far as I am
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: aware, has paused long enough to make and publish an annotated list of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the African game preserves. Herein I have attempted to _begin_ that task
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: myself, and I regret that at this distance it is impossible for me to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: set down under the several titles the names of the men who made these
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: preserves possible, and actually founded them.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: To thoughtful Americans I particularly commend this list as a showing of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the work of men who have not waited until the game had been _practically
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: exterminated_ before creating sanctuaries in which to preserve it. In
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: view of these results, how trivial and small of soul seems the mercenary
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: efforts of the organized wool-growers of Montana to thwart our plan to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: secure a paltry fifteen square miles of grass lands for the rugged and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: arid Snow Creek Antelope Preserve that is intended to help save a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: valuable species from quick extermination.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: At this point I must quote the views of a high authority on the status
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of wild life and game preserves in Africa. The following is from Major
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Stevenson-Hamilton's book.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "It is a remarkable phenomenon in human affairs how seldom the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: experience of others seems to turn the scale of action. There are, I
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: take it, very few farmers, in the Cape Colony, the Orange Free State, or
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the Transvaal, who would not be glad to see an adequate supply of game
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: upon their land. Indeed, the writer is constantly dealing with
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: applications as to the possibility of reintroducing various species from
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the game reserves to private farms, and only the question of expense and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the difficulty of transport have, up to the present, prevented this
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: being done on a considerable scale. When, therefore, the relatively
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: small populations of such protectorates as are still well stocked with
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: game are heard airily discussing the advisability of getting rid of it
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: as quickly as possible, one realizes how often vain are the teachings of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: history, and how well-nigh hopeless it is to quote the result of similar
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: action elsewhere. It remains only to trust that things may be seen in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: truer perspective ere it is too late, and that those in whose temporary
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: charge it is may not cast recklessly away one of nature's most splendid
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: assets, one, moreover, which once lightly discarded, can never by any
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: possibility, be regained.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: [Illustration: THE MOST IMPORTANT GAME PRESERVES OF AFRICA
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The Numbers Refer to Corresponding Numbers in the Text]
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "It is idle to say that the advance of civilization must necessarily
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: mean the total disappearance of all wild animals. This is one of those
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: glib fallacies which flows only too readily from unthinking lips.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Civilization in its full sense--not the advent of a few scattered
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: pioneers--of course, implies their restriction, especially as regards
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: purely grass-feeding species, within certain definite bounds, both as
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: regards numbers and sanctuaries. But this is a very different thing from
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: wholesale destruction, that a few more or less deserving individuals may
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: receive some small pecuniary benefit, or gratify their taste for
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: slaughter to the detriment of everyone else who may come after. _The
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: fauna of an empire is the property of that empire as a whole, and not of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the small portion of it where the animals may happen to exist; and while
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: full justice and encouragement must be given to the farmer and pioneer,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: neither should be permitted to entirely demolish for his own advantage
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: resources which, strictly speaking, are not his own_."--("Animal Life in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Africa." p. 24.)
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: AFRICAN GAME PRESERVES
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: BRITISH EAST AFRICA:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 1.[P] _The Athi Plains Preserve_.--This is situated between the Uganda
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Railway and the boundary of German East Africa. Its northern boundary is
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: one mile north of the railway track. It is about 215 miles long east and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: west by 105 miles from north to south, and its area is about 13,000
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: square miles. It is truly a great preserve, and worthy of the plains
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: fauna that it is specially intended to perpetuate.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: [Footnote P: These numbers refer to corresponding numbers on the map of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Africa.]
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 2. _The Jubaland Preserve_.--This preserve lies northwest of Mount
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Kenia. Its southwestern corner is near Lake Baringo, the Laikipia
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Escarpment is its western boundary up to Mt. Nyiro, and from that point
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: its northern boundary runs 225 miles to Marsabit Lake. From that point
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the boundary runs south-by-west to the Guaso Nyiro River, which forms
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the eastern half of the southern boundary. Its total area appears to be
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: about 13,000 square miles.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In addition to the two great preserves described above the government of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: British East Africa has established on the Uasin Gishu Plateau a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: centrally located sanctuary for elands, roan antelopes and hippopotamii.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: There is also a small special rhinoceros preserve about fifty miles
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: southeastward of Nairobi, around Kiu station, on the railway.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: EGYPTIAN SUDAN:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 3. A great nameless sanctuary for wild life exists on the eastern bank
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of the Nile, comprising the whole territory between the main stream, the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Blue Nile and Abyssinia. Its length (north and south) is 215 miles, and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: its width is about 125 miles; which means a total area of about 26,875
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: square miles. Natives and others living within this sanctuary may hunt
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: therein--if they can procure licenses.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: SOMALILAND:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 4. _Hargeis Reserve_, about 1,800 square miles.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 5. _Mirso Reserve_, about 300 square miles.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: UGANDA:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 6. _Budonga Forest Reserve_.--This small reserve embraces the whole
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: eastern shore and hinterland of Lake Albert Nyanza, and is shaped like a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: new moon.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 7. _Toro Reserve_.--This small reserve lies between Lakes Albert Nyanza
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and Albert Edward Nyanza, touching both.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: NYASALAND, OR THE BRITISH CENTRAL AFRICA PROTECTORATE.--A small
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: territory, but remarkably well stocked with game.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 8. _Elephant Marsh Preserve_.--A small area in the extreme southern end
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of the Protectorate, on both sides of the Shire River, chiefly for
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: buffalo.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 9. _Angoniland Reserve_.--This was created especially to preserve about
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: one thousand elephants. It is forty miles west of the southwestern arm
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of Lake Nyasa.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: TRANSVAAL:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 10. _Sabi-Singwitza-Pongola Preserve_.--This great preserve occupies the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: whole region between the Drakenberg Mountains and the Lebombo Hills. Its
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: total area is about 10,500 square miles. It lies in a compact block
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: about 210 miles long by 50 miles wide, along the Portuguese border.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 11. _Rustenburg Reserve_.--This is situated at the head of the Limpopo
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: River, and covers about 3,500 square miles.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: SWAZILAND:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 12. _The Swaziland Reserve_ contains about 1,750 square miles, and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: occupies the southwestern corner of Swaziland.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: RHODESIA:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 13. _The Nweru Marsh Game Reserve_ is in northwestern Rhodesia,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: bordering the Congo Free State. The description of its local boundaries
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: is quite unintelligible outside of Rhodesia.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: _Luangwa Reserve_.--The locality of this reserve cannot be determined
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: from the official description, which gives no clue to its shape or size.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: GAME PRESERVES IN AUSTRALASIA
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: NEW ZEALAND:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: _Little Barrier Island_ in the north, and _Resolution Island_, in the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: south; and concerning both, details are lacking.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: AUSTRALIA:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: _Kangaroo Island_, near Adelaide, South Australia, is 400 miles
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: northwest of Melbourne. Of the total area of this rather large island of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 300 square miles, 140 square miles have been set aside as a game
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: preserve, chiefly for the preservation of the mallee bird (_Lipoa
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: occelata_). It is believed that eventually the whole island will become
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: a wild-life sanctuary, and it would seem that this can not be
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: consummated a day too soon for the vanishing wild life.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: _Wilson's Promontory_. Adelaide, is a peninsula well suited to the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: preservation of wild life, especially birds, and it is now a sanctuary.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Many private bird refuges have been created in Australia.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: TASMANIA:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: _Eleven Bird Refuges_ have been created, with a total area of 26,000
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: acres,--an excellent record for Tasmania!
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: _Freycinet's Peninsula_.--At present this wild-life sanctuary is not
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: adequately protected from illicit hunting and trapping; but its full
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: protection is now demanded, and no doubt this soon will be provided by
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the government. I am informed that this offers a golden opportunity to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: secure a fine wild-life sanctuary at ridiculously small cost to the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: public. The whole world is interested in the preservation of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: remarkable fauna of Tasmania. The extermination of the thylacine would
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: be a zoological calamity; but it is impending.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: CHAPTER XL
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: BREEDING GAME AND FUR IN CAPTIVITY
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: GAME BREEDING.--The breeding of game in captivity for sale in the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: markets of the world is just as legitimate as the breeding of domestic
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: species. This applies equally to mammals, birds, reptiles and fishes. It
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: is the duty of the nation and the state to foster such industries and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: facilitate the marketing of their products without any unnecessary
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: formalities, delays or losses to producers or to purchasers.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Already this principle has been established in several states. Without
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: going into the records, it is safe to say that Colorado was the pioneer
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: in the so-called "more-game" movement, about 1899; but there is one
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: person who would like to have the world believe that it started in the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: state of New York, about 1909. The idea is not quite as "old as the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: hills," but the application of it in the United States dates back
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: through a considerable vista of years.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The laws of Colorado providing for the creation of private game
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: preserves and the marketing of their product under a tagging system, are
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: very elaborate, and they show a sincere desire to foster an industry as
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: yet but slightly developed in this country. The laws of New York are
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: much more simple and easy to understand than those of Colorado.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: There is one important principle now fully recognized in the New York
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: laws for game breeding that other states will do well to adopt. It is
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the fact that certain kinds of wild game _can not be bred and reared in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: captivity on a commercial basis_; and this being true, it is clearly
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: against public policy to provide for the sale of any such species. Why
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: provide for the sale of preserve-bred grouse and ducks which we know can
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: not be bred and reared in confinement in marketable numbers? For
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: example, if we may judge by the numerous experiments that _thus far_
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: have been made,--as we certainly have a right to do,--no man can
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: successfully breed and rear in captivity, on a commercial basis, the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: canvasback duck, teal, pintail duck, ruffed grouse or quail. This being
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the case, no amount of clamor from game dealers and their allies ever
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: should induce any state legislature to provide for the sale of any of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: those species _until it has been fully demonstrated_ that they _have
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: been_ and _can be_ bred in captivity in large numbers. The moment the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: markets of a state are thrown open to these impossible species, from
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: that moment the state game wardens must make a continuous struggle to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: prevent the importation and sale of those birds contrary to law. This
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: proposition is so simple that every honest man can see it.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: All that any state legislature may rightfully be asked to do is to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: provide for the sale, under tags, of those species which _we know_ can
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: be bred in captivity in large numbers.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: When the Bayne law was drafted, its authors considered with the utmost
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: care the possibilities in the breeding of game in the United States on a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: commercial basis. It was found that as yet only two wild native species
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: have been, and can be, reared in captivity on a large scale. These are
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the white-tailed deer and mallard duck. Of foreign species we can breed
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: successfully for market the fallow deer, red deer of Europe and some of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the pheasants of the old world. For the rearing, killing and marketing
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of all these, the Bayne law provides the simplest processes of state
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: supervision that the best game protectors and game breeders of New York
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: could devise. The tagging system is expeditious, cheap and effective.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Practically the only real concession that is required of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: game-breeder concerns the killing, which must be done in a systematic
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: way, whereby a state game warden can visit the breeder's premises and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: affix the tags without any serious sacrifice of time or convenience on
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: either side. The tags cost the breeder five cents each, and they pay the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: cost of the services rendered by the state.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: By this admirable system, which is very plainly set forth in the New
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: York Conservation Commission's book of game laws, all the _wild_ game of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: New York, _and of every other state_, is absolutely protected at all
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: times against illegal killing and illegal importation for the New York
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: market. Now, is it not the duty of Connecticut, Maryland, Virginia, the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Carolinas and every other state to return our compliment by passing
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: similar laws? Massachusetts came up to public expectations at the next
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: session of her legislature after the passage of our Bayne law. In 1913,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: California will try to secure a similar act; and we know full well that
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: her ducks, geese, quail, grouse and band-tailed pigeon need it very
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: much. If the California protectors of wild life succeed in arousing the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: great quiet mass of people in that state, their Bayne bill will be swept
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: through their legislature on a tidal wave of popular sentiment.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: _Elk_.--For people who own wild woodlands near large cities there are
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: good profits to be made in rearing white-tailed deer for the market. I
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: would also mention elk, but for the fact that every man who rears a fine
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: herd of elk quickly becomes so proud of the animals, and so much
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: attached to them, that he can not bear to have them shot and butchered
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: for market! Elk are just as easy to breed and rear as domestic cattle,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: except that in the fall breeding season, the fighting of rival bulls
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: demands careful and intelligent management. Concerning the possibilities
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of feeding elk on hay at $25 per ton and declaring an annual profit, I
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: am not informed. If the elk require to be fed all the year round, the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: high price of hay and grain might easily render it impossible to produce
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: marketable three-year-old animals at a profit.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: _White-tailed Deer_.--Any one who owns from one hundred to one thousand
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: acres of wild, brushy or forest-covered land can raise white-tailed (or
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Virginia) deer at a profit. With smaller areas of land, free range
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: becomes impossible, and the prospects of commercial profits diminish
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and disappear. In any event, a fenced range is absolutely essential; and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the best fence is the Page, 88 inches high, all horizontals of No. 9
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: wire, top and bottom wires of No. 7, and the perpendicular tie-wires of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: No. 12. This fence will hold deer, elk, bison and wild horses. In large
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: enclosures, the white-tailed deer is hardy and prolific, and when fairly
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: cooked its flesh is a great delicacy. In Vermont the average weights of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the deer killed in that state in various years have been as follow:--in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: in 1907, 196 lbs.; in 1908, 207 lbs.; and in 1909, 155 lbs. The reason
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: for the great drop in 1909 is yet to be ascertained.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In 1910, in New York City the wholesale price of whole deer carcasses
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: was from 22 to 25 cents per pound. Venison saddles were worth from 30 to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 35 cents per pound. On the bill of fare of a first class hotel, a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: portion of venison costs from $1.50 to $2.50 according to the diner's
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: location. It is probable that such prices as these will prevail only in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the largest cities, and therefore they must not be regarded as general.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Live white-tailed deer can be purchased for breeding purposes at prices
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: ranging from $25 to $35 each. A good eastern source of supply is Blue
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Mountain Forest, Mr. Austin Corbin, president (Broadway and Cortlandt
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: St., New York). In the West, good stock can be procured from the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Cleveland-Cliffs Iron Company, through C.V.R. Townsend, Negaunee, Mich.,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: whose preserve occupies the whole of Grand Island, Lake Superior.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The Department of Agriculture has published for free distribution a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: pamphlet entitled "Raising Deer and Other Large Game Animals" in the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: United States, by David E. Lantz, which contains much valuable
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: information, although it leaves much unsaid.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: All breeders of deer are cautioned that during the fall and early winter
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: months, all adult white-tailed bucks are dangerous to man, and should be
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: treated accordingly. A measure of safety can be secured in a large park
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: by compelling the deer always to keep at a respectful distance, and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: making no "pets," whatever. Whenever a buck finds his horns and loses
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: his fear of man, climb the fence quickly. Bucks in the rutting season
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: sometimes seem to go crazy, and often they attack men, wantonly and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: dangerously. The method of attack is to an unarmed man almost
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: irresistible. The animal lowers his head, stiffens his neck and with
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: terrible force drives straight forward for your stomach and bowels.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Usually there are eight sharp spears of bone to impale you. The best
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: defense of an unarmed man is to seize the left antler with the left
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: hand, and with the right hand pull the deer's right front foot from
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: under him. Merely holding to the horns makes great sport for the deer.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: He loves that unequal combat. The great desideratum is to put his fore
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life
