txt: legs out of commission, and get him down on his knees.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Does are sometimes dangerous, and inflict serious damage by rising on
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: their hind feet and viciously striking with their sharp front hoofs.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: These tendencies in American deer are mentioned here as a duty to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: persons who may desire to breed deer for profit.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: _The Red Deer of Europe_.--Anyone who has plenty of natural forest food
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: for deer and a good market within fair range, may find the European red
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: deer a desirable species. It is of size smaller, and more easily
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: managed, than the wapiti; and is more easily marketed because of its
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: smaller size. As a species it is hardy and prolific, and of course its
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: venison is as good as that of any other deer. Live specimens for
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: stocking purposes can be purchased of S.A. Stephan, Agent for Carl
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Hagenbeck, Cincinnati Zoological Gardens, or of Wenz & Mackensen,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Yardley, Pa., at prices ranging from $60 to $100 each, according to size
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and age. At present the supply of specimens in this country on hand for
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: sale is very small.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: _The Fallow Deer_.--This species is the most universal park deer of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Europe. It seems to be invulnerable to neglect and misuse, for it has
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: persisted through countless generations of breeding in captivity, and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the abuse of all nations. In size it is a trifle smaller than our
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: white-tailed deer, with spots in summer, and horns that are widely
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: flattened at the extremities in a very interesting way. It is very hardy
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and prolific, but of course it can not stand everything that could be
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: put upon it. It needs a dry shed in winter, red clover hay and crushed
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: oats for winter food; and no deer should be kept in mud. As a commercial
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: proposition it is not so meaty as the white-tail, but it is _less
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: troublesome to keep_. The adult males are not such vicious or dangerous
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: fighters as white-tail bucks. Live specimens are worth from $50 to $75.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The Essex County Park Commissioners (Orange, New Jersey) have had
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: excellent success with this species. In 1906 they purchased twenty-five
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: does and four bucks and placed them in an enclosure of 150 acres, on a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: wooded mountain-side. In 1912 they had 150 deer, and were obliged to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: take measures for a disposal of the surplus. Messrs. Wenz & Mackensen,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: keep an almost continuous supply of fallow deer on hand for sale.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: _The Indian Sambar Deer_.--I have long advocated the introduction in the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: southern states, _wherever deer can be protected_, of this great,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: hulking, animated venison-factory. While I have not delved deeply into
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the subject of weight and growth, I feel sure from casual observations
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of the growth of about twenty-five animals that this species produces
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: more venison during the first two years of its life than any other deer
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: with which I am acquainted. I regard it as the greatest venison-producer
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of the whole Deer Family; and I know that is a large order. The size of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: a yearling is almost absurd, it is so great for an animal of tender
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: years. When adult, the species is for its height very large and heavy.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: As a food-producing animal, located in the southern hill forests and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: taking care of itself, "there's millions in it!" But _it must be kept
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: under fence_; for in no southern (or northern) state would any such mass
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of juicy wild meat long be permitted to roam at large unkilled. Through
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: this species I believe that a million acres of southern timber lands,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: now useless except for timber growth, could be made very productive in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: choice venison. The price would be,--a good fence, and protection from
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: poachers.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The Indian sambar deer looks like a short-legged big-bodied understudy
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of our American elk. It breeds well in captivity, and it is of quiet
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and tractable disposition. It can not live in a country where the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: temperature goes down to 25 degrees F. and _remains there for long
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: periods_. It would, I am firmly convinced, do well all along the Gulf
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: coast, and if acclimatized along the Gulf, with the lapse of time and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: generations it would become more and more hardy, grow more hair, and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: push its way northward, until it reached the latitude of Tennessee. But
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: then, in a wild state it could not be protected from poachers. As stated
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: elsewhere, Dr. Ray V. Pierce has successfully acclimatized and bred this
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: species in his St. Vincent Island game preserve, near Apalachicola,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Florida. More than that, the species has crossed with the white-tailed
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: deer of the Island.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Living specimen of the Indian Sambar deer are worth from $125 to $250,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: according to size and other conditions. Just at present it seems
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: difficult for Americans to procure a sufficient number of _males!_ We
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: have had very bad luck with several males that we attempted to import
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: for breeding purposes.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: _The Mallard Duck_.--A great many persons have made persistent attempts
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: to breed the canvasback, redhead, mallard, black duck, pintail, teal and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: other species, on a commercial basis. So far as I am aware the mallard
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: is the only wild duck that has been bred in sufficient numbers to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: slaughter for the markets. The wood duck and mandarin can be bred in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: fair numbers, but only sufficient to supply the demand for _living_
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: birds, for park purposes. One would naturally suppose that a species as
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: closely allied to the mallard as the black duck _is_ known to be, would
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: breed like the mallard; but the black duck is so timid and nervous about
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: nesting as to be almost worthless in captivity. All the species named
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: above, except the mallard, must at present, and in general, be regarded
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: as failures in breeding for the market.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Of all American ducks the common mallard is the most persistent and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: successful breeder. It quickly becomes accustomed to captivity, it
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: enjoys park life, and when given even half a chance it will breed and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: rear its young.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Unquestionably, the mallard duck can be reared in captivity in numbers
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: limited only by the extent of breeder's facilities. The amount of net
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: profit that can be realized depends wholly upon the business acumen and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: judgment displayed in the management of the flock. The total amount of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: knowledge necessary to success is not so very great, but at the same
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: time, the exercise of a fair amount of intelligence, and also careful
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: diligence, is absolutely necessary. Naturally the care and food of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: flock must not cost extravagantly, or the profits will inevitably
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: disappear.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: As a contribution to the cause of game-breeding for the market, and the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: creation of a new industry of value, Mr. L.S. Crandall and the author
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: wrote for the New York State Conservation Commission a pamphlet on
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "Breeding Mallard Ducks for Market." Copies of it can be procured of our
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: State Conservation Commission at Albany, by enclosing ten cents in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: stamps.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: BREEDING FUR-BEARING ANIMALS
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: When hundreds of persons wrote to me asking for literature on the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: breeding of fur-bearing animals for profit, for ten years I was
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: compelled to tell them that there was no such literature. During the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: past three years a few offerings have been made, and I lose not a moment
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: in listing them here.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "_Life Histories of Northern Animals_", by Ernest T. Seton (Charles
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Scribner's Sons, 2 volumes, $18), contains carefully written and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: valuable chapters on fox farming, skunk farming, marten farming, and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: mink farming, and other valuable life histories of the fur-bearing
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: animals of North America.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: _Rod and Gun in Canada_, a magazine for sportsmen published by W.J.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Taylor, Woodstock, Ontario, contained in 1912 a series of articles on
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "The Culture of Black and Silver Foxes," by R.B. and L.V. Croft.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: _Country Life in America_ has published a number of illustrated articles
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: on fox and skunk farming.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: With its usual enterprise and forethought, the Biological Survey of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Department of Agriculture has published a valuable pamphlet of 22 pages
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: on "Silver Fox Farming," by Wilfred H. Osgood, copies of which can be
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: procured by addressing the Secretary of Agriculture. In consulting that
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: contribution, however, it must be borne in mind that just now, in fox
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: farming, history is being made more rapidly than heretofore.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: I do not mean to say that the above are the only sources of information
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: on fur-farming for profit, but they are the ones that have most
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: impressed me. The files of all the journals and magazines for sportsmen
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: contain numerous articles on this subject, and they should be carefully
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: consulted.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: BLACK-FOX FARMING.--The ridiculous prices now being paid in London for
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the skins of black or "silver" foxes has created in this country a small
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: furore over the breeding of that color-phase of the red fox. The prices
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: that actually have been obtained, both for skins and for live animals
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: for breeding purposes, have a strong tendency to make people crazy.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Fancy paying $12,000 in real money for one pair of live black foxes!
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: That has been done, on Prince Edward Island, and $10,000 per pair is now
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: regarded as a bargain-counter figure.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: On Prince Edward Island, in the Gulf of St. Lawrence, black-fox breeding
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: has been going on for ten years, and is now on a successful basis. One
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: man has made a fortune in the business, and it is rumored that a stock
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: company is considering the purchase of his ten-acre fox ranch at a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: fabulous figure. The enormous prices obtainable for live black foxes,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: male or female, make diamonds and rubies seem cheap and commonplace; and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: it is no wonder that enterprising men are tempted to enter that
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: industry.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The price of a black fox is one of the wonders of a recklessly
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: extravagant and whimsical age. All the fur-wearing world knows very well
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: that fox fur is one of the poorest of furs to withstand the wear and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: tear of actual use. About two seasons' hard wear are enough to put the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: best fox skin on the wane, and three or four can be guaranteed to throw
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: it into the discard. Even the finest black fox skin is nothing
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: superlatively beautiful! A choice "cross" fox skin costing only $50 _is
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: far more beautiful, as a color proposition_; but London joyously pays
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: $2,500 or $3,000 for a single black-fox skin, to wear!
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Of course, all such fads as this are as ephemeral as the butterflies of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: summer. The Russo-Japanese war quickly reduced the value of Alaskan blue
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: foxes from $30 to $18; and away went the Alaskan fox farms! A similar
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: twist of Fortune's fickle wheel may in any year send the black fox out
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of royal favor, and remove the bottom from the business of producing it.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Let us hope, however, that the craze for that fur will continue; for we
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: like to see our friends and neighbors make good profits.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: PHEASANT REARING.--This subject is so well understood by game-breeders,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and there is already so much good literature available regarding it, it
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: is not necessary that I should take it up here.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: CHAPTER XLI
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: TEACHING WILD LIFE PROTECTION TO THE YOUNG
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Thousands of busy and burdened men and women are to-day striving hard,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: early and late, to promote measures that will preserve the valuable wild
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: life of the world. They desire to leave to the boys and girls of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: tomorrow a good showing of the marvelous bird and animal forms that make
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the world beautiful and interesting. They are acting on the principle
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: that the wild life of to-day is not ours, to destroy or to keep as we
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: choose, but has been given to us _in trust_, partly for our benefit and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: partly for those who come after us and audit our accounts. They believe
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: that we have no right to squander and destroy a wild-life heritage of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: priceless value which we have done nothing to create, and which is not
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: ours to destroy.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: DUTY OF PARENTS.--This being the case, it is very necessary that the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: young people of to-day should be taught, early and often, the virtue and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the necessity of wild-life protection. There is no reason that the boy
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of to-day should not take up his share of the common burden, just as
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: soon as he is old enough to wander alone through the woods. Let him be
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: taught in precise terms that he must _not rob birds' nests_, and that he
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: _must not shoot song-birds, woodpeckers and kingfishers_ with a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 22-calibre rifle, or any other gun. At this moment there lies upon my
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: side table a vicious little 22-calibre rifle that was taken from two
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: boys who were camping in the woods of Connecticut, and amusing
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: themselves by shooting valuable insectivorous birds. Now those boys were
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: not wholly to blame for what they were doing; but their fathers and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: mothers were _very much to blame_! They should have been taught at the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: parental knee that it is very wrong to kill any bird except a genuine
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: game bird, and then only in the lawful open season. Those two fathers
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: paid $10 each for having failed in their duty; and it served them right;
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: for they were the real culprits.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Small-calibre rifles are becoming alarmingly common in the hands of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: boys. _Parents must do their duty in the training of their boys against
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: bird-shooting!_ It is a very serious matter. A million boys who roam the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: fields with small rifles without having been instructed in protection,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: can destroy an appalling number of valuable birds in the course of a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: year. Some parents are so slavishly devoted to their children that they
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: wish them to do everything they please, and be checked in nothing. Such
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: parents constitute one of the pests of society, and a drag upon the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: happiness of their own children! It is now the bounden duty of each
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: parent to teach each one of his or her children that the time has come
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: when the resources of nature, and especially wild life, must be
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: conserved. To permit boys to grow up and acquire guns without this
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: knowledge is very wrong.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: THE DUTY OF TEACHERS AND SCHOOLS.--A great deal of "nature study" is
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: being taught in the public schools of the United States. That the young
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: people of our land should be taught to appreciate the works of nature,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and especially animal life and plant life, is very desirable. Thus far,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: however, there is a screw loose in the system, and that is the shortage
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: in definite, positive instruction regarding _individual duty_ toward the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: wild creatures, great and small. Along with their nature studies all our
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: school children should be taught, in the imperative mood:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 1. That it is wrong to disturb breeding birds, or rob birds' nests;
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 2. That it is wrong to destroy any harmless living creature not properly
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: classed as game, except it be to preserve it in a museum;
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 3. That it is no longer right for civilized man to look upon wild game
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: as _necessary_ food; because there is plenty of other food, and the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: remnant of game can not withstand slaughter in that basis;
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 4. That the time has come when it is the duty of every good citizen to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: take an active, aggressive part in _preventing_ the destruction of wild
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: life, and in _promoting_ its preservation;
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 5. That every boy and girl over twelve years of age can do _something_
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: in this cause, and finally,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 6. That protection and encouragement will bring back the almost vanished
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: birds.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: We call upon all boards of education, all principals of schools and all
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: teachers to educate our boys and girls, constantly and imperatively,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: along those lines. Teachers, do not say to your pupils,--"It is right
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and nice to protect birds," but say:--"It is your _Duty_ to protect all
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: harmless wild things, and _you must do it_!"
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In a good cause, there is great virtue in "Must."
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Really, we are losing each year an immense amount of available wild-life
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: protection. The doctrine of imperative individual duty never yet has
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: been taught in our schools as it should be taught. A few teachers have,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: indeed, covered this ground; but I am convinced that their proportion is
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: mighty small.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: TEXT BOOKS.--The writers of the nature study text books are very much to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: blame because nine-tenths of the time this subject has been ignored. The
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: situation has not been taken seriously, save in a few cases, by a very
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: few authors. I am glad to report that in 1912 there was published a fine
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: text book by Professor James W. Peabody, of the Morris High School, New
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: York, and Dr. Arthur E. Hunt, in which from beginning to end the duty to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: protect wild life is strongly insisted upon. It is entitled "Elementary
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Biology; Plants, Animals and Man."
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Hereafter, no zoological or nature study text book should be given a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: place in any school in America unless the author of it has done his full
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: share in setting forth the duty of the young citizen toward wild life.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Were I a member of a board of education I would seek to establish and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: enforce this requirement. To-day, any author who will presume to write a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: text book of nature study or zoology without knowing and doing his duty
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: toward our vanishing fauna, is too ignorant of wild life and too
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: careless of his duty toward it, to be accepted as a safe guide for the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: young. The time for criminal indifference has gone by. Hereafter, every
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: one who is not for the preservation of wild life is against it and it is
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: time to separate the sheep from the goats.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: From this time forth, the preservation of our fauna should be regarded
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: as a subject on which every candidate for a teacher's certificate should
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: undergo an examination before receiving authority to teach in a public
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: school. The candidate should be required to know _why_ the preservation
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of birds is necessary; why the slaughter of wild life is wrong and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: criminal; the extent to which wild birds and mammals return to us and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: thrive under protection; why wild game is no longer a legitimate food
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: supply; why wild game should not be sold, and why the feathers of wild
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: birds (other than game birds) never should be used as millinery
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: ornaments.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: As sensible Americans, and somewhat boastful of our intelligence, we
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: should put the education of the young in wild-life protection on a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: rational business basis.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: STATE EFFORTS.--In several of our states, systematic efforts to educate
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: children in their duty toward wild life are already being made. To this
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: end, an annual "Bird Day" has been established for state-wide
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: observance. This splendid idea is now legally in force in the following
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: states:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: California, Connecticut, Delaware, Illinois, Louisiana, Minnesota, Ohio
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and Wisconsin.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Bird Day is also more or less regularly observed, though not legally
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: provided for, in New York, Indiana, Colorado and Alabama, and locally in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: some cities of Pennsylvania. Usually the observance of the day is
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: combined with that of Arbor Day, and the date is fixed by proclamation
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of the Governor.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Alabama and Wisconsin regularly issue elaborate and beautiful Arbor and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Bird Day annuals; and Illinois, and possibly other states, have issued
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: very good publications of this character.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: THE PHILLIPS EDUCATIONAL CAMPAIGN FOR THE BIRDS.--Quite recently there
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: has come under my notice an episode in the education of school children
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: that has given the public profound satisfaction. I cite it here as an
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: object lesson for pan-America.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In Carrick, Pennsylvania, just across the Monongahela River from the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: city of Pittsburgh, lives John M. Phillips, State Game Commissioner,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: nature-lover, sportsman and friend of man. He is a man who does things,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and gets results. Goat Mountain Park (450 square miles), in British
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Columbia, to-day owes its existence to him, for without his initiative
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and labor it would not have been established. It was the first game
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: preserve of British Columbia.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Three years ago, Mr. Phillips became deeply impressed by the idea that
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: one of the best ways in the world to protect the wild life, both of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: to-day and the future, would be in teaching school children to love it
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and protect it. His fertile brain and open check-book soon devised a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: method for his home city. His theory was that by giving the children
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: _something to do_, not only in protecting but in actually _bringing
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: back_ the birds, much might be accomplished.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: [Illustration: BIRD DAY AT CARRICK, PA.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Marching Behind the Governor]
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In studying the subject of bringing back the birds, he found that the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Russian mulberry is one of the finest trees in the world as a purveyor
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of good fruit for many kinds of birds. The tree does not much resemble
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: our native mulberry, but is equally beautiful and interesting. "The
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: fruit is not a long berry, nor is it of a purple color, but it grows
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: from buds on the limbs and twigs something after the manner of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: pussy-willow. It is smaller, of light color and has a very distinct
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: flavor. The most striking peculiarity about the fruit is that it keeps
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: on ripening during two months or more, new berries appearing daily while
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: others are ripening. This is why it is such good bird food. Nor is it
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: half bad for folks, for the berries are good to look at and to eat,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: either with cream or without, and to make pies that will set any sane
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: boy's mouth a-watering at sight."--(Erasmus Wilson).
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Everyone knows the value of sweet cherries, both to birds and to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: children.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Mr. Phillips decided that he would give away several hundred bird boxes,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and also several hundred sweet cherry and Russian mulberry trees. The
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: first gift distribution was made in the early spring of 1909. Another
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: followed in 1910, but the last one was the most notable.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: On April 11, 1912, Carrick had a great and glorious Bird Day. Mr.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Phillips was the author of it, and Governor Tener the finisher. On that
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: day occurred the third annual gift distribution of raw materials
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: designed to promote in the breasts of 2,000 children a love for birds
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and an active desire to protect and increase them. Mr. Phillips gave
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: away 500 bird boxes, 500 sweet cherry trees and 200 mulberry trees. The
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: sun shone brightly, 500 flags waved in Carrick, the Governor made one of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the best speeches of his life, and Erasmus Wilson, faithful friend of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the birds, wrote this good story of the occasion for the _Gazette-Times_
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of Pittsburgh:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The Governor was there, and the children, the bird-boxes, and the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: young trees. And was there ever a brighter or more fitting day for a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: children and bird jubilee! The scene was so inspiring that Gov.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Tener made one of the best speeches of his life.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The distribution of several hundred cherry and mulberry trees was
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the occasion, and the beautiful grounds of the Roosevelt school,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Carrick, was the scene.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Mr. John M. Phillips, sane sportsman and enthusiastic friend of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: birds, has been looking forward to this as the culmination of a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: scheme he has been working on for years, and he was more than
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: pleased with the outcome. The intense delight it afforded him more
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: than repaid him for all it has cost in all the years past.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: But it was impossible to tell who were the more delighted,--he, or
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the Governor, or the children, or the visitors who were so fortunate
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: as to be present. County Superintendent of Schools Samuel Hamilton
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: was simply a mass of delight. And how could he be otherwise,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: surrounded as he was by 2,000 and more children fairly quivering
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: with delight?
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Children will care for and defend things that are their very own,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: fight for them and stand guard over them. Realizing this Mr.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Phillips undertook to show them how they could have birds all their
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: own. Being clever in devising schemes for achieving things most to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: be desired, he began giving out bird-boxes to those who would agree
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: to put them up, and to watch and defend the birds when they came to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: make their homes with them. And he found that no more faithful
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: sentinel ever stood on guard than the boy who had a bird-house all
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: his own.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Here was the solution to the vexed problem. Provide boxes for those
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: who would agree to put them up, care for the birds, and study their
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: habits and needs. The children agreed at once, and the birds did not
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: object, so Mr. Phillips had some hundreds, four or five, blue-bird
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and wren boxes constructed during the past winter. These were passed
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: out some weeks ago to any boys or girls who would present an order
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: signed by their parents, and countersigned by the principal of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: school.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: He knows enough about a boy to know that he does not prize the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: things that come without effort, nor will he become deeply
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: interested in anything for which he is not held more or less
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: responsible. Hence the advantage in having him write an order, have
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: it indorsed by his parents, and vouched for by his school principal.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: That he had struck the right scheme was proven by the avidity with
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: which the girls and boys rushed for the boxes. The fact that a heavy
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: rain was falling did not dampen their ardor for a moment, nor did
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the fact that they were tramping Mr. Phillips' beautiful lawn into a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: field of mud.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Mr. Phillips, seeing the necessity of providing food for the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: prospective hosts of birds, and wishing to place the responsibility
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: on the boys and girls, offered to provide a cherry tree or mulberry
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: tree for every box erected, provided they should be properly planted
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and diligently cared for.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: This was practically the culmination of the most unique bird scheme
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: ever attempted, and yesterday was the day set apart for the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: distribution of these hundreds of fruit trees, the products of which
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: are to be divided share and share alike with the birds.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Nowhere else has such a scheme been attempted, and never before has
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: there been just such a day of jubilee. The intense interest
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: manifested by the children, and the earnest enthusiasm manifested,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: leaves no doubt about their carrying out their part of the contract.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: [Illustration: DISTRIBUTING BIRD BOXES AND FRUIT TREES]
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Up to date (1912) Mr. Phillips has given away about 1,000 bird boxes,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 1,500 cherry and Russian mulberry trees, and transformed the schools of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Carrick into seething masses of children militantly enthusiastic in the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: protection of birds, and in providing them with homes and food. As a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: final coup, Mr. Phillips has induced the city of Pittsburgh to create
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the office of City Ornithologist, at a salary of $1200 per year. The
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: duty of the new officer is to protect all birds in the city from all
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: kinds of molestation, especially when nesting; to erect bird-houses,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: provide food for wild birds, on a large scale, and report annually upon
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the increase or decrease of feathered residents and visitors. Mr.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Frederic S. Webster, long known as a naturalist and practical
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: ornithologist, has been appointed to the position, and is now on active
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: duty.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: So far as we are aware, Pittsburgh is the first city to create the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: office of City Ornithologist. It is a happy thought; it will yield good
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: results, and other cities will follow Pittsburgh's good example.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: CHAPTER XLII
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: THE ETHICS OF SPORTSMANSHIP
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: I count it as rather strange that American and English sportsmen have
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: hunted and shot for a century, and until 1908 formulated practically
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: nothing to establish and define the ethics of shooting game. Here and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: there, a few unwritten principles have been evolved, and have become
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: fixed by common consent; but the total number of these is very few.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Perhaps this has been for the reason that every free and independent
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: sportsman prefers to be a law unto himself. Is it not doubly strange,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: however, that even down to the present year the term "sportsmen" never
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: has been defined by a sportsman!
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Forty years ago, a sportsman might have been defined, according to the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: standards of that period, as a man who hunts wild game for pleasure.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Those were the days wherein no one foresaw the wholesale annihilation of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: species, and there were no wilderness game preserves. In those days,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: gentlemen shot female hoofed game, trapped bears if they felt like it,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: killed ten times as much big game as they could use, and no one made any
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: fuss whatever about the waste or extermination of wild life.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Those were the days of ox-teams and broad-axes. To-day, we are living in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: a totally different world,--a world of grinding, crunching, pulverizing
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: progress, a world of annihilation of the works of Nature. And what is a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: sportsman to-day?
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: A SPORTSMAN is a man who loves Nature, and who in the enjoyment of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: outdoor life and exploration takes a reasonable toll of Nature's wild
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: animals, but not for commercial profit, and only so long as his hunting
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: does not promote the extermination of species.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In view of the disappearance of wild life all over the habitable globe,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and the steady extermination of species, the ethics of sportsmanship has
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: become a matter of tremendous importance. If a man can shoot the last
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: living Burchell zebra, or prong-horned antelope, and be a sportsman and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: a gentleman, then we may just as well drop down all bars, and say no
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: more about the ethics of shooting game.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: But the real gentlemen-sportsmen of the world are not insensible to the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: duties of the hour in regard to the taking or not taking of game. The
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: time has come when canon laws should be laid down, of world-wide
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: application, and so thoroughly accepted and promulgated that their
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: binding force can not be ignored. Among other things, it is time for a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: list of species to be published which no man claiming to be either a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: gentleman or a sportsman can shoot for aught else than preservation in a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: public museum. Of course, this list would be composed of the species
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: that are threatened with extermination. Of American animals it should
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: include the prong-horned antelope, Mexican mountain sheep, all the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: mountain sheep and goats in the United States, the California grizzly
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: bear, mule deer, West Indian seal and California elephant seal and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: walrus.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In Africa that list should include the eland, white rhinoceros,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: blessbok, bontebok, kudu, giraffes and southern elephants, sable
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: antelope, rhinoceros south of the Zambesi, leucoryx antelope and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: whale-headed stork. In Asia it should include the great Indian
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: rhinoceros and its allied species, the burrhel, the Nilgiri tahr and the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: gayal. The David deer of Manchuria already is extinct in a wild state.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In Australia the interdiction should include the thylacine or Tasmanian
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: wolf, all the large kangaroos, the emu, lyre bird and the mallee-bird.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Think what it would mean to the species named above if all the sportsmen
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of the world would unite in their defense, both actively and passively!
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: It would be to those species a modus vivendi worth while.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Prior to 1908, no effort (so far as we are aware) ever had been made to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: promote the establishment of a comprehensive and up-to-date code of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: ethics for sportsmen who shoot. A few clubs of men who are hunters of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: big game had expressed in their constitutions a few brief principles for
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the purpose of standardizing their own respective memberships, but that
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: was all. I have not taken pains to make a general canvass of sportsmen's
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: clubs to ascertain what rules have been laid down by any large number of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: organizations.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The Boone and Crockett Club, of New York and Washington, had in its
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: constitution the following excellent article:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "Article X. The use of steel traps, the making of large bags, the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: killing of game while swimming in water, or helpless in deep snow, and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the unnecessary killing of females or young of any species of ruminant,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: shall be deemed offenses. Any member who shall commit such offenses may
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: be suspended, or expelled from the Club by unanimous vote of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Executive Committee."
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In 1906, this Club condemned the use of automatic shotguns in hunting as
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: unsportsmanlike.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The Lewis and Clark Club, of Pittsburgh, has in its constitution, as
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Section 3 of Article 3, the following comprehensive principle:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "The term 'legitimate sport' means not only the observance of local
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: laws, but excludes all methods of taking game other than by fair
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: stalking or still hunting."
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: At the end of the constitution of this club is this declaration, and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: admonition:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "_Purchase and sale of Trophies_.--As the purchase of heads and horns
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: establishes a market value, and encourages Indians and others to "shoot
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: for sale," often in violation of local laws and always to the detriment
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of the protection of game for legitimate sport, the Lewis and Clark Club
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: condemns the purchase or the sale of the heads or horns of any game."
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In 1906 the Lewis and Clark Club condemned the use of automatic
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: shotguns as unsportsmanlike.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The Shikar Club, of London, a club which contains all the big-game
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: hunters of the nobility and gentry of England,[Q] and of which His
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Majesty King George is Honorary President, has declared the leading
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: feature of its "Objects" in the following terms:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "To maintain the standard of sportsmanship. It is not squandered bullets
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and swollen bags which appeal to us. The test is rather in a love of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: forest, mountains and desert; in acquired knowledge of the habits of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: animals; in the strenuous pursuit of a wary and dangerous quarry; in the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: instinct for a well-devised approach to a fair shooting distance; and in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the patient retrieve of a wounded animal."
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: [Footnote Q: This organization contains in its list of members the most
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: distinguished names in the modern annals of British sport and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: exploration. Its honorary membership, of eight persons, contains the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: names of three Americans: Theodore Roosevelt, Madison Grant and W.T.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Hornaday; and of this fact at least one person is extremely proud!]
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In 1908 the Camp-Fire Club of America formally adopted, as its code of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: ethics, the "Sportsman's Platform" of fifteen articles that was prepared
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: by the writer and placed before the sportsmen of America, Great Britain
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and her colonial dependencies in that year. In the book of the Club it
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: regularly appears as follows:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: CODE OF ETHICS
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: OF THE
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: CAMP-FIRE CLUB OF AMERICA
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: _Proposed by Wm. T. Hornaday and adopted December 10, 1908_
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 1. The wild animal life of to-day is not ours, to do with as we
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: please. The original stock is given to us _in trust_, for the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: benefit both of the present and the future. We must render an
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: accounting of this trust to those who come after us.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 2. Judging from the rate at which the wild creatures of North
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: America are now being destroyed, fifty years hence there will be no
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: large game left in the United States nor in Canada, outside of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: rigidly protected game preserves. It is therefore the duty of every
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: good citizen to promote the protection of forests and wild life and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the creation of game preserves, while a supply of game remains.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Every man who finds pleasure in hunting or fishing should be willing
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: to spend both time and money in active work for the protection of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: forests, fish and game.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 3. The sale of game is incompatible with the perpetual preservation
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of a proper stock of game; therefore it should be prohibited by laws
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and by public sentiment.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 4. In the settled and civilized regions of North America there is no
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: real _necessity_ for the consumption of wild game as human food: nor
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: is there any good excuse for the sale of game for food purposes. The
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: maintenance of hired laborers on wild game should be prohibited
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: everywhere, under severe penalties.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 5. An Indian has no more right to kill wild game, or to subsist upon
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: it all the year round, than any white man in the same locality. The
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Indian has no inherent or God-given ownership of the game of North
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: America, anymore than of its mineral resources; and he should be
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: governed by the same game laws as white men.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 6. No man can be a good citizen and also be a slaughterer of game or
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: fishes beyond the narrow limits compatible with high-class
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: sportsmanship.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 7. A game-butcher or a market-hunter is an undesirable citizen, and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: should be treated as such.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 8. The highest purpose which the killing of wild game and game
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: fishes can hereafter be made to serve is in furnishing objects to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: overworked men for tramping and camping trips in the wilds; and the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: value of wild game as human food should no longer be regarded as an
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: important factor in its pursuit.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 9. If rightly conserved, wild game constitutes a valuable asset to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: any country which possesses it; and it is good statesmanship to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: protect it.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 10. An ideal hunting trip consists of a good comrade, fine country,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and a _very few_ trophies per hunter.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 11. In an ideal hunting trip, the death of the game is only an
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: incident; and by no means is it really necessary to a successful
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: outing.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 12. The best hunter is the man who finds the most game, kills the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: least, and leaves behind him no wounded animals.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 13. The killing of an animal means the end of its most interesting
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: period. When the country is fine, pursuit is more interesting than
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: possession.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 14. The killing of a female hoofed animal, save for special
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: preservation, is to be regarded as incompatible with the highest
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: sportsmanship; and it should everywhere be prohibited by stringent
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: laws.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 15. A particularly fine photograph of a large wild animal in its
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: haunts is entitled to more credit than the dead trophy of a similar
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: animal. An animal that has been photographed never should be killed,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: unless previously wounded in the chase.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: This platform has been adopted as a code of ethics by the following
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: organizations, besides the Camp-Fire Club of America:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The Lewis and Clark Club, of Pittsburgh, John M. Phillips, President.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The North American Fish and Game Protective Association (International)
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Massachusetts Fish and Game Protective Association, Boston.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Camp-Fire Club of Michigan, Detroit.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Rod and Gun Club, Sheridan County, Wyoming.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The platform has been endorsed and published by The Society for the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Preservation of the Wild Fauna of the British Empire (London), which is
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: an endorsement of far-reaching importance.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Major J. Stevenson-Hamilton, C.M.Z.S., Warden of the Government Game
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Reserves of the Transvaal, South Africa, has adopted the platform and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: given it the most effective endorsement that it has received from any
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: single individual. In his great work on game protection in Africa and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: wild-animal lore, entitled "Animal Life in Africa" (and "very highly
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: commended" by the Committee on Literary Honors of the Camp-Fire Club),
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: he publishes the entire platform, with a depth and cordiality of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: endorsement that is bound to warm the heart of every man who believes in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the principles laid down in that document. He says, "It should be
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: printed on the back of every license that is issued for hunting in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Africa."
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: I am profoundly impressed by the fact that it is high time for sportsmen
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: all over the world to take to heart the vital necessity of adopting high
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and clearly defined codes of ethics, to suit the needs of the present
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: hour. The days of game abundance, and the careless treatment of wild
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: life have gone by, never to return.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: CHAPTER XLIII
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: THE DUTY OF AMERICAN ZOOLOGISTS AND EDUCATORS TO AMERICAN WILD LIFE
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The publication of this chapter will hardly be regarded as a bid for
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: fame, or even popularity, on the part of the author. However, the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: subject can not be ignored simply because it is disagreeable.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Throughout sixty years, to go no further back, the people of America
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: have been witnessing the strange spectacle of American zoologists, as a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: mass, so intent upon the academic study of our continental fauna that
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: they seem not to have cared a continental about the destruction of that
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: fauna.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: During that tragic period twelve species of North American birds have
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: been totally exterminated, twenty-three are almost exterminated, and the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: mammals have fared very badly.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: If "by their works ye shall know them," then no man can say that the men
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: referred to have been conspicuous on the firing line in defense of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: assaulted wild life. In their hearts, we know that in an academic way
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the naturalists of America do care about wild-life slaughter, and the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: extermination of species; and we also know that perhaps fifty American
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: zoologists have at times taken an active and serious interest in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: protection work.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: I am speaking now of the general body of museum directors and curators;
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: professors and teachers of zoology in our institutions of learning--a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: legion in themselves; teachers of nature study in our secondary schools;
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: investigators and specialists in state and government service; the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: taxidermists and osteologists; and the array of literary people who,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: like all the foregoing, _make their bread and butter out of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: exploitation of wild life_.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Taken as a whole, the people named above constitute a grand army of at
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: least five thousand trained, educated, resourceful and influential
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: persons. They all _depend upon wild life for their livelihood_. When
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: they talk about living things, the public listens with respectful
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: attention. Their knowledge of the value of wild life would be worth
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: something to our cause; but thus far it never has been capitalized!
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: These people are hard workers; and when they mark out definite courses
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and attainable goals, they know how to get results. Yet what do we see?
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: For sixty long years, with the exception of the work of a corporal's
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: guard of their number, this grand army has remained in camp, partly
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: neglecting and partly refusing to move upon the works of the enemy. For
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: sixty years, with the exception of the non-game-bird law, as a class and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: a mass they have left to the sportsmen of the country the dictating of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: laws for the protection of all the game birds, the mammals and the game
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: fishes. When we stop to consider that the game birds alone embrace _154
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: very important species_, the appalling extent to which the zoologist has
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: abdicated in favor of the sportsman becomes apparent.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: It is a very great mistake, and a wrong besides, for the zoologists of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the country to abandon the game birds, mammals and fishes of North
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: America to the sportsmen, to do with as they please! Yet that is
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: practically what has been done.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The time was, thirty or forty years ago, when wild life was so abundant
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: that we did not need to worry about its preservation. That was the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: golden era of study and investigation. That era ended definitely in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: 1884, with the practical extermination of the wild American bison,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: partly through the shameful greed and partly through the neglect of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: American people. We are now living _in the middle of the period of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Extermination!_ The questions for every American zoologist and every
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: sportsman to answer now are: Shall the slaughter of species go on to a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: quick end of the period? Shall we give posterity a birdless, gameless,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: fishless continent, or not? Shall we have close seasons, all over the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: country, for five or ten years, or for five hundred years?
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: If we are courageous, we will brace up and answer these questions now,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: like men. If we are faint-hearted, and eager for peace at any price,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: then we will sidestep the ugly situation until the destroyers have
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: settled it for us by the wholesale extermination of species.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: If the zoologist cares to know, then I will tell him that to-day the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: wild life of the world _can_ be saved by law, but _not by sentiment
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: alone!_ You cannot "educate" a poacher, a game-hog, a market-gunner, a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: milliner or a vain and foolish woman of fashion. All these must be
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: curbed and controlled _by law_. Game refuges alone will not save the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: wild life! _All_ species of birds, mammals and game fishes of North
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: America must have more thorough and far-reaching protection than they
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: now have.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Do not always take your cue from the sportsmen, especially regarding the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: enactment of long close seasons! If you need good advice, or help about
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: drafting a bill, write to Dr. T.S. Palmer, Department of Agriculture,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Washington, and you will receive prompt and valuable assistance. The
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Doctor is a wise man, and there is nothing about protective laws that is
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: unknown to him. Go to _your_ state senator and _your_ assemblyman with
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the bills that you know should be enacted into law, and assure them that
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: those measures are necessary for the wild life, and beneficial to 98 per
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: cent of the people _who own the wild life_. You will be heard with
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: respectful attention, in any law-making body that you choose to enter.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: People who cannot give time and labor must supply you with money for
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: your campaigns. _Ask_, and you will receive! I have proven this many
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: times. With care and exactness account to your subscribers for the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: expenditure of all money placed in your hands, and you will receive
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: continuous support.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In times of great stress, print circulars and leaflets by the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: ten-thousand, and get them into the hands of the People, calling for
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: _their_ help. Our 42,000 copies of the "Wild Life Call" (sixteen pages)
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: were distributed by organizations all over the state of New York, and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: along with Mr. Andrew D. Meloy's letters to the members of the New York
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: State League, aroused such a tidal wave of public sentiment against the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: sale of game that the Bayne bill was finally swept through the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Legislature with only one dissenting vote! And yet, in the beginning not
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: one man dared to hope that that very revolutionary measure could by any
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: possibility be passed in its first year in New York State, even if it
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: ever could be!
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: It was the aroused Public that did it!
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: This volume has been written (under great pressure) in order to put the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: whole situation before the people of America, including the zoologists,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and to give them some definite information, state by state, regarding
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the needs of the hour. Look at the needs of your own state, in the "Roll
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Call of States," and you will find work for your hand to do. Clear your
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: conscience by taking hold now, to do everything that you can to stop the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: carnage and preserve the remnant. Twenty-five or fifty years hence, if
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: we have a birdless and gameless continent, let it not be said that the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: zoologists of America helped to bring it about by wicked apathy.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: At this juncture, a brief survey of the attitude toward wild life of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: certain American institutions of national reputation will be decidedly
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: pertinent. I shall mention only a few of the many that through their
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: character and position owe specific duties to this cause. _Noblesse
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: oblige_!
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The Biological Survey of the U.S. Department of Agriculture is a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: splendid center of activity and initiative in the preservation of our
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: wild life. The work of Dr. T.S. Palmer has already been spoken of, and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: thanks to his efforts and direction, the Survey has become the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: recognized special champion of preservation in America.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The U.S. Forestry Bureau is developing into a very valuable ally, and we
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: confidently look forward to the time when its influence in preservation
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: will be a hundred times more potent than it is to-day. _That will be
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: when every national forest is made a game preserve, and every forest
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: ranger is made a game warden_. Let us have both those developments, and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: quickly.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In 1896 the AMERICAN MUSEUM OF NATURAL HISTORY became a center of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: activity in bird protection, and the headquarters of the New York State
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Audubon Society. The president of the Museum (Professor Henry Fairfield
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Osborn) is also the president of that organization.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In several of the New York State movements for bird conservation,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: especially those bearing on the plumage law, the American Museum has
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: been active, and at times conspicuous. No one (so I believe) ever
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: appealed to the President of the Museum for help on the firing line
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: without receiving help of some kind. Unfortunately, however, the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: preservation of wild life is not one of the declared objects of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: American Museum corporation, or one on which its officers may spend
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: money, as is so freely and even joyously done by the Zoological Society.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The Museum's influence has been exerted chiefly through the active
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: workers of the State Audubon Society, and it was as president of that
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: body that Professor Osborn subscribed to the fund that was so largely
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: instrumental in creating the New York law against the sale of game.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: There is room for an important improvement in the declared objects of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the American Museum. To the cause of protection it is a distinct loss
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: that that great and powerful institution should be unable to spend any
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: money in promoting the preservation of our fauna from annihilation. An
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: amendment to its constitution is earnestly recommended.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The activities of the NEW YORK ZOOLOGICAL SOCIETY began in 1896, and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: they do not require comment here. They have been continuous, aggressive
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and far-reaching, and they have been supported by thousands of dollars
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: from the Society's treasury. It is true that the funds available for
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: protection work have not represented a great annual sum, such as the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: work demands, but the amount being expended from year to year is
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: steadily increasing. In serious emergencies there is _always something
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: available_! During the past two years, to relieve the Society of a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: portion of this particular burden, the director of the Park secured
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: several large subscriptions from persons outside the Society, who
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: previously had never entered into this work.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The MILWAUKEE PUBLIC MUSEUM has entered actively and effectively into
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the fight to preserve the birds of Wisconsin from annihilation by the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: saloon-loafer element that three years ago determined to repeal the best
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: bird laws on the books, and throw the shooting privilege wide open. Mr.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Henry L. Ward, Director of the Museum, went to the firing line, and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: remained there. Last year the saloon element thought that they had a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: large majority of the votes in the legislature pledged to vote their
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: way. It looked like it; but when the decent people again rose and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: demanded justice for the birds, the members of the legislature stood by
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: them in large majorities. The spring-shooting, bag-limit and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: hunting-license laws were _not_ repealed.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: THE UNIVERSITY OF KANSAS (Lawrence) scored heavily for the cause of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: wild-life protection when in 1908 it gave to the Governor of the state
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the services of a member of its faculty, Professor Lewis Lindsay Dyche,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: who was wanted to fill the position of State Fish and Game Commissioner.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Professor Dyche proved to be a very live wire, and his activities have
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: covered the State of Kansas to its farthest corners. We love him for the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: host of enemies he has made--among the poachers, game-butchers,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: pseudo-"sportsmen" and lawbreakers generally. The men who thought they
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: had the "pull" of friendship for lawbreaking were first warned, and then
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: as second offenders hauled up to the bar, one and all. The more the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: destroyers try to hound the Commissioner, the more popular is he with
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the great, solid mass of good citizens who believe in the saving of wild
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: life.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: THE MUSEUM OF COMPARATIVE ZOOLOGY has at last made a beginning in the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: field of protection. Last winter, while the great battle raged over the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Wharton no-sale-of-game bill, several members of the Museum staff
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: appeared at the hearings and otherwise worked for the success of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: measure. It was most timely aid,--and very much needed. It is to be
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: hoped that that auspicious beginning will be continued from year to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: year. The Museum should keep at least one good fighter constantly in the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: field.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: THE BOSTON SOCIETY OF NATURAL HISTORY takes a very active part in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: promoting the preservation of the fauna of Massachusetts, and in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: resisting the attempts of the destroyers to repeal the excellent laws
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: now in force. Its members put forth vigorous efforts in the great
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: campaign of 1912.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: THE BROOKLYN INSTITUTE OF ARTS AND SCIENCES is well represented in the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: field of protection by Director Franklin W. Hooper, now president of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: American Bison Society, and an earnest promoter of the perpetuation of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the bison. When, the Wind Cave National Bison Herd is fully established,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: in South Dakota, as it practically _is already_, the chief credit for
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: that coup will be due to the unflagging energy and persistence of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Professor Hooper.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: THE BUFFALO ACADEMY OF SCIENCES in 1911 entered actively and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: effectively, under the leadership of Dr. Lee H. Smith, into the campaign
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: for the Bayne bill. Besides splendid service rendered in western New
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: York, Dr. Smith appeared in Albany with a strong delegation in support
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of the bill.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life
