txt: THE UNIVERSITY OF CALIFORNIA was the first institution of learning to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: enter the field of wild-life protection for active, aggressive and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: permanent work. W.L. Taylor and Joseph Grinnell, of the University
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Museum, have taken up the fight to save the fauna of California from the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: dangers that now threaten it.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: At this point our enumeration of the activities of American zoological
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: institutions comes to an unfortunate end. There are many individuals to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: be named elsewhere, in the roll of honor, but that is another story. I
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: am now going to set before the public the names of certain institutions
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: largely devoted to zoology and permeated by zoologists, which thus far
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: seem to have entirely ignored the needs of our fauna, and which so far
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: we know have contributed neither men, money nor encouragement to the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Army of the Defense.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: PARTIAL LIST OF INSTITUTIONS OWING SERVICE TO WILD LIFE.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: _The United States National Museum_ contains a large and expensive corps
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of zoological curators and assistant curators, some of whom long ago
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: should have taken upon themselves the task of reforming the laws of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: District of Columbia, Virginia and Maryland, at their very doors! This
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: museum should maintain at least one man in the field of protection, and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the existence of the Biological Survey is no excuse for the Museum's
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: inactivity.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: _The Field Museum_ of Chicago is a great institution, but it appears to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: be inactive in wild-life protection, and indifferent to the fate of our
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: wild life. Its influence is greatly needed on the firing line,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: especially in Illinois, Wisconsin, Iowa and northern Minnesota. First of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: all the odious sale-of-game situation in Chicago should be cleaned up!
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: _The Philadelphia Academy of Sciences_ has been represented on the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: A.O.U. Committee on Bird Protection by Mr. Witmer Stone. The time has
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: come when this Academy should be represented on the firing line as a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: virile, wide-awake, self-sacrificing and aggressive force. It is perhaps
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the oldest zoological body in the United States! Its scientific standing
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: is unquestioned. Its members _must_ know of the carnage that is going on
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: around them, for they are not ignorant men. The Pennsylvania State Game
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Commission to-day stands in urgent need of active, vigorous and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: persistent assistance from the Philadelphia Academy in the fierce
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: campaign already in progress for additional protective laws. Will that
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: help be given?
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: _The Carnegie Institute_ of Washington (endowment $22,000,000)
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: unquestionably owes a great duty toward wild life, no portion of which
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: has yet been discharged. Academic research work is all very well, but it
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: does not save faunas from annihilation. In the saving of the birds and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: mammals of North America a hundred million people are directly
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: interested, and the cause is starving for money, men and publicity.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Education is not the ONLY duty of educators!
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: _The Carnegie Museum_ at Pittsburgh should be provided by Pittsburgh
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: with sufficient funds that its Director can put a good man into the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: field of protection, and maintain his activities. The State of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Pennsylvania, and the nation at large, needs such a worker at
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Pittsburgh; and this statement is not open to argument!
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The California Academy of Sciences;      |
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The Chicago Academy of Sciences;         | Appear to have done nothing
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The New York Academy of Sciences;        |  noteworthy in promoting
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The National Academy of Sciences;        |  the preservation and increase
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The Rochester Academy of Sciences;       |  of the wild life of America.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The Philadelphia Zoological Society;     |
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The National Zoological Park;            |
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: A FEW OF THE INSTITUTIONS OF LEARNING WHICH SHOULD EACH DEVOTE ONE MAN
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: TO THIS CAUSE.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: _Columbia University_, of New York, has a very large and strong corps of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: zoological professors in its Department of Biology. No living organism
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: is too small or too worthless to be studied by high-grade men; but does
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: any man of Columbia ever raise his voice, actively and determinedly, for
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the preservation of our fauna, or any other fauna? Columbia should give
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the services of one man wholly to this cause.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: There are men whose zoological ideals soar so high that they can not see
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the slaughter of wild creatures that is so furiously proceeding on the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: surface of this blood-stained earth. We don't want to hear about the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: "behavior" of protozoans while our best song birds are being
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: exterminated by negroes and poor whites.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: _Cornell University_ should now awaken to the new situation. All the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: zoological Neros should not fiddle while Rome burns. For the sake of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: consistency, Cornell should devote the services of at least one member
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of its large and able faculty to the cause of wild-life protection.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Cornell was a pioneer in forestry teaching; and why should she not lead
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: off now in the new field?
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: _Yale University_, in Professor James W. Toumey, Director of the School
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of Forestry, possesses a natural, ready-made protector of wild life.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: From forestry to wild life is an easy step. We hopefully look forward to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the development of Professor Toumey into a militant protectionist,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: fighting for the helpless creatures that _must_ be protected by man _or
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: perish_! If Yale is willing to set a new pace for the world's great
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: universities, she has the Man ready at hand.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: _The University of Chicago_ should become the center of a great new
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: protectionist movement which should cover the whole Middle West area,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: from the plains to Pittsburgh. This is the inflexible, logical necessity
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of the hour. _Either protect zoology, or else for very shame give up
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: teaching it_!
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: _Every higher institution of learning in America now has a duty in this
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: matter_. Times have changed. Things are not as they were thirty years
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: ago. To allow a great and valuable wild fauna to be destroyed and wasted
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: is a crime, against both the present and the future. If we mean to be
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: good citizens we cannot shirk the duty to conserve. We are trustees of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the inheritance of future generations, and we have no right to squander
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: that inheritance. If we fail of our plain duty, the scorn of future
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: generations surely will be our portion.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: CHAPTER XLIV
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: THE GREATEST NEEDS OF THE WILD-LIFE CAUSE AND THE DUTY OF THE HOUR
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The fate of wild life in North America hangs to-day by three very
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: slender threads, the names of which you will hardly guess unaided. They
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: are Labor, Money and Publicity! The threads are slender because there is
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: so little raw material in them.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: We do not need money with which to "buy votes" or "influence," but money
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: with which to pay workers; to publish things to arouse the American
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: people; to sting sportsmen into action; to hire wardens; to prosecute
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: game-hogs and buy refuges for wild life. If a sufficient amount of money
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: for these purposes cannot be procured, then as sure as the earth
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: continues to revolve, our wild life will pass away, forever.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: This is no cause for surprise, or wonder. In this twentieth century
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: money is essential to every great enterprise, whether it be for virtue
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: or mischief. The enemies of wild life, and the people who support them,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: are very powerful. The man whose pocket or whose personal privilege is
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: threatened by new legislation is prompted by business reasons to work
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: against you, and spend money in protecting his interests.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Now, it happens that the men of ordinary means who have nothing personal
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: at stake in the preservation of wild life save sentimental
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: considerations, cannot afford to leave their business more than three or
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: four days each year on protection affairs. Yet many times services are
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: demanded for many days, or even weeks together, in order to accomplish
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: results. Bad repeal bills must be fought until they are dead; and good
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: protective bills must be supported until the breath of life is breathed
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: into them by the executive signature.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: With money in hand, good men aways can be found who will work in game
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: protection for about one-half what they would demand in other pursuits.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: With the men _whom, you really desire_, sentiment is always a
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: controlling factor. It is my inflexible rule, however, in asking for
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: services, that men who give valuable time and strength to the cause
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: shall not be allowed to take their expense money from their own pockets.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Soldiers on the firing line _cannot_ provide the sinews of war that come
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: from the paymaster's chest!
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Campaigns of publicity are matters of tremendous necessity and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: importance; but their successful promotion requires hundreds, or
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: possibly thousands of dollars, for each state that is covered.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: I believe that the wealthy men and women of America are the most liberal
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: givers for the benefit of humanity that can be found in all the world.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: New York especially contains a great number of men who year in and year
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: out work hard for money--in order to give it away! The depth and breadth
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of the philanthropic spirit in New York City is to me the most
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: surprising of all the strange impulses that sway the inhabitants of that
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: seething mass of mixed humanity. Every imaginable cause for the benefit
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of mankind,--save one,--has received, and still is receiving, millions
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of gift dollars.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Some enterprises for the transcendant education of the people are at
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: this moment hopelessly wallowing in the excess of wealth that has been
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: thrust upon them. Men are being hired at high salaries to help spend
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: wealth in high, higher, highest education and research. It is now
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: fashionable to bequeath millions to certain causes that do not need them
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: in the least! In education there is a mad scramble to educate every
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: young man to the topmost notch, often far above his probable station in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: life, and into tastes and wants far beyond his powers to maintain.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In all this, however, there would be no cause for regret if the wild
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: life of our continent were not in such a grievous state. If we felt no
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: conscience burden for those who come after us, we would not care where
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the millions go; but since things are as they are, it is heartbreaking
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: to see the cause of wild-life protection actually starving, or at the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: best subsisting only on financial husks and crumbs, while less important
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: causes literally flounder in surplus wealth.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: This regret is intensified by the knowledge that _in no other cause for
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the conservation of the resources most valuable to mankind will a dollar
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: go so far, or bring back such good results, as in the preservation of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: wild life!_ The promotion of "the Bayne bill" and the enactment of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Bayne law is a fair example. That law is to-day on the statute books of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the State of New York because fifty men and women promptly subscribed
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: $5,000 to a fund formed with special reference to the expenses of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: campaign for that measure; and the uplift of that victory will be felt
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: for years to come, just as it already has been in Massachusetts.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: At one time I was tempted to show the financial skeleton in the closet
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of wild-life protection, by inserting here a statement of the funds
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: available to be expended by all the New York organizations during the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: campaign year of 1911-1912. But I cannot do it. The showing is too
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: painful, too humiliating. From it our enemies would derive too much
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: comfort.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Even in New York State, in view of the great interests at stake, the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: showing is pitiful. But what shall we say of Massachusetts,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Pennsylvania, Connecticut, New Jersey, and a dozen other states where
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the situation is much worse? In the winter of 1912 a cry for help came
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: to us from a neighboring state, where a terrific fight was being made by
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the forces of destruction against all reform measures, and in behalf of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: retrogression on spring shooting. The appeal said: "The situation in our
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: legislature is the worst that it has been in years. Our enemies are very
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: strong, well organized, and they fight us at every step. We have _no
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: funds_, and we are expected to make bricks without straw! Is there not
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: _something_ that you can do to help us?"
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: There was!
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Only one week previously, a good friend (who declines to be named) gave
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: us _two thousand dollars_, of real money, for just such emergencies.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Within thirty-six hours an entirely new fighting force had been
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: organized and equipped for service. Within one week, those
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: reinforcements had made a profound impression on the defenses of the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: enemy, and in the end the great fight was won. Of our small campaign
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: fund it took away over one thousand dollars; but the victory was worth
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: it.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: With money enough,--a reasonable sum,--the birds of North America, and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: some of the small-mammal species also, can be saved. The big game that
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: is hunted and killed outside the game preserves, and outside of such
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: places as New Brunswick and the Adirondacks, can _not_ be saved--until
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: _each species_ is given perpetual protection. Colorado is saving a small
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: remnant of her mountain sheep, but Montana and Wyoming are wasting
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: theirs, because they allow killing, and the killers are ten times too
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: numerous for the sheep. They imagine that by permitting only the killing
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of rams they are saving the species; but that is an absolute fallacy,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and soon it will have a fatal ending.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: With an endowment fund of $2,000,000 (only double the price of the two
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: old Velasquez paintings purchased recently by a gentleman of New York!)
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: a very good remnant of the wild life of North America could be saved.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: But who will give the fund, or even a quarter of it?
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Thus far, the largest sums ever given in America for the cause of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: wild-life protection, so far as I know personally, have been the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: following:
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Albert Wilcox, to the National Association of Audubon Societies,  $322,000
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Mary Butcher Fund, to the National Association of Audubon
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Societies                                                       12,000
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Mrs. Russell Sage, for the purchase of Marsh Island                150,000
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: American Game Protective and Propagation Association, from
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the manufacturers of firearms and ammunition, annually          25,000
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Charles Willis Ward and E.A. McIlhenny, purchase of game
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: preserve presented to Louisiana                                 39,000
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Mrs. Russell Sage, miscellaneous gifts to the National Audubon
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Society                                                         20,000
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The American Bison Society for the Montana National Herd            10,526
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: New York Zoological Society, total about                            20,000
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: John E. Thayer, purchase of game preserve                            5,000
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Caroline Phelps Stokes Bird Fund, N.Y. Zoological Society            5,000
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Boone and Crockett Fund for Preservation                             5,000
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: A Friend in Rochester                                                2,500
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Henry C. Frick                                                       1,500
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Samuel Thorne                                                        1,250
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Of all the above, the only endowment funds yielding an annual income are
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: those of the National Association of Audubon Societies and the Caroline
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Phelps Stokes fund of $5,000 in the treasury of the Zoological Society.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: A fund of $25,000 per year for five years has been guaranteed by the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: makers of shot-guns, rifles and ammunition, to the American Game
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Protective and Propagation Association. This is like a limited
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: endowment.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In the civilized world there are citizens of many kinds; but all of them
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: can be placed in two groups: (1) those with a sense of duty toward
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: mankind, and who will do their duty as good citizens; and (2) those who
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: from the cradle to the grave meanly and sordidly study their own selfish
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: interests, who never do aught save in expectation of a quick return
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: benefit, and who recognize no such thing as duty toward mankind at
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: large.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Men and women of the first class are honored in life, mourned when dead,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and gratefully remembered by posterity. They leave the world better than
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: they found it, and their lives have been successful.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Men and women of the second class are merely so many pieces of animated
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: furniture; and when they pass out the world cares no more than when old
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: chairs are thrown upon the scrap-heap.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: There are many men so selfish, so ignorant and mean of soul that even
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: out of well-filled purses they would not give ten dollars to save the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: whole bird fauna of North America from annihilation. To all persons of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: that brand, it is useless to appeal. As soon as you find one, waste no
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: time upon him. Get out of his neighborhood as quickly as you can, and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: look for help among real MEN.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The wild life of the world cannot be saved by a few persons, even though
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: they work their hearts out in the effort. The cause needs two million
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: more helpers; and they must be sought in Group No. 1. They are living,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: somewhere; but the great trouble is to find them, _before it is too
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: late_.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: There are times and causes in which the good citizen has no option but
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: to render service. The most important of such causes are: the relief of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: suffering humanity, the conservation of the resources of nature, and the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: prevention of vandalism. If the American Nation had refused aid to
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: stricken San Francisco, the callous hard-heartedness of it would have
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: shocked the world. If the German army of 1871 had destroyed the art
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: treasures and the libraries of Paris, it would have set the German
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: nation back ten centuries, into the ranks of the lowest barbarians.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: And yet, in America, and in the regions now being scourged by the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: feather trade, a wonderful FAUNA is being destroyed! It took _millions
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of years_ to develop that marvelous array of wild life; and when gone
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: _it never can be replaced_! Yet the Army of Destruction is sweeping it
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: away as joyously as a hired laborer cuts down a field of corn.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: That wild life _can_ be saved! If done, it must be done by the men and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: women of Group No. 1. The means by which it can be saved are: _Money,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: labor_ and _publicity. Every man of_ ordinary means and intelligence can
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: contribute either money or labor. The men on the firing line must not be
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: expected to furnish their own food and ammunition. The Workers MUST be
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: provided with the money that active campaign work imperatively demands!
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Those who cannot conveniently or successfully labor should give money
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: to this cause; but at the same time, every good citizen should keep in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: touch with his lawmaking representatives, and in times of need ask for
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: votes for whatever new laws are necessary.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: With money enough to arouse the American people in certain ways, the
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: wild life of North America (north of Mexico) can be saved. _Money_ can
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: secure labor and publicity, and the People will do the rest. For this
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: campaign work I want, _and must have_, a permanent fund of $10,000 per
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: annum,--cash always ready for every emergency in field work. I greatly
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: need, _and must have, immediately_, an endowment Wild-Life Fund of at
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: least $100,000, and eventually $250,000. I can no longer "pass the hat"
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: each year. This is needed in addition to the several thousands of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: dollars annually being expended by the Zoological Society in this work.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: The Society is already doing its utmost in wild-life protection, just as
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: it is in several other fields of activity.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Outside of New York many wealthy men will say, "Let New York do it!"
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: That often is the way when national campaigning is to be done. In
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: _national_ wild-life protection work, New York is to-day bearing about
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: nine-tenths of the burden. It is my belief that in 1912 outside of New
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: York City less than $10,000 was raised and expended in wild-life
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: protection save by state and national appropriations. We know that in
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the year mentioned New York expended $221,000 in this cause, all from
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: private sources.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: In a very short time I shall call for the $100,000 that I now must have
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: as an endowment fund for nation-wide work, to be placed at 5-1/2 per
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: cent interest for the $5,500 annual income that it will yield. How much
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of this will come from outside the State of New York? Some of it, I am
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: sure, will come from Massachusetts and Pennsylvania; but will any of it
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: come from Cleveland, Cincinnati, Chicago, St. Louis and San Francisco?
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: THE DUTY OF THE HOUR
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: I have now said my say in behalf of wild life. Surely the path of duty
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: toward the remnant of wild life is plain enough. Will those who read
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: this book pass along my message that the hour for a revolution has
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: struck? Will the millions of men commanded by General Apathy now arouse,
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: before it is too late to act?
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Will the true sportsmen rise up, and do their duty, bravely and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: unselfishly?
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Will the people with wealth to give away do their duty toward wild life
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: and humanity, fairly and generously?
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Will the zoologists awake, leave their tables in their stone palaces of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: peace, and come out to the firing-line?
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Will the lawmakers heed the handwriting on the wall, and make laws that
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: represent the full discharge of their duty toward wild life and
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: humanity?
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: Will the editors beat the alarm-gong, early and late, in season and out
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: of season, until the people awake?
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: On the answers to these questions hang the fate of the wild creatures of
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life

txt: the world,--their preservation or their extermination.
name: Our Vanishing Wild Life
